item.text: grubya// drug skadadu/ Ar+ya dasha dko an d+ha kA ra
bid+d+haMs na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skadadu/ 'phags pa phyog
bcu'i mun pa rnam par s lo nga zhes bya ba theg pa chen pa'i
ku// mdo= sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad badrag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'dus/
shAkya rnams kyi nan ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong steng nyis
brgyalnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byams pa dang/ 'jam dpal la sogs
pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus
kyinaM/ sham thabs gsol nas// lhung bzed dang/ chos gos bsnams te/ dag slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor
cing/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms la gshegs so/
de'i tshe na shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal zhes bya ba zhig/ bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shing rta la zhon nas/ sar skya'i
gnas kyi grong khyer chen bo nas phyir byung ba dang/ shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das thag ring po kho na nas
bya@#// gshegs pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang/ shing rta de las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas//
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thalamo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das
la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ shAkya gzhon nu
bzhin rab gsal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di na bdag gi ba ma gnyis gnyid log ba dang ma log pa dag la/ mi ma
lags pa rnams rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid la// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang gang gi tsha/ ljongs kyi phyogs gzhan du mchi ba'i tshe/ bdag la/
'chom rkun pa dag rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid cing/ gcan gzan dag kyang rnam bar 'tshe bar bgyidan/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sA ngas rgyas kyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ ci nas kyang bdag la mi 'am/ mi ma lags pa dang/ dud 'gro'i/
skye gnas su gtogs pa 'ga' yang rnam par 'tsho bar ma bgyid pa de ltar/ bdag la legs par bsrung bar mdzad du gsol/ bsrung ba'i tsho ga'ang mAdzad du gsol/
de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal la 'od skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhon nu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon
la yid la zung zhig dang/ ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldane 'das de ltara'atshal lo zhes gsol nas/ shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal bcom ldan 'das la nyan nga
dang bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skadaces bka' stsal to// gzhonan shar phyogs legs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyasakyi zhing brgyad khri 'das pan//
'jig rten gyi khams nyon mongs pa thams cad bskyod pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'asengs rgyas rdzu spyod ces bya ba da
ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhasaso// gzhon nu khyod gang gi tsho bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shar phyogs su 'gron/ de'atshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te/
dran par byas shangamadun du byas te/ sams kyi rgyun gyis dmangon du byed cad songan khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung bar ma 'gyur ro// de'atsham yas bar de la de la
byas n/ khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur ro/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad b 'di bka' stsal to// rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyus thub pa che// rjel rab tu phyag 'tshal te// rtag tu de ni mngon byed cing// 'gron khyod la 'jigs mi 'byung// gzhon nu lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs
kyi zhing dgu khri 'das pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams mun pa dang/ mun nag gatshogs bcom pa zhes bya ba zhig yod// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas sems dang po bskyed pa yi dal mdzad pa rnam grangs bsnyangs pa dang/ bag tsha ba dang bral bsamangon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
gzhes so// gzhon nu khyod gangag tshe bya ba 'ga'azhag gi phyir lho phyogs su 'gron/ 'tsho khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te/ dran par byas sharimadun du byas te/
samasakyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cadi/ khyim la sogs pa'i yid la byed pa dang bra'akha/ rnam pam g.yas pa'i yid la byed pas songan/ khyod bya ba gang gi phyi'i 'groTa'i bya ba de
'grub par 'gyur zhing/ khyod 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung ba ma 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'o das kyis da 'tshatshigs su bcad pa 'ad bka' stsal to/ khyim gyi bsan/
b rnams dang/kun nasalcang ba kun bral zhing// lho phyogs sun 'gro ban// khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung ma 'gyur/ gzhonan nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyis zhing 'di nas
sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klungag khyim snyad 'das ban/ 'jig rten gyi khams yul 'das pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa sa
rgyus khon dang rgyags pa rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so// gzhon nu khyod gang gAtsho bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir nub phyogs su 'gron/ de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin
gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te/ dran par byas shing mdun du byas nas/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing/ zag pa med pa dang/ rnam par ma g.yos pa dang dran pas song na/
khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'atshatshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// chos dga' skyas pa yodaman zhing// 'ga' yang/
'gag par ma 'gyur te// gangagasachosa rnams de ltar shes// de la 'jigs pa ci yang med// gzhon nu byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'ad nas sangs rgyasakyi bye ba phrag stong
'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sasargyas kyi spobs pa can zhes bya bzhag yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/
rin chen gzugs bkod 'od gnonaces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhingagazhes so// gzhon nu khyod gang gatshe gla ba 'ga' zhig ga phyi'i byang phyogs su 'gron/ de'atsho khyod kyis de bzhin/
ga shags pa de la phyag 'tshal te/ dran par byas shing mngon du byas te/ sems kyi rgyun gyis dmangon du byed cing/ rnam par ma g.yengs par yid la byed pas song na/ khyod bya ba gang gi/
a phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grubapar 'gyur zhing/ khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di
bka' stsal to// rtag tu sems can thumasacud la// mnyam pa nyid kyi sems khyos la// sems can de la mkharas dang// khyod la 'jigs pa 'byungam 'gyur// gzhen na byang
shar gyi phyogs legs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad khri 'das pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams bdud kyi sde bcom pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud dang yid gnyis kun 'joms rnam gnonaces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so// de bzhin gshegs
0 pa de byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi steng na po'i jag rten gyi khams nA/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha ja hUM da yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i byang chub las phyir ma ldog par mdzad de/ gzhon nu dan de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs pa 'a skyes bu rtse la de lta bu byung ba yin no// gzhon nu khyod gang gatsho bya ba
'ga' zhig ga phyir byang shar gyi phyogs su 'gron/ de'atshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te/ dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/ sams kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du/
byed cing/ rnam par ma g.yengs par songan/ khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing/ khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur po/
denas bcom ldan 'das kyis da 'tshatshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// gang gis dang po'i thugasakyis// bdud rnams pham mdzad sas rgyas te// dran bzhin dun khyodasob
na khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung ma 'gyur// gzhon nu shar lho'i phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi khri 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu
snang zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems dang po bskyod pas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'byung ba'i dpal
zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so// gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa des dang po thugs bskyed pa nas bzung ste// sangs rgyas pa nyid kyi bar du tshad/
med par sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa kun tu bstan/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan bsgrubs shes rab spyadad/ gzhon nu de ni de bzhin/
gshegs pa de'i skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu byung ba yin no// gzhon nu khyod gang ga mi bya ba 'ga' zhig giri shar lho'i phyogs su 'gron/ de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la yan
lag lngas phyag 'tshal te/ phyis khyim nas song zhig dang/ khyod la phyis 'gyod pa 'am/ 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rnam par ma g.yengs pas yid la byed na/
khyod gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'adas kyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad po 'di bka' stsal to// yan lag lngasan phyag 'tshal to//
phyis nas khyim nas songazhag dang// chom rkun rnams kyis khyod kun tu// zil gyis mnana'agro bar 'gyur// gzhon nu lho nub kyi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'danas sangs
rgyas kyi zhing sum khri 'das ban/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi dra bas g.yogs ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas rin chen gdugs 'phags snang zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so// gzhon nu khyod gang gi tsho bya ba 'ga' zhig ga phyir lho nub kyi phyogs su 'gron/ de'i tshe khyod kyis/
de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te/ dran par byas shing mdun du byas tI/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing/ rnam par ma g.yengs pa'i yid la byed ngas songan/
khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar ma 'gyurazhing/ khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de tsho tshigs su
bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag byas nas// ma tog sil mas gtor cig dang// khyodan snyenub 'gro ba na// 'jigs pa 'byung bar ma 'gyur ro/
gzhonan nub byang gi phyogs logs su sas rgyas kyi zhing 'danas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung drug ga byas snyad 'das ban/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs dgarab gnas mngon 'phags
zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'osangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba zhesakhyu ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so//
gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing na mi gtsang ba med pa/ 'khrig pa med pa/ budamad med pa/ tshoram dang/ gsog ma dang/ gyo ma med pa/ snyags na
lnga med pa yin no// gzhon nu khyod gang gi tsho bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir nub byang gi phyogs su 'gron (tshangs bar spyod pa yang dag par zla ngas nas/ phyis byin
nas rnam par n g.yengs pa'i 'di la byed pa sa song zhig dang/ gzhon nu khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing/ khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar ma
'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'atshatshogs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// tshongs spyod la dag blangs byas te/ phyis nas khyim nas song zhig dang//
khyodan gang dang gar 'gro yang// chom rkun rnams kyis zalamanano// gzhon nu snying ga phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung drugacu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa
na/'jig rten gyi khams dmigs pa med pa la da la byed pa can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ den do ba zhan gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skrag med mun bral ting/
nge 'dzinamangon 'phagasargyal po zhes bya ba daltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhas so// gzhon nu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te/ dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/
'dug kyang rung/ 'greng yang rung/ sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byas nas/ rdzogs par byas shing gnasan/ khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar ma 5
'gyurago/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'atshatshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// khyod kyis ma g.yas pad byed kyis// rtag tu rgyal ba de dran zhing// ga
tubyams pa'i sems byos dang// khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung ma 'gyur// gzhonanu 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dinas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag khri nyis stong 'das pa/
na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang po senAbaskyed
tshom gcod mdzad nyon mongs bskyod ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhingagazhes so// gzhon nu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bya ba rtsom pa thams cad dang/ 'greng yang rung/
'dug kyang rung/ 'chag kyang rung ste/ spyod lam thams cad du phyag tshol cig/ yid la khyos shig/ sams can rnams la khyams pa'i sems dang/ phan pa'i sems sgrubs
shig dang/ gzhonan khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung bar ma 'gyur zhing/ dgos pa thams cad kyang 'bad ma dgos par 'grub par 'gyur ro// denas bcom ldan 'dasaM kyis
de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dka' stsal to// bya ba kun la nyin mtshan du// sangs rgyas de na dran bya zhing// byang chub semasakyang m btang dang// khyod la 'jigs pa 'byungami/
'gyur// gzhon nu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'asas rgyas de dag ga mtshan legs par gzung bar gyis shig/
chab r bcang bar gyis// legs par kun nub pa byas shag dang/ 'jigs pa'am/ bag tsha ba'am/ spu zing zhes byed pa gang ci'ang rung ba de dgathams cad khyob
'gyur ro/ deskad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dasal/ shAkya gzhonanu bzhin rab gsal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
pan+ti gas do bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gamtshana rnams gzung 'gas te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la 'jig rten gyi khams de dgamun pa ma
mas shing/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang/ dparand
bzhin gshegs pa daltar 'khor rnams la chos ston pa bzhin du mthong ngo// des 'khor de las shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal la sogs pa skye bo phal po che'atshogs
bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang/ phyag 'tshal ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ rim gro bya ba dang/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'domonyan pa'i phyir 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i srog chags stong
tshang ba de dag thams cad stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig 'byas nas dus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud/
nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gdon gyi slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad bas/ bcom ldan
'das bdag cag la phyogs de dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang mun pa ma mchis par gda' la/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams de dag dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das de dag kyang/ dper na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa tshos ston pa 'ad bzhin du gda' 'o// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bu stan las langs ti/
bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thalamo sbyar ba btudanas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyarnam grangs 'di bshad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan rnams thos nas//
mag rnam par dag cing phyogs bcu dag na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag mchis pa de dag dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de da ga gamig rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams de dag bcom
ldan 'das lags/ tshorabs gzhan du tsho'agosana'ang 'bral bar 'gyur ram// 'on te ma 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa/ shAra'i bu byang
chub sems dpa' theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag 'di ltaramig rnam par dag pa de dgan sgrib pa med ba'i tshulagyis shani tu rnam par dag
pa nyid du 'gyura'o// shA ri'i bu khyod kyisrog chagA stong tshang ba 'di mthong ngan/ shA ri'i bu 'di dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshon bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsi kha 'dasirangs kyang/
'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid gang+gA'i klug bye ma snyed dag byed du bcug nas/ srid pa tha ma dang/ lus tha ma la byang chub kyi tshogs thams cad rdzogs par byas te/ bskal ba gcig
la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan dag pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba mtshan mthun pa sha stag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyu'o bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de rnams lung bstan pa bshad pa 'di bka' stsal ma thag tu/ stong gsumagyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tugs par gyur te/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yos/ ratugayos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'dazhur
rab tu'ura'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ tshamatsham/ rab tuchematsham/ kun tu rab tu chemaches/ 'khrugs/ rad tu 'khrugs//
kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// sa bla' lha rnams kyisikyang/ kyem grogs po dag 'daltar rigs kyi bu 'di rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'amtshan bzung ba tsam gyis blun med pa yang dag
bar rdzogs pa'i byang nub yongs su bzung zhang/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pas/ don thams cad thugs su chud pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba na ngo mtshar ma//
su zhag sangs rgyas la dad par ma 'gyur zhes sgra bsgrags so// rgyalatshan bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang/ 'thab bral ba rnams dang/ dga' ldan pa
rnams dang/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bdud kyi ris rnams dang/ tshangs ris rnams dang/ tshangs pa mdun na 'don rnams dang/ tshas
pa chen po rnamasazhas/ 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar rgyu sa bla'i lha rnams kyi sgra de thos nas/ ya rangs shing rab tu dga' la/ dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyesanas tshig 'di
skadaces/ kyam grogs po dag 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan bzung ba tsam gyis blan mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su bzubanang
chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyenanas/ nathams cad thugs suchud pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ban ngo mtshar chu ste/ su zhig sangs rgyas la dad par
ma 'gyur zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par
zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin bdu byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub pa byed cing/
gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa dang/ phran glegs bam la bris te 'chang bar byedan/ gsakyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu medi dag sangs rgyas kyis
za byin gyis brlabs dang/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas par yin par 'gog par bya'o//de dag la 'cha ba'i 'jigs pa ma 'khyud bar rig par bya'o// de dag gshis ngan du 'chi bar
rnam 'gyur ro// de dag ba rol gyi gnod pas 'tsho bar ma 'gyur ro/ de dag la chom rkun dang/ dug dang/ mtshon gyi 'jigs pas 'byung bar yid ches par bya'o
tshadanas lha 'i dbang bo brgya byinabyang chub sam dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsrung ba lung bstan pa 'dishas nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'degizung pa'i phyir lha'i bu stong tshang bas yongs su
bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das/
la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang srogachags stong tshang ba gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
du lung bstan pa de dag la/ lha'i tsan dan gyi phyam dang/ lha'i me tog man+dar ba dang/ maN+Da ra ba chen po rnams kyis mngon par gtor nas/ thal mo sbyar te/ phyogs gcig tu/
'dug nas 'daskad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'da'adzin par bgyid pa dang/ 'chang bar bgyid
ba dang/ klog khar bgyidapa dang/ kun chub par bgyid pa de dag bsrung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag khyim na mchis sam/ dgon
na mchis sam/ shing drung namachis sam/ khyim stong pa na mchis sam/ 'brog dgon pa na mchas sam/ lam dang lam gol ba'amachis sam/ gnyid log gam gnyid
ma log pa dgan yang/ de dag pha rol gyi gnod pas 'gum par ma'i gyur bar bdag gas bsrung bar bgyi'o// des bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun
dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa la
rigs kyi bu'am/ gsakyi bu mo gang zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar duchos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ gnas mal dang/ stun gyi gsos sman dang/ yo byad rnams kyis
bsAn bkur byedan/ kun dga' bo de tsam gyisand bzhin gshags pa la bkur sti byas par ma 'gyur/ blamar byas par mi 'gyur/ ma byas par ma 'gyur/ mchod pa byas par/
ma 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ 'dzin par byed dam//
'chang bar byed dam/ klog par byed dam/ kun chub par byadadam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ thanaglogs bam la bris te 'changan/ kun
rgyudaga' bo de tsam gyisin de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur sa dim pa dang/ bla mar bya ba dam pa dang/ rimo dam pa dang/ mchod pa dam pas bkur sti byas pa yin/ bla mar byas pa
yin/ ratshor byas pa yin/ mchodapa byas pa yin// de nas tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga
sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ com ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs
'da'amade calags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ kun dga' bo
da' phyir khyod kyisachos kyi rnam gras 'di phyogs bcu'amun pa rnam par sal ba zhes bya bar zung zhig/ 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba dang/ dngos
bo med par rtogs pa zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan nyid med par rtogs pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bu dang/ shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal dang/ srog chags stong tshang ba de dang/ lha'i dbang bo brgya byin dang/ dge slong de dag dang/ byang chub
sams dpa' de dag dang/ lhadang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten pa'i rangs ti/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
'phags pa phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'am de rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po ba shud d+ha saM ha dang/ lo ba ban+d+ho
chu sa de ben drarak+shi tus bsgyur/ zhachen gyi lo tsa ba bany+dzaklu'i rgyal mtshan gyis zhu chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa//
sa bod skad du/ 'phags pa thar pa chen po lasasu rgyas pa 'gyod tshangs kyis sbyongs te/ sangs rgyas su grub par rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'athams cad l phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gse thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khabakyi grong khyer chen po na/ dag slong/
glu gi dge 'dunachen po brgyad khri dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun sum khri drug stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de dag kun kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ sgrib pa thams
zacad yongs su bral ba/ gzab rjed dbal gyi dbang phyug dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsang ba'i don thabs kyis bskul ba/ sangs rgyus kyi zhing longs su dag par byed ba/
zlasas rgyas kyi bya ba lhun gyis grub pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyurlabs kyis rnam par bkod pa// chos kyi sde snod srung zhing skyob pa'i phyir/ theg pa chen po'i med gzungs su 'an
cing seng ge'i sgras phyogs bsu chos kyi 'brug sgrachen po sgrogs pa// de dag gi yon tan gyis phangs nari rib dang 'dra la/ shes rab zab cing rgya cha ban rgya mtsho dang badra ste/ bdud kyi
sde dpung dang bcas par btul ba/ musnyags thams cad sdud cing semasarnam par byang ba la 'jog pa// mthu stobs dang ldan pas rnam par grol ba la thogs ba med pa// mnyam pa nyid
la bde bar gnas pa// dran pa dang ting 'dzin kun tu bzung ba/ bstan pa la mos shing blo gros dang ldan ng/ bsdu ba'adingos po bzhi dang/ pha rol tu phyind drug dang/ thabs
mkhas pa dpag tu med pas/ chos thams cad kyi don dang ma ldan pa 'ad pa/ skya bo rnams kyi yod bzhin du phyir ma ldogo pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba/ yod pa dang med pa'i shes rab bstan
te/ chos kyi rnam grangs la mkhas pa// mngon par shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ spyanalngas sems can rnamasakyi dbang po rtogs ba/ gzi brjid dang dpal dpag tu med nga/
skya bo mang bo rnams bsam gtan dang shes rab kyis sems yongs su sbyangs te/ mtshan dang dang byad bzang pos brgyan cing/ mchog dang ldan par byed pa// sams nam mkha' dang
'dra ba/ 'ag rtan gyi gzugs dang kha dog yongs su btang ste/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid lamakhas pa// rang gi rig pa dang ldan pa'ashes rab kyis sems can gang nas gang du 'khor
bar shes pa/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang ldan pas mnyam pa med pa la bsnyan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yun ring po nas bskyod pas/ sangs rgyas kyi dbang phyug thob pa/ ye shes dang/
stobs bcu dang/ ma 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa// bzang 'gro'i sprin phyi/ ngan 'gro rnams kyi sgon bkag ste/ sems
cha can kun la bu gcig pa dang 'dra par snyoms par bstan pa'i phyir/ lam rgyud ltar skye zhing lus ston par byedapa/ sems can rnams nyon mongs pa las bsgral ba'i phyir/ sman pa 'a
rgyal bo ltar rdzu zhing 'khor ba la gnas te/ nad gso ba'i tshig la mkhas pas/ nad kyi rkyen bzhin du sman byinanas/ 'khor ba las yongs su thar par byed pa// gang gis thos
kyang m grol bamed pa// de lta bu'i yon tanachod med pa dang ldan ba/ sngon 'das pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med pa lamachod pa myong ba/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid shin tu rig pa//
de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring du gnas par shes pa// rtag par yang sems can la sas rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod par 'chad pa sha stag 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a
chen po 'jam dpal dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od m g.yo dang/ byang chub sems dpa' klu shing ljon pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ byang
chub sems dpa' mthuchen thob dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi bladang/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pa dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal bodang/ byang chub sems dpa' sang gi 'i sgra dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs 'dzin dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chenan dzod dang/
byang chub sems dpa' rtag 'grus dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyun mi gtong dang/ byang chub sems dang la mtshan nyid la dad pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thub mad dang/
byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'atshan bo sum khri drug stong dang/ mthu stobs dang ldan pa'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu dang/ dge slong
dang dge slongam dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyenam dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ mi dang/ ma yin pa la sogs pa dang/ tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin
la sogs te/ gros med dpag tu med pa'i lha dang lhan cig tu nam ma bab la 'khod de/ lha'i rin po tsho'i ma tog gachar phab nas rol mo sol snyan yang grangasamad dpag tumed pa sgra rang 'byin
bar byas te/ lhatshangs pa sam b+ha ra'i gis kyi bdug pa drazhim pos bdugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i sprin phung phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten grangs med pa'i khams kun tu khyab da ra
gyur pas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thamasacad dang/ phyogs bcu'i chos thams cad dang/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun thams cad la kun tu mchod yon gsol bar gyur to//
de ltar lha rnams kyis mchod pa phul ba la'ang theg pa chen po bla na med pa lamatshol ba'i phyir ro// de nas de 'tsho de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das 'khor chen po grangs med
dpag tu med pas bskor ba de dag thabs gcig tu shing sA la chen po gal ba de logs su gshegs nas/ dpyid zla 'bring po'i tshis bco lnga lamya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i
byin gyi rlabs kyis/ byams pa chen pos sems can thams cad sdud cing skyob bar dgongs te/ gsung dbyang sachen bo phyunganas/ sgra des phyogs bcur kun tu khyab pa so so'i skyid bzhin
du sems can thams cad la bka' stsal pa// deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasakyis sams can thams cad la thugs brtse bar dgongs so//
soms can la bsrubazhang skyob par dgongs so// sams can sdud cing gzhes par dgongs so// sems can la snyoms par gzigs pa ni/ dper na bu gcig la lta bu dang 'dra bar na
rgyu med pa la ston bya'o// sangs rgyus kyi bdag nyidim mthong ban mthong bar bya'o// nyonamongasab dang ma bral ban bral bar bya// bde ba med pan bde bar byago/ ma grol ba na rnam par grol
bar byago/ los spyod med pa'i longs spyod dang ldan par bya'o// thatsom dang ma bral ba'athatshom dang bral bar bya'o/ 'gyo tshangasam byas pa 'gyod tshos byas par bya'o/ mya ngan las ma 'das/
panachu ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ de'atshida' dus na lam gyi g.yas g.yon du sa gzhamanyam pa thang bzang po yongs su dag pa bkra shas kyis chu zheng du mnyam par/
dpag tshad stong phrag bcu bsu yod pa da/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas yod la der gzhis te/ dag slong rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gnas 'di'i chos bshad pa'i
sar 'os so zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs nga nasnyen rtag tur dang/ tshal
dang chab gtsang ma 'a bab ba dang/ bza' shingagar ba dang/ me tog dgamachis pa ladagyisan/ deng 'dir char 'bab pa 'dam mchas/ shing dang tshal yang ma mchis/ grong
khyim dang/ bza' shing gi ra ba dang/ mi phal yam mchis par bcom ldan 'das 'dir rtsal dgyes te bzhugs shing chos bshad ces gsungs// phal shul ring po nas mchib/
bkres skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungasaba' rnams srog kyang ma 'tsho ste/ zas mchasanan sreg mas/ grog mchasananalus mchas/ lus mchasanani tshes lam yang
mchis so// zasam mchasan srog ma mchis// srog ma mchis na lus m mchas/ lus m mchas na chos lam yang m mchis pa lags n/ da lta 'di'i nang du 'a de lta bu'i yid l
@#// bab pa gangayang ma mchis par/ bcom ldan 'adas ci'i slad du 'di chos bshad ces gsungs// de nas shes rab chen po shAr dra ti'abus/ sas rgyas kyi byin
chagyurlabs kyis/ kun dga' bo la smras pa// sngar chos kyi phyir zhu ba'i rigs kyi/ gzhanan bsamam dgos so// de bzhin gshegs pa na stobs bcu dang ma 'jigs pa bzhiram zad kyi/
de bzhin gshegs pa la stobs dpag tu med pa dang/ cis kyang ma bsangs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dpagatu med pa dang/ gzi brjid dang/ rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa mnga'//
rgyu gang named pa de'on tan du mdzod/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyidenamathong bar mdzad/ nyon mos pa dang ma bral ba ni nyon mongs pa dang bral bar mdzad/ bde ba med pan bde ba 'jig pa mdzod
ma grol ban rnam par grol bar mdzad/ longs spyod dang ma ldan pan longs spyod dang ldan par madzod/ mya ngan las ma 'das banayongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mdzad de/ de bzhin
gshegs pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa'ardzu 'phrul dang ga tu med pa dang ldan n/ de bzhin gshegs pa larang byung mdapa'i mya ngan byar dgos/ bdag dran pa sngon dri mchan po drachemed nga ra
grags pas phalamang bo 'chos bstanang/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhananas 'ongs ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ mthu stobs dang ldan pa'i/
0 rtswa dang/ klalasogs pa'i phalamang po khang pa'i nang du 'dus te 'khod pa'atshin zas dag ma snang nas/ bdagags de'atshon phalamang po 'ad rnams kyi zas ji ltar 'byor snyan bsams
pa las/ drimamed par grags pas// bdag la smras pa/ nyan thos shes rab dman pa yang dag pa'i chos bsam pa'i rigs kyi/ thog ma nas zas dang/ gos dang/ khri
stan la sogs pa skya ma'i rdzas la rtsa'i phyir rnam par rtogangos/ dri ma chen po drim med par grags pas de skad snyas ba'i tshe/ lhadang ma rnams kyis chos lam thob/ bdag niskyes te
khyod da ltar sbas pa'ang de dang 'dra'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// dga' bo blo gros kyi mchog shA ra dwa ti'abus smas pa bden te/ thag
pachen po bsam pa rigs kyi lus bde ba'i phyir bsam pa ma yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas/ byin gyi rlub kyi mod la sa der gso ra gyi me tog gcig
dbusanas byung// de'i 'phang du dpagatshad khri phrag bzhi bcu yod la/ sa stopakhams kun kyang chub par g.yogs nas/ brtu'i dri bas kyang gser gyi me tog khyab par g.yogs te/
me tog de'i 'og tu rin po che'i khrusakyi rdzong yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu gtsang mas yongs su gang ba/ de'i ngos bzhari me tog sna tshogs rnam pa mang po la 'di lta ste/ ma tog ut+pal dang/
gyu/ ku mud dang/ pad+ma dang/ puN+Da ri ka la sogs pa mang po dpag tu med pas/ na po che'i rdzong rnam par rgyan pa khyung ste gang la la zhag gas gsar ma tog dang/

sa zhi po che'i rdzong bu mthong ba tsam gyis chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thoban/nang du zhugs te khrus byas pa lta na smos/ gal te zhugs te khrus byis pa ni rnam par dag pa dang ma spyi ba'i chos la
bzod pa thob bo// gser gyi ma dog de'i 'og tu seng ga' khri rin po che lasakhas pa// 'phang du dpagatshad brgyad ba byung ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rin po che'i khri de la bzhugs/
ts+tsha nas/ sku'i ba spu 'bu ga dang/ yan lag kun nas 'od chen po btang// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer yang gser gyi mi tog gi kha dog dang 'thun par phyogs bzhir byung bas/
phyogs bcurasangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du khyab par snang bar byas pa'i gnas thams cad du ra lung dang/ yul sa kun kyang mnyam par gyur nas/ thams cad gser gyi kha dog tu
rgyu gyur te/ skya brtsog pa'ang yod la/ semasacan dmyal ba'ang zhanas/ mdegs kyang rnam par grol te/ longs spyod dang dam pa'atshos la smod pan ma gtogs so// de bzhin
gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlobs kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang/ dbus kyi khams 'di dang 'dra bar gyuranas tha dad pa med do// phyogs bcu'asangs rgyas kyis kyang 'od de gzigs/
@#/nas (so sonasatshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la'ags so zhes bstod nas/ legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das byams pa chen pos 'od zer btang ba 'din snon/
gyi 'od zer dang ma 'dra ste/ sngonachad kyi 'od nashar phyogs su sngarashar na/ deng ga'idon phyogs bzhi nas dus gcig tu phyogs bcur khyab par sha pa la bltasan/ 'od desan sdug
bsngal kha'asems can thams cad khams gsum nas bton te/ mya ngan las 'da' bar mngon no zhes gsungs so// de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis so so'i
'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dub chen po rnams la bka' stsalab/ gas kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/'jig rten gyi khamasamamadzad nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas 'od zachen po gtong ba ni/ gdonam za bar dam pa 'tshis bstanatsang/ sems can rnams sdug bsngal ba las bsgral gyican/ khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi
khams desongal/ sangs rgyas de la mchod pa phulanas/ tsom rnams zhu zhing chos kyi rnam grangs nyan cing gsol bar rigs so// 'jig rten gyi khams de'isams can mos sadan
khro la bskrun sgyu can te/ theg pa gcig la ma dad pas de bzhin gshegs bshAkya thub pas byams pa chen pos thabs snatshogs icig nga gsum du phye ste// srid pa gsum las rnam pa grol bar byed
do/ tatheg pa gsum du bstan gyis kyang thog mar dag ba/ bar du dag ba/ thamar dag ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su dag pa/yongs su
chadakar ba ste// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni bskal pa khri phrag brgya stod du'ang mthong bar ma'agyur/ chos kyi rnam grangs bshad de cig kyang thos pa ma 'gyur/ 'khor de dag kyang tshogs 'dus
ba ma'agyur/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'agadan khri dang/ gsar gyam tog khyad par can la bzhugs pa'ang mthong bar mi 'gyur// de bsan khyed rnams 'jig rten der song la/ sangs

paN+NaM rgyus de mthobazhang thatsom dgazhun/ khyed rnamasakyang bsod nams thob la/ skya bo kun la phan pa dang bde bar yang 'gyur ro// de skadatsas bka' stsalam thag tu phyogs bcu'isangs rgyas kyi zhing der
nas: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu bcu rangarang gi gnas nas langs to/ so so'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas thabs gcig tu dong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de'ang rol mo rnam nga
brgyad stong thogs te/ ma tog rin po cha' mi chog tubazangapo'achir phub nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la bder phyin to/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lan bdun bskor ba byas
nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas so so nas tshig gcig dang/ ngag gcig dang/ sgra gcig gis bcon ldan 'das la 'daskadacesagasol to// bcom ldan 'das
bdag cag gsolazha ri zhu ba gcig mchasin/ skye bo rnams lasmanab dang bde ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye zhing bshadapa smon to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis/ phas byan pa 'byung chub sems dpa'a rnams la bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu dag de tsam yodan de kun dris shag dang/ sa khyed rnams la bye brag phyed par bshad/de nas byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skadaces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ga de bzhin gshegs panathig pa gcig las ma bshadan/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das
kyis ci'i slad du theg pa gsum du bshad ces gsol pa dang// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thogs pa med pa'i yabashesakyis/ byang chub sems dba' rnams 'baka' stsalab/ gas kyi bu
khyed rnams sems can la phan ba dang/ bde ba'i phyir don 'dilta bu 'dra ba lags kyis nyon cig/ gas bu rnams dpangan ma gcig la ming gsum yodang lta bu // chung ngu'i tshonan byis bzhes bya/
le nyi shu yan chad lan skyos bu zhes bya/ labargyad yan chad 'das banargan po zhes khyago/ ngathog pa gsum yang de dang 'dra ste/ sems rgya chung du nyan thos lan theg pa chung dur bstan/ sems rgya
'brang derang sangs rgyas tsam 'an theg pa 'bring po bstan/ byang chub sems dpa'achen bo lamachenapo la zhugs pa la nathog pa chen po bstan to// rigasakyi bu khyed rnams yang nyon cig/ mdor
mtha' gnyisamad pa dang/ phyogs gcig tu'athun tashesapa'asgo tha dad kyang mtha' gcig tu 'dago/ mdon thig pa gcig ste/ thabs spyad pas gsum du bgos kyis/
kyang/ nyanathos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'ang theg pa chen po'i ning du 'du/ theg pa chen de nasangs rgyus kyi thag pago/ de bsan thegang gsum yang theg pa gcig go zhesachos 'ad bstan
'tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'astong khrag bcu ma skyo ba'achos la bzodapa thob bo/ dag slong brgyad brgyasan dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// lha nyi khris ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob bo//
malas khri phrag brgya stong mod la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa byang chub tu sems bskyadaro// de nas phyogs bdunas phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis/ bcom/
ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar te btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cagan de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang byin gyi rlabs kyi khams

rgya'adar phyin cing/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong ba'i stang du thag pa chen po'i tshos kyang thos nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag cag gis blangs te/ gzungs su 'dzin par gnang bar mdzod du gsol//
de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i smadan/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang/ 'jig rten gzhan du ra ding/ nags dang/ tshal dang/ shing drung dang/ rig pa 'dzinapa'i gegs dang/
0 gro dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ dgon pa dang/ dur khrod dang/ mchod rten dang/ gtsug lag khang dang/ dge 'dun gyi gnas khang dang/ chos bstan pa'i mi

mang po 'du ba dang/ khyim ba'i gnas so so'i khyon khyim du rgya cher spel zhing rgyunam 'chad par bgyi'o/ de ci'i skyed du zhe na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnasan ngan 'gro kun bkag par 'gyur
ro/ dzil zhen ston de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pas sems can dmyal ba'i sgo bcad ces thos te/ gang gis mdo sde 'di las tshig gcig bton na/ lha rnams kyang rab tu dga'
ba dang/ tshim pa skyes te/ rtag tu bsnyen bkur bgyid cadi/ rangabazhin gyi dge ba spyod do// gang la las thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo 'di thos te/ dga' ba skyes nas dad pa dang
gus pa'i sems kyis ya gir 'dri'am/ yigira'ang 'jug gam/ klog gam/ kha ton du byas sam/ blangs sam/ 'chad dam/ phyag 'tshal zhing chos kyi rnam grasu'ade'inang gis sargyas
kyi mtshan gcig gam/byang chub sems dpa'i minge brjodan/ gang zagadenatsho'adi nyidi la bde ba thob// sdug ba rnamasamamatheba'ang tshe zad de 'chi'i bosana'ang/ byang chub sems dang 'a bdag cag
rnams kyis sngon du lamadrangs taM/ bdag cag gi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag bar gnasagaca tu skyo bar bgyi'o/ de ci'i slad du zhin/ mdo sde 'di blangs pa dang/ gzungs su 'dzin
pa'i slad du'o/ mdo sde 'di blangs te gzungs su 'dzin pa sangs rgyas kyi sa 'dzin pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi sa 'dzin ba na byang chub sems dpa' lags bar mngon te/ de
bsan de dag na bdag cag dang bslab pa gcig go/ rgyu dang rkyenadesan mdo sde 'di gzungs su 'dzin pa rnams gnas gcigatu skye 'ongam 'bral bar smonato// de nas tshangs pa chen po dang/
sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba rgyalapo chen po bzhi dang/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rje dang/ gnod na gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes la sogs pa dang/
pan+ti klu'i rgyal ngo dga' bo dang/ nye dga' bo dang/ lham yin dang/ namamakha' lding dang/ dbyangs canadang/ 'phrog mamo dang/ ri'i lha dang shingag lha dang/ klung gi lha dang/ mtsho'i
lha dang/ sa'i lhadang/ []shu'i lha dang/ ma' lha dang/ rlu la sogs pa grangasamed da ga tu med pa dag rang rang/ snyanas las te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thalamo
rgyusbyor cing gus pas phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'disgodacas gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa'amado sde par nga chen po phyogasasu rgyas pa
'di la rtag tusuzhanga'adzanapar brgyago/ mdo sde 'di gang du gnas pa der bdag cag gas rtag tumadun du bdar te yongs su dag par bgyi'o/ mdo sde 'dimachod rten du 'tshe/ gnas khang du 'am/
khyim pa'i khyim du 'am/ dgon pa na gnas kyi nga rus/ gal te gang zag 'ga' zhig gis sug pa mi gtsang bas mdo sde 'di bzung dag/ mgus par bklags sam/ kha ton du bgyisan/ bdag/
cag gang zag de 'gro sdod 'dug nyal spyod lam rnam bzhari lus dang sanas ma bde bar bgyi// dgad duganas ba der 'jigs shing klog pa dang/ blo bur duganod pa 'byung bar bgyi'o/ tshodil miba'i
bsnatshogs dang/ tshe 'phos na'ang sems can dmyal bar ltung bar bgyi'o/ gang la la zhig gis mdo sde 'di lo gus par brgyus te/ sug pa gtsang mas bla ngas shang 'chang des/ khrus bgyis te/bdug
spos kyis bdugatsang bklags sam/ kha ton du bgyis sa/'tshang ngam/ 'dzinatam/ yi ger 'dri'am/ ya gira'adrari'ajug gam/rjes su dran nam/ sdig pa'atshos rnamasam spyadan/ bdag
cagags mdo sde 'di bsrung ba'i su du/ gang zag de'i rim gror bgyi'o// bsrung bar bgyig/ gang zag de nyalana'ang de'amadun du mchis te ltas ngan pa rnamasama'abyung bar bgyig/ lang gcig
dun dgram rungs pa dang/ gdonam rungs pa rnams kyis gnod pas ma tshugs par bgyi'o/ de gdu gnas pa'i khang khyim yang bsrung bar bgyi'o// de ste 'gron dumachin bdag cag rnams kyis rtag

tu phyin 'brang zhing ci'atshal ba sbyar bar bgyi'o// phyogs bzhagang du mchina'ang bgegs ma mchis pa rgyun du dge ba'achosamathong zhing/ mo'aphos na'ang lhar skye bar bgyi'o// rgyu de dang rkyen des na sangs
rgyas mthong zhing theg pa chen po ma stor bar bgyi zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen bo rnams dang/ lha dang// lha ma yin gyi
cha bdag po la sogs pa la bka' stsal pa ) de de bzhinano// de de bzhin te/ khyed rnams kyis bshad pa bzhin te/ mdo sde 'ad thos par yang ma 'gyuranA/mthong bar lta ga la 'gyur/ gal te ma do sde/
'di len tan/ 'dzin tan/ chang ngam/ klog gam/ kha ton du byed par 'dod nas khrus dag par byas la/ gos gtsang ma bgos te/ khang pa dben pa gtsang ma gnang ba don dang/ rgyalamatshon/
dang/ gdugs kyis brgyan nas/ bdug pa sna tshogs dang/ tsan dan dang/ phyi ma dang/ byug pas mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas/ de ltar nyin mtshan dus drug tu thogamaran go btsugs nas/
nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin r zhing mdo sde 'di bklags te/ sems ma g.yeng ba dang/ dran pa mgiyeng ba dang/ rtog ba ma g.yeng ba dang/ bsam pa chu g.yo nga ba dang/ gzungs su 'dzin pa
rnam g.yeng ba dang/ spyod pa mi g.yeng ba dang/ bstan cing bslab bam g.yeng bar nyin mtshan dus drug tumado sde 'dab nang nas 'byung ba'asangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dang ba dang/ mdo sde bcu
gnyis rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing klog pa dang/ kha ton du 'donatsang mos pa 'am/ gus par byedas na/ mdo sde 'di'i nang nas 'byung ba bzhin du sdug lci ba kun 'byang bar 'gyur gyis/ dol phyogs tsom

mam la de gnyis su chu khyedacig/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ shar pa chen po phyogs su rgyud 'a mdo snga'adon/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi spyad pa spyod pa go/ 'di ni su zhing skyob pa ste/ sangs rgyas thams/
cad kyi yum mo// 'din mdo sde kun gyi rgyal po'o/ 'din don dam pa'i snying po'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnamasakyi lam mo// thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde zab mo 'don
'jig rten na chen bo drug dang 'dra ste/ bsam gyis ma khyab go/ drug po gang zhin/ sachen bo dang/ chen po dad mchen po dang/ rlung chen po dang/ rin chen po dang/ nam mkha'atshan
bo'o/ mdo sde 'dinas chen po dang 'dra ste/ gtsang smadang bzang ngan thams cad theg par byed de// mdo sde 'dan du chen po dang 'dra ste/ sa brtsog thams cad 'khru bar byed do/ mdo sde 'din
mchen po dang 'dra ste/ nyon mongs pa dang/ brtsog pa dang/ ljan ljin thams cad tshig par byed do// mdo sde 'di ni rlung chen po dang 'draste/ skye brtsog thams cad bus par byed do// mdo sde 'din

nyim chen po dang 'dra ste/ mun nag yod do cog snang bar byed do// mdo sde 'di ni nam mkha' dang 'dra sta/ bzang ngan yod do cog thams cad shong bar byed do// de lta bu'i theg pa chen po mdo sde thar pa na de

phyogs su rgyas pa 'di rgya che ba ni dpe zla med do// yar byang chub sems dpa' dang/ bar du nyan thes dang/ mar 'jig tshogasakyi gzugs can no cog mngashong ba med do// debs na khyed rnamasakyisimado sde
ba// 'di gzungs su bzung ste/ chongs shig/ kun tu stsal bar gyis shig/ dad cing gus par byos shig dang/ khyed byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sa ma rgyas

kyi shes khong du chud pa dang/ sangs rgyasakyakhe dag nyid mngon dmathong bar bya'o/ khyedalha rnams kyang mdo sde 'dirlus te 'dan/ rgyunadu nga'angamathong lamakhyonapa'is ngas rgyas thams cad mtho bdang
chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ dkyil 'khor chen po la zhugs par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang// de nas 'khor mang po'oning nas/ byang chub sems dang ba mtshan nyid kyis bya ba de/
'khor 'dus pa'i nang nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ com ldan 'das la'adi skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das bdag cag rnams gsol zhungazhu ba zhig mchisan/ dpagatum mchis pa'i skya bal sman pa dang bde ba'aslad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye zhing bshad par smonato// de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byung chub sems dpa'amtshan nyidadada' bka' stsal pa// shanitu legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu dri ba 'danatsa'adod pa bzhin dris shig dang/ ngas khyoda' khyabrag phyed par
bshad do// khyod kyis dras pa de'angasams can dpag tu med pa la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyidadad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
@#/gsol to// bdag dran pa sngon yun ring po 'das ngan/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan rin chenagatsug phud ces bgyi ba de'amtshanalan cig thes na ltar skye ba thob bo zhes thos te/ de las mun m ring ba
zhigan/ rgyal po lha 'debang phyuga'od kyi yul khamasan/ dgon banang zhig la rdzong chen po zhigamachas pa'achab bskams nas/ den nya chen pa steng phrag bcu zhig mchis pa gdugs kyis
gdus te/ 'gum du zhu ba las dram chu'abobs zhes bgyibs nya de dag mthong nas/ sems can la shin tu byams pa dang/ snying rje skyes te/ chab dang kha zas stsal kyang/ dgung 'ga' tsam
zhig nagasonagrangan/ tshor bom thogs par 'tshal bas/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug phud kyi mtshan lan gsum brjod pa nya de dag gis thos ma thag tu dus las 'das te/ sum cu rtsa
gsum gyi lhar skyes so zhes gda' na/ dang bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di dag dang/ dus slad ma'i sems can rnams kyi slad du/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan bstan cing/ bcom ldan 'das
shAkya thub pa'amtshanathos nasatshad mamatshes dpag tu ma mchis pa'i skye bo la sman pa dang/ bde ba dang/ dpag tu ma mchis pa'i bsod nanas dang/ rtag tu longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang/
sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid kyang mangonasum du rtogs par 'gyur ba' slad du gsol 'go/ sdom pa'i rtsa ba nyams pa dang/ nyon mongs pas 'khru la pa'i sems can rnams yongs su grol bar/
ku@#// 'gyur ba'i slad du bshad bar smonato/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid dad la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu gal te ngas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rgya cher bshadan/ bskal pa brgya stong khri'i bar dbashad kyang mi rdzogs te/ 'di ltaranu thams cad kyi thigs pa ni bag
zhing shis par rung gi/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshanani gsasu shes pa med de// rinab thams cad ni srang grangs su bgrang bar ra gi/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ni gras su shes pa med do//
nam mkha'i mtshams dang mtha' thug bar shes par rung/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshanani grangs su shes pa med do// ngas khyod la dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshanamadatsam zhig bstan gyis/
! gang gis rna bar lan cig thosan/ gang zag detsha posam thag tu lha'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur re// thos nas kyang mos pa dang gus par byas te/ yiger bris la mtshan nas brjod cing phyag 'tshalan/
bskal grangs med pa nas 'khor ba'i sdig pa kun 'byang bar 'gyur/ bsod nams dpag tu med pa thob par 'gyur// gang zag de dusazad na'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nang nas gang du dad/
ba de dang der skyebar 'gyur te/ pa'ongamathong la/ dusam 'os pa na/ bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong bar gyur ro/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rang 'khor/
wamang po rnams la bka' stsal ba/ khyed rnams tshul bzhin du gesatshags bcas la lus mi g.yeng ba dang/ sems mi g.yeng ba dang/ dran pa mi g.yeng ba dang/ rtog pa mi g.yeng bar bus la/
chos thos par 'dan/ sems rtse gcig tu sdus shig/ bcom ldan 'dasamar me rarab rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'dasarin chen rgyal la phyag 'tshalale// bcom ldan 'das rin
chen gtsug phud la phyag 'tshalalo// bcom ldan 'das redabagamed la phyag 'tshal bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das rin chenamang la phyag 'tshal/
go/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// chos thams cad sdud cing 'dzinipa la phyag 'tshal lo// brjod dpag 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// dpe zla med la phyag 'tshal lo//
mu med chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ bsam khyab dka' la phyag 'tshal lo// stobs lo gnas pa'i stobs kyi stobs la phyags 'tshal lo// 'jigs pa med pa'i stobs bcu la phyag 'tshal lo//
jig rten gsum gyi gsol phyag 'tshal lo// thamasacad 'dren pa'i ston ba chen bal phyag 'tshal// 'ching ba kun gcod la phyag 'tshal lo/ b.rel gyi mthar phyin la phyag 'tshal lo/
'jig rten kun las 'das zin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor ba'i rgyud dang yongasas bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha' ltar
dmigs su med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// mang po'i nang narnyes kyi rgyal la phyag 'tshal// bdud bzhi'i tshogs 'dzanas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bu gcig pa'i pha ltar
byams pa chen po la phyag 'tshol lo// tshe rabs 'chi 'phos gar byung bar skyes kyang/ sas rgyas kyi zhal rtag tu ma byung zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid mngon par rtogs la/ mya ngan las 'das/
pachen por phyin par gyur cig/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'jigatshogos can kun la sangs rgyasakyi bdag nyid yod pa'i phyir ro// kyi 'khor mang po rnamasasor mkhacu'i thal mo sbyor la yang dag pa dag
cing/ sems thag pa nas mchod ba phul cig/ ngas ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi/ sangs rgyas mtshan rnams bshad kyis nyon// sdig pa mtshams med lnga po yang// rnam grolamtshan nyid bskyed
par bya'o// dge rtsamed pa'i gang zag la/ ngasani dgrol zhing bshad kyis kyang// des kyang chud par ma nus te// sa bon tshig rnams rang bzhin dang/ grung ban 'ba' zhig gnas par/
'gyur// theg pa chung bas 'anasas// theg chen nye tshoyod par 'gyur// theg pa gnyis pobasal nas su// theg pa gcig pu yod par 'gyur/ dge tshu med pa'i gang zag gis//
sgra 'di thos par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas grangasamedamachod myong bas// gdod des sangs rgyasamtshan thos so// len cing 'dzin bar byedapa ni// phyogs tsam rnam par grol ba ste//
wa rnam dag sa la bde bar gnas// de yang ng yi chos 'di la// sangs rgyas spyad pa kun spyod de// sangs rgyas mtshan la phyag 'tshal zhing// mdo 'di byung zhing klog 'chang na// bdud kyi
lasadang bral bar 'gyur// rtsa ba bzhi dang mtshams med dang// log spyod rnams kyi sdig kyang 'bying// ma 'ongs dusan gang zagade// 'phags pa'i lam yang nges par 'grub// gang
zhig dadabu ma skyes na// nasong gsum du ltung yang dag dud skyesaban 'grus phyag 'tshalan// tshad med sangs rgyasamathong bar 'gyur// debs rtse gcig phyag tshol cig/ sdug
pa dpagamed byed byas pas// de phyir gus por phyag 'tshal lo// rinas 'khor mang bo rnams thalamesbyar te/ gang dag bar mnyan nas/lus dang sems gcig tu bsdus te/ g.yel zhing
'gyur ba med par yan lag lngas la gtugs te/ sems thug pa na/mnyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nas brjod cing bsgrugasapal/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dpag
tu med pa la phyag 'tshal go sangs rgyas nyi zla mar megasal nyi khri la phyag 'tshol la/ sangs rgyasamar mamadzadasum khri la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas thogs med ye shes mchog la phyag 'tshal/
lo sasargyas rgyal ba bcu drug la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas namamakha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal 'ako/ sangs rgyas rin chen mang la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas sbyin dbang mar me rgyal
bal phyag 'tshal lo// sas rgyas byin sgra rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ sangs rgyas 'od dbag med la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dge bar bsams la phyag 'tshal lo//

sangs rgyasas sprul la phyag 'tshal lo/ sas rgyas nyi zla gsal gyi dbal phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas pad+madag pa rgyu skar rgyal po ya shes la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rnam dag kha rgyan ba 'irgyal la/
phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas klu btsun rgyal bo la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas spren 'brug sgra rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'brug sgra rgyu skar rgyal yishes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/

rgyu sangs rgyas rin chen rgyal po'i phyag 'tshal 'go/ sangs rgyas shingasAl rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rinachenablam dbalagazi rgyalapo la phyag 'tshulalo/ sangs rgyas 'od snang rgyal po la
phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'od mig 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'od rgyud ring la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas zla 'od la phyag 'tshal ko/ sangs rgyas pas tsan dan/
rnalaphyag 'tshal lo/ sadas rgyus rilegs rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal/ sangs rgyasari rab lha'i thor tshugs la phyag 'tshala'o/ sangs rgyas 'od snyoms ri rab la phyag 'tshol logo gas rgyas
zlagazugs la phyag 'tshalalo// sangs rgyas yang dag pa'i dran pa la phyag 'tshalalo/ sas rgyasadrem bral ba la phyag 'tshalal/ sas rgyas chags med la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyasaklu'i

lhal phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas mi g.yel phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bat+tAra'i me tog dmchog la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas pa rlung dang gser gyi kha dog la phyag 'tshol lo// sangs rgyas gseradzod/
la phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyasasa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas zla ba'i gzugs brnyan la phyag 'tshal lo// sas rgyas nyi ma'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas pad+marnam grol la

phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas do zer rnam par brgyan la phyag 'tshol lo// sangs rgyas blo rgyamatsho mngon par shes pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas nu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dbyangs chen/

gol phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dri ma sgyu ma dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'daskyo sngangs laphyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin po che 'bar ba la phyag 'tshalalo// sangs rgyas gtsug
dag ba la phyag 'tshul lo// sangs rgyas dpo'abar 'dzugs la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas shasarab yon tan 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas nyi zla'i da sgrib la phyag 'tshal lo//

sangs rgyas nyi zlade rdzu'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bla med de cha ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal 'go/ sas rgyas rab mchog gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas byang chub me tog la phyag 'tshal
lo sangs rgyas zlogasal la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas nyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sas rgyas me tog mdog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas chu zla'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo//
wu// sangs rgyas the tshom mun sel la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas sdug bsngal bsgral la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas mos pa dang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyus sngon
legs la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas chos shes rab la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bzhad sgral phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas seng ge sgra'i
phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas klu'i sgra 'khyag 'tsholal// sangs rgyas 'jig rten gnas la phyag 'tshala'o// sangs rgyas dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dbag med la phyag 'tshal lo//
sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'odomatha' yas la phyag 'tshala'o// sangs rgyas 'od thogs med la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'od blamed pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
sangs rgyas 'dod dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshul le/ sangs rgyas khar pa'i rtsa ba la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rnam dag 'od la phyag 'tshal le//
! sangs rgyas rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal/ sangs rgyas shesarab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'od rgyan ma 'chad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'od bsam dka' la phyag 'tshal
la sangs rgyas 'od brjod med la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas nyi zla'i 'od 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas mtshan bzas gser btso ma'i mdog la phyag 'tshal lo// sas rgyas
ring du brtags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin po che'i mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyasadabyas dpag med la phyag 'tshol lo// sangs rgyas zil dngar gyi rel phyag 'tshalale//
sas rgyasaklu'i rgyal bal phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas seng ge'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/
ril phyag 'tshal go/ sasargyas rdo rje rgyal ba'aphyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dri mdang bral ba 'od la phyag sangasargya me tog bla med la phyag/
'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'jigs med stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal la/ sas rgyas klu rjedabang phyug la phyag 'tshal go sangs rgyasaseng ge'i gzi brjid rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
sangs rgyas dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sas rgyas 'od khyab la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kon snang la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun tu gtsang la phyag 'tshal lo// sas rgyas
sos tachar bar tsan dan la phyag 'tshal lo/ sasargyas pos tsan dan 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sasargyas nor bu rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshulale// sangs rgyas dkon mchog brtsegs rab tudaga'

ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas brtson 'grus chen po bran med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas nor bu'i rgyal mtshan mar me'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas shes rab sgron ma/
[ng]@#// snad la phyag 'tshal lo// sas rgyas rgya mtshodabal 'od snang la thug tshu'alo// sangs rgyas rdorjesra brtan la phyag 'tshal lo/ sangs rgyas gser 'od kun tudagram la
phyag 'tshal lo// sasargyasabartson 'grus che brtan la phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas dpa' brtul la phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas thugs rje 'od 'phyag 'tshal 'go/ sangs rgyas thugs rje stobs/
kyi rgyal po 'phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas byams pa'i snying bo la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas tsan dan gyi phug rnam par bakod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas bzang legs gsol/
phyag 'tshal lo/ sas rgyas legs par sad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gser gyi ri bo rin po che'i gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo//

sangs rgyas gser gyi me tog 'bar ba'i 'od kyi mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas sgron chen 'od snang la phyag 'tshalal// sangs rgyas rinapo che'i bla re stong pa nyid du brtag pa'i stobs kyi dbang
rgyu phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gser gyi me tog gi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas nam mkharin chen me tog gi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sas rgyas boDUrma rnam par bkod pa'i
rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas sku kun tumangon par ston pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshalal// sasargyas ye shes 'od mi 'gyur la phyag 'tshal lo// sas rgyas bdud kyi rgyal pa rnams tshar gcod/
la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'od snang stong la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas byams pa'i shes rab rgya la ba la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas byams pa'i 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs
rgyas 'jig rten dag pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sas rgyas dge dben zla ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// sas rgyas mchog btsun ye shes rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gdugasaran

po ma'i rgyal por gnas pa la phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas klu'i rigs bla na med pa ye shes gtse'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas nyi zla'i 'od la phyag 'tshulalo// sangs rgyas nyi zla nor bus

da la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas ye shes kyi gdan mchog brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshol lo// sangs rgyas dri med mdzod kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'od snang mtshan ma la phug
'tshol lo// sangs rgyas gser 'bar ba'i 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gser 'od snang ba'i mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyasaseng ge'i sgra'i stobs kyi dbang phyug rgyal la
phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas mchog dbus dam pa'i rgyal pAl phyag 'tshal lo// sas rgyas ba dan 'od ga la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnam par rtog pa'i mar me'i rgyal pa la
phyag 'tshal lo/ gsas rgyas shes rab kyi bza'i rgyal bo thob la phyag 'tshal lo// sas rgyas chos kyi mtshan nyid dam pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas ri rab 'od la phyag 'tshol/
@#/ lo sas rgyas me tog sumana'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas me tog ut+pala'i 'od la phyag 'tshal le// sangs rgyas stobs btsan dag pa'i rgyal bo la phyag
'tshal lo// sangs rgyas shes rab kyi stobs kyi rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyasarab dga' 'brug med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs dpag med rgyal po la phyag 'tshal
lo// sangs rgyas blo gros 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gser rgya mtsho yid 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas shesarab kyi dang rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
tsa sangs rgyas thar pa chen po bod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas chos thams cad rtag tu gang ba'i rgyal pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bla na mi ston la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa'isas rgyas
sprul pa'i sku thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas gcig/ sangs rgyas bcu/ sasargyas brgya/ sangs rgyas stong/ sangs rgyas bre la phyag 'tshalan/ bskalag
gtso me dpog tumed pa'i 'khor ba sa sdig bgyis pa'i mi bzad pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gcig 'bum phrag bcu/ 'bum phrag brgya/ bum
phrag stong/ 'bu phrag khri byab khrag khrig gang+ga'i bye ma snyed gras med/ dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas lagus par phyag 'tshal lo// gal tegang zag 'alas 'das pa'i sangs rgyasagrasaM
med dpag tu med pa'i mtshan thos na/ de bskal pa khri phrag brgyad cu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung ste/ de bas gus par phyag 'tshal// gang gis sangs rgyas
'das pa 'i mtshan// de la gus par phyag 'tshal// sems nyid thob cing sdegakyang 'byad// me dge bcu dang mtshams med lnga// phyin chad mi byed sdom par nus// dam pa'i chosani rtag tu
thos// theg chen tshul khrims ldan pa ste// de phyir du sbyor phyug kyang 'tshal// rnam pa gnyis shig ma gtogs te// theg chen chos la snod ba dang// log spyod phyogs su blta ba'o//
gang zhig sems nyid rnam dag sku log spyod cesasum bya ste// sangs rgyas dpag med rtag khyumathong// sdig pa'i rtsa ba bzhi po dang// mtshams med lngar bas gdabyas pa// rnam dag
sems kyi 'gyod nusan/ de ni tshul bzhin gnas pa yin// de yang gus par phyag 'tshal phyir// mi dge bcu yis 'byang zhing// theg chen tshul 'khrims thob pas na// de bas
gus par phyag 'tshal// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan de dag bshad pa'i tshe/ byang chub semasadapa' stong phrug bdu ma skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// nyan thos brgyad
brgya ni theg pa chen po'i sems shasatsam skyesaso// dge slong lnga stong ni dgra bcom par grub// lha dang mi khri phrag bcu zhig chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob go da ltar bzhugs pa'i sa
@#/ rgyasagrasamedadapag tu med pa la phyag 'tshalag sungasargyas gsalargyal 'bum phrag bcu la phyag 'tshalal// sangs rgyas gser btson 'i phyi dri ma bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo//
sangs rgyas snang ba dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ sas rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od snang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas spros brtsigs la phyag 'tshol lo// sangs rgyasasadage 'du
gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas seng ge rnam par rol pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ sas rgyas yon tan kun tu 'od kyiri'i rgyalapa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas yon tan de gnas rin po
che'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin po che'i me togarnam par brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dka' thub la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rar ba mtshunam
phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas ri rab rgyal po thob la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin chen dbar la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin chen

rgyu bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin po che'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dka' thubaseng ge'i nga re la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'od chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// gas rgyas

mi 'gyur la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rnam par brgyan laphyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas lding khang phyin la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas zla ba'i
gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'od khyab la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gtsug
rican la phyag 'tshal la/ sangs rgyas thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas log par dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gser thub la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas
'od srungs la phyag 'tshal lo// sas rgyas 'brug sgra'i rgyalapo la phyag 'tshal sangs rgyas chos kyi snyid po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas tsan dan me tog 'phyag 'tshal/ sas
rgyas tsan dan 'dab ma la phyag 'tshol lo// sangs rgyas pad mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas thub bla med la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas zil dngar dral phyag 'a tshul lo// sangs
rgyas rnam par gzigasal phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas nyi zla'i 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas thub med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rnam par brgyanadang ldan pa'i rgyal
la phyag 'tshul sangs rgyas da zer kun tu khyab pa'i yon tan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshala'i// sas rgyas bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i seng ge'i rgyal bo la phyag 'tshal la/ sangs rgyas rdo rje/
'jigs med la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bi cha ra'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sa sargyas ri rab rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'od zer gtsang ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
sangs rgyas dge dpal la phyag 'tshal le/ sangs rgyas 'od zer dpagamed la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gzungs rnam par rol pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sas rgyas
dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas dge mthong ting nge 'dzinagyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas yon tan bla med la lug 'tshal lo//
sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas mtshan ma'i gzus med la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gzungs 'thor la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dri mtshan med la/
phyag 'tshal lo/sangs rgyas bremtshan med la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas reg mtshan med la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi dpa phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ kasas
[“ ]rgyas shes rab ting nga 'dzin gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas rin po che'i gzugs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal le/ sangs rgyas kun tu sdud la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs
rgyas drin dpal kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshol lo// sangs rgyas gtsug tor can 'phyag 'tshol la/ sangs rgyas thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshol lo// sangs rgyas 'go par dad sa' phyag
'tshol lo// sangs rgyas gser thub la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'od srungs la phyag 'tshalalo// sangs rgyas yid sgra snyanased la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rab tu dga' di
ba/ luphyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas ri rab mtshanam la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas seng ge dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyasased/
ga'i mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo// des rgyas sbranadabang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rtag tu'i la phyag 'tshalalo// sangs rgyas dbang po'i mtshan ma la phyag 'a tshul lo// sangs
rgyas snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas tshongs pa'i mtshanam la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal lo/
sangs rgyus rta mar bar tsan dan gyi skyes la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas ri rab kyi gzugs la phyag 'tsha' go/ sangs rgyas sprin dbang phyug rgyal bo la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'jig
rten gyi 'jigs pa thams cad bcom pa la phyag 'tshal go/ sas rgyas sprul pa'i sku shAkya thub pa 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo// da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas
gcig/ sas rgyas bcu/ sangs rgyas bskya/ sangs rgyas stong/ sangs rgyas khre la gus par phyag 'tsholan/ bskal pa grangs med pa nas 'khor ba'i sdug lci ba thams cad byang
bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gcig/ 'bum phrag bcu/ 'bum phrag brgya ]'bum phrag stong/ 'bum phrag khri bye ba khrag khrig gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed grangs med/
dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyus la phyag 'tshal// gang la las de ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas grangasamed dpag du med pa'i mtshan thos na/ de ni bskal pa khri phrag drug/
cu'i bar du sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ste/ de bas gus par phyag 'tshal lo// da ltar phyogs bcurang zhugs pa yi// sas rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal na// las ngan kun las rnam par
grol// mtshams med lnga po 'i sdig kyang 'a byang// rnam dag sa la rtag tu gnas// shAkya'i chos la'ang bde gnas shing// mtha' ru ngan song gsum dang bral// sangs rgyas byams pa 'ang
mthong ba dang// sangs rgyas stong la dmathong par 'gyur// de bas da ltar phyag kyang 'tshal// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas yang mthong ste// rnam dag zhing du rtag par skye// dam pa'i tshes
kyang thos 'gyur cing// sangs rgyas rtag pa 'ang mngon par rtogs// da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyus rnams kyi mtshanabashad pa'i tshe// nu bgadaganyis kyi byom snyed kyi byang chub sems dpas
gzus kyi gor chud par gyur to// lhadang mi 'bum phrakha ni tshu rtsaganyis ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tusems bskyed do// bskal pa bzang po'isas sam byon pa dpag tumed pa la phyag
'tshal lo// sangs rgyas byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rnam dag sku la phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas me tog 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyasame tog rdzogs la phyag 'tshol

0 lo// sasargyas 'od snang la phyag 'tshol lo// sangs rgyas ming dang mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'dzam bun da'i gser 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas chos snang la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyasain

chenasnang la phyag 'tshal lo/sangs rgyas khyabasnang la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun tumtshanam la phyag 'tshal lo/ sangs rgyas natu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas shes rab ri dang rgya mtsho la phyag
'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang phyugagi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyus rin po che rnam par bkod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas skyes bu dam pa la phyag 'tshol lo
sangs rgyas dbang phyug thob pa'i rgyal bo 'bum phrag brgya 'phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin po che'i mtshan nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// sas rgyasamatho dga' la phyag 'tshol la/ sangs rgyas
bod kyi mtshanams rnam par brgyan pa'i rgyal po'i khri la phyag 'tshol go sangs rgyas mtshan 'thun pa kun tu dpa' sum khri la phyag 'tshal lo// sas rgyus 'brug sgra'i rgya la de la phyag 'tshal lo//

sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur ba bzhi khri brgyad stong la phyag 'tshol lo// sangs rgyas zla ba rin po che'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ sangs rgyas dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas
gakhrugs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gzugs dam pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bgegs kyi tshogs thams cad bcom pa la phyag 'tshal le// sangs rgyas dri'i
tshogs la phyag 'tshol lo// sas rgyas sgra'i tshogs la phyag 'tshol la// sangs rgyas 'od zer rnam par bkod pa stong phrag brgyad cu la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs
rgyas 'od zer rnam par bkod pa 'bum phrag brgyadazhu 'phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rin po che'i me tog rnam par brgyan pa 'phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas yon tanamchog gi rgyal po la phyag
'tshal// sangs rgyas gser btsoma'i 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas lung bstan pa pa'i 'od lnga brgya la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas mi 'jigs sred med kyi bu la phyag
'tshalalo// sangs rgyas me tog bzang bo la phyag 'tshal ko/ sangs rgyas sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo// sas rgyus me tog bzang pos rnam par brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
sangs rgyas rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang phyug 'phyag 'tshal lo// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gcig/ sangs rgyasabacu/ sangs rgyas brgya/ sangs rgyas stong ka sangs rgyas khri
la phyag 'tshalan/ bskal pa grangs med dpag tumed pa'i 'khor bas sdigalci ba rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gnug/ 'bum phrag bcu/ 'bum phrag brgya/ 'bum phrag
stong 'bum phrag bre bye ba khrag khrig gang+ga'i bye ma snyedadapag tumed grangasamed pa'i sas rgyas kyi mtshan gang zagagang la las thos par gyur na/ bskal pa khri phrag bzhi bcu'i bar du dmyal
bar mi ltung ste/ de bas da ltar phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig sangs rgyas ma byon rnams / de lagus par phyag 'tshalan/ kalor spyod rnams ni ma gto gas te// sgrib pa gsum/
dang mtshamaMs med lnga// sdig pa de rnams 'byang bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas chos la bde gnas shing// dpag med sangs rgyasamathengo bar 'gyur// dam pa'i mgokyang rtag tu byas M//
debs da ltar gus phyag 'tshal// gang zhig phyogs bcu dus gsumagyi// sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal na// kha na ma tho 'das pa dang// ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi// las ngan
bcu bo byas pa yang// da ltar mngon du byung bar 'gyur// phyi ma 'a dus la sangs rgyas kyi// mi nyid kyang mthong bar 'gyur// de bas de lums par byos// kha ton 'dri klog dug
'tshal na// tshor bas gang byung gar skyes kyang// ltab log par mi skye'o// rnam par grol ba rgyun tu 'thul// mtha' 'khobasaru yong mi skye// ngan pa'i yul du'ang mi skye zhing//
rgyal po ma rungs mthong mi 'gyur// bskal pa 'bum phrag bzhi khri'i bar// sems can dmyal bar mi skye'o// de bas gus par phyag 'tsholan// mu dgabanu las 'byung zhing/
gzusachen rab tu thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas mkhyen pa rnams kyi mtshan bsgrags pa'i tshe [！ ]byang chub sems dpa' lnga khri phyir mi
ldeg pa'i gnas so// dge slong ma bdun brgyas ni dgra bcomamar 'grub// lha dang mi 'bum phrag drugacu rtsa gnyis kyis chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thobate/
gakhrus chen po dang mdo snga bcu gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo// mdo sde la phyag 'tshol lo// lung du bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// tshigs su bcad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshul lo// dbyangs kyi
sud pa'i sde la phyag 'tshol lo// ched du brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshol la// gleng gzhi'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// bdas pa brjod pa'i sde la phyi'i
sgyu skyes pa rabs kyi sde la phyag 'tshol lo// shin turgyas pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// rmad du byudapa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// gtan la bab par bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// theg
pa chen po'i sde snod thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// gang des mdo sde bcu gnyis dang/ pAre'o tu phyin pa rnams kyi mtshan thos nas/ bstod pa byas sam/ phyag 'tshal lam/ brjod dang
rgyu mos pa bskyed dam/ blangasasam/ 'chadabar byed na/ ngag de bskal pa khri phrag nyi shu'i bar dusems can dmyal bar mi ltung ste/ tshe snga phyi dran pa'i ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
de'i phyir gus par phyag tshol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyisamade sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan bshad pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dab la brgyad khri lnga stong gis rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// nyan thos
ma 'bum phrag bcus theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed do// dge slong dang/ dge slong ma stong phrag btus dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thobate// lha dang med pag tu med pa zhig gis tshes kyi mig nam/
par dag pa thob bo// phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshol lo// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshol lo//
byang chub sems dang 'a spyanas gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal la// byang bsems dpa' mthu chenathob la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtag la phyag

[G]5 pa'i sdig lci ba thams cad yongs su byung bar 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan 'di dag sa na/ bsal ba stong phrag bzhi ba'i bar du//
can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dumultung zhing/ srid pa gsum gyi khams su ma g.yos to/ rtag turnam par grol ba'i khams su gtogs par 'gyur ro// mtha' 'khob pa'i yul du'ang mi skye
zla yul ngan pa'am/ lus nganapa me len/ log par ma lta/ rigs ngan du mi skye/musteg can du mi skye dbang po yan lag tshang bar 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos rtag tu thos par 'gyur/ sdom pa'i khrims ma
mnos kyang khrims dang rtag tu ldan par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po spyod lam mdzes pa dang/sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ debs zhus par phyag 'tsholato/ sangs rgyas kyi
bden par gnas shing/ phyi ma'i tshe sangs rgyas grub pa thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi mtshan bshad pa'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu
yodad pa can 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyisani phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'brasabu thob bo// lha 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhis ni lan cig phyir mi 'od pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// dge slong sems skor ba
'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa brgyad kyisani sems kyi bdag nyid slar rnyed de/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// nga chub sems dpa' khug phrag bcus ni gzusachen po thob ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus
namangon par 'tshang rgya'o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid dad la bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu'adus pa'i sas rgyas bcom ldan 'dasarin
chen gtsug phud ces bya ba de'i mtshanasems can sdug bsngalagyi gzi ba nu rnams kyis lanAcig thosan/ 'chi 'phos pa'i tsholhar skye'o zhes khyod kyis bshad pa dang/ de'ang da lasangs rgyas thams/
cad kyi mtshan bshad par gsol zhing/ sems can kun sngag bsngal dang bral zhing/ 'jig rten las bzla bar 'dod pa de'i phyir/ ngas kyang khyod dang skye ba kun dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan rdzogs par
bshad kyis kyang/ don dam par dkon mchog gcig la bkri ba'i dbang gis gsum du bshadapa/ gdal las de'i mtshan thos nas/ sems thag pa nas dran par byas te/ 'chi ba'i bar dge
ba'i bshesaganyena'aga' zhig gis dkon mchog gsumagyi mtshan lan gsum du/ namebud+d+hal/ namod+hamAya/ nam:sad+d+hAya/ zhes de skad du ched du brjod du bcugan/ me 'di 'chi'aphos nas
nasong gnam dum 'gro ste/ phyogasaranu'i 'jigarten gyi khams gang nas gang du dod pa de dang der skyobar 'gyur ro/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mthar kyis rim gro byed par 'gyur/ byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal dad kun tu bzang pos theg pa chen pos chos thar pa chen po'i phyogs su rgyas pa bshadapa 'ang thos par 'gyur// thos nas dadam
thag tu skye ba med pa chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gang zag de'ang bskal pa grangs med panas dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags pas gdod dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan thos pa yin no//
de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyidadad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na dkon mchog gsum zhesabagyi/ ngos po gcig gam/ dngos po
rgyu gnyis sam/ dngos po gsum du bgyi/ ci ste dngos po gcig na ni/ skyabs gcig tu 'ong bas/ dngos po gsum lugs ni/ skyabs gsum du gyur pas/ skyabs gsum du gyur nanisas
rgyus dang chos kyang dbyis tha dad par 'gyur te/ dge 'dun yang de bzhin no// gal te skyabs gsum zhig 'gasanani/ skye bo rnams rnam pa gsum du mthong bas/ bskal pa gsum gyi bar du chos
rgyu spyod kyang theg pa gcig tu brda mi 'jal bar mami na/ bcom ldan 'dasasems can rnams las na pa dang bde ba'i slad du bdag 'bashad du gsol/ bdag 'di thos nas kyang skye bo kun 'bye brag phyed par
bshad par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na/ gang la las mtshan thos na/ blan med pa'i byang chub kyi gnas thob par yang 'gyur ro zhes gsol pa dang/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad la legs so zhes bya ba kun te/ rigs kyi bu legs se legs so// den nan po 'dilta bu ngal zhu bar nus pa ni shin tu'ang legs so/
legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di lta bu'i don chen po 'dri ba'angs dang bodang/ sa gnyis pa dang/ sagasum pa nas/ sa bdun pa dang/ sa brgyad pa la gnas pa ma yin te/ sabacu chos kyi sprin
la gnas pa'i skyes bu chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don chen po 'di lta bu 'dri ba yin no// khyod legasapar nyon cig/ sa bye brag phyed par bshadado// rigs kyi bskye bo thams cad ni thog ma

med pa nas ma rig pas bsgribs te/ khams gsum gyi btson ra nA 'khor zhing sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi gzir te/lam rgyud drug tuphan tshunarnam par rgyud la skyabs dang rten pa'i gnas medanas lha ma srin la

phyogs te/ skyabs tshol ba mu stegs can rnams rang gi rkang lag bsrings shingasrolaM btang ste/skyabs tsholana'ang sdug bsngal las thar pa med do// me dang mtsho'i nang du mchongs te/ srog btang yang ga ler ba/

las thar pa'i dus med de/ de'i phyir mgon po chen po de bzhin gshegs pas byams pa'i ting ngo 'dzin gyis skye bo rgyun du 'khrul pa rnams la thug brtse bar dgongs te/ dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan bstan cing

ka dag pa'i rten gnas su bya ba'i phyir/bslab pa da nga pob nyan thos dang byang chub b rnams la themaskas dang 'dra bar/kon mchog gsum yang dngos po tha dad par bshad do// de'i 'ogatuyunaring du tshangs par
