spyad pa spyod pa skyes bu dam pa la yang dag par mthar phyin pa 'a dkon mchog gsumadangos po gcig par yang bshad de/ sangs rgyas dkonamchog gcig gi nang na chos dad dge/
'dun gyi dkonamchog kyang yod rab shadade// rigs kyi bu ci'i phyir dkon mchog ces bya zhe na/ dperan 'jigartenagyi rin po'i snabadun pes 'bongs pa rnams la 'tsho ba bstas pa dang 'dra bar/
dkon mchog gsum yang 'jig rtenan skye bo rnams kyi chos kyi sku bskyed pa dang/ ye shes spel bar byed pas dkon mchog ces bya'o// dkon mchog gsum dngos po tha dad pa ni/ sas rgyas rgyal po'i
khab tusku sprul nyid/ byang chub sems dpa' yin pa skad dusems can bsgral ba'i phyir brdzul zhugs dang dka' thub spyad de/ byang chub shing drung du mngon par byang chub nas/ bdag dang gzhan gyi
donamadzad ces bya ba ni sasargyas zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas ni ma rigapa'iganyid las sad pa'o// dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni mchod pa'i gnas so// ston pa las slob mas don red pa'i phyir dge
bdun zhes bya'o// dge 'dun la rnam pa gnyisate/ 'thun pa dang/ 'dusam byas pa'o// 'dus ma byas pa thob pani yang dag pa'i stod pa nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
grol ba ni 'dus ma byas pa'o// 'khrul pa bar mi chad par 'byung ba'i brag pa zadapa'ang 'dus mabyas zhes bya'o// zag pa thams cad 'gags nas/ 'phags pa rnams dang gnas gcig tu
0 'thun te/ rtsod pa med pa ni 'thun pa ste/ don de gnyis dang ldan pa ni dge 'dun zhes bya'o rags kyi bu chosan dag sdug gi chos thams cad dang/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa rnams so//
sdig pa'i tshesan dpar bya// dge ba'i tshesan 'phel bar bya'o// de dang sems kyis dmigs so cig chos dkon mtshig ces bya'o// de'i phyir sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun gnyisadades
pa'ang mi gcig la/ ngo bo nyid kyang tha dad de// chos ni dge 'dun dang sangs rgyasasu dbyings 'thun te/ soser dbye bar dka' 'o// ji ltaras sor dbye bar dka' zhen/ gal tesangs
rgyasudang dge 'dun gnyis kyi mtshan bla dgas su btags te rnam par spyod pa bas/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po lnga po thob pa dang/ dge ba'i yon tan thams cad chos dkon mchog go zhes bya bar
don de lta bu 'ang ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i yon tan dang bsod nams kyi dbang gis lus bapa yin// chos dang bralan mi med la/ las gud na'ang chos kyi dkon
mchog ces bya ba gal yod/ denga'adi gleng bzhin dang chos su gtsag tu 'thun la thadad pa'ang yod de/ tshesakyi dbang gis mar 'grub/ mi'i dbang du ngos 'gro bas/ de'i phyi'i rnam par grol
ba'i phung bo dang/ stobs bcudang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa pa'i dang/ mtshanasum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa/
la sogs te/ ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa 'angs des rgyas dkon mchog tu bshad do// nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba'i phung po ni dge 'dun dkon mchog tu bshad do//
yon tan 'drinanas 'dus byas dang 'dusam byas pa'i chos kyi rnam gras dang/ gtanAtshigs su dmigs ba'i sbyor ba ni chos kyi dkon mchog ces bya'o// ye ni dbyangs gcig ste/ dren gnyis
yon tan 'di rnams 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyi rnam gras dang/ gtanatshigs su dmigs pa 'i sbyorib nas kyi dkon mchog ces bya'og la ni dbyangs gcig ste/ don gnyis su
zla bshad kyis kyang chos kyi dbyis 'asangs rgyas dang dge 'dun thadad pa'ang yod de/ de'i tshes kyi dkon mchog tu bsdu'o// de ltar rnam ba gsum du bshad nas/ sems can gyi skyabs dang rten du
byas na/ khams gsuman 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las thar par 'gyur ro// spyod pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sbom polas thar gyis kyang/ sdug bsngal phra mom zad de/ de'i phyir yang dag pa
su mthar phyin pa'i dkon mchog gsum bshad par bya'o// sngon bshad pa la sangs rgyas la sdug bsngal ma nga'i 'o// chosani mi rtag go/ dge 'dun yang mi rtag ste/ sdug bsngal yin bas yang
dag pa re rten gnas ma yin zhes zeran/ deng 'dir bshad pani rtag tu gnas pa ste/ rnal 'byo'i spyod pa rnams kyis chos nyid stong pa nyid du mngon par chud cing/ phyin ci logo brgyad dang bral ba/
skye 'gagamed pa yang dag pa'i rten gnas su gyur pa de nisas rgyas dkon mchog ces bya'o// rtag pa'i chos red de cog dmigs pa'i thar phyin par spyad pa ni yang dag pa'i tshes dkon mchog ces
bya'o spyod bu pa rnams kyis yang dag pa chos kyi chos nyid bod du chud cing rtag tu 'dus ma byas pa'i gnasas grub pa ni dge 'dun zhes bya'o// yang phyin ci log brgyad dang gtan du bral bas//
'phags ba dang skye bo thams cad 'khrun cing nam du'angartsod pa med pa ni dge 'dun dkon mchog/sa byago/ sngonadakon mchog gsumam dang tshesas tha dad par bshad/ deng 'dir ni sas rgyas
dngos po gcig la chos dang dge 'dun yang der byung bas/ don de'i phyir ngas khyod la dngos po gcig pa'i dkon mchog gsum bshad de/ skye bo kun theg pa gcig tu phyogs par bya'o//
de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub semaso dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcomoldan 'das gangal rnam par rtog ste/ theg pa chen po bsgrub par
bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu khams gsum brtag par bsams tetheg pachen po bsgrub// byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid dad kyisaga'ir//
ji ltaranam rtag pa la rnam par rtog par bgyi/ bka' stsal pa// mi rtag pa la rnam par rtog par byin/ nyon mongs pa rnam par spangs te/ yang dag pa'i dran pa mngon du bzhag 'khyams
kya kha dang ing rje thog mar 'gro bar bya ste/ skye bo rnams la tshes bshad cing bsgralan 'dang lan mi re ba ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// de ltar sems can yongasas//
na mi gtang bar theg pa chen po bsgrub par bya'o// rigs kyi bu dngoran grong khyer chen po gcig 'khor rgya dpag tshad gcig la sgo mang po zhig yod pa der 'gror ni laman ga5/dus dang/ mun nag
dang : shin tu 'jigs pa'i sa chen khyed kyis kyang/ grong khyer der phyinon shin tubade skyid par 'gyur bas/ skyes bu me gcig la bu gcig pu zhig yod pa shinatu'ang sdug mod kyi/ grong khyor re
nabade skyed ba'i longs spyodad pag tu med pa yod do zhes thos pas/ bu sdug pa der bor nas// grong khyer dud 'gro 'dod pa'i phyir/ thabs snatshegasakyis 'aka 'gos sa bsgral nas/
grong khyer de'i sgor phyin pa dang/ rkang pa yagacig nang du bcug ste/ rkang pa ya gcig ma btog pa'i bar du bu de dranan// 'di ltar bsams so// bdag la bugacig pu yod pa bdag nas pa'i
khar tu skyen khrod/ dasu zhig sladon gso zhig gu zhes bsams nas/ grong khyer de gtang ste slar bu'i thad dungs so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa dang sAng rje'ang de dang 'draste/
a byams shing snying brtse ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa lnga sgom par byed do// bsgoms te zag pazad na'ang gru ba ba ma lenato// de ci'i phyir zhen/ sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ zag pa zad/
0la dang mngon par shes pa snga ste/ so so'i skye bo'i sar bgrod par byed do/ gas kyi bu dper grong khyer bde skyid pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par thar ba chen la bya'o// dper sgo mang po zhes bya
bani ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stod la bya'o// dpera'am 'jigs sa chen po zhes bya ba ni bdud dang bgegs lta bu labya'o/ dper grong khyer gyi sgor phyin ces bya ba ni mngon par shes pa
lnga thob pa 'khyago/ dper rkang pa ya gcig bteg ste/ them pa'i nang du 'jug pa ni ye shes la bya'o// dper rkyang ba yagacig ma bteg ba ni khyod chub sems dpa' gzhanarnam par grol/
bal bya'o// dper bu gcig pu lus zhes sla ba ni lam rgyud lnga'i sems can la bya'o// dper bu la dran pa ni snying rje chen po la khya'o// dper bu'i tha dad du ldog panasems can 'dul zhing
rnam par grol ba thob par byed pa la bya'o// dper lan dang 'grub pa ma yin pa ni thabs mkhas pa 'khya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa chenapo/
dud snying rje chen pos bsdus te mi gtong ba nibasagagyis mi khyabago/ rigs kyi bu yang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu dam pa dang po sams bskyed pa nas/ byang chub kyisI/
'thug gi bar dusemaso can la rtag tu dge ba bcu dbog par bya'o// khanu bo gang zhin/ srog mi gcad pa dang/ mkhyen par mi len pa dang/ 'dod pas log par migayem pa dang/ brdzun
bya 'u/ du mu ts+tsha ba dang/ phra ma dang dbyen mi byed pa dang/ ngag tshub pa ni bu dang/ don med pa'i gtamatshig pakyal pa mi snab dang/ brnab sems mi byed pa dang/ gnod
mi byed pa dang// log par mi ltob sto/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin du byamasaM pa dang snying rje phun sum tshogs par spyad na// byams pas ni dag bston cing bde ba la 'god par byed/ snying rjesani/
sdug bsngal las thar pa dang/ dmyal ba las sgrol bar byadad// skyepornamasamya ngan las 'da' bar sgrub 'dod pa'i sgom shes pa mthongan/ byang chub sems dpas skye bo de dag la snying rje ba'i
sems bsgom par bya'o// snying rje'i dbang gis sems can thams cad la mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo 'byed pas/ bde ba'i gnasamangon par stonate/ theg pa chen po'i 'bras bu thob par byed
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyad pa spyod pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das yang dag
zla pa'i dran pa zhes bgyi ba gang/ bka' stsalapa/ mi skyo mi 'gag pa'i chos spyod pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dasachos me skyeb ni gang/ ma 'gag pa ni gang/ bka' g.yapa/ rigs kyi bu sbos
ba'i chosani mi skye bar bya/ dge ba'i chos mi 'gag bar bya'o// de lta bu'i spyod pa khams gsum du spyad pa ni/ 'dod brnam pa lnga'i bag chags kyi drims gos par mi 'gyur ro/ rigs kyi bu bams
gsuman bgrod cing sems can bsgral bar 'dod na/ chosarnam pa bcu po 'dis khams gsum dukhagrod par bya ste/ kun rdzob kyi tshig dang yi ge'i rjes su khams gsum yod par bshad mod kyi/ bla
named pa'i byang chub 'i dus gsum du mi gnas la/ mthar phyin pa'i byang chub rnam grangs su mi ltung na/ dus gsum dang khams gsum lta zhig ci smos/ chos bcu po gang zhe na/ bstod pa dang/
smad pa lasems skye dbri med pa dang/ sanapa dang mi snyan par thos pa lasems rnam par mi rtogapa dang/ shis rab canadang/ gtimug can la 'dra bar sa dadzo bskyed pa dang/ sems can
bla 'og gang yang rung ste/ snyoms par lta ba dang/ mchodapa dus ma lus pa lasems rnam pa gnyis su mi byed pa dang/ gzhan gyi nyes skyon la 'phyis mi gos pa dang/ theg pa rnam pa sna
tshogs su mthong na'ang thig pa gcig tu lta ba dang/ ngan song gsumakhyi sgrathos pa la 'jigs pa dang/ skrag pa'i sems ma skyidapa dang/ byang rlubasems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs/
dang 'dra bar ltab dang/ bskal pa snyigs ma can gyi dus su sas[E]sa 'byung pa la ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i 'du shes skyed pa dang bcu ste/ chos bcu po de dgadad ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa'i
nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyis nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sims dpa' skyes bu dam pa khams gsum nabagrod pa'i tsho/ snying rje chen pos gzhi byas na/ mnolo ba'i zhir der 'od
@# bya/ 'dres kyang/ la mi gcig ste/ de bas nabasam khyab dka' zhes bya'o// gang zhig 'jig rten nam gan// bskal pa gcig gi bar dag tu// tshul khrims dmadu
bsrung bani// skyes bu de ni skad cig dga' ba tsam// byams pas spyad pas dmapa mchog/ gang zhig 'jig rtenas 'di ru/ lus dang ngag yid sdig dade// ngan song gsum dultung
ngas kyang// byams sems de yis 'phral du 'phyang// byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' zhig gis// 'jig rten napar skyes na yang// 'jigs dang dogos pa ma skyed cig/ ngan song
ltung ba'i sdug yod kyang// mgo ban pa tsamakyis 'phyang// gang zhig 'ching ba gcod 'dod dam// nyon mongs sgrib pa song 'dod pa// 'jig rtenangan 'dir skyes na yang// dam
tshos srung khes shes rab 'phel// rnam dag zhing du bskul pa 'bum// tshul khrims rnam dag spyad pa bas// deng nas sang gi bar dag tu// 'jig rtan 'di naganas kyang bla// de ci'i
phyir zhen/ ngas ni mi 'khrugs 'jig rten dang// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gnyis// shin turnam dag mthong ba na// sdug bsngalu bya ba'i ming yang med// khams derab sod namasabya
bani dka' ba snyam du mi mdzod do// gang zhig 'jig rten 'di dag tu// rangag ma bzod bzod bya ste// pha rol po yong bzod bdug na// de ni bsod nams dam pa mchog/ dephyir
byang chub sems dpa' rnams // 'jig rtenangan 'dir 'god pa'atsho// nyon mongs mya ngan ma byed par// sems can thams cad 'dren bya ste// brtson 'grus brtan pa'i sems bskyed na//
bla med byang chub myur du'ago// de nas bcom ldan 'dus la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i sing pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dusubadagacug
rnamasakyis deng 'di'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi rgyudang rkyen zhig tu zhing mchisan/ de bzhin gshegs pas skabs dbye bar gnang na/ spobs pa bskyed de zhu bar bgyi'o zhes gsol
bdang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// legasaso rigasakyi bu khyod sngonasas rgyas brgya stong du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa// byang chub sems dpa'i thabs da bumakhas
pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyir/ byang chub spyod pa'i brtson 'grus brtan pa 'dre ba legs kyis 'dod pa bzhin dris shig/ ngas khyed la bye brag phyed par bshad do// bcom
ldan 'das kyis skabs phye bar gnangs/ bcom ldan 'das la/ namakha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ci bgyisan/ brtul zhugs dang
dka' thubakyi sems la gdung bamamachis par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyisan nges pa'i tshig la 'gyod pa ma mchis par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas kyi bgyi'o na dge ba'i
rtsa ba 'phel bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dbas kyi bokyisan/ 'jigs pa ma nus shing tshulami g.yobar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyisan/ dam pa'i sa/ rtsa ba 'phalabara'agyur/ byang chubs sangs
[& ]yodas su 'grub par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ sagatuganas/ sa bcu'i bar du legs par 'tshal bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas rtsi bgyis na/ thabs la shin tumakhasab
'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas rtsed kyis na/ sems can gyi ston bgyid par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ tshe tshor bas bsasu byang chub kyi sems chud mi gzonapar 'gyur/ byang
snachub sems dpas rtsibagyid na/ sems sbyod pa rnam gcig las rnam pa sna tshogs su spyod pa mams par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas rtsibagyis na/ chos rin po che 'gas par sgrub par 'gyur/ byang chub
sems dpas ci bgyis na/ tshul khrims dang 'dul ba las bcas pa'i khan ma tho ba las 'byung bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dang su ci bgyis na/ nyon mongs pa rnams 'gagapor 'gyur/ byang chub
sems dpas bkyis na/ tshogs mang po kun dang 'thun par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyisan/ chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgo legs par 'byed par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/

sngon gyi dbang gi mthus dge ba'i rtsa ba mi stor bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na ! gzhan gyi bstan pa la rag ma lus par rang bzhin gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug skyod par 'gyur/ byang chub sems
dungs ci bgyis na/ bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin btang ste/ 'dod pa'i khams su skye bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dbas kyi bgyisan/ sangs rgyas kyis las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ byang
sems dpas ci bgyis na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba la yel ba dang khams gsum du bgrod cing sems can la ston pa bgyid de/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyidi bar mi chad par 'gyur ro zhes brtsis pa dang/ de nas bcos/
ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba rnams su zhu nus pa'ang shin tu legs so 'degs so/
khyod legs par nyon la drang don du shog cig/ gsolapa/ bcom ldan 'das bda' bzhin du thos par skyon te/ mnyan cing mnod par 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldanu'adas
kyis byang chub sems la nam mkha'i snying bo la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyisami gdung bar bgyur ro//
chos bzhi gang zhe na/ ses canathams cad la snying rje cher skyed pa dang/ brtson 'grusabaskyed cing le lo ma byed pa dang/ skye shi'i 'khor ba rmi lam tsam dang 'dra bar shes pa dang/ yang dag
pa'i yid kyis sangs rgyas kyi bshesakhasam pa dang bzhi ste/ byang chub sems dpa'achosakhazhipa dedagadad ldan n/ dka' thub dang brtul zhugs kyisasems gdung ba med par 'gyur ro//
bya nga chub sems dpa' yadachos bzhi dang ldan n/ nges pa'i tshig la bar ma dor 'gyod par mi 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ nges pa'i tshig chos la bdag med par mngon da
ces brjod pa dang/ nges pa'i tshig skye gnas so rig la dad pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa mi rigs zhes brjod pa dang/ nges pa'i tshig gis theg pa chen po la rgyun du bsngags pa brjod pa dang/ nges pa
gis las dge sdeb ga 'bras bu marlag ces brjod pa dang bzhi'o/ byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan n/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/
tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang/ mad du thos pa dang/ sbyin pa sbyin pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' yang ngos bzhi dang ldan n/ 'jigs pa med cing tshul las mi
la g.yo bar 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhen/ khe sor padang/ mi snyan par grags pa dang/ smad cing smadabab pa dang/ sdug bsngal gyis non kyang mi g.yo ba dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems
zla dpa' yang tshes bzhi dang ldan n/ chos dkar po las su 'grub par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol po la las dge sdig yid ches par ston pa dang/ sbyin pa la lan ma ra ba dang/
dam pa'i chos la srung zhing skyong ba dang/ shes rab chen pos byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par byedapa dang bzhi'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan n/
sa gcig nas/ sa bcu'i bar du legs par shes par 'gyur ro// chos bzhi gang zhen/ dgeba'i rtsa ba yun ring du skyed pa dang/ nyes skyon thams cad sel ba dang/ thabs la shin tu
mkhas pa dang/ dgaba'i brtson 'grus kyi sbyad pa byang chub tu sdob dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan n/ thabs la shin tu mkhas par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang
zhen/ sems can gyi yid dang 'thun par byed pa dang/ gzhani bsod nams dang yon tan la rjes su yi rang ba'i sems bskyed pa dang/ sdig yodon 'gyod tshangs byed pa dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba 'debs pa dang ba zhig/ byang chub sems dpa' yang tshes bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can gyi ston pa byed par 'gyur ro//
bzhi gang zhen/ rtag tu semasacan la phan pa dang/ bde ba sgrub par byed pa dang/ rang gi dga' ba yongs su der ba dang/ gnyen des byas te bzod pa sgom pa dang li 'ong ba ga la'i
byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan n/ tshorabs bis su byung chub kyi sems rlud ma zos par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyan sawa la
bar byed pa dang/ bsod nams byas so cogasemasacan gyi phyir bla na med pa'i byang chung sngob dang/ dge ba'i bshesaganyen la ston dpa : theg pa rton+tang yid+danas meg pa spyi dang
bzhi'i khyad chub sems dpa' lad chos bzhi dang ldan n/ sems sbyodapa rnam pa gcig las rnam pa sna tshogs sum spyod par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhen/ nyanathos kyi
sems snang ba dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems byung ba dang/ chos sgrub pa skye ma ngas pa dang/ chos ni thos pa gzhan lason par byed pa dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan
na chos rin po che legs par sgrub par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhen/ theg pa chen po'i chos dkon pa'i phyir rin po che dang 'dra bar 'du shes bskyed ba dang/ theg bachen po'i chos sems kyi nad

zla thams cad sel ba'i phyir sman dang 'o drab r blta ba dang/ theg pa chen po'i chos nam yang m rlag pa'i phyir nor dbyig dang 'dra bar lta pa dang/ thog ba chen po'i chos mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa'i
phyir sdug bsngal 'gog par lta ba dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan n/ tshul khrims nyams pa dang/ nyon mongs ba'i khan ma tho ba las 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzhi
rgyu gang zhe naM/ chos rnams 'ong ba med pa'i phyir/ chos la mi skyeba'i pazod pa thob pa dang/ rnos rnams song ba med pa'i phyir/ chos la mi 'gog pa'i bzod pa thob pa dang/ chos rnams rgyu dang/
rkyen las skye bar shes pa'i phyir/ chos la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i bzod pa thob pa dang/ thadad pa'i semasargyud med pa'i phyir/ mi gnas pa'i bzod pa thob pa dang bzhi'o// bya nub
@#/sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ nyon mongs ba rnams 'gag par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhen/ da nga dag pa'i dran pa mngon du gzhag pa dang/ dbang po rnams kyi sgo bsdams pa dang/
dge ba'i chos kyi stobs bskyed nus pa dang/ dben pa'i gnas su dad cing 'du 'dzi spang bar bya ba dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' yod sa bzhi dang ldan na/ tshogs mang po kun dang 'thun
par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag chos sgrub na'ang khyad par thob par mi sgrub pa dang/ le lo med par rtag tu bkur sti dang gus pa'i sems skyedapa dang/ chos kyi phan pa 'ba' zhig
tshol gyi/ bdag ni spro na ba dang// gzhan dge ba'i chos bstan kyang/ red ba dang/ bkur sti dang/ grags pa me tshol ba dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan n/
chos kyi sbyin pa'i legs par 'byed par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhen/ dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung zhing skyong ba dang/ rang gi shes rab la phan pa byed cing/ gzhanal ston par byed pa
dang/ rtag tu ya rabs kyi ches sred pa dang/ rnam par dag pa dang ma dag pa'i chos la mi rtog pa dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sngon gyi dbang gi mthus dge
pa'i nub mi rgyag par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol po'i nyes skyon la dbang me bza' ba dang/ zhe sdang can la rtag tu byamasasems bsgom pa dang/ rtag tu chos thams cad rten 'brel/
0// dubashad pa dang/ blon med pa'i byang chub rtag tu dran par bya ba dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan n/ gzhan gyis bstan pa la rag ma lus/
'bar rang bzhin gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhen/ rtag tuchos kyi sbyin pa gzhan la sbyin pa dang/ gzhan gyi kha nam thob mi brjod pa dang/ chos kyis bsdus tesems/
can gyi ston pa la mkhas pa dang/ chos zab mo chub par shis pa dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan n/ bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin btang ste/ 'dod pa'i khanan
su mngond skye bar 'gyur ro// gzhi gang zhe na/ semasamanyen des su bya ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma red par bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad mi gtong ba dang/ shes rab dang
thabs mkhas pa'i mthu stobs rgyun du sgom nus pa dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhidang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// chos bzhi
gang zhan/ skye shi 'khor bgrangs med par myong na'ang skyoba'i sems mi bskyed pa dang/ rtag tusangs rgyas tshad med pa la mchod pa bya ba dang/ byams sems tshad med pa bsgom par bya ba dang/
sangs rgyas kyi ye shesatshad med pa la mos pa bskyed pa dang bzhi'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi bdaganyid rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro//
chos bzhi gang zhe na/ sems canathams cad kyi phyir smon lamami gtong ba dang/ sbyin pa'i sbyong lam la dad pa dad/ brtson 'grus chen po la 'dun pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la
sems zab mos rgyun du spyod pa dang bzhi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khamasagasum dubagrod cing/ spyod pa bzhi po rnam grangs su spyad de sems can la phan pa dang bde bar
byas shing 'jig rten las zlo bar bsgoms na/ sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe theg pa chen po'i chos rnam pabazhi bzhir bshad pa na/ lha bzhi khrisani bla na
med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// mi las nyi khri lnga stong ni chos la ma skye ba'i bzod pa thob bo// byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri brgyad stong ni chos kyi khams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol
tuphyin pa thob ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yi shes la mngon bar chud do// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ yadabcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po namamakha'i snying
po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod mdo sde 'di legs par zung zhig/ chongs shig ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di/
skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dasamado sde 'di'i ming ci lags/ ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde 'di'i ming na thar pa chen
po phyogs su rgyas pa bdud kyi yul 'jomu pa/ mu stegs pa'i dpung dang banus par gzhig pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sel ba/ log par lta ba dang 'dodapa/
[+ ]rnag lta'i 'ching bgro'al/ khams gsum gyi btson ra 'dralakha/ 'khor ba las thar cing mya ngan las 'du ba'i phyogs su sgrolab/ sa bon dam pa'i rgyu bsams badran par byid bas/
rgyu rkyen chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi chos kyi char khebs pa/ sems canatheg pa gsum gyi myu gu dang/ me tog rgyas shis 'phel bar byed pa/ byang chub kyi 'bras bu mchog theg pa gcig tu
rgyu'agrub par byed pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'as la byang chub sems dpo'amamakha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon 'das pa'i
sangs rgyas grangasam mas pa'i spyan snga dang/ 'dus pa grangs ma mchis pa dang/ tshogs dpag tu mamachis pa'i nang du/ chos rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ don rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ mtshan
ma rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ theg pa nam kha snatshogs thos na/ ngomatshar rmad du byung ba'i chos de lta bu dang/ ngo mtshar rmadadu byung ba'i don de lta bu dang/ gnaMr rmad du byung ba'i mtshon mde
lta bu dang/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i theg ba chen po de lta bu'i thos mamyong ste/ deng thos pa 'did bdag gis rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtagal/
chos dang dge 'dun ni 'gag par mi 'gyur te 3 khams gsumagyasems can rang skye zhing rang 'gag par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba dang/ chos dang dge 'dun ma
mthong bas mya ngan las 'das te 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes brjod do// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyin gyi rlabs kyis/ khams gsum du bgrod cing so so'i skye bo'i rjes su snyegs te
mya ngan las 'da' 'o zhis bla dgas su brjod pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad dun bdag cag rnams kyis theg pa brgyad khris sangs rgyas kyi ye/
shesasu chud par skyesabu chen po'i tshes kyi sku thob par bgyi'o// chos kyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams la mdo sde 'di spel bar bgyi// gzung zhing ba cad bu dang/ bklag pa/
dang kha ton du 'don par bgyi'o// ji ltar bshad pa bzhin bsgom ste/ dus gcig tu sangs rgyas su 'grub par bgyi'o// mi gtong bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang/
rigs kyi bu mo gang la las bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das ba'i slad na/ snyigs ma can gyi dus su mdo sde 'di gzungs su bzung zhing klog gam/ kha ton du bgyid dam/ glegs bam du yi ger
'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jugan/ bsod nams ji tsam zhig thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu gang la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
kha mas kyi nang na burin po ches losasubs nga ste/ sbyin pa byin pa bsamado sde 'di'i ming tsam thos par bsod nams dpag tu med par che'o// ga nga la las 'jig rtenatsi
khams stong phrag bcu nor bu rin po ches yongs su bkang ste/ sbyin pa byin pa bas mdo sde 'di glegs bam du byas te/ 'chadabatsam gyis bsod nams dpag tumed par che'o// gad la las
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su nor bu rin po ches yongs su btang ste/ sbyin pa byin pa pas theg pa chen po phyogs su rgyas ba'i mdo sde 'di'i nangan/ yi ge 'bru gcig gam/ tshigs
sgyu bcad gcig gam/ shulog gcig 'dri'am 'drir 'jugan de bas kyang bsod nams dpag tu med par che'o// 'jig rten grangs med pa'i khamasasu rinapo ches yongs su bkang ste/ sbyin
ba byin pa bas kyang sems thag ba nas mdo sde 'di 'ashu lo ka gcig klog gam/ ga ton du byas na bsod nams de bas kyang dpag tu med par che'o// stong khams yongs su gang ba'i sems
sku can gyi srog gi skyabs sbyin pa byin pa bas kyang/ gang gis sems thag pa nas mdo sde 'di'i don tshig gcig shes te gzhan la tshig gcig gam/ shu log gcig gi don bstanan/ bsodo
nams de bas kyang dpag med par che'o/de ci'i phyir zhen/ zang zing gi sbyin pa ni nyan thos kyi sbyin ba yin te/ tshe dang longs spyod skyed par zad kyi/ 'khor ba las mi thar ro// theg/

pa chen po chos kyi sbyin pa ni/ sems can rnams kyi byang chub kyi rtsa ba bskyed pa dang/ theg pa gsum kyi ye shes kyi srog sdud pa byed do// rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di klog pa dang 'o chung ba ni sngon
sdig canam rusapa yin na'ang da dge ba dang ldan pa'o// sngon sdug bsngal can yin na'ang da longs spyod dang ldan ba'o/ !sngon 'ching ba can yin na'ang da grol ba thar ba dang ldan pa'o/
stonam rgal ba yin na'ang da rgalab can no// sngon blun bo zhig yin na'ang da ni slob dpon duchung ba'o// sngon zag pa dang bcas pa zhig yin na'ang danazag pa med pa'o// sngon so so'i skye
bo'i spyod pa can zhig yin na'ang da ni 'phags pa'i spyod po dang ldan pa'o// sngon chen lam dang 'gal ba zhig yin na'ang/ drani 'phags pa lan la chud pa'o// lus skye bo'i lus can yin
na'ang/ mdo sde 'di klog pa dang 'chang ba'i phyir blo ni 'phags pa'i ye shes dang 'dra ba'o// sngon nyon mongs pa can zhig yin nA'adra/ da mdo sde 'di klog pa dang/ 'chang ba'i phyir sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra ba mya ngan las 'da'ab can no zhes bkabasal pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'dis dgasol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegasapase bshad pa ltar na/ sngon so so'i skye bo lags kyang da ni'aphogs pa'i spyod pa dang ldan zhes bgyi ba dang/ sngon nyon mongs pa canalags na'ang/ da ni mdo sde 'di klog pa
dang 'tshang bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'as dang 'dra bar mya ngan las 'da' ba canano zhes gsungs pa/ tshul khrims zhig pa dang/ mtshamasam mchis par spyad pa
nga dam pa'i chos la'ang skur lung tab ba yang/ rimadosde 'di klog pa tsam gyis nyon mongs ba song te/ mya ngan las 'das ba dang 'thun pa zhig lags sam/ don de rig par dka'
zhing mchisan/ bcom ldan 'das bye brag phyed par bstan du gsol zhes bgyis pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saya pa/ legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyodakyis legs par
zhus pas/ sakyang legs par bshad par bya'o// rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad sangs rgyas mamatho ba'i phyir log par lta ba dang/ tshul khrims nyams pa dang/ dam pa'i chos la
skur pa btab pa yin no// sangs rgyas 'jig rten dubazhugs pa na tshul khrims nyams pa dang/ dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa'ang med do// de ji ltazhen/ dper dra mamigacig la bu gcig
bu zhig yod de shin tu'ang 'phangs shing sdug na/ ba yod pa'i tshon ni nyin mtshan du bstan cing bslabs pas/ byas si rtseg la 'gal ba med/ bu'ang gal sri zhu che ste/ 'di dag nyan cing nyes pa

yong ma byung// re zhig dus gcig na pha lo marang por 'gron du song ba las ring du lon tesar ma 'khor ba'i bar du bud pa'i bstan ngag kharjod nas nyes pa'i ngamang du byung ngo// pa reng du yon te slar ma 'a khor
ba'i phyir/ pha shi ba skad du brjod de/ dulo dag byed cing khad kyis 'al du byed do// mya ngan gyis nonati sems stor nas/ thas bstan pa'ang brjed de/ chos la skur pa dang 'dra ba'agal ba sha
dag byed// pha de yunaring bo zhig lon nas dus gcig naslar khyim du log pa'i tsho/ bu'ang shin tu dga' ba dang rim pa skyes nas sngon pa 'di bstanangag kyang dran te/ gzus su bzung nas

nyis pa'angamakhyung ngo// tha mthong ba'i phyir pha ma shi bar yang yid ches nas/ log par ltungapa can zhes kyang mi bya'o// pha'i bka' bzhin du mi 'gal bar sad pas skur pa can zhes kyang mi bya ste/
rigs kyi bu dra ma zhis bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// bu gcig tu zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad do// phas bstan cing bslabs zhes bya ba ni tshul khrimaso so// lam rid por song zhes bya
ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa khams gzhan du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor gshegs ba'o// tha ma mthong zhes bya ba ni[]'das so zhes brjod pa'o// mya nganagyis nonapa ni sgrib pas bsgrengs pa'o//
gzugs su mi 'dzin pa'i phyir tshul khrims zhig pa'o// shi ba/dbarjod pa'i phyir sdig spyod pa'o// don 'khrul pa'i phyir skur pa btab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa khams gzhan nas sur
gshegs te/ sems can gyis mthong ba ni/ sangs rgyas mya ngan las mi 'da' bar yid ches pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis chos bstan nas/ sems kyi rang bzhin slar rnyed pas tshul khrims mi/
[7 ]gyang nya mas pa'o// mya ngan las mi 'da' bar yade ches pa ni ltung ba med pa'o// bstan pa dang mi 'gal bar spyod cing don shes pa ni/ chos la mi skurab yin no//
la rigs kyi bumado sde 'di klog pa dang 'chang ba ni 'khor ba grangs med pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sdig lciyakun 'byang bar 'gyur ro// gang mdo sde 'di thos panisangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos pa'o// gang mdo

sde 'di mthong ba ni sangs rgyas kyi zhal mthong ba'o// gangamado sde 'di 'dzin pa nisangs rgyasakyi sku 'dzin pa'o// gang mdo sde 'di spyod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa spyod pa'o// gung mdo sde 'di
nyi 'chad pa ni sangs rgyasakyi mdzad pa 'chad pa'o// gangamado sde 'di'i don shes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi don shes pa'o// gangasas rgyas kyi mdzad pa spyod pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi don legs par
khril ba de ni/ nyon mongs pa gtan med par 'gyur pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mdosde 'di lag tu 'ongs pa'i phyir/ nyon mongs pa yongs su song bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu bskul
pa brgyad khri la nyin zhag gcig tu brtsi ba/ zhagasum tshul zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu bsgres pa'i bskul pa brgya stong bya ba khrag khrig 'dus pa la/ sudus rgyus gcig
'byung ba dang phrad do// yang bskal pa grangs de dang 'dra ba 'dasan/ sangs rgyas gcig 'byung ba dang phrad pa bas kyang/ mdo sde 'di dang phrad pa shin tu dkonano// gang mdo sde 'di dang phrad
bani phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang phrad pa dang 'dra'o// de'i phyir blo dang ldan pas mdo sde 'di byung ba dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kha ton du 'don pa dang/ yi
ger 'drib dang/ 'drir 'jug pa dang/ gzhan la'ang bstan na log par lta ba dang/ ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa dang/ brag pa dang bcas pa'i sdig pa yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/ bsod
nams kyi zhing la gnas par 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi mchod yon dpag tumed pa'ang 'jubar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ nam mkha'i snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang sangs
rgyas kyang 'jig rten gyi yon 'ju ba skad mi gda' na/ so so'i skye bo lta zhig yon 'ju bar 'gyur ram zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rang sangs rgyas yon mi
'ju mi srid de/ sems can la chos bshad cing bsgral mi nusana'ang/ bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pas ting de 'dzin las langasate/ 'phrul chen bo rnam par stsal rting/
sems can rnams sgrol bar byed pas/ mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur ro// de nasabcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying posaM 'di skad ces gsolo te// bcom
ldan 'das mdo sde kha cig las 'byung ba lta ba log pa dang/ tshul khrims zhig pa rnams dang/ khams gcig tulhan gacig gnas su'ang mi rung ba dang/ chu klung gcig la chab 'tshal
gdu'ang medung ngo zhes 'byal/ gso sbyong gi tshogang zag de 'phags pa'i lam stor ba lags te/ dge 'dun gyi nang du'ang mi chud ces 'byungan/ ci'i slad du deng 'dir tshul/
khrims zhig pa rnams kyang mchod yon 'bar 'gyur zhes gsus/ gal te de dag mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyuranani/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang yang tha mi dad la/ 'bags pa dgra bcom pa dang/
rang sangs rgyas pas 'da' ba 'dra na/ bcom ldan 'das de tsam zhig bye brag phyed par bshad par smon/ bdag kyang de thos nas de bzhin du sems can rnams la bstan par bgyi'o// rnam par dgrol
bdebagyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po 'baka' stsal ba/ legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod la sogs pa deng 'dir byams pa dang/
snyingadzaphun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas sems can rnams la snying brtse bar bsams te/ dond zhu bani rab tu'ad legs te/ ngas kyang bye brag phyed par bshad kyis/ legs par soms la
rgyu nyon cig/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i spyod yul ni nyan thos dang rang byang chub rnams kyis rig par yang gyural/ bdud dang/ mu stegs dang/ so so'i skye bo rnams kyis bsam pa'i gnas
kyang ma yin te/ de ni sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang/ khyod kyi khong du chud par zad do// rigs kyi bu sa rtag tu byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams la bstanapa/ sems can bzang ngan rnam par
mi rtog par sbyin pa byas na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su 'grub bo zhes bshad de/ byol song la sbyin pa byin pas ni bsod nams kyi yon tanabargya thob par 'gyur ro// log spyod la sbyin pa
byin pas ri/ bsod nams kyi yon tan stong thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bdage ba'i rtsa ba rgyun chad bzhi'achol bosan log spyod kyi rgyud du 'grogo/ drin mi gzo ba dang/ khrel med pa ni 'dis/
'phos na byol song gi rgyud du 'gro'o// log spyod kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang/ bsod nams canagyi yen 'jun/ mdo sde 'di klog pa dang 'chang ba'i gang zag ltazhig ci smos/ de bas
theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mthu dang byin ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// tshul khrims 'jig pa dang/ mtshams med par 'gro ba dang/ dam pa'i chos la skur pa dang
log par lta ba dang/ nyon mos pa can gyi sdig pa yongs su byang ba byed pas na/ mchod yon 'ju bar nus so// bcom ldan 'das la// byang chub sems dpa' naMm mkha'i snying pos gsol/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'ang bsamagyis mi khyab/ tharab chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mthu dang byin yang bsam gyis ma khyab/ mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa dang klog pa'i gang zag de'i yon tan
yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis bshad pa bzhinati/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtha'
g.yas pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes gsol pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bya chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ngas dran pa/

sngon 'das pa'i bsal ba rnamapar dag pa zhes bya ba na/ nga de'i tshesangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu nu gnyis la mchod ba phul te bsnyen bkur byas na'ang nyan thos kyi tshul du spyod pas nyes skyon mang du byung ba
dang/ tshul khrims nyams pa dpag tu med pa dag byung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang dal lung bstan par m gyur to// bskal pa de 'das nas/ bskal pa mthong ba

mos pa zhes khyab na/ nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi ba nu la mchod pa phul te bsnyen bkur byas na'ang sangs rgyas de dag gis dal lung ma bstan to// bskal pa de 'das nas kyang bskal pa mongs
pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ban/ nga de'i tshesangs rgyasabye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis la mchod pa phul te bsnyen bkur byas na'ang sa rgyas de dag gis nga la lung ma bstan to// bskal pa de 'das nas/
rgyu yang bskal pa segs dga' zhes bya ba na/ nga de'i tshesangs rgyas brgyad khri bzhi stod la mchod pa phul te/ bsnyen bkur byas na'ang sangs rgyas de dag gis nga la lung yang ma bstan to// bskal
pa de 'dras nas/ yang bskal pa sdug bsngal skyabs zhes bya ba dang/ 'jig rten rnam par brgyan pa zhes pa na/ de bzhinagashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa/
dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa// 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dulapa'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lhadang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sbyin ba chen po zhes//
bya ba byung ste/ nga de'i tsho sas rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi bcul mdo pa phul te/ bsnyen bkur byas nasaM/ gdod mdo sde 'di'i ming thesatete/ nyon mongs pa yongs su spangs kyis kyang/ mdo sde
'di da dung ma mthong ste/ bde'i tshe de'i dus na mchod ba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs bsags te/ mchod ba phulana'ang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang nga la lung bstan par ma gyur to/
rigs kyi bu nga sngon bskal pa de snyad du/ sangs rgyas de snyed la mchod pa de snyed cig phulab dang/ bsnyen bkur dang bstod pa byas nas/ nyon mongs pa rnam bar sas to/ nyan thos kyi sngon
ba dang/ tshulaphun sum tshogs pa tshangs par spyad cing spyin pa byin bdang/ tshul khrims bslab pa dang/ nga rgyal dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug spangs te sa pa'i yon tan rgyud pa dang/
bzod pa dang/ byams pa'i sems dang/ ji ltar thos pa bzhin brtson 'grus su bshad pa dang/ shos so cog thams cad mibarjed pa dang/ 'du 'dzi spangs te dben pa la gnas pa dang/ bsam
gtanadang ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang/ bsam gtan las byung nas/ chos nyan pa dang/ klog pa dang/ kha ton du 'don pa dang/ bsam ba la sogs pa byas kyang rgyal ba de dag gis nga
ka shubya// 'a lung ma bstan te/ de ci'i phying zhen/ sdom pa mnosase nyogo 'jig pa dang/ nyams pa mang du bya ba'i phyi'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la chags
ba'i phyir// theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pachenapo phyogs su rgyus pa ma thos pa'i phyir ro// de bas na byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis nyan sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod

lam spang bar bya/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas par bsgom par byas na lung bstan pa thog par 'gyur ro//gal tes bskal ba gcig nas bsal ba gcig gi bar dusasargyas kyi mtshabang
na 'ang rdzogs par mi nus te/ rigs kyi bu nga bskal pa de dag 'das pa'i 'og tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyurakyis tshogs chen po dpag tu med pa la/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po
phyogs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam gras 'di bshad pa der mthong nas/ ngade'itsho de'i dusan gdod thos pa dang mthong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal ba de las blangs te/ 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/
bton du bya ba dang/ don bsam la sogs pabyas nas/ de ma thagachosal me skye ba'i bzod pa thob bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyur gyis nga la lung bstan pa/ khyod ma bo sa pa'i
dusan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhesakhyabar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstanato// debasan rig kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs te/ 'chad pa
[•]dang klog pa la sogs bcasan/ sangs rgyas kyisabang myur du thob par 'gyur na/ 'jig rten nalhadang mir bcas pa'i mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ rigasakyi bu de'i phyir ngas theg pa/
chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mthu stobs rin po che'i snyid po 'dra ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa// tshul khrims 'jig pa dang/ dbul la phongs rnams kyi tshuladang/ rin po che'i nor bu spyin/
par byed pa la bstodapa tshigs su bcad pa brjod par bya'o// theg chen dpe tshad rgya mtsho bzhin// theg pa chung du ba rjes chu// theg chenadape tshad rirab lhun// theg pa chud du grog ma'i
mkhar// theg chen dpe tshad nyi zla bzhin// theg pa chung ngu me mdag tsam// theg pa 'di ni theg chen yin// bsam gyis mi khyab theg pa po// dper na nam mkha' dang 'drab//
sems can thams cad go 'byed do// theg pa thams cad kun gyi nang// theg pa 'di las 'da' ba med// theg pa chen po 'dinang nas// theg pa rnam pa snatshogs 'byung// dpag
pa'i gras shig yod na ni// thams cad bsgral ba'i mi nus so// theg pa blun med pa 'di// sems can yongs su bsgral nus pa// nam mkha' 'dra ba'i thegachen la// gang gis lug
med 'di spyod pa/ gnam mkha' dpag tumed pa bzhin// gakhrugs dadadabyibs kyang yod med do// theg pa chen po'ang de bzhinate// theg pa med cing dpag tumed// sems na/
ka ga khams cad de dag kun// theg pa chen 'di zhonol// theg pa'i mtshan la rnam rtog na// gtos rgya che zhing ma dushod// gal te theg chen yon tan dang// theg pa gcig tu
spyod pa ni/ bskal ba dpag med rab bshad kyang// mtha'adu rdzogs par yodaminus// thegakha thamasadan gyi nang// theg pa chen po dpal mchog/ sems thag theg chen 'di blangs na//
byang chub shing drung mngon par grol// 'ching ba med cing thogs pa med// blon med pa'i theg pa 'di// theg pa dman pa'i mchog 'gyur bas// khyod la dkyil du 'jug par 'ong// rten 'brel
zla bcu gnyis rnag dog ste// sems can rnams la snyapartse 'i phyir// phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la// theg chen mdo sde bshad par bya// gang zhig theg chen theg pa ni// 'phel ba'am
khrib pa yod med de// nam mkha' bzhin du kun shod bas/ theg pa chen po bsam mi khyab// de phyir sems can thams cad kyis// brtson 'grus su ni bsgom bya ste// mngon par shes pa
rgyu rnams dang ni/ lo shesachenapo bo par bya// lha yi tshogs dang lha yi bdud// mu stegs nyon mongs sel 'dod na// theg pa chen po'i skyabasasol// mngon shes drug dang ldan par
byas// rig pa gsum dang rnam thar gsum// des ni bdud dang mu stegs 'joms// log par lta ba'angabacil bsan// theg pa chen po mchog tu dgos// nyon mongs thams cad 'jig/
pa dang// dge rtsa phunasum tshogs 'gyur ba/ theg chenamathunibasam mi khyab// de bas dpag pa'ang rab tu dka'// 'jig rten pa yichos rnams dang// 'jig rten 'das pa'i chos thams
da/ slob dang mi slob de dag kun// theg pa chen po kun 'dus so// sems can gang zhig ngan 'gror skyod pa ni// log par lta ba dang nisdig grogs bstan// gang zhig theg pa chen por
tshadad pa// sani nyon mos bdud rnams 'joms mi nus// de rnams sbas te theg chen skyabs song la/ grol thar 'dod pas theg pa chenapo slob// skyes bu gang zhig don chen shes 'dod
pa thog chenabashad pa thos na dga' ba skye// de'i theg chenamani yin par mngon// zhig nas sems ni mngon par shes dang ldan// de yang theg chen dbang gis rnam par brgyan// gang zhig
theg pa chen por spyod nusapa// de ni dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad// gang zhig dkonamchog gsum la phyogs pa ni// de ni bsod nams dpag med thob pa'o// phyogs bcu'i
'jig rten khams su phyin pa dang// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dpag med mchod pa dang// de bzhin theg chen phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo// mchodan 'jig rtenatheg pas thug pa med// dpaladang
gzi brjid ldan zhing 'khor ba 'joms// de phyir theg pa chen po bsam khyab dkag/ byad gzugs stobs dang dbang phyug thob par 'gyur// phun sum tshogs ldan chos skumangon par 'grub// ga da
zhig thegachen 'di la zhon pa ni// blun med pa'i dga' ba myong ba yin// lus kyi sbyin pas snying rje byams bsgoms nas// de phyir theg pa bla med thob par 'gyur//

sa tshul khrims brtson 'grus tshas par spyod pan// rdzu 'phrul mngon du nyi zla sgrib kyang nus// de yang theg chen spyod pa'i dbang gis so// rang gi sems kyisabartson bgrus rgyun spyod la/ desani thog
ba chen po thob pa'o// sdug bsngalanon pa'i sgrib pa yodan yang// theg chen bsgoms pas de dag kun kyang 'bying// gang zhig theg chen chos la bde gnas pa// de ni tshodang longs spyodasangs
rgyas bzhin// yang dag rten pa brtson par ldan pa ni// phru'aphrul nang pa bzhi yi stabs kyang red// mchos yang dag don la rten pa yang// theg pa chen po bsgoms pa'i dbang gis so// mi
'jigs dang ni stobs bcu ldan pa dang// mtshan bzang sumaMtsatsaganyis brgyan pa dang// de ting 'dzin ye shes thams cad kyang// thegal chen po bsgoms pa'i dbang gis so// rigs kyi
bu gang la las theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ste// 'brug cig gam/ tshig gcig gam/ tshigs bcad gcig 'chad dam/ klogan bsod nams 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ gang gis mdo sde 'di 'dzinab// sdug bsngal kun dang yongs 'bral la// nam du'ang ngan 'gror mi ltung ste/ bde ba'i gsasu byin par gyur// gang gisamado/
sde 'di thos ba// phyi ma ma 'ongs dus nga tsho// mtha' ru sas rgyas 'grub par yang// sa ni lung du bstan par bya// gang gis rgyal la rtag gzhol ba// rgyal pa'ang rtag tu de la gzhol//
gang gis rgyal ba'i chos bsdus na// rgyal ba' dade la srung bar gyur// rdzu 'phrul chen po thego ba dang// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar nus// 'khor ba'i rgyud las bsgral ba dang// bdud
kyi dbu bcas 'dzol yang nus// rgyal ba 'od mi 'gyur de las// sa ni mdo sde 'di thos nas// bzod pa gnas te lung bstan pa// shAkya thub ces bya bar grub// nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og/
gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'chang ba// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba// ngas kyang lung dubastanapar bya// gang gis ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe// mdo sde 'di yi don shes te// blunapo rnams la rab
bshadab// dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad// sas rgyas 'jig rten mi bzhugs kyang// mdosde 'jig rten gang na bar// gnas pa'i mchod gnas de dag tu// sangs rgyas mngon sum
bzhugs pa bzhin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na// sa ston de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pas mdo sde 'di mnos te 'chad ba dang/ bsa'apa 'jig pa'i tshogazhan la rgya cher bshad pasan/ tshan
sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang da ltar thob bo zhes bka' stsal padang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
[ru]ka ga shegs pa thams cad kyis kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sumazhu nu gnyis bshad/ deng 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bshad na/ lasakyi rgyu gdagi/
bang gis de dag 'grub par 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye zhing bstan du gsol zhes bgyis pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni yon tan

dbag tu med pa bsgrubs pas mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'grub pa yin te/ gal te ngas rgya cher bshadadu khasalaba'i bar du'ang bshad pa mirdzogs pas/ dengamadotsam zhig khyed labashad do//dedag gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
semasathag pa nas tshul khrims dag par bsrung ba dang/ yi dam brtan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pas mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ bla mal bsubaskyal dang chos nyan pa gtsug lag khang dang/

zla mchod rten bsgrub pa la 'dud byas pas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan rtsibs stong dang ldan par gyur ba dang/ sems can thams cad la ma b.rAs pas rting ba yangs pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang
dam pa'i chos yongs su bsus pas sor mo ring ba'i mtshan dang ldan 'gyur ba dang/ bsdu ba rnam bzhi goms par byas bas phyag dang zhabs drabs sor mo bor 'brel ba mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur pa dang/
gos bzang bo sbyin pa byin pas phyag dang zhabasa gzhon zhing 'jam ba'i mtshon dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ bza' ba dang/ btung ba zhig bo dang/ gtsang ma dang nyams su bde ba byin pas bdun shin tu

mtho ba'i mtshan dang ldan bar 'gyur ba dang/ sas rgyasakyi chos la thos par dga' ba ri dgas me rgya ma'i byin pa lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ gzhan gyi g.yogatshad sbed cing btabs pas/ !
gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ dge ba bcu bsgoms pas seng ge'i ro stod lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs te/
sems can la rtag tubastan pas phrag so shin turgyas pa'i mtshanadang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ 'jigs pa rnams kyi mgon dang skyabs byas pas/ phrag pa'i lhan madzes par grub pa'i mtshan dang ldan
bar 'gyur ba dang/ gzhan gyi gtsug lag khang ngam mchong rten sgrub pa'i grogs byed par mos pa dang/ slong ba rnos la bdog pa med ces ma byas pas phyag brgya drang posapus mo'i lhad la bslebs pa'i
mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ rtag tu dge ba'i chos thams cad bsgrub pa dang/ srog gi rim gro byas pas sku che zhing drang pa'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur ba dang/ nab rnams kyi rtsi sman dang/
rim gro dang/ nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pas/ robro ba'i mchog thob pa'i mtshon dad ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ mun ring po nas tshig bcas pa spangs shing/ dusasu smakhasaseng ge'i 'gram
pa lta bu 'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par soms pas tshemasamanyamazhibazhi bcu tshang ba'i mtshon dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ rtsod pa rnams bsdam
pal dga' bsatshems thag bzo ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ rin po che'i sbyin pa byas pas tshegasamanyam pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa 'gyur ba dang/ 2su dang dag yid/
yongs su dag pas tshims shin tudakar po'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ ngagagi nyis babasngags pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ sems can rnams la
rtag tutshig 'jam po bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ byams pa'i sems bsgoms te/ rmongs ba med pa'i mig gis lta lta bas spyan dkar nag 'byed pa'i mtshon dang ldan pa

rgyu 'gyur ba dang/ sems thag pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub tubasgrubs pas ba'i rje'i ltabu'i mtshan dang ldan pa 'gyur ba dang/ gzhan la bsod nams dang yon tan yodapa rjes su yi rang zhing bsngags pas

zhal mdzod bus brgyan pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ phatshadang/ ma ban bodang/ slob dbon la sogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul bzhin du rim gro dang btsun par byas pas dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'i

mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur bdang/ theg pa chen pa'i chos bstan la mos pas mdog shin tu 'jam pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ stanadang/ gos dang khadabang gnas bzang po'i nangs gser gyi kha dog

dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi gtam tshogs te smra ba spangs bas sgyu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang/
mkhan bo dang/ bla ma rnams kyis bstanapa'i tshig yang dag par blangs pa dang bzung ba mngon du spel zhing 'grib par ma byas pas/ yan lag gi sa gyen du 'khyil ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/

yon tan dpag tu med pa bsgrubs pas zhabs legs par thob pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ sems can rnams ting nge 'dzin bsgom par baiskal bas shing na gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa'i mtshan dang/
ldan par 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar dpag med pa'i yon tanabasgrubasan/ mtshanasum cu rtsa gnyis de ltabudag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// zhes
de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang nubasems dpa' nam mkha'i sing pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bdag gis brtags na gang la dadas
po dang mtshan mar ma grub ste/ mamatshis la de bzhin gshegs la brtags na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam dem lags na/ ci'i slad du spyod lam rgya cher bsgrub ces gsungs/ dkonamchog
gsum dad/ bden pa bzhi dang/ phung po lnga dang/ skye mched dang/ khams dang/ rten 'brel bcu gnyis dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos rnams la bdag gis brtagasanu'ang phyi nang gi rgyu 'bras
kun stong nyid de// mdzan ma ma madris/ stonapa ma mchis/ skye zhing 'byung ba'ang ma mthong/ 'gag cing nub pa'ang ma mthong/ skya ma dang 'dra ba/ sbal pa dang 'dra ba/ 'bar ba dang 'dra ba
khrag tshadang 'a drab/ chab kyi blub dang 'dra ba/ dus sbal gyi spu dang 'dab/ ri bong gi rwadang 'ab/ namamakha'i me tog dang 'dra ba/ tshogashamagyi bu dang 'dra ba/ gzugs/
b.rAnagyi gos gyon zhing/ sgyuma'i glang po che la 'tshal ba dang 'dra ba/ mchis pa'ang 'drab/ ma mchis pa'ang 'dra ba/ de dag ni ma ba dngamams pa/ mchis pa 'dan lags/ mamachis pa'ang
mkhags/ rtag pa ma lags/ tshad bam lags/ skye bam lags/ 'gag pa ma lags/ nad du ma lags/ slad rol malags/ mthod ba ma logs/ shes pa ma lags/ dpengananam
[– ]mkha' dang 'dra ba la/ bcom ldan 'das rtsa'i slad dungs ni spyod lam de dag spyad ces gsungs/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gis partagasan/ bdagam lags/ sems can ma lags/ srog ma
ba lags/ gso ba ma'ags/ skyes bu malags/ gang zag ma lags/ shed canam lags shed bgam lags/ byed pa po la sogs pa ma lags/ mig ma lags/ gzugs
ma lags/ mig dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod lam lags/ rnab lags/ sgra ma lags ) rnab dang sgra'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/ snam lags/ drig lags sna
dang dri'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/ lca ma logs/ ro malags/ lce dang ro'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/ lus ma lags/ reg bya ma lags/ lus dang reg bya'i mtshan nyid kyi
spyod yul ma lags/ yid ma lags/ chos ma lags/ yid dang chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul yang ma lags/ rnam par shes pa ma lags/gzugs kyimtshan nyid kyi spyod yul yang ma lags//
gzugs ma 'gas/ sdug bsngal ma lags/ gzugs dang sdug bsngalagyi mtshan nyid kyi sde do yul yang ma lags/bdag ma lags/bdag lags/ 'gro ba ma lags/gzugs canam lags/
phung bo ma lags/ bdeno pasalags/ brdzun pa ma lags/ bsdus pa ma lags/ gtor bam lags/ 'byung ba malags/ 'jug pam lags te/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/
'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin te/ phar bzhud pa ma lags/ tshur byon pa ma lags/ bzhugs pa'i gnas kyang mam 'a/ sems dang/ yid dang/ rnam pa shes pa'ang
mi ma'/ lus dang/ dag dang/ yid kyi las kyang mi mnga'/ gcig pa'ang ga lags/ tha dad pa'ang ma lags/ 'das pa'ang ma lags/ mkhyen pa ga lags/ da ltar byung ba ma 'gas/
drim can malags/ yongs su dag pa lags/ bdagam lags/ sems can ma lags/ srog dang/ skyes bu dang/ gang zag lasogs pa'ang ma lags/ rtag pa ma lags/ dpam
lags/skye ba ma mchis/ 'gag pa ma mchis/ bsgom du mamachis/ spyod du mchis/da du ma mchis/blang du ma mchis/ mtha' las 'das pa yun du zhugs pa la/ gang gi slad du spyod lam rgyacher bsgrubs
bya// zhes gsungs zhes gsol pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ legs so legs
so rigs kyi bu khyodasngon 'das pa 'i dusan/ sangs rgyas grangasamed dpag tu med pa rnams la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'itsababaskrunub/ kun ring shos theg pa chen kheban med pa'i don chub par shes te/
gso rig kun kyang stong pa nyidadumangon par shes pa dang/ bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa'i mtha' las 'das te/ tshun du gnas par yod shes pas// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper nanor bu rin bo che

bcu ma'i nor bu ni tudang ba/ gsal ba/ 'dam rdzab kyi nang du lo stong gi bar du bzhag kyang/ rang bzhin khong gis dag pas phyir phyung na' nga snga mkho bzhin te/ khyod kyang de dang 'dra bar chos kyi mtshan nyid
mngon par rtogs larang bzhin rnam par dag pas khyed rnams ltar khams gsuman sibs macanalta'i 'dam rdzab tu gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang sems can gyi don byas kyis kyang bdamadzub
kyis ma gos pas na/ don 'di lta bu dag 'di nus pa yin no// rigs kyi bu khyod yang nyonacig/ 'di lta ste/ sa so cog thams cad yang dag par na dngos po med de/ yi ge yod pa'i phyir chos yod
ces bshad/ chos kyi nang du yi ge med la/ yi ge'i nang du'ang chos med do// kun tu spel ba'i phyir yigir bstan to// yig nang du ni byang chub kyang med/ byang chub kyi nang du ni yi 'ang med modakyi

don dam par ni yi gi med kyang kun rdzob tu yi ge yod par bshad pas/ sems can la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang/ bla na med pa'i byang chukyang yi ge las gudan mi rid do// rigs kyi bu khyod ze ba 'ang bden te/
de bzhin gshegs pa la zad pa med/ skyeb med/ mi sgom/ mi spyod/ sgom spyod rnams dang bral ba/ mang dag pa'i chos la mi 'jug/ de las ldog cing 'gyur ba'ang ma yin/ skyeb gcig gi
dga' ldan gyi gnas su'ang ma skyes ) dolas babs te yumagyi lhums su'ang ma gnus/ chos thams cad la sems mi gnas pas/ nga ni skye rga 'chi las 'das so zhes kyang m byas/ phyogs

bzhir gom pa bdun bdun yang ma bor/ yin 'jigarten bla na med pa btsun pa yin no zhes kyang ma brjod/ grong khyer mchog tuna'ang bzang mo dang yang g rtse na/ 'jig rten bya ba yig rtsis la sogs pa'ang rma
bslabs/ stobs dang 'bod tshul yod ma skun to// sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir/ rgan po mngon sum du bstan pa ni lus la zhugs pa rnams bkag pa'o// nad pa mngosum du
bstan pa ni tsho la chags pa rnams bkag pa'o// shi ba'i mtshan ma mngon sum du bstan pa ni// 'dod chags dang nga dang ngar 'dzin pa rnams bkag pa'o// dge slong mngonosum du bstan pa ni/ sems can
rnams tshangs pa dang brgya byin gyi lus su mi smon par 'jig rten las 'das pa/ bla na med pa'i chos la brtson par bsgrub pa bya ba'o// grong khyer mchog nas phyung ste/ shegs pa ni khams gsum gyi
bu/ btson las thar ba dang/ 'bras bum yin pa rnams bstan pa'o// slar gzigs ba ni byams sdang mi mang bar bstan pa'o// de'i phyir mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku rnam
bar brgyan cing/ sems can gyi bsod nams kyi zhing du bya ba'o// dbu skra bregs pa dang/ rgyan rnams sbyangs ba dang/ rtatsan ta ka zhabs 'bring dad pa can la mar bskur ni nyon mos ba thams cad
dang bral bar bstan pa'o// kha spu bregs pas chos thams cad la mi chags rnam par bastan pa'o// ka ga dur smig gyon pas sems can gdul bar bstan pa'o// drang srong u ta ka dang a ngan/

dal chos 'dri rtog bya ba ni rang gi nga rgyal gyi sems 'jom par bstanapa'o// lo drug gi bar du dka' thub spyad pa ni mu stegs 'dul ba'o// zhal zas blas pani 'jigarten pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/
lha sa ti blangs pa ni chog shes par bstan pa'o// rtswa bting ba'i steng du bzhugs pa ni nyamarangs dang g.yel ba rnams 'joms par bstan pa'o// lha klu kun gyis bstod cing bsngags ba dang bsnyen bkur
bya ba ni yon tan gyi 'bras bu la bkod par bstan pa'o// bdud rnams brtul bani dpa' ba'i mthu bstan pa'o// phyag g.yas pa sa la bstan pa nibasod nams kyi mthu bstan pa'o// sa chen po kun tu/
g.yob ni drin gyi lan ldon par bstanapa'o// de ltar mtshan ma med par bsgom ba'i phyir/ blon med ba'i byang chub kyi lam thob pa yin no// 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid mngon du mkhyen nas/
rjes kun mnyam pa nyid du bstan pas ni sangs rgyas zhes bya'o// sas rgyas kyi ye shes la thug pa med de/ chos bstan to cog la sas rgyasasu 'grub pa'i don bstan pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pazhes
bya'o// dus gsumagyi bya ba dge ba dang/ mi dge ba'i chos mngon dubasal bar gzigs shing mkhyen pas na/ thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o// bden ba dang yang dag par gsungs pa'i phyir/ lha dang mi'i

mkhan po zhis bu// gang zhig de ltar slob cing rtogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// de la log par rtog pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bsu ba can zhes bya'o//
gas kyi busangs rgyas thams cad ni mi 'byud/ mi 'jug/ mi skye/ mi 'gog ste/ sems can thams cad mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir 'jigs rten du 'byung ngo zhes brjod pa dang/ sas rgyas mya ngan
las 'da' 'o zhes brjod pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang yang dag par na chos thams cad kyi

ngo bo nyid ni stong pa nyid du rtogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'byung ga'am/ nub pa'ang mi mnga' bas/ rgyal po'i pho brang du'ang ma bltam/ byang chub kyi shing drung du'ang mya ngan las ma 'a sa/ mthar
las 'das te/ yun du gnas pa sems can yongs su bsal bar mdzad pa'i slad du/ dka' thub spyad cing mya ngan las 'da' bar bstan kyang/ yang dag par na 'gyur 'al/ spros pa mi ma'ang/
de de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul yun du gnas te/ khams gsuman sku 'byung ba dang chos kyi rnam pa lnga phyung ngo// lnga po gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid dang/

sa sku yon tan canadang/ sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes pa dang/ sku sprul cing 'byung ba dang/ sku nam mkha' lta bu dang lnga ste/ de la sku yang dag pa'i bonyid cesabagyi ba ni/ yang dag pa'i 'bras bu'i mchog
mtshan ma thams cad las 'das pa/ rang gi dbyis la lan du gnas pa na/ sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bgyig/ sku yon tan can zhes bgyi ba ni sems can mya ngan las bkluba'i slad du/ spyod pa/
rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad cing/ dge ba thams cad phunasum tshogs par mdzad pas na/ sku yon tanacan zhes bgyi'o// skachos kyi ngo bo nyid skyes zhes bgyi ba ni/ chos kyi mtshan nyid thams cad
thugs su chud de/ mi mkhyen pa mi mnga'o/ sbyong tshul de la yang dag par mkhyen pa'i stong pa nyid las skyes te/ yang dag par rdzogs pas na/ sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes zhes bgyi'o// sku la/
rgyu ning 'byung ba zhes bgyi ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung yang/ lam rgyud lngar dag sdug kun la mngon par bstanacing/ skyabs su mi mdzad ba ma mchis te/ sprul pa'i rdzas las mtshan3
du'agyur bosan/ sku sprul cing 'byung ba zhes bgyi'o// sku namamakhaM' lta bu zhes bgyi ba ni nam mkha' mtha' yas pasan/ chos kyi sku yang mtha' yas so// nam mkha' 'od pag pa dang gzhal du ma
mchis pas du/ chos kyi sku yad dpag nyid gzhal dum mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku yang nam mkha' chen po dang 'dra'o// sems can yongs su mya ngan la bzla ba'i slad du sku rnam par ltar ston/
pasan/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skye ba mi mnga'/ 'gag pa mi mnga' bar mngon no// chos thams cad kyang de bzhin te/ sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas mngonadu
sngal cing/ chos rnam par spel galags so zhes gsol ba dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs
kyi bu khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar chos kyi mtshan nyid lam khas pas/ spyod yul thams cad la rab tu chod pa 'am/ thog pa med de/ rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dusan/ bskal pa stong

rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba dang/ 'jig rten long spyod can zhes bya ba der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha rtag theg pa chen po 'ba' zhig spyod de/ nyan thos dang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i ming na
ba'i thog mar yang mi grag na/ ngan song lta zhig ci smos/ khyod bskal pa de dang 'jig rtenader de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba
'byung ste/ 'jig rten gzhan nas skyes bu chen po dag kyang der phyin cing/ theg pa chen po thar ba phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde mnyanab dang/ blangs pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// de bsanasems
bza bya// canagang la las byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying bo'i ming thos te/ phyag 'tshal zhing mchodabubusan/ 'jig rten longs sbyong can gyi khams der yang skye bar 'gyur go

sems can gang la las theg chen po'i chos sgrub na'ang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur/ gang chos kyi rnam gras 'di blang zhing ba cangs ba des nisas rgyas 'byung ba bcu ma 'dus par lung bstan
pa 'ang thob par 'gyur ro// de'i tshade'i dus na bcom ldan 'as shAkya thub pa 'khyang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyi zhusanas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang/ mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshon dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dbab chen po'i dge 'dun rnams kyi mtshan bstan nas yang seng ge'i sgra chenapo
slogs te/ seng ge'i sgra zhes bya bani nges pa'i tshig bstan pa'o// nges pa'i tshog bstan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rtag par 'tsho skyong zhing gzhes te/ mya ngan las mi 'da' bar rig pa'o// yang sems
can thams cad lasas rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod do zhes bstan pa dang/ lha'i bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pas gong ste/ skyabs kyi dbang du gyur pas naseng ge'i sgra zhes bya'o// de ltar bstan nas ljag
kyi mtshan rgyachen pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten kyi khams kun khebs par g.yogs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// rnam pa drug tu g.yodos zhes bya ba/
ni shar phyogs mthon nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mthon shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mthon byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mthon lhe phyogs dma'/ dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/ mtha' ma thon

dbusadama' ba nes rnam pa drug tu g.yos zhes bya'o// ljags kyi drung nas 'od za chenapo btang ste/ phyogs bcur snang ba chen po byas so// snang ba chen po des mi rtag pa ni rtag par byas/ ma dag pa ni
dag par byas/ sdug bsngal can ni bde bar byas/ mi rig pa ni rig par byas/ de'i tshe sas rgyas kyi 'od kyis reg cing snang do cog la ridang/ nags tshal dang/ yulas dang/ chu bo'i klung dang/
rgya mtsho dang/ lcagos kyi ri 'a khor yug dang/ dmyal ba 'asogs pa thams cad kyang mtho dman med par mnyam par gyur cing/ nyal nyil dang ljan ljin med de kun kyang yongs su dag par gyur naso 'di
lta ste dper na shar phyogs na 'jig rten khru gang rnam dag yongs su brgyan dang 'dra'o// de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku sprul pa ni/ nam mkha' nas bab pa

ni me tog gi char bab pa dang 'dra'o// 'og nas byung ba ni sprin dung na bun byung ba dang 'dra ba nam mkha' yongs su gang ste/ nam mkha' stong par cung zad kyang medi// sprul ba'i zhal so so nas tshig
'thun par de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag par mtsho skyong gzhes te/ mya ngan las ma 'da' 'o// sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod dozhes gsungs/ yang chos thams cad ni stod
pa nyid do zhes gsungasaso// spyod la de dag gi rgyu 'bras theg pa gcig tu zad pa las sems can gyis theg parnam pa gsum du mthong zhes bshad nas/ de ma thag tu kun mi snang/

bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan 'khazhugs ba nyi snang ste/ de'i tshe tshogs mang bo thams cad kyis sku sprul pa de dag mthong ba ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthuste/ shAkya

thub pa yab byams pas/ 'di 'du ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang gzibarjod mngon par sprul pa de'i tshe/ tshogs kyi nang nasong chub sems dpa'i gad+ma'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed kyisani mi skye ba'i chos la bzodapa

thobapo// nyan thos brgyad khri zhigani theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed do// dge slong stong phrag bcu zhig gis ni dgra bcom pa'i lag thob bo// dge slongam khri brgyad stong zhig gis ni'ur mi 'ong ba'i laglog

pe dge bsnyen khri phrag bzhi bcunani lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i lam thob bo// dge bsnyenam 'bum phrag bcus ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i lam thob bo// lha dang migrangs med pa zhig ni chos kyi mig rdul med pa//

dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag pa thob ste/ rang gi tshe snga phyi shes pa dang/ dusabyas kyi chos thams cad mi rtag par mthong ngo// de nas tshogasakyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo song ge'i sgra
stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'adas 'a 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan

'das kyisagong du bstan pa bzhin nanisangs rgyasakyi mtshan thos na'ang sdig 'byang/ chos kyi mtshan thos na'ang sdiga'abyang dge 'dun gyimtshan thos na'ang sdig 'byang bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung na/ sas/
rgyas kyi mthu lags sam/ chos kyi mthu lags sam/ dge 'dun gyi ma lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags n ni sangs rgyas la gsol ba bgyi/ chos kyi mthu lags na ni chos la gsol
bar bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi mthu lags na ni dge 'dun la gsol ba bgyi ba lags na/ gsum can la gsol babagyi ci 'tshal/ gong du gsungs pa'i theg pa gcig la so so'i skye bos rnam pa gsum du/
mtho do zhes 'byung na/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis kyang gsum du bshad na sems can lta zhiganyisos zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po sang ge'i sgrol 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// legs so legasaso// rigs kyi bu sems can 'gro phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir don de lta bu 'driba'ang shin tu legs te/ nyon cig/ ngas
khyod la khye brag phyed par bshad do// sangs rgyas kyi mthu 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin/ chos kyi mthu 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin/ dge 'dun gyi mthu 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin te/ kun tshogs pa'i mthu bas
sangs rgyas ni sems can gyi mgon skyabs kyi pha ma byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no// sems can bslad pa can sems stor ba sang redade 'khor ba la skyonas/ dran pa'i mthu
ma bos khams gsum na nyon mos pa'i rgya mtsho'as bsgral bar 'dod na/ phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'dis bsgral ba'i gru chen po byed de// de bas na rigs kyi bu sangs
rgyas kyang chos so// chos kyang dge 'dun no// dge 'dun ni 'dus ma byas pago/ 'dusamabyas pa nistong pa nyid dang/ 'dus byas kyi stong pa nyid dang/ nang gi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi'i stong

pa nyid dang/ chen po'i stong pa nyid dang/ chung ngu'i stong pa nyid kyang stong ba nyid du 'dra ste/ de'as gzhan med do// rigs kyi bu khyod zer bstan/ rnam pa gcig tu bslab kha'i rigs kyi bus rnam pa
gsum du bsgrub ci dgos zhes bya ba ni/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mi gcig cig nam mkha' stong pas skrag ste/ gar phyin dgur gab kyang nam mkha' dang yongam brol lo// rigs kyi bu
phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa dang/ ngas bshad de cob/dge ba thams cad kyi rgyudang/ rkyen dang/ dkon mchog gsum dang/ theg pa gsum yong gcig las ma 'da' 'o//
byang nub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgras gsol pa/ legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pas bstan pa ltar ni bdag sde nas 'tshol te/ sems can rnams kyi slad du don de zhu ba lags
so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du mi gnyis mi gsum mo// thar pa chen po phyogs sa rgyus pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ byang chub sems dpa'
nams kyi shul chenapo/ rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mig ste/ lta ba log pa rnams sdud pa dang/ sems storab rnams skyong ba dang/ nganasong gsum gyi sgo gcod pa dang/ bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sgo
'byed pa dang/ nyan thos rnams bzlog ste/ theg pa chen por 'dzud pa'i skad du/ bdag gis gzungs chen po'i sngags kyis bsrung zhing bskyag par bgyi'o// sdom pa ma nyams pa dang/ mdo sde 'di la

sgom zhing bslab pa bgyid pa de la'ang bsung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o// gal te gang zag las mdo snga 'di la bsnyenabakur bgyid cing/ dgung bdun gyi bar du spyad pa spyod la/ bdud sdig canagyis 'khrug cing
'tsho ba'i grags lta ba mchis na/ bdud sdig can gyis glags kyi skabs mi red par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag mdo sde 'di la rim gro bgyis te yun ring por gnas par bgyi ba 'ang/ byang chub
kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du gnas par bgyi'o// bcomaldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyodamado sde 'di la rim gro bya ba ni/ dkon mchog gsum la rim gro bya ba dang 'dra'o// ston pa
la'ang rim gro bya ba dang 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgras/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gzungs sngags 'di skad ces smras so// na mo bud+d+hA ya// na mo d+harmaya/ nam can
a dan d+hi d+ha ra ni/ tad+ya thA/ ha AkAshani ba bI/ sarba d+harmun b dwe/ a sha ma d+ha/ pi pa sha na/ bim lasupa ri dar ma ni la na/ b.ru ni tsa yaM tam le tsa le/ yul shulu/ shib
gde man tra sAhA/ sngags 'di dus gcig la lan du brgyad bzlas shing/ mchod rten lan bdun bskor ba bgyi/ deltar gdugs bdun gyi bar du mdo sde gzhan lami bsam par/ rgyu
gdugs gcig kyang dus gsum du phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di la sems rtse gcig tu bgyis te/ sems gzhan dum g.yodwa par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzus sngags 'di ni sangs rgyas khri phrag
brgyad brgyas gsungs pa ste/ deng 'dir bdag gis kyang brjod pa lags so// gal te 'ga' zhig gzungs 'di la smadab mchis na/ sangs rgyas de dag la smod par 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di la snod/
pa bani[]rabs du ma'i bar du byang nub tubasgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ sridapa gsum las kyang mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ sngags 'di ni sems dran pa nyams pa rnams sems sar
redapa dang/ gzungs 'di lan cig tsami rnabar shesasam/ thos nas yi ger bris te/ shadang chang 'chol bar sdom pa la gnas shing/ bdag nyid rtse 'jo la sogs pa sas te/ 'du 'dzi'i
nang du mi 'jug la// rgyun du byams pachen bo spyod cing bsam gtan la gces par 'dzin na/ gang zag de dpagatum mchis pa'i sgrib pa gsum gyi sdig lci ba rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro// gzus
de som thag sems thag ba nasablangab dang/bcang bodang/ nyin r zhing klog pa dang/ bton dubagyid pa dang/ yi dmadu mi bskyodabar bgyid na/ gang zag de mngon par byang ma chub kyi bar du ngan song
gsum du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgral bka' stsal pa// legs so legasaso// rigs kyi bu khyodadakon mchog gsag gyi
rim gro bya ba dang/ byams pa'i sems kyis sems can rnams srid pa gsum las gdon ba dang/ bslab pa mang po gras med pa la phan ba dang/ bde ba chen po bya ba'i phyir/ ston pa'i sgo 'byed cing/
log par lta b rnams bzlog ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba 'a 'tshud pa'i phyir/ gzungs sngags 'di bshad pa ni shin tu'ang legs so// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag khyod kyi ming dang/ sngags kyi

sgra thos nas// dad pa dang gus pa bskyed de mi smod na/ gang zag de tsho 'di nyid la'ang bde la/ 'chi 'phosana'ang rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong zhing/ nga'ang mthong la khyed la sogs pa khyad
chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// mngon par 'chad rgyu bar yang nges par rang gis rig ste/ the tsom med do// kun nas nyon mongs spangs pa dang// dge ba kun gyis
lam bsgrubs te/ sangs rgyas rang bzhinamathong ba yang// rnam dag dad pa'i dbang gis so// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/
rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las nyin gcig gam/ dus gcig gam/ mchon gcig gam/ skad cig ma gcig la phyogs bcu dus gsum dugashogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/
@#la/ mdo sde bcu gnyis dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing thegapa chen po tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang/ don dam pa'i bden pa la
bsams na/ gang zag de ni skad cig ma se gol gtogs pa tsam gyi mi dge ba bcu dang/ mtshams med pa lnga dang/ mnyam pa nyid la skur ba dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las thams cad/
yongs su malus par 'byang bar 'gyur// gal te dge slong na dge slong ma 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ dge sbyong ngamo/ dge sbyong mas sems kyi rang bzhin stor nas/ rtsa
ba bzhi dang/ sdom pa brgyad nyams pa dang/ mi dge ba bcu dang/ mtshams med pa lnga byas pa dang/ mnyam pa nyid la skur pa'i rnams phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshon

la dad pa bskyed de phyag 'tsholan/ 'di lta bu'i las ngan pa kun ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro// de skad bka' skul ma thag dusngon sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur gyi dus na/ rgyal bu dag mthong zhes bya ba
de'i tshe mi sum stong dang lhan cig tu skad cig mar der lhaganas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs te phyag 'tshalanas/ tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
bdag cag bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa nas/ kun nas nyon mos pa'i las bgyis blta zhig bshad kyis mi rdzogs te/ mi dge ba bcudang/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang/ mnyam pa nyid la
0 skur pa'i sdig grangs mamanyis bar bgyis par de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo ste bzhuganyis la brten nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams kyi spyan sngar 'thol te/ 'gyod tshangs su gsol
zhing 'chis na/ skabs dbye bar ci gnang zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu 'jigs pa'i sems bskyed pa'ang dka' la// dge
ba'i chu babaskyed pang dka' ste/ mi dge ba bcu dang/ mtshams med pa la 'thol zhing 'chags par 'ded pa ni/ log spyod la sogs pa'angasaa rgyus kyi bdag nyid mthong nye bas/ yid la dran pa
bzhin du 'thob zhing bshag shog/ de nas rgyal bu ga mthong la sogs pa ma sum stong gis bcom ldan 'das skabs dbye bar gnang ba byams pa'i sems thosanas/ goso tshags bcos te thal mo sbyar
cing phyag 'tshal nas/ bla gos phrag pa ga las su gzar te/ bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag phyogs
banu'i sangs rgyal skyabs sumachi'o// phyogs bcu'i chos la skyabagasumachi'o// phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi// yang 'di lta ste/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'a khrugs mi
mnga' la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol la// lho phyogs kyisangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// nub phyogs kyisas rgyas 'od dpag med la phug 'tshul
zhing skyabs su gsol lo// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas don yod grub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// bla ma phyogs kyi sangs rgyas dribartsegs la phyag 'tshal zhing
skyabs su gsol lo// 'og maphyogs kyis dus rgyas gzugs b.ran 'bum la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// yang shar phyogs na skyes bu chen po kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs
su gsolal// lho phyogs na skyes bu chen 'jig rten 'dzin la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// nub phyogs na kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo//

byad phyogasan zla gang la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// bla ma phyogasananamamakha'i sAd pa la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs sugasolalo// 'og ma phyogs ni skyes chen po brtan pa la phyag 'tshol zhing
@# skyabs su gsolal// yang bdag cag gi mkhan po de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyur ba la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su
gsol lo// phyogs gzhan na sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// da ltar bdag cag gi mkhan po bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs sugasol lo//
skyes bu chen po dri ma med par grags ba dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nul du phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// 'phags pa dga' bo dang 'od srungs la'ang skyabs su gsol lo// 'phags pa'i dras
wagu rnam bzhi mngon par byung ba rnams la'ang skyabs su gsol lo// byang chub kyi sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la skyabs su gsol lo// sde snod chen po gsung rab mdo sde bcu gnyis dang/

mnyam pa nyid yang dag pa'i mdo sde gzhan bzhugs so 'tshal la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// cha brgyad du bgos pa'i sku gdung ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing
skyabs su gsol lo// de ltar na sku gzugs bzhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ tshangs pa dang/ brgya byinadang/ sum cu/
rtsa ba/sum gyi lha'i dbad phyug dang/ bar snang na gnas pa'i lha dang/ sa'i ltadang/ ri dang/ nags tshal dang/ shing drung gi lhadang/ drang srongadad/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan pa rnams
dang/ lha'i spyan mnga' ba rnams dang/ lha'i snyan mnga' ba thams cad kyi snyanagyis gsan cing mkhyen par mdzod cig/ kun dpang du gsol te/ sems can thams cad la ma mthol ma bshags pa
zhig mchis na'ang/ sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur cig/ yang 'di skad ces smas te/ bdag cag theg mamamachis pa nas/ daltar gyi lus donapa 'di thob kyi bar dunod nying 'khrul pa'i
sems kyis phyin ci log tu lta ba dpag tu ma mchis/ nyon mongs pa dang/ mi dag de'i las bgyis pa brjod kyis mi lang ste/ sdig pa'i tshogs bgyis so na myol rang gis mtshonam rig pas ngan
sems rab tu rgyas te/ tshe phyi mam mthong zhing mo 'di 'bu ba zhig mthong bas/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags 29 bos te dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ring du gyur cing/ las ngan pas bar du/
nas sdig pa'i grogs po dngabasten cing/ dag slod dang/ dge slong mal mi rigs mi tshul pa'i las bgyis pa dang/ pha dang ma la mirigs ma tshul ba'i las gyis pa dang/ yang bdag nyas rangos
kyi dbang gis dge 'dun gyi dkor nor thugs thub tu spyad pa dang/ dge 'dun sde lnga la mi rigs mi tshulapar bgyis pa dang/ 'jig rten pa'i kun nas nyon mod pa'i 'bras bu dpag tu ma mas par bshags pa/
( 'am byang chub kyi dgo ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i sems canapa kum pa bam/ chos kyi slob dpon la skur te/ chos la chos ma lags zhes skur/ chos ma lags pa la chos lags zhes brjod/ de bzhin
gshegs pa 'ani mi rtag ces bgyis/ dam pa'i chos la'ang mi rtag go zhes bgyis/ dge 'dunarakonamchog kyang mi rtag go zhes bgyis/ sbyin pa dang shes rab la rimamos/ log pa'i chos la dad cing
'dzin pa de dag gi slad du/ deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/ khrel zhing ngo tsha ba'i du dpag tshu mchis te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs sugasol lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus ni bum
ba dang thugs rje mnga' ste/ phyogasasu snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag gis sdig pa bskal pa grang ma mchis pa'i 'khor
ba nas bgyis pa mthol zhing bshags par 'tshog na/ gnad ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol zhing slan chad kyang mi bgyid par smonati// yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bskal pa dpag tu ma
mchisapa tshun tshad mtshams ma mchis pa lta bgyis pa dang/ sangs rgyas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i bslab pa zhig par bgyis pa dang/ log spyod kyi spyod pa da pa dang/ ngag rtsub mogatong ba dang/
dam pa'i chos la skur pa 'debs pa'i las ngan pa de dag 'gyod cing 'thol ma myong ste/ sems la gnong pa 'am/ ngo tshabamamachis par me dgo ba bshudang/ mtshams ma mtshes pa lnga lasogs pa'i
sdig pa mi dge ba'i las lci ba nges par bgyis par rang gis chog kyang nongs pa bcabs nas/ 'jigs shing skrag ba dang/ gnong zhing do tsha ba'i sems thog ma nas ma mchis par/ dad pa can gyi
mchod pablangs nas/ 'thol zhing bshags ma myong ste/ dam pa'i chos yun du btsugs te/ rimagro bgyiba'i sems ma mchis par rtag tu smod cing// b.ras pa dang/ ngag gi sgo nas kun nas nyon mos
