pa'i nos ba mang bo bgyis pa dang/ chedan dkon mchog gsum yang med do zhes brjod pa dang/ mi dge ba bcu dang/ mtshams ma mchis pa'i sdig de dag bgyis pa'i slad du/ dang 'jigs shing/
skrag po dpag tum mnyis/ gnong zhing khrel ba dbalag tu ma mchis te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byams ba dang thugs rje mnga' ste/
tsha kya// phyogasag snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnamasanadage ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bo dag cag gi sdig pa bskal ba grangs mamachiso ba'i 'khor bas
bgyis pa/ mi 'gaba'i sems kyis 'thol zhing bshags par 'tshalan/ gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ slan chad kyang mi bgyid par ston to// yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
cag bskal pa grasam mchis pa tshun chad phyin ci log tu 'di lta ste/ nub bzhin sbom por bshad/ sbom po ni rtsa ba bzhir bshad/ zhig pa rnams nim zhig bar bshad/ ma zhig pa rnamasan zhig par

bsha/ lci ba rnamAni yabar bshad/ yang b rnamasani lci par bshad/ dag pa rnams ni ma dag par bshad/ ma dag pa rnams ni dag par bshad pa dang/ yang log par lta bas 'jig rten pa'i gtsug lag la bstod cing bsngags
nas/ chos dang mdo sde lanam gus te/ mengan gyi gtam rtag tu gleng zhing brjod pa dang/ mkhartags pa'i nor rnam pa brgyud pa 'chang ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa nibadud/
kyi tshig go zhes bgyis pa dang/ bdud kyi tshig yang dag bani de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkagazhes bgyis pa dang/ mu stegs mkhan gyi tshig la' nga yid ches par 'dzin pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthar
mya ngan las 'das te med pas/ dkon mchog gsum yang mi rtag go zhes bgyis nas lus dang sems 'khrul cing/ phyin ci log tu lta ba dpag tu ma mchis pa'i sladadu deng 'jigs shing skrag pa' dpag tu
0 ma mchis/ gnong zhing ngo tsha ba'ang dpag tum mchis te/ dkonamchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byams ba dang thugs rje mnga' ste/ phyogs su snyoms pa'i
yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag gis sdig pa bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bgyis pa de dag mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis
'thol zhing bshags par 'tsho'an/ gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ slan chad bar mi bgyid par son to// yang 'di lta ste/ bco ldan 'das bdag cag bskal pa dpag tumams pa nas/
tsho lus 'di la thug gi bar du/ dge 'dun gyi spyi'i nor ram/ phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi ra ram/ da ltar bzhugs pa'i dge 'dun gyi nor ram/ dge 'dun sde lnga'i noraram/ dge slong gang zag
nor ram/ yon bdag thams cad kyi nor rdzas la brkus ba bam/ rang nyam du spyad pa dang 3 yanang smos te/ bdag gis dam pa'i chos bsam gtan bzhi 'am/ 'bras bu bzhi ma thob par thob

bo zhis sa pa la sogs pa rkyen de ltabu'i las ngan pa mi dge ba'i rgyu rkyen du gyur te/ khyim nas khyimamed par rab tu byung na'ang/ pham pa bzhi dang/ sdom pa brgyad dang/ lcib drug dang/ drage 'dun gyi
lhag ma bcu gsum dang/ ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang/ spang ba'i ltung ba sum cu dang/ ltung ba dag bcu dang/ so sor bshags pa bzhi dang/ bslab pa mang po dang/ bdun shin tu zhi ba'i
chos rnams te/ tshul khrims de dgasher la nyes byas nas/ pham pa la thug gi bar dunyams pa dang/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa dang/ dam pa'i chos dang/ mdo sde
zab me la skur pa dang/ log sred kyi spyodab sladunas/ nongs pa babs te/ 'gyod cipa 'thol ma khyodabs/ nyin mtshan du 'phel zhing skye ba/ sngon rgyal ba dag gis bshad b.las thos pa na/ dgapa'i/
chos la skur pa 'am/ mtshamasamo 'tshos pa lnga bgyis pa 'am/ nubabazhi pham par gyur pa rnams ma bshags ma 'brel na/ sems can dmyal bar nges par lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang
chub semasaM dab 'a rnams dang/ 1thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang skyabs mdzad par 'gyur/ dge 'dun dang/ pha ma dang/ lha rnams dang/ mi rnams kyis kyang skyabs dang bor ba bgyid mi nus so

zhes 'byung ban/ de'i slad du deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/ gnong zhing ngo tsha ba dpag tu mamachis te/ de'i slad du deng dkon mchog gsum dang/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang/
ma'os pa'i sangs rgyas stong dang/ da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku shAkya thub pa la skyabs su gsol lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa dang thugs rje'i mnga' bdag ste/
phyogs su snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags/ bdag cag bskal ba dpag tum mchis pa tshun chad kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang/ las
'awa kyi sgrib pa dang/ shes bya'i sgrib pa dang/ pham pa bzhi dang/ mtshams ma mchis pa dang/ mi dge ba bcu la sogs pa'i sdig lci ba rnams 'thol zhing bshags par 'tshal na/ gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar
gsol/ yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das deng bdag gis sems can rnams dang/ bdag cag gis rang rang gi slad du/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i spyan sngar 'a thol shi bshags par 'tshal la/ sems
canathams cad kyis bskal pa dpag tu mamachis pa tshun chad/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang/ pha ma'i drin glo bar mchud pa dang/ rnam par byang ba'i ches ma 'tshal to/ mi dge ba sna tsholos
bgyis pa dang/ rang gi rigs bsams te/ dregs shing rgyags pa'i tshe/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las nyamangag tu bgyis kyang/ nongs par ma mthong ba'i/ skye bo blun po'i las bgyis pa dang/
sdig pa'i bshes gnyen la bsten tsong/ nyon mongs pas sems 'khrug pa dang/ 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan la chog ma 'tshal te/ mi dge ba'i las rnams bgyis pa dang/ 'gro ba bzang mos bsus te/
'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gi nyon mongs pas gzir ning/ sems 'khrugs te/ spros pa dang/ lus dang/ ngag nga/ yid gsum gyi sgo nas bsags pa las mi
dge ba bdag rang gis bgyis pa dang/ gzhan bgyid du stsal ba dang/ bgyid pa la rjes su yi ring ba de dag thams cad dengaso sor 'chags so// 'khrol lo// mi 'chab bo// sas rgyas dang/
chos dang/ 'phags pa'i dag 'dun la bsnyen bkur mngagyis pa'i sdig pa dang deng so sor 'chags so// 'kholo// 'chab go/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/
rang sangs rgyas la'ang bsnyen bkur mabagyis pa'i sdig pa'ang deng so sor 'chags so// 'thol lo// mi 'chab bo// ma rig pa'i dbang gis dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa dang/ pha ma dang/
mkhan po dang/ slob dpon gyi drin globar ma chudaba'i slad du/ bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa de dag kyang deng so sor bshagasaso// 'thol lo// mi 'chab bo// blunazhing rmongs pas bsgribs te/
nyamar dwadang rgyags bsal dge ba sna tshogs bgyis pa'i sdig pa de dgakyang dengaso sor 'chags so// 'thol la// mi 'chab bo// slan chad kyang mi bgyid do// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la
bdag cag gis yon phul zhing mchod pas ni/ 'as pa'isems can de dag kun s bcul 'khod// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
bar gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal bu dag mthong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// legs so// skyes bu chen por da gi las legs nyes kyi rtog pa la mkhas te/ kun nas nyon
mongs pa'i las la 'jigs pa dang slog pa skyesanas/ nyes pa rnamasamangon par 'thol ba'i slad du/ sems can gyi sdig mang bo'ang khyod kyis 'thol zhing bshags pa'i phyir/ khyod ni skyes bu dam pa

yung dag pa zhes bgyi'o// rang gi nyon mongs pa'ang song pa'i steng du/ sems can gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa' da ring du dbral bar byas pas/ de'i phyir khyod ni skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa zhes bya ba yin/

te/ rang gi don du smos pa yin gyi/ thog mar sems can thams cad kyi don du blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tumangon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i smon lam btab pa'i phyir/ khyod ni/
skyes bu dam yang dag pa zhes bya'o// de nas rgyal bu dge mthong la sogs pa ma sum stong gis 'gyod 'tshangs bgyis pa'i 'og tu/ bcom ldan 'das latshigasasubacad de 'di skad cesabastod do//
bcom ldan nyag gcig gtso bi'i mchog/ khams gsum pa ma thams cad mkhyen// thams cad min nyamamanyam pa nyid 3 bcom ldan dakon la phyag 'tshal lo// skye bo sbyin gtod rang gi phug
nor rdzus byon cing la yang r// byams chen rgyal ba de yin te// dgra gnyen byams sdang phan sogs mdzad// rkang gnyis nang na rgyal ba btsun// shes rab san gyis mkhyen gzigasal//
brtson 'grus che bdag skyabs su mchi// lha rnams shes rab de ma 'tshol/ 'das dang ma byon da ltar bzhugs// rgyal ba kun la bdag phyag 'tshal// de bzhin rgyal ba skyabs lagasol pa'ang/
dus gsum rgyal ba mchod pa bzhin// de nas phyogs ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ rgyal bu dge mthong dang/ mi sum stong latshigs su bcad de bstod pa/ gang zhig sangs rgyas 'grub 'dod pa/
mang du thos la 'brong pa byos// slob dpon dge la bkur byas n/ gsas rgyas grub pa yun miring/ nga du phasal 'bu/ gang zhig tshul khrims rnam dag spyod// de ni dge slong yang dag yin/
sa gang zhig stong par sgomanus pa// de ni ting 'dzin thob ces bya// gang zhig brtson 'grus spyod nus pa// de ni byang chub spyod pa'o// gang zhig mya ngan 'da' 'gyur ba// de ni dga' ba yang dag
ba'o tshul khrims 'dzin pa'i dge slong dang// rnam dag khrims 'dzin dge slong ma// zlab phyed cing gso sbyongabyos// chos gos rnam pa lus gyon te/ lhung bzed gsegashing thogs nas su//
ma dgabasod snyoms 'gro dusan// lha rnams kun kyang dgar 'gyur bas// thal mo sbyar zhing gus phyag 'tshal// sa kyang lhadang mi rnams kun// de yi bya ba byed du gzhug/ dper na lha bun thams
cad kyis/ lha yi dbang po brgya byin la// rim gro gus bar byedapa bzhi// daltar 'phral du'ang lan thob ste// phyi ma'i dus su'ang dpag tu med// rab tu byung zhing khrims 'dzin pa// sangs
rgyas drin lan lon zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste// ngadang sems pa ma gtogs par// 'jig rten pa yi mi kun gyis// rnam dag dad pa'i sems bskyed do// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag
kun// mya ngan ma 'das rtag tu bzhugs// chos dang dge 'dun de bzhin te// de ltaramangon bar shes pa ni// sangs rgyas drin lan len zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste// 'jig rten pa
yi mi dag kun// rnam par 'byed pa'i sems med cing// theg pa gcig las mngon par shes// 'dus pa dang ni ma 'ongs pa// phyogs bcu dang ni da lta'i rnams // sangs rgyas theg pa gcig
bu la gnyis sam gsum zhes bya med par// de ltar yid la bskyed nas su// semasakyis rnam par mi rtog na// de lta bu yi mi rnams ni// rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di/
lta ste/ gang zag la la 'ga' zhig gis// sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das pa na// rtag tu dad pa'i sems bskyedade// sems can kun la sas rgyas kyi// bdag nyid yod par bshad pa ni// de lta
bu ya seng brag rnams // rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya// gang zhig skad cig dgo spyod cing// lha yi 'bras bumar ste// cig car bla med lam bsgrubs na// rgyal ba'i drin lan lonazhes bya//
rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ gsas rgyas mya ngan 'das phun// gal te gang zag 'ga' zhig gis// yud tsam mdo sde 'di bklags te// dkon mchog gsum la gus byas shing// mkhan lasu zhu
mchod byas na// de lta bu yi gang zag rnams / rgyal ba'i na lan lon zhes bya// gang zhig nor rdzas sna 'ga' 'am// kha zas dang ni gos kyi rnams // kun la khyab par sbyin byas na// rgyal
ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste// nga yi chos rnams 'jig pa na// gang zhig 'ga' la blo bstan nas// yud tsam mdo sde 'di nyan na// byang chub somasadapa' 'bum
bya@#/ brgya la/ mchod pa phul bas de lhag go/ theg chen mdo sde 'di dag kyang// sangs rgyas byang chub kun gyi yum// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// mdo sde 'di
la dran byas te// snyoms sems phan tshunaganyis med na// rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste// gang zhig chos 'di 'jig pa'i tshe// rgyal ba'i drin lan blon 'dod
bas skad cig yud tsam sgrog byedapas// stong khams gang ba'i sems can gyi// srog gi sbyin pa byani ba bas// bsam gtan bsgom pa yon tan che// gang zhig bsgom la skur pa dang//
dge 'dun 'khrugs par byed pani// stong khams gsum po gang ba yi// mi rnams kyi nisrog bcad dang// srog chags thams cad bsad dang 'dra// bsgom dang dge 'dunadakrugs skuran/
de yasdig kyang de bzhin no// gang zhig dge sbyong mthong ba la// skur pa 'debs shing ma dad pa// dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs gcod pas// desani rgyul ba'i lan ma ldon// de nasaMrgyal bu
dge mtho dang/ masamastopo/bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan par gnang ba/ dga' ba'i tshom nas bstan pa nyid spyi bos blangs te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
kyis bstan ba la// gang skad logs shing gangamemed// mad dang ma mad gnyis ka yang// dngos bor dmigs su yongam mchis// yang dag mtshan nyid de lta bu // chos rnams kun dang ma 'gal
00 lo/ sems can kun la byams smad du// thabs kyis chos kyi ba khor lo bskor// 'phags pa gang nas byon pa nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de nas byon// yang dag mtshan nyid ji lta ba// de bzhin
gshegs pa'ang de bzhin no// 'phags pa kun gyi bden tshig ltar// de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de bzhin bshad// de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan// de bzhin gshegs zhes bgyi ba lags// brjod/
pa'i go cha brtan pa'i sems// sra ba'i gzhustobs brtson 'grus che// rnaba'i mda' ni shes rabs mgyogs// le lo'i dgra rnams 'joms mdzad cing// 'jig rten lha dang mi rnams kyi// mchod/
yon phu la pa bzhes pas na// de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan// dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba lags// rab tu sdug bsngal mtshan nyid mkhyen// sdug bsngal rgyu yang shin tumakhyen// sdug bsngal
zhi ba'i mtshan nyid dang// zhi ba'i tshul yang rab tumakhyen// 'phags pa'i bden bzhi mkhyenapas na// 'gyur ba ma mchis bden par nges// dbas phyogs bcu'i nang na yang// mtshananiya
dag rdzog/sa zhes bgyis// rig pa gsum po mchog brnyes pas// spyod lam rnam dag yang dag ldan// de slad mtshonani bcom ldan 'das// mkhyenadang zhabasas ldan zhes bgyi// chos
rnams thams cad kun makhyen cing// dam pa'i chos nyidorab brnyes pas// thams cad kun la byams slad du// dus skabs sbyor ba thabs kyis bshad// skye rgan 'chi rab bsal cing/
bde ba'i gnas su phyin par mdzod// de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan// bde bar gshegs zhes bgyi ba lags// 'jig rten gang nasams pa dang// 'jig rtenabs pa'i
mtha' yang mkhyen// de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan// 'jig rten mkhyen ces bgyi ba lags// thugs rje chen pos sems can bsgral// mnyenades dge ba bstan cing btul// de yi slad du rgyal
ba'i mtshan// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab can// thub cing bla ru 'da' ba med// de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshon// bran med ces bgyi ba lags/
wA nyon mongs mi mang shes rab ldan// rnam grol dam pa mchog bshadabs// de yisad du rgyal ba'i mtshan// lhadang mi yi ston ces bgyi// dus gsum g.yo 'am ma g.yo la// bas sam ma bas

ngos kun kyang// byang chub shing drung kun mkhyen pas// de yi slad dumtshanasangs rgyas// de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams rdzu 'phrul chen po'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas/ skanam mkha' la 'phags
te zhal so so nasatshig 'thun par 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye rgyal bu dge mthong dang/ mi sum stong po khyed rnams kyi sdige gi rang bzhin nanang na'ang mi gnas/ phul na 'di mi gnas/ bar
na'ang mi gnas so// sems brtan pa'i phyir dge ba'i mthu yang brtanano// sems rnam par grol ba'i phyir/ sdig gi rang bzhin yang rnam par grol lo// shes rab stong pa nyid kyi phyir// sdug gi

[/]rang bzhin kyang stong pa nyid do// dad pa'i mthu che ba'i phyir/ bsod nams kyi mthu yang me'o// de bzhin du mthol bshags te 'gyod tshangs nus pa ni/ nged rnamasamathong ba'i steng du/ sangs rgyas rin chenamang/

dang/ sprul pa'i sku thams cad kyang mathong bar 'gyur ro// 'gyod tshangs kyis sdig sbyas pas/ rgyun du nga la nga mthong la// deng byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstan bcos pa dang 'dra bar/ de bzhin du 'gyod
tshangs byas pa ni/ nga dasprul pa'i sku rnams dang/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rin chenamang lasogs pa thams cad kyang dgyes par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyus mthong ba dang/ mchod
dbus par 'gyur ro// de dag kyang dgyes par 'gyur te/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde 'di'i rjes su byang chub du chud par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor zhabs 'bring baAlabaka' stsalal/
sdig can rnams kyis sdig bshags par 'dod na// rgyal bu dge mthong bzhin du dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang/ mdo sde bcu gnyis dang/ nganub sems dpa'i dge 'dunamen bo rnamaga' re re nas
dmigs te phyag 'tshol ba/ nga dang phradang dang 'dra ba 'am/ mthong ba dang 'dra bar 'du shes bskyed de/ sangs rgyas gcig gam/ sangs rgyas gnyis sam/ sangs rgyas bcu 'am/ sangs rgyas brgya
'am ! sangs rgyas stong sa/ sangs rgyas gri'am/ sangs rgyas gras med pa'i 'a du shes bskyed de/ mthong ba dang 'dra bar dmigs la/ de bzhin du re re nas kyang dmigs te/ sems kyis phyug/
[p]bya// 'tsholan de dag gis bsod nams dpag tu med pa gang thob par 'gyur la// lakhor ba'i sdug skye ba thams cad kyang sel bar byed do// bskal pa graamed pa'i bar du janasod
gsum du ltung bar mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la bde bar gnas par 'gyur bar yang nges te/ the tsom med do// de'i phyir sdig pa rnams 'thol zhing bshags par byas la/ sems thag pa nas dad
pa bskyedan/ gdon mi za bar sdig 'phyadapar 'gyuraro// de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang/ mi sum stong gis cig car du skad bskyed de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de
bstod pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shing thugs rje che// shAkya'i gdung rigs ngos kyi rje// tshogs kyi nanganaseng ge'i sgras// khyab par sems can bsras pa ni// dal
gzigs pa bu gcig bzhin// rnam par 'byed pa yongam mchis// de lta bu yi pa med pa// mthong nas de slad gus phyag 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal bu dag mthong dang/ masum/
stong rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed rnams 'di ltar 'gyod tshangs byas te/ ma 'chad pa'i sems kyis 'thol zhing bshigs pas/ da ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes
bya'o khyed rnams ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas su 'grub bo// rigs kyi bu yang 'di lta ste/ dmya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gang zhig sems thag panas phyogs bcu'i de
bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang/ mdo sde bcuganyis dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal bar nus pa ni: kon mchog gsum kyi drin gyi lanA lon zhes bya ste/ de mthag
tumi dge ba bcu dang/ mtshams med pa ltadang/ mnyam pa nyid la skur pa'i sdig 'byang bar gyur nas/ rgyun du zhugs par 'os pa ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin no// lan cig phyir 'ong
bar 'os pa ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sbyin no// phyir mi 'ong bar 'os pa ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sbyin no// dkA bcomo par 'os pa ni/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu sbyin no//
rang sangs rgyas su sa pa ni/ rangasangs rgyasakyi 'bras du sbyin no/ byang chub sems dpar 'os pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu sbyin no// da ltar mdo sde 'di'i nang na/ byang chub sems
dba'asems dpa' chen po rnams skye ba gcig gis yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid thob bang/ phyogs bcu dus gas gyi sangs rgyas mas la phyug 'tshul ba'i don no// byang chub sems dpa'askye
ba gnyis kyis chos byed nges zlango/ dus gtamyangs rgyas rnamA la yon/ dung chung sems dpas yang dag pa'i blor phyin pa'i ye shes thob pa'ang dusagasumagyi sangs rgyas
rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i don no// byang nub sems dpa' la lasadon dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud pa'ang/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no// byang chub sems dang 'a
la dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa' da/ dus gsum gyisas rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no// byang chub sems dpa' la las nam mkha'i mdzod kyi ting
de 'dzin dang/ se shesakyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan ba'ang/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yonano// byang chub sems dpal la phyir mi ldog pa'i bod pa dang/
des sbyin gyi bzod pa dang/ chos sbyin gyi dbyings dang ldan pa'ang/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yonano// byang chub sems dpa' la la gzungs dran pa chen po'i sems dang//
rang gos rig pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa nga/ dus gsum na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tsholapa'i yon no// byang chub sems dpa' la'aseng ge'i sgra'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdo rje'i ting nga/

'dzin dang/ ye shes lnga'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'a dzin dang ldan pa'od/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyasa rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yonano// byang chub sems dpa' la la mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge
'dzinadang/ byags pa chen podang/ snying rje chen po dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam dang ldan pa'ang/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag
'tshal ba yin no// de nas byang chub sems dba'asems dpa' chen po chos kyi rje 'jam dpal gyis 3 bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad nor cing
'khrul bas sems 'khrugs te/ mi dge ba dang/ mtshamasam mchis ba bgyis pa rnams ji ltar bgyis na sdig 'byang bar 'gyur zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal la bka'
stsal pa: gong du bstan pa yin te/ gang la las phyogs su rgyas ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sas rgyas dang/ mdo sde bcu gnyis dang/ byung chub sems dpa'i
rnams kyi mtshan shes nas/ dga' ba dang/ rab tu dga' ba bskyed la// dad pa dang gus pa dpag tu med bas bsasam/ bachadangam klog game/ 'don tam/ yi ger bris sam/ kun nug
bar byas te/ dben pa'i gnas khang pa gcig ginang du dkyil 'khor byas la/ dri chus chag chag btabaste/ 'phan gdugs bzang pos brgyan cing pog sa zhim bo bsregs nas/ rgyal ba rnams
spyan drang zhing gshegs su gsol ba mang yang rung/ nyung yang dung/ spyan drangs nas/ bdag khrus ga par byas la gos gtsang mkhyenacing/ lan cig phyi rol che chung du 'gron/ khrus lan cig byas
te/ seng ge'i khri btsugs nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du bsgoms la/ chos kyi mtshan de la bdag dang/ gang zag dang/ sems can la sogs pa'i lta ba med par mngon par rtogs
par byas te/ dang po pas bye brag phyed cing gsal bar brjod par bya'o// de nas dri sis zhim po bsregs la/ 'khrugs sems bsal nang/ dran pa yang dag pa dang/ bsam pa yang dag pas:
de bzhin gshegs pa la sems rtse gcig tu bsam mo// de ltar spyod pa rnams 'thun zhing bdum pa ni mchog ste// de la mi mthun zhing rtsod pa ni 'thol tshang su mi 'gyur ro//
khro ba des kun 'jigs par byed de/ spyod lam dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro// theg pachen po dranazhing don dam pa bsams la// nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du nyul zhing gnyid log tu mi rung ngo// nyin
gcig kyang dus gsum dumado sde 'di kha ton tam/ klog pa nyin mtshan dus drug tu byas la// dri bsung gas mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas/ 'thol tshangasaM su byas te/ mdo sde 'di nyid nas/ sangs rgyas/
dung byang chub sems dpa' dang/ mdo sde ba gnyis kyi mtshan brjod cing/ sems thag pa nas mi 'khrug pa dang/ sems thag pa nas munor ba dang/ sems thag pa nas mi g.yeng ba dang/
sems thag pa nas dus kyi 'grus pa dang/ sems thag pa nas nyin gcig pas nyin gcig 'gyus pa dang/ sems thag pa nas dad pa bskyed pa dang/ sems thag pa nas dga' ba skyed pa dang/
sems thag pa nas rim pa bskyed pa dang/ sems thag pa nas rgyun mi gcad ba dang/ sems thag panas gza' pa dang/ sems thag pa nas mi 'bral ba dang/ sems thag pa nas sdig pa mi bsam ba dang/ sems
thag pa nas sangargyas dran pa dang/ semA thag nas chos dran pa dang sems thag pa nas dge 'dun dran pa dang/ sems thag pa nas tshul khrims dran pa dang/ sems thag pa nasagatong ba dran pa dang//
sems thag pa nas don dam pa'i lha dran pa ste/ de dag de bzhin du klog pa dang/ de bzhin du phyag bya bdang/ de bzhin dusems thag pa nas so sor 'chags shing 'thol ba/ thog ma'i nyin par nas//

zhag drug tu lon pa'i nang par dri nus pangachagachag btabaste/ lus 'bang spos chus bkru bar bya'o// pog pos bzung po bsreg cing/ semasathag pa nas mchod pa byas pa/ de dag de lta bu sems thag bcas so sor

'thol zhing bshagApas/phyogs bcur sgul bar 'gyur te/ ngade'i tshe de'i dusan sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dpag tumed pa gablugagling gi bye ma snyed dang 'grogate/sgra dbyangs

kyi rjes su khang bu de'i nang du phyin cing mngon du 'grub pa'i dbang du bya'o// de bzhin du nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du byas na/ gdonami za bar sdug 'byang bar 'gyurar// ji ltar sdig 'phyang bar shes//
shen/ so so'i skye bo rnams kyi don dam par da dung ma grub pas/ rmit+ta da[©]mtshan ma la brtags su byas te/ rmi lam rnams gcig rjesanA/ mtshams med pa rnam gcig 'byung ngo// mi
lamarnam lnga rmisan mtshams med pa rnam lnga 'byung ste/ des nub mo rmi lam na chu klung chen po rgyal bar 'dod de/ thom pa chen po'i steng du 'gro bar rmisan/ deni nges par rnam par grol ba thob pa
yin no// gal te de'i rmilaman gzhan gyis bdag la khrus byas pa dang/ lus lo char bab par rmis na/ de sa par rnam par dag pa thob pa yin no// gal te de'i rmi lam na bdag dge 'dun mang
tsha @#// pe gi nang du zhugs te gral du 'dug par rmison/ de ni nges par sangs rgyas kyi slob ma yang dag par gyur te// gal te de'i rmi laman/ bag mchod rten nas gtsug lag khang du/
zhugs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan mthong bar rmisan/ de ni chos kyi sgo mo dam par zhugs par gyur to// gal te rang gis shing thog rid cing za bar rmisan/ de'i tsha'adi
nyid la yon tan gyi 'bras bu 'grub par mngon no/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal 'baka'astsal ba/ gal te dge slong// dge slong ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ dge sbyong ma 'am/ byang
chusems dpa' dad pa can gang la dran pa nyams te/ lo cing 'khrul pas sdom pa'i tshul khrims re re na zhig pa 'am/ nyan pa de bzhin du sosor 'chags shing 'thol na/ sdig mi 'khyang mi srid de/sems
thag pa nas ma byas pa ni ma gtogasaso// de nas bcom ldan 'dasal/ bojam dpal gyis 'di skad ces zhusaso// bcom ldan 'adusacho ga 'di ltar bgyi ba'i tshe/ mi mang nang ngam mi rung/ bcom ldan
kharas kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi gcig yan chad nyi shu man chad rung ngo// chog 'di ltar spyod pa'i tsho mdo sde gzhanam bsamamo// de ltar 'thol tshangs bgyis pa'i 'og tu phyin na nyes ba mi byed na/
'tho'atshangs zhes bya'o/ de ltar dran par gyis shig/ bdag cag rnams daltar 'chi ba las sar 'tsho ba dang 'dra bas/ da ni bdag tshul khrims srung ngo// da ni bdag

'a00 brtson 'grus su spyod do// danib dag theg pa chen po'i mdo sde klog pa dang/ bton bgyi'o zhes de'i tshe de'i dus na dran pa de ltar gyis shig/ bdag deng nas sdom pa bzung ba ni rdo rje dang 'dra bar sran/

thub par smon to// des de ltar dran pa'i tshe/ skyes bu dam pa drim medabar grags pa'i du byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu medub dang lhan cig tu de'i mdun du 'greng ste/ dpang dubyed do// 'a phugs pa kun tu
bzang po'ang 'gyod tshangs kyi mkhan po byed do// 'phags pa 'od srungs kyang zhu gnas kyi rten byed do// 'jam dpal 'dzin sdig sbyangs pa zhes bya'o// 'di'i rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni tshul
khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni gnas thob pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis yang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gang la
la zhig gis rtsa ba bzhi dang/ sdom pa brgyad dang/ sdom pa phyed can dang/ tshul khrims bcudang/ gsum la skyabs su song ba dang/ khrims lnga dang/ dge ba bcu dang/ tshul khrims dang/ 'dul
b.re re nas zhig pa 'am/ nyams pa 'am/ mtshams med pa lnga byas pa 'am/ mnyam pa nyid laskur ba'i sdig byas pa zhig yod pa de log spyod ma gtogs par/ so sor ma bshags ma 'thol na//
mi de tshe 'phos ma thag tu gdon mi za bar mnar med pa'i sems can dmal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ mnar ma mchis pa'i dmyal ba zhes
bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du/ de ci'i rgyu ni'i rkyen gyis ltung ba dang/ dmyal ba'i dbyibs che chung dang/ rnam par smin pa'i sdug bsngal
bskal ba'i grangs ji tsam gyi bar du gnas par 'gyur bshad du gsol zhes bgyis pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'o snyam pa// 'jam dpa 'ashin tu'ang ma bas so// shin tu'ang mkhas go/
don 'di lta bu 'dri ba'ang shin tumakhas te/ legs par nyonal lamang po rnams kyang legs par soms shig/ ngas bye brag phyed par bshadado// ji ltar namanar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba zhes
wA bya zhe na/ skad cig kyang mnar zhing bsir med pa'i phyir/ mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o// gcig tu na 'gag pa 'am/ 'ong bar bya ba'ang med/ 'gyur ba'ang med de/ tshabarab tutshe/ sdug/
bsngal ba ni shin tu'ang mi bzad pa/ skad cig kyang mi dal/ skad cig kyang mi sdod cing bar skabs med pa'i ra/ mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o// yang rnam pa gcig tun/ me chenapo 'barib/
rgyu rab tu tsha ba/ kun tu 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar zhing maredar/ khong du zhugs pa'i phyir/ mnar med pa'i dmalab zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'jam dbal la bka' stsal pa// rigs
kyi bu dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa'i dbyibs ni gru bzhi lham pa/ dpag tshad brgyad khri yod de/ lcags kyir ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor cing/ steng du'ang lcags kyi dra ba rim pa bdun gyis g.yogs te/
'og tu bar chad bco brgyad yod do// de'i bod khor yug tu ral gra'i tshal rim pa bdun gyis bskor to/ 'alcags kyi dra ba rim pa bdun gyi nang logs su nags tshal ral gri'i lo ma can yod do/ lcags

kyi khang pa bar chad bco brgyad po rtseg mar 'dug ste/ rim pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do// de'i grwa bzhir zangs kyi phyi na po bzhi 'dug pa/ lus kyi bong tshad nib pang du dpag tshad bzhi bcu la// mig ni
glog gi 'od bzhin/ mche ba ni ral gri sdong po dang 'dra/ so ni spu gris gtams pa'i ri dang mtshungs/ lceni lcags kyi mchil pa bzhin/ sder mo ni lcags kyi gsal shing dang 'tshungs/ mjug ma ni
lcags kyi sprul dang 'dra/ spu'i bu gu re re nas 'bar ba'i meshin tumached cing kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar ba 'byung ste/ de'i dud pa mnam pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi rdzas mnam ba gang dang yang bskrun du
med do// domyal ba de'i sgo bzhi la/ sgo re ren dmyal ba'i srungs ma bcobargyad 'dug go/ mgo nasrin po'i mgi/ khani srin po'i kha dang 'dra ste/ mgo la rwa bcobargyad yod pa/ lag dalcags
kyi gsal shing thogs so// ra ba rim pa bdun gyi nang logasasu/ lcags kyi rgyal mtshan grus med pa zhig yod de/ rgyal mtshan gyi mgor me 'byung ba ni/ chu mig 'byung ba dang 'dra bar byung ngo//
lcags 'ju ba'i khu ba 'bab pa ni/ kun tu khyab par 'bab ste/ dmyal ba'i sgo bzhir sgo re re'i steng na/ zangs mo chu bco brgyad yod pa'i nang na/ lcags khol ba'i khu bo khang ldud cing/ sgo bzhir
'bab pa/ dmyal ba'i nang du gang bar ba ba bo// bad pa bar chad re re'i nang du'adi lcags kyi sbrul chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pas/ khar gdug pa'i me skyag cidar pa kun
tu gang ba gtong ngo// sbrul gyi sgra sgrogs pa ni 'brug sgra chen po zer ba bzhin no// lcags kyi thu lum chen po'i chen bab pa'ang mnar med pa kun tugang ngo// der sdug bsngal bo zadabani 'du

phrag brgyad khri ste/ sdug bsngalakhyenang na sdug bsngal/ mo bzad pa'i nang na mi bzad pa// kun kyang der 'dus pas dpe zla med do// mnar med pa'i dmyal ba de'i sgo bzhi'i/ sgo ra ri'i phyi rol tu 'bar
ba'i mi shin tu mched cing 'bar// lho byang shar nub bsnol zhing khyad par rgyu'o// 'bar ba'ang lcags kyir ba kho ra khor yug dpag tshad brgyad khri nas/ steng lcags kyi dra ba la thug gi bar du/
yar tha' mar la zhing bla bra 'og dang/ phyogs bzhir kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar bar gyur te/ sdug bsngal cig/tsar ldang ba ni/ gong du smos pa bzhin no// rtsa ba bzhi dang/ sdom pa brgyad 'jig pa dang/
rtswa mtshams med pa lnga dang/ mnyam pa nyid la skur pa 'debs pa rnams mdo sde 'di las 'byung ba bzhin bathol tshas ma bus la/ gnong bkur ba 'am/ khre la bamed na ma de tshe 'phos ma thag tu/ stobs
tshan po'i dpung pa g.yas pa brkyang zhing bskuoM pa tsam gyis mnar med pa'i dem la bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// lus kyang de'i nang du gang ste/ tsha ba'i gzir bas 'phongs nas kha gdangs/mig btsums
mig gdangs/ kha btsums kyang kha 'thams pas sna ma nus so/ 'desdig mang ba'i phyir ral gri 'khor lo grangasamed ba dum zhig nam mkha' nas char bzhin 'bab ste/ klad par phog cing rkang par byung

ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni sngar gong du bshad pa bzhin brgya stong khri phrag tu bsgyur ba'o// gang la la rtsa ba bzhi po tshang bar zhig par gyur na/ sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong ba ni/ bskal ba rin
bo lnga rdzogs kyi bar du'o// sdom pa brgyad la jig pa ni de las gyur cig gis mong ngo// mtshams me dpa lta yang gyur mig gis mang ngo// mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo sde la skurapa 'debs pa'ang gyur
cig gis mang ngo// dkon mchog gsum la smod pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi nor brkus pa dang/ dge slong dang dge slong ma tshangs par spyodab la/ dri ma can du sbyong ba dang/ mkhan po dang/ slob
dpon la dbang thob dang/ mal g.yem pa rnam pa gong ma dag las kyang gyur cig gis bskyed do// log spyod kyi rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba gtananadapas/ nams kyang mnar med pa'i dam la banas mi
thar pa ni dar ma gtogs so// de la sogs pa'i sdig can rnams sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i tshe/ 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched pa khong du zhugs te rmugs nas 'chi'o// de nas srin po dmul
ba'i srungs mas lcags kyi gsal shing sa la brdabs te/ sos sos zhes bos pa dang/ bos pa'i sgra bzhin du yang sos yang gos nas/ nyin mtshan gcigo la lan khri ni 'chi/ lan khri ni 'tsho ste//
00/ @#// sdug bsngal mi bzad pa chen po nyamasasu myong ba ni gong du bstan pa bzhin no// nam zhig mnar med pa'i dmyal ba nas slar phyin na'ang tshul khrims bshig pa dang/ yon bdag dad
pa can gyi yod blangs pa'i 'os kyis/ yang dmal ba chung ngu rnams kyi nang du 'jug ste/ de la dmal bgrang sbrebs pa dang/ dmyal bamun nag bdang/ dmul ba bu tsha pa dang/ dmyal ba spu gris
bstams pa dang/ dmul ba ral gri 'a khor lo dang/ dmyal ba me'i shing rta canadang/ dmal ba phyi sa'i 'demadang/ dmul bcu tshan dang/ dma'ab memur krungadang/ dmyal ba nags tshal ral gri
lam can dang/ dmyal ba lcags kyi 'khrul 'khor canadang/ dmyal ba lcags kyi shal ma la ka ba canadang/ dmal pa lcags kyi canadang/ dga' ba lcags kyi 'khor lo canadang/ dmulub
lcags kyi thu lum dang/ dma' ba bsdus 'joms thug ri dang/ dmyal ba zangs khulud dang/ 'di rnams so so re re'i nang du'ang lo khri phrag brgyad brgya'i bar du nyon mongs nas gdod thar te/ 'on kyang
smyu rtag tumarabs su skyes la/ mo rabs lo brgya'i bar du dkonamchog gsum gyi sgra mi thos so// brgya la dgaba'i bshes gnyenadang phud panani/ byang chub sems bskyed kyang srid/ dge ba'i bshes
dang ma phrad na ni/ slar yang dmyal bar lhung ngo// nyes byas kyi sdig pa rnams mi mthol bshagasan/ dmyalakhar sdug bsngal myong ba'ang rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha la lo grangs lta bu r/ lo khri phrag

[In ]brgyad brgya'i bar du nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// de la ltang ba rnams kyi sdig pa ni de las nyis 'gyur du bskyed do// dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'ang de las nyes 'gyur du bskyed do/// sdig can de dag/
gis sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i tshe/ tshig gzhan mi byin te/ a pa pa/ a tata/ a lal/ mal ba 'ba' zhig zer zhing 'dug go/ de bas na sdig can rnams ris par so sor
'thol zhing bshags la/ dkon mchog gsumagyi skyabs su song bar gyis shig/ 'jam dba' yang 'di lta ste/ sdig pa myur du bsal ni bya bar 'donon/ mdo sde 'di'i nang nas/
'byung ba bzhin du so sor 'thol bshags te/ 'gyod tshangs byos shig/ cho ga nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin gcigazagacig tu byas la/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang/ yang dag pa'i dran
pas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas su grub pa'itshe/ mi chen po'i mtshan dang/ mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i mtshan dang/ mi g.yo ba'i mtshan dang/ rnam par grol ba'i mtshan dang/ 'od zer
can gyi mtshan dang/ ye shes yongs su rgyas pa gi mtshan dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang/ dpa' bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i ting 'dzin rgya mtsho'i mtshan rnams
bsam par bya'o// yang gcig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i yi de dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ yid 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o/
@#// yid 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ slar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nga 'dzin lasalangs te/ shes rab
sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ shes rab sgron ma la las te chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ chosa rnams kyi mtshan nyid lasal sa te/ mtshanam 'od zer can gyi
ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ mtshan ma 'od zer can las langs te seng ge'i ngare ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ seng ge'i nga ro las langs te/ seng gesbrag kha'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ seng ge
sdug pa las las to/rgya mtsho yod kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ rgya mtsho yade las langs te/ kun tu ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ kun tu ye shes lasaM 'bangs te/ gzus kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge
'dzin 'khajug/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya las langs te/ kun tu snang ba'i lus gzugs can gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ kun tu snang ba'i lus gzugs can las langs te/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyiting
zlange 'dzin la 'jug/ chos kyi dbyisanyidi las langs te/ seng ge'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ seng ge'i rgyal po las langs te/ chos kyi rgyal bo'i ting de 'dzin la 'jug/ chos kyi rgyal
po las la sate/ bdud rnams kyi mtshanam 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ bdud rnams kyi mtshanam 'gog pa lasalangs te/ stong ba nyid kyi shes rab kyi ting nge 'a dzin la 'jug/ stong ba nyid kyi

shes rab las la sate/ stong ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa las langs te/ chen bo stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug chen/
bo stong pa nyid kyi ye shes lasalangs te/ gnas thams cad du khyab pa'i lus kyi gzugs can gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ gnas thams cad du khyab pa'i lus gzugs can las langs te/ sems kyi

mtshan nyid la rnam par rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ sems kyi mtshan nyid la rnam par rtog pa las las te/bla chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la bajug/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dab chen po rdo rje'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin las las te/ rdojigatsug tor gyi ting de 'dzin la 'jug/ rdo rje gtsug tor lasalangs te/ rgya mtsho thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/
rgya mtsho thams cad las langs te/ gzus thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ gzungs thamasacad kyi rgya'atsholasalangs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge
'dzin 'bag/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul rgya mtsho lasalas te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i rgyamatsho'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes lagazigs pa'i rgya mtsho las langs te/ gdod thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mtha' med/ mu med pa'i rgya mtsho'i sgor 'jug
ga/ bar bya'o mtha' med du med pa'i rgya mtsho'i sgo nas langs te/ yid 'gog pa dang/ zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug/ yid 'gog pa dang zhib las langs te/ rdo rje gdonami za/
ba'i rnam par grol ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o// 'jam dpal dmya ngan las 'das ba'i 'og tu/ rigasakyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dad pa skad cig ma'i sems bskyed de/
mdo sde 'di yi ger 'drib 'am/ klog pa 'am/ kha ton du skad cig mar dran te/ bsam pa'i 'du shes dang/ napa'i 'du shes dang/ rtog pa'i 'du shes su dad pa'i sems grub na/ skad cig mar/
bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu gapa'i bye ma snyed kyi 'khor ba'i sdig phyi'i snyal bar 'gyur ro// marig pa'i sgrib pa 'ang gtan bral bar 'gyu'o// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag
tu'atsho skyong zhing gzhes te/ myang n lasam 'dar bar mngonano// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyiso/ 'khor mang bo rnams la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ yi dgas mthuchen tham nadang// dud 'gro
grung po ma rus dang// bud med g.yeng dang ma rungs klu// dpag med pa'i ma rungs rnams // ba su dang nim skyes dag/ lha sbyin dang ni sor mo'i 'phreng// lus dang sems kyi snage spyadabs/
dmyal ba mnar med byung sokyang// phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal gal// dad pa bskyed de phyag 'tshal phyir// thub ba chu ngan 'da' ba'i khar// bskal ba grangs med phyir bshol lo// mag d+ha
yi skye bo dag/ kun kyang byang chub sems bskyed pa dang// phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la/ gus par phyag khyas dbang gis so// ko'u dicu la sogs pa// nyan thos lnga brgya dag gis ni//
ma'os sa su 'tshang rgya babang// phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal la/ gus par phyag byas dbang gis so// mu stegs dang ni bram ze dang// sngags 'chang chen po drang srong bcu// da ltar dgra bcom
grub pa yang// 'das pa'i phyogs bcu dus sum gyi// rgyal ba rnams la phyag byas yon// dam ba'i don la tshud pa dang// phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i zhing rnams na// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
thams cud// tshe dpag med bar skyes pa yang// phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la// gus par phyag byas dbang gis so// rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste// sngon nga rgyal po byed ba na//

drang srong chen po sbyin zhes bya// do tshosangs rgyas mkhyung ste// bram ze lnga brgya rnams shig la// kha zasadang ni gos rnams dang// khang khyim dang ni ma lacha'i bar// lo gras shu tshang bar du/
rab tu byung ba'i mchod ba phul// ngasani dachobasgol// khyed rnams byang chub sems skyed cig/ bram ze lnga brgya de dgags// mchod pa phul ba blangs kyis kyang// dkon mchog gsum la
ma dad pas// mod bzhin nga lasar snas pas// 'jig rtenanang na byang chub dang// rnam par grol ba med do zhes// de skad smras pa ngas thos nas// mnyam nyid mdo sde bsrungs pa'i phyir/
kya@#// bram zeldabargya'i srog bcad do// bram ze de dag tshe 'a bos nas// dmyal khamanar med lhung bar 'gyur// sems can dmyal bar lhung nas su// dran pa rnam gsum g.yos
[+ ]nas kyang g/ dus gsum rgyal la phyag byas so// mnyam ba dekyi mdo sde dang// byang chub dge 'dun dadabaskyed// dran pa rnam gsum byas pasan// bod la dmul nas byung ste dong//
'jig rten zil dan rngadu skyes// tshon bskal pa chu cu thob// de yang gus pa'i sems kyis su// phyogasabacu'i rgyal la phyag bya yon// bram ze de dag thams cad kyis// thog mar skur
bas ramal lhung yang// phyis ni dad pas med la thar// byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams // khrel dang ldan pa smos ci dgos// sdig gi rang bzhin thegamanas// med pas sems can rnamA
kyi phyir rtsa ba bzhi po'i sdom pa dang// mtshams med lnga po'i sdig rnams kyang/ log spyod bar du 'thol bshags so// so so'i skye de la la zhig/ de lta bu yi sdig byas pa// de bzhin
'thol tshangs byed nusun// rtsa ba bzhi dang mtshamasamed lnga// log spyod bar du sdig 'khyang ste// sangs rgyas 'grub pa'ang gdon mi za// ma dad pa ni ding ma gtogs// gang zhig dad pa'i
sems skyes te// rgyal ba rnalaphyag byas n// chos lamam 'grub mi srid do// de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang// me sum stongapo'i mi rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das latshogo 'thun par//
'di skad gsol te bdag cag rnams // sangs rgyas grub nas skye shi las// 'khor ba'i rnam dag bsgral bar smon// lha mi'i nang na btsun bzhugs pa// bye brag phyed par bshad du gsol//
de la gzungs su bzung ba dang// yi ger bris shing klog 'chang ba// de yi bsod nams ji tsam mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal pa// bye brag phyed par ngas bshad kyis// rgyal bu
dgemathong legs par nyon// gang zhig rin chen sna bdun gyis// stong khams gang ba'i sems can la// sbyin pa byas shing yon phul nas// de yi steng du chos bshad kyis// dgra bcom 'bras bu
thob byas pas/ la la zhig gis rgyal ba'i mtshan// thos nas dad pa'i sems bskyed de// skad cig dus su phyagatsasan// de yi bsod nams de bas 'da'// yi ger bris shing klog 'chang dang//
dadabs phyag 'tshol smos ci dgos// de yi bsod nams dpag tumed// gang gis yi ger bri ba dang// klog pa dang ni 'don pa dang// dus su phyag 'tshal sems bskyed na// mchod rten stong khams
nub pa ru// brtsigs pa'i bsod nams pas ni// de nas 'od bsrungasachen po dang// shAri'i bu dang kun dga' bo// mchod rtenasrung ba mthu bochi// tshongs lha rnams dang lha dbang po// 'khor
lo sgyur dang rgyal chen bzhes// bcom ldan zhabs la mgos btud nas// skad 'thun par ni 'di skad gsol// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das slad na/ 'badag cag rnams kyisasems can la// khyab
bar spel zhing bstan par gyis// lus sems rtag tu bdaba'i phyir// phyag 'tshal rnams la bsrung bar bgyi// gang zhig sdom pa zhig pa dang// mtshams med lnga yi sdig pa
dang mnyam pa nyid la skur ba'i rnams // sangs rgyas de dag mtshan thos pas// rnam dag sa ru bde bar gnas// dper na rgyal bu dge mthobazhin// da dung ma 'ongs phyi dusan// sangs rgyas
rang bzhin mthong bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ tshogs chenapo rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyed rnams legs pa nyon cig/ khyed rnams la sngon khyad ba'i
las kyi rgyu rkyen bshad par bya'o// nga sngon bskal pa dpag tu med pa 'das pa'i sngon rolan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mdzes pa'i 'od ces bya ba las/
phyogs bcu dus gsum gyisas rgyus kyi mtshan thos nas/ shin tu dga' ba'isems bskyed de/ thal mo sbyar zhing spyi bor blangs so// blus nas kyang sems can gang nas gang du gnas pa de dang der

dpag tu med pa mtha' yas pa'i sems can rnams la rgya cher spel zhing bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos par byas so// de'i tshe de'i dus na tshogs rnams kyi nang du mi sum stong nyitsho zhing/ nga'i
chos kyi don dang 'thun te/ dad pa'i sems dpag tu med ba skyes nas/ nga'i thad dusangs rgyas de rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod cing phyag byas pas/ daltar phyogs bcur snang zhing mngon pa sangs
rgyas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu rtsa ba bzhi dang/ mtshams med pa'i sdig lci ba dang/ mnyam pa nyid la skur pa dang/ log spyod kyi bar du sdig 'byang bar 'dodan/ dadapa'i sems kyi dbang du 'go bar
bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang 'di lta ste/ gang 'alasam dad cing mgus pas/ mdo sde bcu gnyis la skur cing dbang bzas pa dang/ rdo rje'i sku dang/ skyes bu dam pa 'jam dpal dang/ phyogs bcu'i
rgyal ba rnams la skur cing dpang bza' ba'i rnams gdonami'abar sems can dmyal bar lhung ste brdzun pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo ma dad pa'i phyir ro// dam pa'i chos la skur pa'i phyi ro/
bla ma rnams la bsus pa'i phyir ro// phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la smad pa'i phyire te/ nges par dmyal bar lhung ngo// sangs rgyas kyi mtshon 'di dag la dad cing sems thag pa nas
phyag 'tshal na/ mi dge ba bcu dang/ mtshams med pa lta dang/ mnyam pa nyid la skur pa'i sdig lta zhig mi 'byang mi srid de// ma dad pa dang/ ma gus pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun chad pa dang/
log spyod rnams ni rin ma gtogs so// rigs kyi bu dag shAkya thub pa'i 'bum phrag rgyud lnga pa yang/ 'jig rten re re na ston pa mdzad cing bzhugs te/ thama'i skaning yin no// de'i tshe

dang 'grogs pa'i mi sum stong po kun da ltarasangs rgyas su grub ste/ stong dang po'i gtso bo nisangs rgyas pad ma'i 'od ces bya/ stong par ma'i gtso bo nisangs rgyas rdo rjesgo zhes bya/ stong tha ma'i
klu/ gtso bo ni sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya'o// de bas na khyed rnams kyang de bzhin du phyogs bcu dus gsumakyis sargyas kyi mtshan brjod cing phyag 'tshal ba'i rigs so//
[+ ]khyed rnams ma 'ongs pa'i dus na tshogs mang po rnams la chos ston pa rgya cher byed cing/ mtha' med pa'i sems can rnams la phan btags te/ khams gsumanasabazlas shing zhi ba dang dben pa'i gnas/
sudakyil 'khor gyis la/ nga dang 'dra bar byos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzung 'dzin stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs/
te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar zhing phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam gras 'di'i ming ci lags/ ji ltar
gzung bar bgyi/ ji ltar sgom zhing dbar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigakyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ni sdom pa lci b rnams la phan 'dogs
pa'o zhes bya bar zung zhig/ rdo rje rin po che'i snying po zhes bya bar zung zhig/ de snod kyi sgo dpag tu med pa'o zhes bya bar thung zhig/ thams cad kun tu bsdus pa 'o zhes bya bar zung zhig/
rgyal po chen po dpe zla medaba'o zhes bya b.razung zhig/ mi sum stong sangs rgyas su grub par rnam par bakod pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ 'gyod tshangs kyi sdig sbyongs te/ bsod nams thob pa'o
zhes bya bar zung zhig/ thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la// byang chub sems dpa'i gzung 'dzin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan/
'das de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa ltar chos kyi rnamagras 'din sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams bsnun pa dang/ bde ba chen po mdzad pa'i slad du sdig sbyangs pa dang/ sas rgyas su
'grub par mdzad pa'i mdo sde 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yumamo// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni lagamo/ nyan thos rnams kyi ni mig go/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ni khang khyim lags/
te de lta bu bsam gyisami khyab pa'i don dang ldan pa bdag gis gzungs su gzung bar bgyi// lha dang mi gang nas gang du gnas pa de dang der rgya che'amel bar bgyi'o// rgyun mi 'chad nyid yun
du gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legasasogo/ khyed ni skyes bu dam pa yin te/ sde snodachen po dpag tu med pa thams cad gzungs su 'dzin pa lags te/
khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ nga 'gro ba'i gnas su khyed 'gro zhig gang 'dug pa'i gnas su khyed 'dug cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyisas kyi rnamagrus 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dang/
dbag tumed pa zhig phyir mi ldog pa dang/ mi 'gyur ba'i sar gnas so// nyan thos brgyad khrisani theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed do// dge slong stong phrag bcus ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu
thob bo// lha dang mi brgyad khri bzhi stong ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob bo/ sems can stong phrag brgyasaniblag med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
bskyed do// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'bashad zin nas/ shing sA lag la ba de logs su gshegs so// gshegs nas gser gyi me tog rin po che'i rdzing bu dang bcas pa yang mi snang
bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyang bsdus nas/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mtho dman dang/ gtsang sne'ang sngon bzhin no// mi rnams nyes byed pa'i phyir dmyal khabang sngon
bzhinano// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'i stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang/ lha dang mi dang/ lha ma yinadang/ dri brar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi
ba gas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////'phags pa thar pachen po phyogs su rgyasapa zhes bya ba thegapachenapo'i mdo rdzogs so
rgyagar skad du/ mahAsanani pa tAd mahAyAn sud/ tathAgatagisom yan/ nAm mahAyAn sU tAn/ bod skad du/ 'dus pa chen po theg pachen
sde las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyidamatshig ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/// bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshol lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa chen po'i phu bu mtha' yasamu med pa lung bstan pa/ drang srong rnams kyis
gnas thub pa'i rten ni ther sgra'al/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po la 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos bgrang ba las 'das pa dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/
phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas der 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrangs las 'das pa dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshon khor 'dus pa
dan dpal lha motshanamo tshes nya pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga thag mi ring ba zhigan 'dug go/ de nas dpa'alha gochen mo stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di/da ltos gsol to// thatsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po 'i gzungs kyi skye
ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar mi bgyid pa dag mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'din/ sems can bsod nams su'o/gas/
pa dang bral ba dag phal che lags te/ rgyu dang rkyen desan byang chub sems dpa' soms dpa' chen po dag 'dir sems can rnams la snying rjechen po dag skyed par bgyid lags so// 'di na sems can
rgyargya/ rnams gang gisanargyum mchis par sa zhing longs spyod dang bral la/ tshon khros sdug bsngal zhing nyam thag pa dang/ don mamachis par 'badapa de dugani sbyin pa rnam par 'gyed pan
mchis pa yongs su smin par bgyid pa'i rngo mi thog ste/ de lta bas na du bdag cag gis sbyin pa'i go bgosati/ brtson 'grus bskum par bgyi zhing/ 'dir bdag cag gis sbyin pa'i gzings kyis skye

ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi'o zhes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kun tu spyod par bgyi ba'i dngos pos sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho blun ma
mnyis pa la 'jug par bgyid pa nas/ chos kyi rgyal po bya nam mchis par dbang bskur ba rab tu thob par bgyid pa'i bar du'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di na sems na rtag par snang 'di dag longs

spyod dang/ nye bar spyod pa rgya chen po dang bra'al// tshol khros sdug bsngal zhing nyam thag pa dag mchis te/ de dgatshul khrims rnam par 'byed pa gamanyis bar yongs su sminapar bgyid par rdzogi thog bas/
'di'i sems can rtag par smra ba rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po de dag snying rje chen po dag skyed par bgyid cing/ tshul khrims kyi go bgos pa'i gzis kyis sems can rtag pa
'di dag skye ba'i rgya mtsho 'di las bsgral bar bgyi'o zhes/ byang chub sems dpa' sen sa dpa' chen po de dag tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams kun tu spyod par bgyid pa'i dngos pos sems can
rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis yosas smin par bgyid pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho bran ma mnyis pa la 'jug par bgyid pa nas// chos kyi rgyal po bla na ma mchisopar dbad
bskur ba rab tu thob par bgyid pa'i bar du'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di na sems can gang dag phram dang/ tshig rtsub po dang/ chags sems dang/ gnod sems kun tu spyod pa'i yid kyis/

de dag 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang ldan zhing longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa dang bral la/ tshol khros sdug bsngal zhing nyam thag pa dag mchis te/ sems can de dag rab tu 'byung ba'i tshul khrims dang sdom pa ma
mnyis par yongs su smin par bgyid par rdzomi thogos pas/ sems can phra ma dang/ tshig rtsub po dang/ chags sems dang/ gnod sems kun tu spyod cing/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang ldan pa
tshang ba spyod pa de dag 'a byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag snying rje chen po dag skyed par bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag mi rtag pa'i tshul gyis bstan pa la 'jug pa
bgyid pa dang/ rab tu 'byung ba'i sdom pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa'ang/ bdag cag gis bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus brtsamasanas/ bdag cag gi rab tu 'byung ba'i
sdom pa'i gzings kyis skye ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi'i zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dedag tshul khrims lasabyung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po rtag pa'i tshul gyis/
tu// sems can rnams rab tu 'byung ba'i tshul khrims dang/ sdom pas longs su smin par bgyid de/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo de dag sangs rgyas kyi ye
shes kyi rgya mtsho bla namamachis par 'jug par bgyid pa nas/ chos kyi rgyal po thunam mchis par dbang bskur ba thob par bgyid pa'i bar du'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po dag/bsam gtanAdang bo'i rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong zhing slob pan/ bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams btsa' ba dang/ 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba dang/ yan lag

ldadang ldan zhing yan lag lasajus pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi rnam par rtsub mngon par 'tshal ba dang// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la mchod pa dang/ bkur sti bgyi ba dang/
dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i slad dusangs rgyas kyi zhing thams rud du glog lta bu'i shugs kyis mchis pa la mkhas pa dang/ sems can rnams kyi lo gsum mo// gsum 'di lta ste/ las kyi lam dang/
rgyu nyon mongs pa'i lam dang/ sdug bsngal gyi lam dag skams par bgyid pa dang/ bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod namasabagyi ba'i dngos po rdzogs par bgyid pa dag ji lta bu lags/ de bzhin du
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa ji lta bu lags/ de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drag po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang/ myuradubanam mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs
04 pa'i byang chub tu mngonapar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dag ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dpa'achog shesalegs so legs so// dpal chog shes khyod kyis gang
gi chos bzhi po 'di la yongs su rdzogs par spyad cinge/ goms par byas kyang/ khyodakyis sems can gzhan dang/ gang zag gzhan dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'drib senus
pa/ dpal cho ga shes de'i phyir legs par nyon la rab tu yid la zung zhig dang bshad do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad a
bka' stsal to zhu bya ba'i bar du'o// dpal chog shes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag bsam gtanadang po'i rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong zhing slob pa na/ bsam gtan gyi
yan lag rnams shes pa dang/ 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba dang/ yan lag lnga dang ldan zhing yan lag lnga spras pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis rtse ba mngon par shes
pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la mchod pa dang/ bkur sti bya ba dang/ dam pa'i chos mnyanapa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du glog lta bu'i shugs kyis
'grol lamakhas pa dang/ sems can rnams kyi lam gsum po las kyi lam dang/ nyon mongs pa'i lam dang/ sdug bsngal gyi lam dag bskams pa dang/ bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod
nams bya ba'i dngos po rdzogs par byed pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha lo tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug bo yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur

khadang/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dag ji lta bu yin zhe na/ dpal chog shes 'di la byang chub sems dpa 'gems dpa' chen po
dag thams cad kyidar bor dbugs rngub pa dang/ dbugs 'byung ba'i mtshan ma'i dmigs pa thams cad la sems gtod pa byedade/ de g.yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis dbugs rngub par byed do//
dbugs 'byung bar byed do// de dang por dbugs rngub pa'i semasaM kyis sel bar byed pa de dag ni de'i rnam par rtog pa yin no// de nges par 'byung ba na dbugs 'byung ba'i sems kyis sel ba de dag
ni de'i rnam par dpyod pa yin no// de la dga' zhing tshim pa gang yin pa dang/ sems rtse gcig pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ g.yeng ba med pa gang yin pa des na/ denges par 'byung ba la gnas shing/
rnam par rtog pa dang/ rnam par dpyod pa spong ba'i sems dang ldan pa yi ne no// de ltar na der des rnam par rtog pa dang/ rnam par dpyod pa dang banus pa'i bsam gtan dang po thob pa yin no//
de la mtshan ma 'di dag 'byung ste/ de'i lus thams cad g.yo bar 'gyur// drobar 'gyur ro// der de 'dod pa'i 'dun pa'i sgrib pa spong ba yin no// de'i dge ba'i chos thams cad gnon par
00 byed do/ gang gi tshe brtson pa drag pos yid la byed cing gnas pa de na/ de rnam par rtog pa dang/ rnam par dpyod par nye bar zhi ba yin te/ des na rnam par rtog pa dang/ rnam par dpyod pa med/
pa'i bsam gtan gnyis pa thob pa yin// de ltar de'i lus thams cad shin tu sim pa dang/ bde ba dang/ tshim par 'gyur bani/ dperan 'o ma 'jam tsamakhyis lus 'acig car blugs na bde bamyong
ba yin no// des bdag ni 'di ltar gyur par shes te/ de zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang/ bde ba de lta bu dang ldan no snyamadu shes so// byang chub sems dpa' des dkonamchog gsum la dad pa thob
nas/ de bdi snyam dubadag gis ni sems can thams cad kyi don du gom chen po bgos nas/ bsam gtan la mngon par brtson par bya zhing/ bdag gis ci nas kyang lus dang sems kyi bde ba'ang don/
bar bya'o snyam dusems so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo de dbugs rngub pa dang/ dbugs 'byung ba goms par bya ba semasakyi dmigs pa dag 'dor bar byed do// desna'i bu mor
sems gtod pa byed de/ gang gis 'jug pa dang nges par 'byung ba dbugs rngub pa dang/ dbugs 'byung la gnas pa'i sems kyinyi bar rtog par byedado// de sems de'i skad cig mal zhig la dang/
skye'ang/ 'jig pa nye bar rtog pa byed de/ sems dang/ yid dang/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched thams cad lanu zla dang/ mig yor dang/ smig rgyu lta bu dang/ glog lta bu dang/
kyan bdag la med pa dang/ thams cad skad cig ma 'jig pa dang ldan par rtogs te/ de de ltar dga' ba dang/ bde pa rab tugatong bar byed do// des der bsam gtan gsum
pa'ang thob pa yin no// gang du chos dedag 'phel bzhin du'agog pa yid la byed pa'i sems kyis bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas pa de la mtshanam 'di dag 'byung ste/ des mig gnyis ka
btsums kyang nyi ma'i snang ba chen po lta bu r snangab dag yang dag par lta bar byed pan/ de 'di snyam du mtshanama'i stobs snang ba'i rkyen las sems thams cad kyi phung bo dang/ gnas dang/ skyen/
dang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnam par 'phel zhing 'barabs/ bdag gis nas kyang yid la byed pa'i semasakyi dmigs pa'i snang ba dag dor bar bya'o snyam du sems so/ de la
pa'itshar ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ sems pa dang/ reg pa gang yin yid la byed pa kun 'byung ba dag skyezhing 'jig pa dang/ 'gog pa'i tshul gyis rab tu zhi bar byedal/ 'gog pa'i grong khyen
shin tu yongs su dag par 'jug par yang byed do// de 'us dang/ ngagadang/ yid la byedapo shin tu sbyangs pa la gnasaso// yang de las kyang ldang ngo// yang na rdub pa dang/ dbugs
'byung ba'i mtshanam dag 'dzin par byed la/ reg pa yid la byedangs mtshanama'anye bar rtog par yad byed do// yang stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par yang byedal/ yang na dbugs
[/]rngub pa dang/ dbugs 'byung ba'i skye ba dang/ 'jig pa'i mtshanama'i dmigs pa dag yang dag par lta bar byed do// stonapa'i ting nge 'dzin de la yang gnasal/ yang nadabugs rngub pa dang/
dbugs 'byung ba'i zhi ba dang/ gog pa yang dag par lta bar byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa de bzhin du/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa 'ang yos su rdzogs par
'gyuro/ de la rnam par thar pagasum bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyural/ yang na dbugs rngub pa dang/ dbugs 'byung bar mi son cing/ 'jig pa'i tshul gyis dmigs pas
rupar rtog par yang byed do// de la yang dag par spong bzhibasgom pa yongs su rdzogs par yang brgyudal/ yang n dbugs rngub pa dang/ dbugs byung ba'i skye ba dang/ nub pa'i mtshan mal
nye bar rtog par yang byed do// de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa yongasardzogs par yang 'gyur la/ yang n dbugs rngub pa dang/ dbugs 'byung ba'i mtshanam la dmagos pas/ nyi zer
gyi rdul dang 'dra bar phye mar brlags pa bzhin du rang gi lus la bar rtog par yadabyed do// de dbang po lta bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par yang gyur la/ yang na dbugs rngub pa dang/ dbugs 'byung
ba skye ba dang/ nub pa'i tshul gyis 'du byed gsum la nye bar rtog par yang byed do// de stobs lnga bsgom pa longs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur la/ yang na dbugs rngub pa dang/ dbugs 'byung ba'i
tshor ba'i mtshanam bsal ba'i tshul gyis phung bo dag la zhi ba dang/ nye bar zhi bar rtog par yang byed do// de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par
yang 'gyur la/ yang na dbugs rngub pa dang/ dbugs 'byung ba'i rlung gi rnal 'byor yid la byed pas/ sa'i khams gzugs su snang ba thams cad rdul du brlags te/ gtor nasamtshanamamed/
pa lus pamed pa/ brjod du med paM/ mtshan nyid med pa// rnam par rig pa med pa/ 'dubyod gsum zhib/ nya par zhib/ 'gags pa/ dmigs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag rab tu thob
bo bsam gtan la rnam par rtsi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de ltabuni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasas sbyod ba thunamol yin la/ bsam
gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bani/ nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba thams cad kyi'ang thun mong yineno// gang dag kha cig de la gnasanargyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas pa yin no//
brtson 'grus zhan pa kha cig ni nyan thos kyichos rnams 'phel lo// kha cig ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu la gnas pa'i bar du'o// gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po
snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'bad pa brtan pa/ sems can thams cad la lta la/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu medab goms par byas te/ bsam gtan yongs su sbyong
pas rnam par rtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi la 'byor de lta bu de la gnas nas/ rnam par ldog pa mi byedal/ nyan thos kyings pa la 'jug par yang mi byed de// byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po de dag go chachenapobagosanas/ bsam gtan gyi yarol duphyin pa dang/ sos dadag par rig pa bzhi la sbyor ba yongs su sbyor ba la gnasal nas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i bar du'o// dpal chog shes su la 'khor de na dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen
dang 3 dge bsnyenam dang/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dang/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs
kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo dag bsam gtanA yongs su sbyong bas rnam par rtse ba yi de la byed pa de lta bu dag gis gnas pas/ yul 'khor der lha'i dbang po thams cad kyis legs par
bsrungs par 'gyuro la 'khor de klu'i dbang po dang/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang bo dang/ lham yin gyi dbang po dang/ namamakha'adzing gi dbang bo dang/ mi'amatsi'i dbang bo dang/ lto 'bye
chen po'i dbang po dang/ yi dgas kyi dbang bo dang/ shaza'i dbang po thams cad kyis legs par basrungs par 'gyu'o// den ting ting 'dzin de lta bu dang ldan pa'i sbyin gnas dag 'khodapa'i
bar du'o yul 'khor de'i rgyal po'ang yid dang bskrun pa'i sa bcu thob par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ nad med pa dang/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang/ tshe rid
ba dang/ gzugs bzang ba dang/ mdog bzang bo dang ldan pa dang/ yan lag dang 3 nying lag sdug pa dang/ 'khor skye bo bzang ba dang/ las kyi mtha' legs par spyad pa spyod pa dang/
u pa dang/ snying rje la sbyor ba dang/ snyan par grags pa dgaste/ tingange 'dzin de lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i sbyin gnas snod du gyurab/ mtho ris su 'gro ba'i yul 'khor de ni yon tan dang//
phan yon chen po bcu po de dag gis rgyas par 'gyur ro// rang gi dpung dang/ gzhan gyi dpung dang/ chom rkun dang/ mi rgod dang/ ridugs dang/ stag dang/ sbrangam dang/ sha sbrang dang/
phye ma leb dang/ tshar ches pa dang/ than chen po dang/ dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang/ lhags pa dang/ zhimasagadus pa dang/ tsha ba'i reg pa dag gis gnod bar mi 'gyur ro// yul 'khor de
sa gzhi mnyam ste/ dgon pa dang gcodo medado// tshong dang kha ba med/ denas bon sna tshogs dga' phelal// 'bu dang/ sman dang/ rtswa dang/ shing dang/ shing ljon pa dang/
chudag phun sum tshogs shing/ chud mi za bar 'byung ngo// de name tog dang/ sman dang/ 'bru dang/ ro rnams chud mi za b.raphunusum tshogs par 'gyur ro// yul 'khor der yid du mi 'ong
ba'i sgra dang/ phyi dgra dang/ nang 'khrug gi dpung dag dang/ lo nyes dang/ nad dung/ dus ma yin pa'i nad dang/ 'chi ba dag ma 'byung ngo// de na sems can rnams tshering zhing kha dog dang ldan go/

bdeb mang zhing sems la rogo pamedaro// rtsedaga' dang mtshungs par ldan zhing chos spyod la mtho ris dag la gzhol lo// yul 'khor de na sbyin lag nas snod du gyur pa dgarnal 'byor yid la byed pa dang/
'thun par mngon par dag/dab dang bcas pa gnasaso// denababra' btung gi los spyod ma tshang ba med do// 'byung ba chen po yid du 'ong ba dag gis brtan to// dbang po dang khams dag rgyus
shing mi mthun pa med do// yul la bor de nami rnams dga' zhing dran pa dang ldan ' byams pa dang/ snying rjedang ldan zhing mtho ris dag la gzhol lo// dpal chog shesayul 'bor de chos
bcu po de dag gis legs par brgyan pa yin no// dpal chog shes byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lasakyi sgrib pan 'di yin te/ theg pa chen po gtong ba dang/ slu zhing nyan thos kyis la
'jog par byed pa'o// sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nyan thos kyi bsam gtan dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa nadi lta bu yin no// nyan thos
gang dag gis bsam gtan gyi yan lag khongs su rdzogs par mi shis pa de dag ni khams gsum gyi btson ra'i gnas kyi yan lag lnga ma spangs shing yan lag lnga dang ldan pa yin no// gang dag
khams gsum las yang dag par 'das pa/ gislob pa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pas rnam par rtse ba mngon par shes pa/ pha rol
tu phyin pa thob pa// bskal pas nges par 'byung ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi zhal nas skyes pa// chos dang ldan zhing chos kyis la bde dag gis ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das dag la mchod pa dang/ bkur sti bya ba dang// chos mnyan pa'i phyir sas rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu 'gro bar yang mi nus la// sems rten gzhan dag dang/ gang zag gzhan dag
tsa gi lam gsum po dag kyang bsam par mi nus so// gang na nyan thos bsam gtan gyis rnam par rtsa ba ma ngon par shes pa dag ni de lta bu yin la/ yul 'khor de yon tan dang phan yonani da lta
bu yin te/ sngar ji skad gsus pa lta bu 'o// 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdobaco lnga pa ri'i snying po'i le'u las/ nyan thos mtshon pa ste dang po rdzogs so//
dpal mo gshes de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang rgyal thams cad kyibasam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bathun mong du
gzhug pa dang/ gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po dag/ pha rol tu phyin pa lhag ma lnga po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ dbal cho gshes byang chub senaMms dpa'i
sems dpa' chen po 'di dag dbugs rngub pa dang/ dbugs 'byung ba thams cad du nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag gi skye ba dang/ 'jig pa la rtog par byed de/ des nasred pa dang/ chags/
pa dag skems par yang byed la// nges pa la 'jug par yang mi byedad// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis rnam par rtse ba mngon par shes pa yin no// sangs rgyus bcom ldan 'das de dag thams
cad la mchod pa dang/ bkur sti bya ba dang/ dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ sos rgyas kyi zhing thams cud du glog bu'i shugs kyis 'gro ba la mkhas pa'ang yin no// sems can rnams kyi
lam gsum po las kyi lam dang/ nyon mongs pa'i lamadang/ sdug bsngal gyi lam dag skem par yang byed de// 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar yang byedal/ 'dod pa'i
khams dag gtong bar yang mi byed do// sems can thams cad yongasas smin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi skye ba'i sa dag stonapar yang byedal/ mngal gyi nyes pas gos par
yang mi byed do// sems can rnamasakyinyon mongs pa'i drab gcod par yang byed la/ sems can rnams dmigs par yang mi byed do// dpal chogashes 'di 'byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa'achen po dag dbugs rngub pa dang/ dbugs 'byung ba phan tshunami 'drab la'ang lta ba bzhin rtogs par yang byed la/ 'phral 'phral du de shes par yang mi byedado// dbugs thub
padang [u0f10 ]dbugs 'byung ba'i gzugs lte bar len pa'i phung po dang/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ de bzhin du dbugs ba pa dang//
ka dbugs 'byung ba'i rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa'i bud po dag la ji lta ba bzhin dbang rab tu shes shing/ dbugs rngub pa 'du gzhan la/ dbugs 'byung ba'ang gzhan no// dbugs rngub
pa soso yang dag par rig pa 'ad gzhan la/ dbugs 'byung ba so so yang dag par rig pa'ang gzhanano// dbugs rngub pa'i nor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ sems pa yid la byed pa'angagazhan
la/ dbugs 'byung ba'i tshor pa dang/ 'dushes dang/ sems pa yid la byed pa'ang gzhan no// dbugs rngub pa'i sems pa'ang gzhan la/ dbugs 'byung ba'ang gzhan no// gang gi tshe
dbugs rngub pa so so yang dag par rig pa de'i tshe/ dbugs 'byung ba soso yang dag pa rig pa ma yin no// gang gi tshe dbugs 'byung ba so so yang dag par rig pa de'i naM/ dbugs rngub pa so/
rgyus yodadug par rig pa ma yin no// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo dum bu gsum par tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ sems pa yid la byed pa'ang de lta bu yin te/ 'jug pa'i rgyusani bar mdo med
par skye ba'i rgyamatshor 'das shing thar par yang mi byed do// yang dang yang skye bar byed do// rga bar byed do// 'chi bar yang byed do// yang skye bar yang byed do// chosagang 'di dgamangon
par rdzogs par sangs rgyas des na/ rga 'asanges par 'byung ba dag yang dag pa jilta ba bzhin rab tu shes// de dag dbugs rngub pa dang/ dbugs 'byung ba yang dag pa ji ltab
bzhin par rtog par mi byed do// 'di ltar srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i sgo dag gi dbugs rngub pa dang/ dbugs 'byung ba 'jug pa dang/ nges por 'khyud bar yang byed// de bzhin du ba sbya'i
khung bu'i so 'bum phrag khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa dgusnyed thams cad kyi dbugs rngub pa dang/ dbugs 'byung ba'ajug pa dang/ nges par 'byung bar byed kyang/ ba su'i chung bu'i sgo
'bum phrag brag khrig dgu panun dgu de dag nyams par yang mi mngonano// rgyas par yang mi mngonano/ sngon gyi mtha' dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' dang thog ma dang/ bar ma dang/ mtha'
mabang mi mngonano// 'jug pa dang/ 'byung ba 'ang mimangonano// de 'di snyam du bdag gis nyin s kyang ba spu'i khung bu thams cad kyi dbugs rngub pa dang/ dbugs 'byung ba de la skye
ba dang/ 'jig pa'i tshul gyis/ skye 'jig gi mtshan nyid la brtson pa dang ldan par gnas par bya'o snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rma'i skye dgu'i
dbugs ba pa dang/ dbugs 'byung ba'i skye ba dang/ 'jilag pa la sbyor zhing so sor rtog par byed do// de bzhind ba sa'i khung bu'i sgo 'bum phrag khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa dgu stod 'di'i
ba spu'i khung bu'i dbugs rngub pa dang/ dbugs 'byungaba'i skye ba dang/ 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid la brtson pa dang ldan par gnas par byed do// yang na deb spu'i khung bu'i sgo/

skra'i nyag ma tsam du chung bar rtogana'ang/ der dbugs rngub pa dang/ dbugs 'byung brgyud de dag la chung bar yang mthong ngo// yodazhachepar rtog na'ang khung 'bru chen potsam du yang dag par rjes su

mthengang// langan skyur tsam du rtog na 'ang skyu ru ra tsam du mthong// yang na tha 'i khung bu re ra la ba'iba'i 'bras bu tsam du rtoganabang/ bil ba 'bras bu tsam dumathong ngo/ yang na dpag tshad

stong tsam du rtog na'ang dopag tshad stong tsam du mthong ngo/ yang na gling bzhi nga gcig tsam du gna'ang/ gling bzhi pa la yig tsam dmathong ngo// yang na ba sa'i bung bu re re la rgya che bar rtog na'ang/
rgya che bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo// de bzhin du mig gi tshad la'ang sbyar bar bya'o// gang durga shi dang 'brel ba'i semasatsan dgabar chad med par 'khor ba'i chu bor bdasabs/ sdug
bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs dag nyams su myong ban/ da 'di snyam du bdag gis ci nas kyang rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes dgu dor bar bya'o snyamadusems te/ de rlung gi khams la
myi sems nye bar gtod par byed do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs gyi 'du shes dag spong bas/ des brjod du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu thob ste/ de ni nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba thamA
cad kyi sa ma yin no// del sa'i khams mi dmigs so// chu'i khams mi dmigs so// me'i khams mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs so// rnam
par shes pa'i khams ma dmigs so// phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams rgyub mi dmigs so// sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so// phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs so// 'jig rten 'di ni mig
so// 'jig rten pha rol mi dmigs so// legs par spyad pa dang/ nyes par spyad pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mi dmigs so// skye ba mi dmigs so// 'jig pa mi dmigs so//
kun nas nyon mos pa mi dmigs so// rnam par byang ba mi dmigasaso// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de zhi ba la gnas pa de dag gis gnasaso// gal te chos thams cud stod

ba nyid brjod du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dis bskal pa tshad med par byin gyis rlob par 'dod na'ang/ de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis byin gyis rlob bo// de chos thams cad stong pa nyid brjod/
dumed pa'i ting nga 'dzin 'dis bskal pa tshad med par gnas par 'dod na'ang deb zhin du gnas par byed do// 'di ltar sems can yongs su sminapar bya ba'i phyir/ parol tu phyin pa drug yos
su rdzogs par byed de/ dper na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen posa'i snying po bzhinano// dpal chog shes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo gang gis chos thamasacad stong
ba nyid brjod du med pa'i ting nga 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dbang thob par gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po degangagari ting nge 'dzin 'di la 'jug par 'dod pa de'i tshe/
des dang bo khor semasazhan yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bsod nams dung/ shes rab kyi stobs kyis smon lam 'di lta bu r 'debs par byed de/ 'di ltar bdag yunaji srid du ting nge
pa: 'dzin las ma 'das pa de srid kyi bar du/ yul 'di nyid dang/ gling bzhi pa 'di nyid ces bya ba nas/ sos rgyas kyi zhing 'di nyid kyi sems can zhes bya ba'i bar gyi sems can rnams longs spyodadad
yongs su spyod pa dang/ yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs dag phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ 'di lta ste/ de na sems can rnams kyi gnas dang/ lus dang/ lus kyi dbyings mdog dang/
yan lag dang/ shing lag dang/ rgyan dang/ lhab lhub dang/ phyang phrul dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ mal cha dang/ gos dang/ bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/
redung/ reg pa yid du 'ong ba ci dang ci 'dod pa dang/ ji lta bu zhig 'dod pa dang/ ji snyed cig 'dod pa rnams 'byung bar gyur cig ces smon lam btabanas/ de'i rjes la byung chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po de ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par byed do// ting nge 'dzin de la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ji sridadu snyoms par zhugs pa de srid kyi bar du/ de na/
sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang/ yo byad de lta bu dag 'bud bani sngar ji skad gsungs pa yin/ 'gazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de smon lam 'di lta bu r
'debs par byed de/ 'dir bdag/yun ji srid duting nge 'dzin dolta bu dang ldan pa de srid kyi bar du tshad bzung ste/ sems can rnams kyilus kyind rlung las gyur ba dang/ mkhris pa las gyur pa dang/
bad kan las gyur pa dang/ 'dus pa las gyur pa dang/ de bzhin du sems nad 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug la sogs ba dag rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i
gnod pa las byung ba'i nad dug rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi la dag la gnas par gyur cig ces smon lam btabanas/ de'i rjes la ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par byed do// byang nub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di ltar yun ji srid du ting nge 'dzin lta bu dang ldan pa de srid kyi bar du tshad gzung ba'i sems can rnams kyi lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal gyi nad de lta bu dag rab tu
zhi bar byed do// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenAbodi smon lam 'di lta bu r 'debs par byed de/ bdag yun ji srid du ting nge 'dzin de lta bu dang ldan par gnas pa de srid kyi bar
dusems can dmyal ba rnams dang/ dud 'gro rnams dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnamasakyi sdug bsngal dang/ bkres pa dang/ skom pa dang/ tsha ba dang/ grang ba dang/ mi sdug pa dang phrad
parang sdug bsags te// dga' sa thams cad dang bral ba rnams dge ba'i chos thamasacad man pa 'i sems dang ldan pa dang/ khon med pa'i/
[/]@#// pa dang/ sdug ba dang bral ba dang/ ngal ba'i sdug bsngal dang/ tshom khro'i sdug bsngal dag rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ yun dze srid du ting nge 'dzin de lta bu dang ldan pa desrid/
'a: ldan pa de srid kyi bar du sems can rnams sems can ba gzhan dag la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang/ phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang/ mi 'khrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang/ khon med pa'i/
sems dang ldan pa dang/ rtog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang/ snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa dang/ snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi sems dang ldan pa dang/
snyoms par 'jug pa la mkhas par gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang/ 'khrul pa med pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig/ jisid du ting 'dzinade lta bu dang ldan pa de srid kyi bar du sems can rnams
kyi gti mug gi mun pa dang/ rtag pa dang chad par lta ba dag ra ba tu zhibar gyur cig/ dus thams cad du lta bar 'dzinapa rnamasarab tu zhi bar gyur cig yun risrid du ting nge 'dzin de lta bu dang/
ldan pa de srid kyi bar du sems can rnams dkonamchog gsumal gro'ajug cing/ zhis dang ri mo byed par gyur cig/ phyin ci log bzhi dang bral zhing bden pa bzhi'i rnam pa la gnas pa'i sems dang ldan
par gyur cig/ 'phags pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa la rnam par gnas ba'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig/ byang chub semasadapa'asems dpa' chen po desems can yongs su smin par byaba'i phyir/ gang gi

doting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'dod pa de'i tshe/ 'di ltar shes rab dang/ bsod nams kyi stobs dang/ thabs kyi stobs kyis 'di lta bu r byin gyis rlob par byed de/ bdag yun ji srid du ting nge 'dzin lasam

langs pa de srid kyi bar du yul 'di nyid dang/ gling bzhi pa 'di nyid ces bya ba nas/ sas rgyas kyi zhing 'dinyid kyi sems can zhes bya ba'i bar dag/ ji ltaratshadagazung ba rnams la 'di ltar bdebar sbyar bar
byin gyis rlob par byed do// de'i rjes la chos thams cad stong ba nyid brjod du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin de lta bu la 'jug par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs ma thag

pa des ji ltar sems can rnams tshad bzung ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis bde bar sbyar ba yon tanasna tshogs de lta bu dag gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par byede/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgachos thams cad stong pa nyid brjod dumed pa'i ting nge 'dzin las de srid du ldang bar mi byed do// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs

pa de'i lus la gnod pa dang 'gyurab mi 'byung ngo// bkres pa dang skom pa'i gnod pa mi 'byung ngo// me'i gnod pa mi 'byung ngo// bskal pa misatshog par mi 'gyur ba nas/ mi phal pas tshig par mi 'gyur ro
[4]/ nubya// chus khyer bar mi 'gyur ro/ nad kyi bskal pas zer bar mi 'gyur// mu ge'i dgon par gyur pa'i bskal pas zad par mi 'gyur ro// bsams bzhin du tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba la ma
gtogs par tsho'i 'du byed dang/ srog gi dbang po yongs su zad par mi 'gyur// lus dang srog la mi dang/ mi ma yin pa dang/ rlung dang/ nyi mas gdungs pa dag gis gnod par mi 'gyur te/ de lta bu /
tsha nisnyoms par zhugs pa'i yin no// ting nge 'dzin las las nas kyang bdod na/ sa'i na mo gcig gi nang du sangs rgyasakyi zhing dpag tu med pa dag ba/zhug par nus so// 'dod nasangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang/ byang rlub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad gacig tu sdoms pa ma lus pa dag sor mo gcig gi sen mo'i nang du blta bar yang
nus so// 'dodon sku'i rtse mo gcig gnang dusems can dpag tu med pa thams cad bzhugs par padanus la/ de nasems can ra'i rang rang gi yul dang/ spyod yul dag yas par yang mthong//

'dod na ba sas rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa dag ki rlung gi kham thamA cad skrag rtsa tshogacig gi nang dubacug ste/ der nam mkha'i gtos yas pa bzhin du spyod par byed kyang/ dmangar yang mi mngonano//
chung bar yang mi mngon no// 'dod na byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi chu'i khams thams cad mon sun sde tshu'i 'brum bu gcig gi nang du bcug ste/ der nam

mkha'i gtos yos pa bzhin du spyod par byed kyang/ de tsho bar yang mi mngon no// chung bar ya nga mi mngonan// byang chub sems dang ba 'ang gi smon lam gyi stobasan gtogs par yang dang yang mngal gyi gnas su
