skye bar mi 'gyuraro// ngan 'gror skye bar mi 'gyur// bud med du mi 'gyur ro// skye ba dman pa 'thob par mi 'gyur ro// yan lag nyams par mi 'gyur ro// lus dang/ ngag dang/ yidi kyi
spyod pa la 'khrul par mi 'gyur ro// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyirerang gi smon lam gyi stobs ma gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag tu skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de rtag par sangs
rgyasal bltab dang/ chos mnyan pa dang/ dge 'dun la bkur sti bya ba dang mi 'brel ba yin no// de shes rab dang/ bsod nams dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ thabs mkhas pa dag gis sems can
yongs su smin par byed pa nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa blun med pa'i par la 'jigs pa med pa dang ma bral ba yin no// dang lacho ga shes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gomtshan
bo de lta bu bgos nas/ bsam gtan dang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong zhing slob pa na/ 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar byed do// de bzhin dubasam gtan gyi yan lag rnams

kyang shis par byed do// yan lag lnga dang ldan zhing yan lag lnga rnam par sangs pa yin no// de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis rtse ba mngon par shes pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
a// dag thams cad la mchod pa dang/ bkur sti bya ba dang/ dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du glog ltapu'i shugs kyis 'gro ba la mkhas pa yin no// gang
sa gsanasems can thams cad kyi lam gsum po las kyi lam dang/ nyon mongs pa'i lam dang/ sdug bsngal gyi lam dag sems par byed pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' de ltar sems pa rabyed pa'i

phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de bzhin du de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yos surdzogs par 'gyur zhing/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa na/ 'khor de nasems can lnga khri po gang dag gis sngon chos bzhi
po 'di dag goms par byas pa de dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzodapa rab tu thob pa dang ldan no// de na srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dag gisani/ dpa dpar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par
gyur to// de na srog chags khrag khrig stong phrag dgu bcurtsa dgu dag gis ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs pa rab tu thob par gyur to// de na sems can sngon byang/
chub tu sems ma bskyed ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa dag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyedanas/ blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
[/ ]phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ 'das pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo bcoltar ri'i snying po'i le'u las/ bsam gtanamatshonapa ste gnyis pa rdzogasaso/// de nas
du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen posa'i snying pos/ dpal lha mo chen mo la 'di skad ces smras so// dpal chog shes gling chen po bzhi pa 'di/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
dedag thams cad kyi yun ring por shin tumachod bacher bya ba dang/ rjes su bsrung bar bya ba dang/ rjes su dran par bya ba dang/ phyag bya bar 'os pa dgaji tsam pani/ daltar de bzhin gshegs pa dag
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyi 'dus pa chen po di lta bu dag bsdus pa dang/ byang chub kyi lam
mtha' dag la 'jug pa dang/ phyir ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu 'gro ba dang/ sangs rgyas su dbang bskur ba'is rab tu bsgrags pa de lta bu dag ltos shig/ khyod phyir mi
ldog pa'i 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag la yang dag par mngon du zhen nas/ khyod kyi sbyin gnas de lta bu dgel bza' ba dang/ btung ba'i yo byad dag
'byor par byas pa yin te/ khyod brtson pa des na myur du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byedadam/ rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la gnas par byed dam/ de la dpal lha mo chen
bya mos 'di skad ces pas so// skyes bu chen po dam pasajiskad smras pa de ltar lags te/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal ba dpag tu med ba dag 'dus pan/ gang gi tshe

sa byang chub sems dpar shAkya thub pa de byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pan/ 'di ltar bdag dang gcig la gcig dmatshig bcas pa gang gi tshe/ khyod byas med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
'tsha mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu ba de'i tshe/ bdag gling chenapo bzhi pa der dpal chenamo'i go 'phang thob par shog cig pa dang/ de nasems can rnams la bzla ba dang/ btung ba'i yo byad thams
cad kyis sbyin par byed par 'gyur bar bgyis lags so// rigs kyi bu khyod bdag las gsonacig dang/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i bskal pa dpag tu med pa 'dus pa gang de'i tshe de'i dusan/ de bzhin gshag/

pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyas dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur to// skye dgu'i tshe lo stong zhes bya ba nas/de'i tshade'i dusan/ dge bas na skar madri
rgya ma med dpal zhes bya ba dul ba/ gsal ba/ 'jigs pa med pa/ thos pa mngal/ 'khor bzhi pa dag la chos ston pa 'khor mang ba/ 'khor phun sumatshogs pa zhig byung bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i
bar du ste/ de'i bu thub dromid dpal zhes bya ba zhig byung ba des rang gil latshigs su bcad pas sa pa/ yab cig ci slad rang gi lus srog btang nas kyang// zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis brtson zhing
[n/ ]rtsol bar mdzad// yab zhig tshe 'disamya ngan 'das par mi gshegs par// sems can rnamasalamchog tusrung mdzad shin tu brtson// des rang gi bu dri med dpal latshigs su bcad pas lan sapa/
sems can 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis rmongs pa dang// lam ngan zhugs shing nyon mongs pa la me 'barab// rtag tu sdug bsngal dag gis nyon mongs sa mtho nas// nyonamos pa yini dag/
gsad phyir nga brtson byed// shes rab rnam par nyams shing mtha' las 'das pa dang lam las rab tu nyams shing ngan song 'gro ba dang// 'khor ba shinatu bzad rlagachu bor lhang ba rnams //
rab tu bsal ba'i phyir ni nga yang spyod par byed// sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa rnam par spangs pa dang// lha dang mi yi bde bas rtag tu nyams pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag dang rtag tu bral ba
rnams // de dag la ni bdag gis lam ston 'gyur bar bya// sems can nyon mos pa yasabatson rar rtag bcings pa// mgon med gyur pa mig ni rnam par nyams gyur cing// lta ngan dag 'chag
bsha dang khragaza ba// de dag dag par bya phyir nga ni spyod par byed// sems can re re'i don du mnar med spyod byed pa/ de 'dra'i snying rje sems can rnams la bskyed par bya// ji ltar sems can re
re de dag thabya'i phyir// sdug bsngal bzad rlag bzod dka' ba dag gis dang du blang// bu tshig da yis byang chub spyadamchog spyad par bya// nyan thos dag gishes pa btsal bar mi bya zhing// rang
sangs rgyas kyi shes pa'ang btsal bar mi bya ste// blunamed pa'i ye shes dag ni btsal bar bya// ji srid gang+ga'i bye snyed sems can du ma dag/ sdug bsngal dag las thar par
ka byag par ma gyur bar// de srid byang chub mchog rab 'dir gi'atshang mi rgyu// byinas byang chub mchog rab de 'areg bar bya// bucig khyod kyis sems can rnams la mtshungs par ni// snying rje 'di
lta bu dag bskyed par byas nas kyang// khyod kyis dag dang rtag tu ldan par byas pa rnams // byang chub mchog rab 'phags pa dag tu bsngo bar gyis// sems can nyon mongs me las rab tu thar
bya'i phyir// sdug bsngal bzadag bzod dka' ba dag dang du long/ sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa dag la legs spyod cig/ rdzogs sangs rgyas pa 'gyur ba 'di'i ni the tshom med// gang gi tshang ni byang/
chub mchog ma thob pa na// de tsho khyedan sems can rnams kyi sbyin par 'gyur// nga yis khyod na byang chub mchog tu lung bstan nas// 'di la dam bcas brtan por legs par gnas pa yin//

rigasakyi bu de'i tsho bdag gis dengazhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i spyan sngar 'di lta bu r dam bcas te/ bdag yun ji srid du 'khor ba na 'khor ba de srid kyi bar dubartul zhugs
dang/ dka' thub dang/ dka' pa spyad pa dang/ sbyin pa dang/ dul ba dang/ sdom pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ thos pa dang/ gtong ba dang/ zhal ta sna tshogs dag la goms par bgyi'o//
dka' ba spyad pa dang/ yongs su gtongab rnam pa sna tshogs dag la goms par bgyi'o// gang gi rtswa skye dgu'i brgya thub pa'i tshe nyon mongs pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i sog pa dag gis kun tu rmongs
par gyur ba'i zhing dag tu/ bdag gi thun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i zhing der bdag gis kyang dpal gyi go 'phang gi bdag po bla med pa
dag bstan par bgyi'o// de'i bstan pa la bza' ba dang/ btungapa'i yo byad blan med pa'i sbyin pa por 'gyur bar bgyi// de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa dag la
bdag gis zhal zas dang/ btung ba sna tshogs dag gis rim grobagyi'o// der de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas mngonasum du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan
pa thob par bgyi'o// der sems can gang dag ma rus pa/ rtsub pa/ snying mi brtse ba/ byas pa mi gzo ba/ ma mnyam pa/ ya nga bar spyod pa/ sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur
ba de dag gis dus ma yin pa'i rje char dang/ tshob dang/ grang ba dang/ ma mo mi dag 'bebs par byed pas/ gang dag sems can rnamasakyi 'bru dang/ 'bras bu dang/ lo tog dang/ sman
dang rnaljon shing dang/ ro dag ma rung bar byed pa/ mdas 'brog pa/ sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang/ yongs su spyod pa dag chud gzon par byed pa/ mun nag tu byed pa de dag thams cad
bdag gis bsod nams kyi mgru dang/ shesarab kyi stobs kyis bzlog par bgyigod par bgyi'o// kabam po gnyis la//
gang gi tshesems can de dag longs spyod dang/ nye bar spyod pa dang bral bas/ sems can de dag mi dge ba bcu la spyod par byed do/ dge ba bcu'i chos rnams yongasasu nyams par byed/
da/'di ltar der bcom ldan 'dasakyigadul bya rnams bstan pa dang/ dkon mchog gsumakhyi bdud dang/ yo byad dag dang mi ldan pas/ grags pa med par 'gyur te/ des na der bdag gis longs
sprod dang 'bar spyod pa'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu dag gis sems can rnams bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par bgyi'o// gang gi tsho 'di lta bdag gis
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar smon lam btab pas/ ma 'os pa'i dusan de ltar bdag gis bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das des legs so zhes bya ba gnang
zla/ ste de'i tshe ji ltar smon lam btab pa bzhin bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pas/ rigs kyi bu de ltar smon lam btab ba legs so legs so zhes/ dbazhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi rgyal
mtshan rgyal pos legs zhes bya ba gnang ba yin no// gas kyi bu khyod la bdag gis 'byor byed mu khyim side po zhes bya ba'i gzungs sbyin gyis/ khyod kyis gzus kyi sing po 'dis de lta bu r sems/

can rnams shin tu yongs su smin par byed nus sa// sems can tshad med pa dag longs spyod dang te par spyod pa'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dag gis nyon mongs pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed/
dam/ tad+ya thA/ dza'am sdu/ ma hA/ dza lam b+ha/ anu/ dza lam g+ha/ sarba/ dzo lam b+ha/ og 'dzolam/ yaka bri/ dza 'amag+ha/ nAg bri/dzulam/ u ga ra bri/ pholam b+ha/ hastabri
dza lam/ e dzo lamalha/ dzalam b+ha/ man bla ka dri/ dza lamalha/ bamu bri/ dza lam/ pang ka khri dzalam amabri/ dzalam/ su'i mu kha bri/ dza lam b+ha/ ba srab spra/ dza la ba ma/
gi dza: blund/ phrad tA pu/pa'aag+ha/ muklon/ ri phran sa/ d+haram/ yad nya/bri'iso/ sbi lam g+ha/ sha shAs/ dal/ gu gang sar gnatso/ dung gung/ bar po sad/ 'byor byed chu skyes
snying po zhes bya ba'i gzus de yin te/ gzus kyi snying po 'dis de lta bu r sems can rnamasangashin tu yongs su smin par byedazhugs// rigs kyi bu der bdag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i
tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po de las/ 'byor byedachu khyim snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di mnos so// mnos nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la bdag gis mchod pa dang/ rim gro rnam pa snatshogs
'di dag byas te/ tshul khrims dang/ thos pa dang/ brtul zhugs dag kyang spyad do// de'i 'og tu yangs pas rgyas tre snyed pa de lta bu'i smon lam btab pa desan/ bdag gis da ltar bskal pa
ga/ bzang po 'di la dpal chen po'i go 'phang thob pa yin no// daltar bdag 'dir don chen po de lta bu bgyid pa'i tshi/ mi nyal ba de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de tshun chad klu khro bo pha' mo tshadag
byang ba dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ lha ma yin dang/ grul bum dang/ yi dwags dang/ shawa ma nus pa/ rtsub pa/ mdad pa/ sIng rjemed pa// snying brtsi ba med par zhugs pa phal mo che dag
lhags pas// srog chags su gyur pa rnams la gnod pa dang/ yang bar spyod pa de dag gis dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang/ char mo che dang/ thanachen dang/ ser drag 'bebs pa dang/ tsha ba dang/ grang nga/
dug 'byin par byed do// phyi dag dang/ nang 'khrug dang/ phung par 'gyur ba dang/ phas kyi dmag tshogs kyiganod pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ nyims gdus pa dang/ myu dmar dag gtong bar byedad//

dadag kyang sngon gyi rgyal bas byin gyis ma brlabs la/ de dag 'jig rten pha rol la'ang mi lta bas 'byor byed mu khyim snying po zhes bya ba'i gzus 'di la ri mo mi byed de/ de dag sems can rnams kyis bon dang/
rgyu gu dang/ 'dab ma dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ ro dang/ 'bru dang/ sman dang/ longs spyod dang/ 'bar spyod pa dag chud gson par byed// 'jig par byed do// mdangs 'phrog par byed/
do/ de dag sa'i bcud rnams la dbugs gtong bar byed do// de dag gis sa'i bcud rnams skyon dang bcas pa dang/ snyigs ma dang bcas pa dang/ nadadang bcas pa dang/ ldam ldum gyis 'gags pa dang/
rtsub pa dang/ ro med pa dang/ sra ba dang/ drimi zhim pa dag tu byed do// de dag gis sems can rnams mngonapar dga' b.ram byed do// sems can gang dag sa'i bcud 'di la rten pa rnams sa bon dang//
sdong bu dang/ lam dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ rodang/ 'bu dang/ smanadang/ longs spyod dang/ nye bar spyod pa dag la spyod par byed pas// de dag gi sems 'jig rten pha rol la mi lta zhing
sem can rnamA la sems nub pa dang/ zhe 'gras pa dang/ gdug pa dang/ sdang ba dang/ snying rje med pa dang/ snying brtse ba med par zhugs ba yin no/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir cing/ gzugs mi sdug
la/ lus rtsub pa/ nyonames pa dang/ nad du mas nyams smad pa/ lta ba ngan par zhugs pa/ skyabs ngan pa la rten pa yin no// de dag ces bya ba nas/ ri dgas dang/ bya
dag gi bar du dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang dang ba dang/ dga' ba dang/ bla ma dang/ zhes dang/ ri mo byed pa'i sems dag ma thob pa yin te/ de dag nad sna tshogs dang/ lta ba ngan pas win
cing ngan g.yo can khar bres bas/ dkon mchog gsum pa lus dang/ ngag yid 'khrul bar spyod pa yin no// sdig pa'i sems dang ldan ba/ tshul khrims 'chal pa/ sdom pa ma yin pa la spyod pa
dedag dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan zhing yon tan gyis phyug pa/ spobs pa grol ba dang ldan pa de dag gis spong bar byed do// da ltar 'di nasems can dag gshe ba dang/ spyob dang/ snod pa dang/
[7 ]@#/// ga shung ba dang/ nyams par byed pa dang/ banas pa dang/ 'drid pa dang/ sdigs pa dang/ grags pa ma yin par spyod pa dang/ ngo shes pa dang/ khrel yod pa spangs pa dang/
ka mi gab bcu'i lasakyi lam rnams la mngon par dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang/ dge bathams cad la spyod pa sbas pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang/ bsod nams dang/ shes rab dang bral ba dang/ tshe
thung zhing nganasong du 'gro ba desan 3 sems can 'di dag thams cad do bdag gis nilongs spyod dang/ nyob spyod pa thams cad kyis tshim par byed kyang mi nus/ yongs su smin par byed kyang mi nusaso//
'di ltar skyes bu dmal khyod nisangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la ragam las par shes shing/ mkhas pa khyod ni ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzugs dang/ bzod pa thams cad la rnam par sbyod pa la mkhas pa'i

rol tu son pa/ snying rje dang/ snying brtse bas brgyan ba/ mkhas pa chen po shes pa'i pha rol tu son pa khyodani byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyi nang na rgyal mtshan gyi mchog tu gyur pa/ seman
can thamasad logs smin par byed pa yin pas/ dakhyod kyis gling bzhi pa 'di snying rjodang/ snying brtse ba dag skyed cig/ gling bzhi pa 'dinaklu khro bo dgaji ltar bzlog par nus pa dang/ gnod
sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ lham yin dang/ grul bum dang/ yi dgas dang/ shaza khro bo dang/ lus srul po khribo dag ji ltar bzlog par nus pa dang/ dodagaci nas kyang dus su 'debs
[s F]shing chu 'byin par 'gyur ba dang/ lo tog phunasum tshogs pa sgrub par 'gyurab dang/ tshab dang/ grangang dus su sbyor bar 'gyur bdag blos rtogs shig dang/ gzhi des sems can rnams kyi las/
spyod dang/ nye bar spyod pa mi nyams la/ sa'i bcud thamasacud la'ang skyon med pa dang/ nad med pa dang/ snying bo dang ldan pa dang/ dran pa'i rgyu can dang/ zhim pa dang/ dri zhim pa dang/
dezhim po phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ sa'i bcud 'di la rten pa'i sems can gang dag gis longs spyod dang/ nye bar spyod pa la 'os spyod pa dodag ni nad med pa dang/ dran pa dang ldan pa dang
zhes bya ba'i bar du sngar ji skad gsungs pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos/ dpal lha mo chen mo de lo 'di skad ces smras so// dpal chog shes bdag gis
zhesangs rgyasakyi zhing 'di thams cad kyi 'byung ba chen bo ma lus pa dag lha'i bde bar sprul nas/ 'dir sems can rnams bsal ba 'bum phrag skyed kyi bar du losaspyod par bya bar nus

kyang/ 'dir sems can rnams kyi lo dpyod par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ sems 6na 'di dag gi bsod nams dang bral ba ste/ longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa chen po dag la longs spyod pa'i snodam yin
no bdag gis nis sargyas kyi zhingamimad 'di thams cad lha'i gzhal med khang rgya chen por sprul pa dang/ lha'i gnas mal dang/ rgyan dang/ gos dang/ lhab lhub dang/ sos dang/ me tog dang/
@#/ 'phrengab dang/ 'brasabu dang/ shing ljon pa dang/ ro'amo'i sgradang/ sil snyan dang/ glu dbyangs dang/ ri bo che sna tshogs kyis brgyanapa dag tu sprul par nus kyang/ 'dir sems
[A/ ]can de dag bsod nams dang bral bas/ snod du ma gyur pa'i phyir longs spyod par mi nus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
! dpa' chen pos bcu pa de dag dang/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin la dbang thob pa dag longs spyad par spyod pa ni ma gtogs so// bdag gis sems can gyi khamasum lus pa dag bsam gtan bzhi la
snyoms par zhugs par bzhag par nus na/ 'din klu khrogazhes bya bas/lus srul po khrib zhes bya ba'i bar dag zhi bar bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'diltar bdaganadi bzhin gshegs pas ma gnang bar bdag

gis rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dag bstan pa ni tshul dang 'thun pa ma yinate/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos ma gnang bar blon po rin po chedang/ khyim bdag rin po dgagis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa
shom pa de ni gnas medado// de ci'i phyir zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pom lus pa de dag thams cad ni/ de bzhinagashegs pa'i sras su thugs las skyesapa/ gsungalas skyes pa/

chos las byung zhing chos kyis sprul pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhinagashegs pas ma gnang bar rdzu 'phrul gyi yul bstanaparani sus kyang mi nusaso// dpal chog shes 'on kyang chu klung nor bu'i gzhal med khang
0/ zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi tshogs kyi rig sngagadang/ gsang sngags kyi tshig mdor bsdus pa dang/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung gi byin gyis

nus kyis rnam par 'phrul pa dag yod kyis/ dang[«]cho ga shes du de bzhin gshegs pa de la tshig ngag zhus shig dang/ dade bzhin bshegs pas khyod 'chu klung nor bu'i gzhal med khang zhes bya pa'i gzungs
kyi tshogs kyi rig sngags dang/ gsang sngags kyi tshig mdor bsdus pa dag ston par 'gyur te/ bdag kyang rjes su yi rang ngo// khyod kyis kyang bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par gyis shig/ de nas

dpal lha mo chen mo dang/ lha mo chen mor byus can dang/ lhumo chen mo brtanam dang/ lha mo tshanamo 'od byed dang/ lha mo chen mo gzi brjid can dang/ lha mo chen mo dge ldan dang/ lu mo chen mo tam 'a'i
snying po dang/ lha mo chen mo'am bdag dang/ lha mo chen mo shel canadang/ de dag la sogs pa lha gzhan khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad du skyed kyis yongs su bskor cing/ mdun gyis bdar nas/ stan
las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal go sbyar ba btud nas/ dpal lha mo chen mos de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/ spyod pa rnam dag dri ma'i dri med pa// nyi mas nyonamos
rnyog sel bstan du gsol// chu rlung gzungs kyis bdag cag skom lags na// bde gshegs gzus tshogs bzhi bgyid bstan du gsol// chu klungarig sngags gsang sngags tshig rab mchog
ku sgrub pa rin po cheyas bstan du gsol// des na rig ldan klu dag dad 'gyur bas// sa yi bcud rnams skad chad chub mi 'tshol// dus min rlung dang nyi mas gdus pa dang// rdul dang than
chen chen po bgyid la// lo tog 'bras busus kyang madangs mi 'phrog/ gang dag srung bar 'gyur ba bstan du gsol// des na nad med dran dang ldan pa dang// dgib dag la spyod par gyur nas kyang//
rgyal ba'i bstanal ltarangan pa po// yang b gzhi rnam par song bar 'gyur// rgyal bas bdag gi snying lamya ngan dang/ nyon mongs se 'bagyid mdangasani 'grub pa dang// gang gis bdag nisims/
can thams cad dag/ yongs smin bgyid par rje thogos bstan dugasol// thub pa'i thad na lha rnams 'di dag gsol 'debs pa// theg pa chen po zab mo'i 'amal gzhug tu gsol// sems can
yon tan phyug po 'bras bcas 'dus ba po// phyogs bcu'i byang nub sems dpa la khyod la bsngags pa brjod// chu bo legs 'bab 'e tog mi nyams bgyi slad du// sdig can klu rnams bzlog
phyir 'di dag bstan du gsol/ gdonas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dpal chog shes 'dus pa rnams kyi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i dus su byis kyis slob par mdzad la/ dbazhin gshegs
pa ni 'dus pa rnams kyi nang du/ dus gsumagyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'byor byed mu khyim snying po zhesabya ba'i gzungs ston to// phyogs bcunas
bdi lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis de thos nas kyang/ gas bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga can stong pa de na/sems can rnams la 'byor byed kyi ma ste/
zhes bya ba 'i gzus 'di rab tu ston par byedado// gzus kyi rgyu desan/ der dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang/ nyi mas gdungs padang/ grang ba dang/ tshab dang/ ma mo mi dang/ thachen dgarab tu'i
bar byed do// desan der 'jig rten rol mi lta ba'i lhadang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ lham yin dang/ grul bum dang 3 yi dgas dang/ sha dang/ srul po dang/ lus srul po
dang ma dang/ mim yin pa dang/ sman ri dgasadang/ bya ma rus pa/ gtum pa/ sems can rnams lasnying brtse ba med pa dang/ snying rje med par zhugs pa dag dad pa can du 'gyur ro//
sems 'jam par 'gyur ro// dge ba dranapar 'gyur ro// sa tshol ba la 'dod par 'gyur ro// chos srung bar 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro// gzungs
'di'i mthus de na sems can rnams tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// kha dog 'phel bar 'gyur ro// lo tog ba phel bar gyur ro// longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bde ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro// nad
med pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro// grags pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims 'phel bar 'gyur ro// thos pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gtong ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro// byams pa ba phel bar 'gyur
snying rje 'phel bar 'gyug/ shesarab 'phel bar 'gyur ro// thabs 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gzungs 'phel bar 'gyur go/
sa rnam par dpyod pa 'phel bar 'gyug/ rnam par spong ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro// sems can longs su smin par byed pa 'phel bar 'gyur// theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa los su 'phel bar 'gyur/
smon lam gyi khyad par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// sanasasar 'phar ba la yel par 'gyur ro// phung po dang/ khags dang/ skye mched lhag par mthong 'phel bar 'gyur// ngo tsha shes pa dang/ khrel med pa
'phel bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rab tu 'dzin pa 'phel bar 'gyur// phyogs bcu'isangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad rtag par dus su dgongs pa 'phel bar 'gyur//

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo dag la rtag tudage ba'i bshes gnyen yin par 'dzin pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkangangs rnam par rtsa ga 'phel
bar 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa thams cad skye zhing 'phel ba dang/ las 'phel ba dag las kun nas sgrol bar byed do// mya ngan las 'das pa bla na med pa la thug pa'i bar dudage ba'i chos thams cad kyis
nyams par mi 'gyur// yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ tad+yathA/ sngar driti/ na ya bita biSh+Tha tshoti/ a na yA ba ti/ bsgyur brati/ sharanabati/ ma dbra ti/ san tIr brati/ tshadas la bri ti/ sa ra/
brate/ sar pi ra hAre/ sar brata pa ri re/ na yan pa ta/ par share/ bi pi rmi ka/ pa ri re/ yadanya pa ri smar/ bin du/ parihAre/ dzal pa ri t+tAre/ ke tA pa ri hAre/ du kA pa ri de/ sanas pa ri pUr/
srab pad tre'i/ go ma ya bane/mdas la/ sun ya/ pad tra dze me la/ ban de/ ar cha dzA te/ khrar badzAb+he/ nArA paN/ bi dza b+he/ ur ga/ a ni mi 'a/ kun dzar b+heme/ dzahani ma b+he/ karma bi ra le/
shams la le/ khadagoshame/ a siname/ a ni ngad te/ nang gtumare/ bA yo ba/ bzhe/ kan dra bra/ sha kra dkA ye// anAtshubye/ rlazhu ya/ ni le/ trayad d+hu/ bud d+ha/ a d+hiT+Thiti sAhA/

yani/ til ye swAhA/ tsakrakhartakrame sanA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byor byed chu khyil snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bstanAmathag tud nas de'i mod las chen po g.yos par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing

mi da thams cad kyis rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'a khor TisId lhags pa rnams kyang 'dar shig shig ste 'khrugs shing skyo ba skyes nas/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo//
sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes 'phyor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dpal lha mo chen me la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dpal chog shes khyod kyis 'byor byed du khyim snying po zhes bya ba'i
gzusanadi lta bu yin te )de'i mthus rtsod pa dang/ 'thab methams cad rab tu zhi bar byedado// klu khrobodang/ marangs pa thams cad zhi bar byedad// gnod sbyin dang/ mi dang/ mim yin pa dang/
shug/ thar gas dang/ bya khro bo dang/ ma rungs pa thams cad kyang zhi bar byed do// dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang// rims gdus pa dang/ grang ba dang/ tshab dang/ than chen thams cad
rab tu zhibar byed/ lo tog thams cad 'phel zhing 'grub par byedado// sems canarnamasatshe ring bar byed do// longs spyod 'phel bar byed// las 'pha'akha sgrol bar byed pa'i bar du byed do/ mun
tsha las 'das pa bla na med pa la thug pa'i bar du/ dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis nyams par mi 'gyur ro// yengs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro// la la zhig gzungs chen po 'ditan tam/ glog gam/ sgrub par
byedan/ de phyis 'gal ba med pa'i chos dang/ sdom pa gsum 'du gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying posagasol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di'i bdag gis kyang mtshon cha'i

stobs zhes bgyi ba'i gzungasachen po bshad par bgyi'o// mtshon pa'i stobs zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs des sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang yo ngas su spyod pa thams cad kyi ched dusa'i bcud thams cad nyams
par mi 'gyur lags so// yo phas su nyams par mi gyur la gsaso// sa'i bcud kyi mdangs rnams gang gis kyang dbrog par rdzogi thogs lags so// dbugs gdug pa gtong ba na/ bskam par yang rdo
mithogasalags so// sgrub pa dad/ rom mchis par bgyi bar rngo mi thogs lags so// nyams pa dang ma mchis par bgyi ba jomi thogs 'gas go/ dog sa las lo tog gi 'khrung bar bgyi ba radzomi
0thogs lags so// rtsub pa dang romamachis par bgyi bar mi thogs lags so// lo tog gi sa bon dang/ myu gu dang/ 'dab ma dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ 'bru dang/ snyana rnams kyi dad
dbrog par rdzomi thogs 'gasago/ de la dbugs gdug pa gtong ba 'am/ bskam par yang rdzom thogs lags so// rtsub pa 'am/ rom mtshes bar bgyi bar yang dom thogs lags so// ma smin parnayA
ba stsal bar yang rdzom thogs lags so// lhags pa dang/ tsha ba dag gis tshig pa dang/ 'tshul du mi rung bar bgyi bar rjomi thogs lags so// 'tshal ba tsam gyis sems can 'a'a'i lus 'badadugs
gdug pa btang bar rdzogi thogs lags so// gzhi de lta bu las sems can rnams kyis zas 'tshol ba slonanas// lto bro 'tshal ba dang/ yan lag dang/ nying lag bro 'tshal cing 'khums pa la bgyi bar rngo
mithogs lags so// rims nad dang/ bad byed dang/ sems g.yos pa dang/ dran pa nyams par bgyid par rdzomathogs lags so/// phan tshun 'thab mo dang/ dmag bgyid par rdzomi thogs
lags so// kha cig srog gcod pa dang/ mkhyen par len pa la mi sbyor ba nas/ log par lta ba la mi sbyor ba'i bar gyi chos de dag gis sems can rnams kyi sems la sbyor la/ lha dang/ kludang/
gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ grul bum dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ dro bo dang/ yi dgas dang/ sha zadang/ srul po dang/ lus srul po dang/ mi dang/ mim yin pa dag gis kyang/ sems
sha/ can rnams la gnod pa de lta bu dag bgyi bar rngo mi thogs lags so// tad+ya thA/ nAbi/ mahAn bi/ kA ra nA be/ a ping gu nA le/ sangasho Sha Na/ nA ba/ nir dza kha be/
a ba'amuni/ tu ru Na du he/ nar pad tre/ ba drame/ mAsur te/ tir pad te/ khan ni ye/ tsako b+ha se/ ga Na bi mi/ kIti/ to ye swAhA/ ang rAke Any+tsa/ pum ye swAhA/pha 'am
b+he swAhA/namo to yisAyA/rIr/bkram/ AhA/dpal chog shes khyod kyi mtshon cha'i stobs zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po ni di ya nete/ mtshon cha'i stobs zhes bya ba'i gzungs rin po'i mthunesan/ sems
can rnams la de lta bu r rgyas par byed/ bde ba chen po skyed par byed// rgyudes na des sems can rnams myur du 'dul par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po de la
thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lhags pa rnams kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin zhing/ bcom ldan 'das gyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rigs kyi bu leg so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod/
nasemasacan rnams kyi sman yin zhing sems can rnams kyi sman par gyur pa'o// 'di ltar gling bzhi pa 'di'i sems can thams cad kyi 'brudang rtsisman yin zhing/ sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar
byed pa'o// bde bar sbyar ba thams cad sbyin par byed pago/ snying rje chen po kun nas slong ba dang/ tshungs par ldan pa'o// mtshon cha'i stobs zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po shin tu zab pa delta
bu ston pa yine// gzus chen po desan bde nasems can rnams kyi sa'i bcud kyi mdangs dang/ sa bon dang/ myu gu dang/ 'dab ma dang/ me togadang/ ro dang/ 'brudang/ sman rnams mi
nyams shing skyon med la/ 'phel zhing 'byor bar byed do// sems can gang dag gis zos pa de dag gi rgyud la rtsod pa'i rtog pa thams cad zhi bar byed do// 'dir sems can rnams dge ba'i chos thams
cad la spyod par 'gyur ro// gling bzhi pa 'dir dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang/ nyigs gdus pa dang/ tshoTaM dang/ grang ba dang/ char mo che dang/ than chen dang/ slob dang/ nyim dang/ gza' dang//
rgyasar dang/ nyin mtshanadang/ zla ba dang/ blab phyed pa dang/ lo dang/ dus tshegs log pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed do// gzungs chen po bstan pa desan/ 'i dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung
dang: chos kyitshul yun ring duganas par 'gyur ro/gal te 'dir mun pa can skal pa chung ba/ rgyags pa dang drags pas khes shing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/ rgyal rigs gdol pa dang/ blon po gdol
pa dag gis 'di ltar pa'i bstan pa dka' bas bsgrubs pa dang/ nga'i dge slong dang/ dag slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma dag la 'tsho bar byed pa nas/ rgyudasan wu dang/ klu dang/
gnod sbyin dag 'khrug par mi byed pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du sems can rnams labade bar sbyar ba thams cad 'byung ba ni sngar ji skad gsungs pa bzhinano// 'as pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo
ga/ bco lnga pa ri'i sade po'i le'akhas/ thanachenarab tu zhibar byed pa'i mtshon pa ste gsum ba rdzogs so/// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
dpal lha mo namal khadiskad ces bka' stsal to// dpal chog shes sngon de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po togagi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i spyan sngar bdag cag gnyis kyis phan tshunadam bcas pa de bzhin du
bdag cag gnyis kyis bsam pa yongasasu rdzogs shing grub bo// de nas dpal lha mo chen mos 'di skadaces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// btsunapa bde bar gshegs pa de lta

lags te/ 'o skol gyi bsam pa rdzogs legasaso// sngo'o skol gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i spyan sngar phan tshun dam bcas pa bzhin 'di lta'o skol gyi bsam pa yongs su
grub ste/ da lta khyod nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ 'jig rten du byung la/ daltar bdag gisani dpal kyi go 'phang thob pa lags so// daltar bdag gis sems can rnams la sems can yongs su

smin par rngo mi thogs par gyur pa de ci'i sladadu zhen/ bdin ku glang po ni lta bu dang/ gru rta lta bu dang/ klu sbrul lta bu dang/ klu nyalta bu dang/ klu stsal pa lta bu de dag dus 'dir yang sgrub par bgyid lags
so/ bdag gis 'jig rten snang bar byed pa zab mo dag bstan pan/ gangadagag dusam lags pa'i lhags pa dang/ tshob dang/ sngon dang/ khug rna dang/ rjechar dang/ char mo ri dang/ than chenadog
0 'byung bar bgyid pa/ sems can rnams kyi rtog dang/ lam dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ 'bru dang/ sman rnams ma rungs par bgyid pa'i klu dang klu chen po dag ma bskad lags so//
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dus 'dir da ltar gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'din/ krudang/ glachen bo dang/ klu'i 'a khor dang/ skyes pa dang/ budamed dang/ khye'u dang/ bumodang/ gling
bzhi pa 'din ga pa kha gcig gru'i skye gnas pa de dag thams cad da ltar 'dir mchis pa rnams dang/ phyogs bcu'i sas rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo de dag da
ltar 'dus pa chen po 'dir mchis pa rnams dang/ da ltar 'dir lhadang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ dri za dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lha ma yin dang/ lto 'phye dang/ yi dgas dang/ sha za dang/
srul po dang/ lus srul po 'jus pa thamaa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos mi dang/ mi ma yin pa de dag da ltar 'dus pa chen po 'dir chos nyan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis
pa'i sems can de dag thams cad zas pa zhi la rten cing 'tsho bar bgyid lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da lta'i dus su glu khro bo phung bar bgyid pa dag zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ gang dag klu khro bo
rnams ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la mngon par ma dad pas/ rtag par yang sgrub par bgyid pa/ sems can rnams la mtho 'tsham pa/ sems can rnams kyi los spyod dang/ nye bar spyod pa dag
rung bar bgyid pa/ 'jig rten pha rol la mi lta ba/ sems can rnams la snying brtse ba ma mchis shing/ snying rjem mchis par zhugs pa/ sdang ba/ rtsub pa lags te/ bdag sems/
na los su smin par bgyid pa la bar chad bgyid pa lags pas/ de dag gi don du bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rjechen po bskyed du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi sdig pa de dag thams cad
zhibar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan bas kyis/ klu'i gnas na gnas ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ra'i snying po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mA me

mdzad kyi spyan sngar klu yongs su smin par brtson pas smon lam btab pa ni badra zhen sngon dang/ dalta dang/ga 'od pa'i dus kyi klu dang/ klu chen po klu khrobo skye gnas bzhi ba dag dbug gdug pa dang/ klu rnam kyi mig

gdug pa dang/ reg pa gad pa dang/ lceg dug pa dang/ 'dodachag kyi dug dang/ zhe sdang gi dug dang/ gtingul ga dug dang klu khro bo kyi sreg pa'i chos dag gis kyang chos dang ldan pas badzul bar nus par bya'o// ci
nas kyang klu bro ba de dag gis sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang/ nye bar spyod pa dang/ yo byad sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams la gnod par mi 'gyur bar bya'o// dkon mchog gsum po de dag la dadapa/
dang/dang bo dang/ dga' ba thob pa bya'o// 'jig rten pha rolo la lta ba dang bcas shing sdig pa'i chos rnams dang 'bral bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo// de skad ces bka' stsal pa
dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsunapa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gang dag klu khro bo de dag ni gnas der zhugs te mchis//
klu rnam par bskyis pa gi gnas zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gnas par bgyi lags so// ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus bdag gis de dag gi brob dang/ nga rgyal dang/ dregs pa dang/
'dod chags de ngag nye bar zhi bar bgyi lags so// de dag 'jam pa dang/ snod du rung ba dang/ sems zhi bar 'gyur ba dang/ sems 'jig rten pha rol la lta bar 'gyur ba dang/ sems can thams cad l
sems byams pa dang/ snying rje ba dang/ snying brtse ba dang/ sems brtse bcan du 'gyur bar bgyi lags so// klu khro bo dang/ klu ma rungs pa rnamasadad par 'gyur bar bgyi lags so// sems can
thams cad la mi 'tshe zhing snying brtse ba can gyi sems kyi sa la gnas par bgyi lags so// gzhan yang gdag rje dang/ mar mo chudang/ than chen dang/ sbyin dang/ sprin chen dang/ lhags pa dang/
tshapa dag gis gnod par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/ bdag gis ming brjod nus 'di skad du/ ri'i snying po thugs rje rgya che ba/ klu yongs su smin par mdzad pa/ bdag cag dran lags/
so// dran lags ko// blon med pa'i byang chub spyod par mdzad pa/ thabs dang de shes sna tshogs la brtson pas mi spyod lags sam/ bdag cag sdug bsngal las thar par mdzad du gsol//
ga/ yongs su bskyab tugasol zhesats+tshab dag gis 'di skad du brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ stam b+ha b+hudza/ bar b+hu dza/ gog+ha/ biri dzA b+hadza/ mer b+hu dza/ ga dub sgyu dza/
chungahung/ a ne bshudza/ smar b+hu dza/ smar a brtab+hu dze/ nim pa b+hu gtu/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can gang gcigaglu khro bo de dag gis rgyus gnodapa dag gis gnod pa bgyis par gyur pa de

ltabu de dag gis bdag gi ming nas bde pa ra bgyi zhing/ klu khro bo nga rgyal cin dregs pa/ phrag dog dang 'dod chags kyi sems zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ gsang sngags 'don pa na/ bdag gis lha'i rna ba
rnam par dag pa milas 'das pas thes nas/ skye gnas bzhi pa'i klu dang/ klu chen po dang/ glurgan po dang/ klu'i budang/ klu'i 'khor rnams dad par ma bgyis sam/ dus ma lags par donached
[% ]yang la zhugs pa dag/mi bzlog gam/ de'i tshedusam lags pa'i cha'amo mi dang/ than chen dang/ dus ma 'a gas pa'i lhags pa dang/ tshab dang/ rlung dang/ sprin dang/ 'khrug pa dag rab tu
zlazhibar ma bgyis sam/ bdag gis bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis sems can de dag gi bsam ba dag yosasu rdzogs par ma bgyis na/ bdag gis dus gsum gyisangs rgyas bcom ldan
bas thams cad bslus par gyur cig/ bdag nyid kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig// btsun pa bcom ldan s bdag
dgis sngon 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs mar me mdzad 'khor tshogs pa dang bcas pa'i spyan sngar sems can yongs susminapar bgyi ba'i slad du/ smon lam partanapor btab ste/ shin tu gnas pa

gyur lags so// de'i go tu'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag skyed 'tsho zhing gzhes pa la khor tshogs pa dang bcas pa'i spyan sngar smon lam brtan po 'di lta bu dag/
btab ste/ bdag gis der rtag par sems can yongs su sminopar bgyi ba'i slad du/ pha rol gnon pa'i ba na 'grus chen posashinatu brtan par gnas par bgyi'o zhesab rtsonapar bgyis lags so/
daltar bcom ldan 'adasakyi spyan sngar klu khro bo rnams yongs smin par bgyi ba'i sladadartsol ba brtan por bgyis la// bdag gis de lta bu'i rtsol ba brtan pos brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni/ bskal pa
krangs ma mchis par skad cig tsam yang btang ma myong lags so// bdag gis rtagapar pha rol gnon pa'i rtsol ba dang/ brtson pa brtan pos sems can yongs su smin par bkris lags pa
rnams kyang/ yang yongs su smin par bgyi lags so// gzhan yang bdag gis klu'i dbang po dag theg pa chen po'i spyod pa la brtson par bgyis lags te/ klu glang po che rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal/
poshin tu rab gnas 'di dang/ gusbrul rnamasakyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang/ bsnyen dga' bo 'di gnyis dang/ glu d+ha rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa 'di dang/ klu nya rnams kyi/
kya kha dab bo klu'i rgyal bo nu lha dang/ klu sbal pa rnams kyi bdagapo klu'i rgyal po ya de bzas 'di lta ste/ klu de lta bu dag ni sems can rnams la gnod pa bgyid dro thogs pa dag go/

klu'i rgyal po gzhan lta bu de dag kyang/ rang rang gi mthus sems can rnams la de lta bu r gnod pa bgyid rje thogs pa dag go/ 'di lor theg pa chen po la rab tu zhugs pa'i rgyal bo chen po de dag thams cad
kyis kyang/ sos rang rang gi 'khor dang/ dpung gi tshogs rnams dus ma lags par de lta bu r yung ba bsgrubs pas rang rang gi 'khor rnams skyod par bgyid lags so// 'di ltar 'di bam
ldan 'das kyi bstan ba chos sgron ma dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung myur du mi 'chad par bgyi ba'i slad du'o bor der mchis pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri'i snying po klu'i
drang srong la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsal to// de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po shin tu rab gnas stan las langs te/ bcomo ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to//

btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la rten pa'i klu dang/ klu'i bdag po gang dag sgo nga las skye ba dang/ mngal nas skye ba dang/ drod gsher las skye ba dang/ rdzus te skye ba'i klu dedug gang na bcom ldan
'das kyi 'khor nyan thos rnams dang/ 'khor byang chub sems dpa' de dag la phan tshun byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang/ yul 'khor der sha khon ma mchis pa'i sems kyis gnas par 'gyur
lags so// gnod sems ma mchis pa dang/ sems mnyam pas gnas par 'gyur lags so/ gang dag yul 'khor de'i rgyal po de dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la sems shin tu
dpar 'gyur lags so// de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa'ang 'dzin par 'gyur lags so// dbang phyug gis rgyags pa dang/ dregs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'jig par mi
'gyur ba gsaso// dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma dag la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi slad durab tu byung nas/ skakhrug
te gos ngur smrig bgosar/ snod du gyur ba dang/ snod du ma gyur pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa can rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'dzin pa bgyid lags so// gzhan yong yul 'khor te/
na/gangadag mi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa de'i tshor mar gyur pa dedagachos dang ldan pas skyod par bgyid lags so// de nas yul 'khor der dge sbyong dang/ bram ze bsod snyoms la
rnams la sngon gyi rgyal po dag gis sngon lhag pa'i bsam pas sbyin pa phul ba rnams rgyalarigs dge bas 'phrog par mi bgyid la/ rgyal rigs dge ba/ blon po dang/ mdun na 'don dang/
skye bo dmag mi rnams dang bcas pas tshogs sbyor banirin med la brtson pa lags so// seng bo blangs pa lags so// lag brkyang nas lhug par gtong ba lags te/ rgyal rigs dge ba de
g.yu 'khor dang bcas bar bsrung bar bgyi lags so// yongs su bskyang bar bgyi gas so// de'i yul phyogs na/ rtsod pa'i rtog pa thams cad dang/ so so'i 'o kher dag
sngar jid bstan pa bzhin bskrad par bgyi lags so// daci'i slad du zhen/ chos gos ngur smig kha bsgyur ba 'di ni/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lag
wa so/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyal mtshan lags so// mya ngan las 'das par mtshing rnams kyi lam lags so// nyon mos pa rnams kyi ral gri lags so// tshungan las 'das pa/
sa bon lags so// lam las rab tu nyamasapa rnamasakyi sgronam lags so// phung bo rnams kyi smin lags so// ma rig pa'i mun pa'i rlung lags so// ngan 'gro rnams kyi srog shing lags/
[% ]/nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis nyams par gyur ba rnams kyi skyug sman lags so// dgra rnams kyijorjelags so// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi gter logs so// sdig pas gos pa rnams kyi cha lags so//
nos ba bgyis pa rnams kyi mi long lags so// sems g.yeng ba rnamA kyiting 'dzin lags go ting nge 'dzinamAkyizag go lagaso//pha rol tu phyin pa rnamAkyi sa gzhi lags so// gzungs rnams kyi dbu
tshe lags so// bzod pa rnams kyi khyim lags so// sa rnams kyi snodalags so// phas kyi rgol ba rnams kyi mkhar lags so// nad pa rnams kyisnyan gsaso// bslab pa rnams kyi ri lags so//
nyon mongs pas kun nas 'dus pa rnams kyi blob lags go// lto ba ngan par ltung ba rnams kyi kim lags so// ye shes kyi rgyu mtsho lags so// byang chub kyi phyogs pa rnams kyi 'phreng bar gyur pa/
lags so// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bum pa bzang bo lags so// chos gos ngur smig 'dini yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ba lags so// chos gos ngur smrig 'di ni sems can
rnams la chos kyican bab pa'i don gyislad du/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags so// patsunapa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gang dag rgyal rigs gdol bde dag nibcom ldan
'das kyi bstan pa 'jig par bgyid cing/ dge slong dag la mtho'atsham par bgyidapanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dadu rab tu byung ba snod du gyur pa dang/ snod du ma gyur pa'i lus la gnodapa bgyid
pa dang/ nor 'phrog pa dang/ srog gi bar chad dag bgyid pa'i bar du'o// yul 'khor dir gang dag sangs rgyas la dad pa'i lha dang/ kludang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ lham yin dang/ grul
bum dang/ yi dgas mthu bo che de dag thams cad kyang rgyal rigs gdol pa la gshe bar gyur te/ de dag gis de'i yul 'khor du 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ lo shes dang/ nad dang/ pha rol gyi dmag/
tshogs dag 'byung bar bgyid lags so// sa ma lags ba'i char mo che dang/ than chen dang/ lhags pa dang/ tsho ba dang/ rlung dang/ nyi mas gdungs pa dag gis sa bon dang/ myu gu dang/
'dab ma dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ 'bru dang/ sman dang/ ro rnams mi rung bar bgyid kyang/ de na klu rnams la skyon ni ma mchis lags te/ de na klu rnams rgyud/
na grags pa ma lags pas ni gos par 'gyur lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dper bgyin/ yul gyi dudamed bzang mos sras ngan pa 'tshal na/ dbugs dri mi 'da' bar 'gyur yogs go/
dbazhin du rgyal rigs gdol pas kyang rgyal rigs kyi chos rnams spangs nas/ dmas rigs kyi chos rnams spyod pa bgyidan yul phyogs thams cad srung ba'i lha nas/ yi dgas mthubo dag gi
bar du khros par 'gyur te/ de dag gis yul 'khor ma rung bar bgyid la/ klu dang/ kuchen po rnams grags pa ma lags pas kyang gos par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'asul
pa/ klu'i bdag po rgyal bo rnams rgyal po'i bslab pa'i gzhi gnas par bstanapa di dang de dag mtho ris dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la brtson pa yin no// gang dag rgyal rigs gdol pa rgyal
rigs kyi bslab pa la mi gnas pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa'i bar la gzhol ba yin no// klu'i bdag mo rang gi 'khor bslab pa las mi 'da' bar bstan pa des na/ dedagad ltar
dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus su da'i bstan ba dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung med par mi byed par 'gyur// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lhalags s// btsun pa bde bor
0 gshegs bde lta 'gas go/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das yul 'a khor gang dang gangadad/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ ri brags kyi gnas yul pa khoraden/ bcom ldan
'dus kyi na thos tshul khrims dang ldan zhing thos pa mang po sbyin gnas de lta bu dag ba shing mchis pa de bdag gi 'khor gang dag dang/ gru mo dang/ klu rgan po dang/ klu rgan mo dang/ klu'i bu/
dang/ klu'i bu mo dang/ klu'i 'a khor dang/ klu'i 'khor mo rnams dang/ dus ma lags par rdzi charadang/ ser drag dang/ mar motshadang/ than chen dag gtong bar bgyid dom/ lhags mo che dang/ shin tu
tsha ba dang/ nyi mas gdungs pa dag 'byung ba bgyid dam/ sems can rnams kyi lo tog dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ 'bru dang/ sman kyi ro dang/ longs spyod dang/ yongs su spyod pa dgar ba
batshal bar bgyidan/ klu de dag gis bodago cag bsus pas/ de'i lus thams cad la khums par 'gyur ro// de dag rdzu 'phrul dang bral nas 'gro mi nus par gyur cig/ rims nad kyis gdungs
par gyur cig/ longs spyod thams dang bral bar gyur cig/ slobs pa med par gyur cig/ don byed mi nus par gyur cig ces mnas bsgog por bgyig/ tad+yathA/ nA ga tsA dungashe/
nu ga men/ nAgad+har klu sgyu/ dzal glusgyu/ Arimur ge/ sa sro mu khe/ kal ti pu se/ nAg stamaN+Ti/ dza ya ba pha le/ bi mu shag kyis/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'a khor gyis de nyid du
legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nyid kyi tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams shugs drag bon 'khrugs shing sngangs par gyur to// de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang/ bsnyen
dga' bo gnyis stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das daltaradung ma 'ongs pa'i dus su/ rgyal rigs
tsha gdol pa de dag gzhan la sbyin par ma dad cing/ bdag nyid longs spyod par 'tshal la/ 'jungs pa longs spyod la sems kun tu 'dzin cing lag mi skyong bas/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ bkren pa/
dang/ la phongs pa dang/ 'gren pa slong ba rnams kun nas tshim par mi bgyid lags so// bo srung 'khor dang/ ljongs kyi mi dang/ 'khor rnams yang dag pa'i bde bas tshim par mi bgyid lags so//

rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag la yul phyogs srung ba'i lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ lham yin dang/ grul bum dang/ yi dgas mthu bo che de dag thams cad kyang khros par gyur te/ dedag gi sa la

'khor du 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ mu ge dang/ nad dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dag kun tu 'byung bar bgyid lags so// 'bru dang sman gyi bar gyi ro rnams ma rung par bgyid kyang/ den klu dang/ klu chen/
po rnams la skyen ni ma mchis lags te/ de na klu rnams rgyu des na grags pa ma lags pas ni gos par 'gyur lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dper bgyin/ phyis khung gi dri gi 'da'o ba bser mas/
khatshul na/ drimi bda' bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyal rigs gdol pa brnab mos kyang yul phyogs thams cad srung ba dag khros par gyur te/ yul 'khor de ma rung bar bgyid
lags so// klu rnams kyang grags pa ma lags pas gos par 'gyur lags so/// bam po gsum pa ste tha ma'o// yang na kru thams cad bdag gis

bslab pa las mi 'da' bar bdag gis lung dbrog par bgyi ste/ yul 'khor gang dang gang dag na grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ ri brags kyi gnas yul 'khor de na/ da lta dang ma
'ongs pa'i dus su/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos tshul khrims dang ldan zhing/ thos pa mang po sbyin gnas de lta bu dag gnas shing mchis pa der/ bdag gi 'khor gang dag klu dang/ klu mo dang/ klu rgan

po dang klu rgan mo dang/ klu'i bu dang/ klu'i bu mo dang/ klu'i 'khor dang/ klu'i 'khor mo sgengolas skye ba dang/ mngal nas skye ba dang/ drod gsher las skye ba dang/ rdzus te skye ba dag dus ma lags
par rje mar dang/ ser drag dang/ mar ma ni dang/ than chen dag gtong bar bgyid dam/ lcags mo che dang/ shin tu tshab dang/ nyi mas gdungs pa dag 'byung par bgyid dam/ sems can rnams kyi
lo tog dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ 'bru dang/ sman dang/ ro dang/ longs spyod dang/ yongs su spyod pa dag ma 'tshal bar bgyid na/ klu de dag gis bdag bslus pas/ de'i lus thams
cad 'khunas par gyur cig/ de dag rdzu 'phrul dang bral nas 'gro mi nus par gyur cig/ rims nad kyis gdungs par gyur cig/ longs spyod thams cad dang bral bar gyur cika
slebs pa med par gyur cig/ don byed mi nus par gyur cig ces mnas bsgrug par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ kar Na grume/ kun b+harake/ bar ma gu Ni/ A ka lake/ bshane/ bi ram gake/ nab ri/
a ta sa le/ nayan tum ste/ kA la ka she/ nung gu pra de/ gnad+har pa se sa// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des lags so zhes bgyi ba stsal lags so// de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa
zhes bya ba nas/ sngar ji skad gsus pa'i bar du'o// tad+ya thA nAmab+hishe/ A no ke/ na ba kun dza b+ha ke/ kha ga ba'i la/ sar khron shu/ pA pA yas le/ nArA ya na bu Ne/ baneste le/ dasha kras/

u kru d+hazhese/ u nas ba sAhA/ klu'i rgyal po chu lha zhes bya ba sa/ sngar ji skad gsungs pa'i bar du'o// tad+ya thA/ him phe me/ ba li ki Na gu tse/ raN bin du drin/ tsAr ka d+ha re/ me gsang kra me/ bya du
kesho dru mo de/ mAye tun kus/ tsar mahi// tsa lang g+ha/ nAnAdad te/ ka'u ka tu le sAya/ sngar ji skad gsungs pa'i bar du'o// de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po yidi bzas stan las langs te/bcom ldan
bdas ga la ba de logasasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la rten pa'i klu dang/ klu chen po de dag ni sgo nga las skye ba dang/ mngal nas skye ba dang
drod gsher las skye ba dang/ rdzus te skye ba dag lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus su rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag gis rgyal rigs kyi chos srungs nas/ dmas rigs/
kyi chos rnams sprodapar bgyid do/ sems can dmyal ba mnar ma mchis pa'i bar dag la gzhol lags so// rgyal rigos gdol pa de dag gi skyon gyis klu rnams mnos bzhin du grags pa ma lags
pas gos par 'gyur lags so// rgyu des na klu rnams las kyi sgrib pa dag par bgyid par 'gyur lags so// de lta lags pas bdag cag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la bkur sti bgyi zhing
gzung bar bgyi// dpe'abagyin/ 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po des yul gyi pud med bzang mo khrus legs par bgyis te/ spos kyis khyogasanas/ gos mchog tu bzang ba bskon te/ yan lag gi
dam pa mgo la rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'i 'phring ba mang po dag brtags shing dpung rgyan dang/ ser skud dang/ sor gdub dang/ log rgyan dang/ rkang rgyan dag gis brgyananas/ glang po che'i
bzhon pa la zhon te/ 'khor phal mo che dang lhan cig khrid pa de bzhin du/ da ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag cag klu rnams dud 'gro'i skye gnas sa
bsdus pa lus na snad ma nyams la/ mchog tu grob dang/ nga rgyal dang/ dregs pa'i dri masaM bsgos pa bdag cag klu thams cad rgyags pas myos pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rjes bkris lags so//
bla// bdag cag la ngo tsha shes pa dang/ khrel yod pa 'i gos bskonalags so// byang chub kyi phyogs su cu rtsa bdun gyi 'phreng bas bcings lags so// bdag cag gi sems
dang/ yide dang/ rnam par shes pa dag bzod pa dang/ gzus dang/ sa rnam pa snatshogs kyis legs par brgyan la gsaso// theg pa chen po'i shing rta dag gis bteg lags so// gang na sangs
rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang bral ba shin tu yongs su dag par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs yongs su dag pasabaskor sa/ theg pa chenapo'i chos kyi gtam da
ston pa der bdag nub mi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ daltar bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la bkur sti bgyid cing 'dzin par bgyid lags so// de lta lags pas bdag cag
'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la shin tu gnas par bgyid lags so// grong dang/ grong khyen dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ ri brags kyi gnas gang dang gangan/ sems
cananyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang/ rangasangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang theg pa chen po ba dag khyim na gnas pa 'am/ rab tu byung ba 'am/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am/ tshul khrims brtul pa 'am/
thos pa mang ba'am/ thos pa nyung ba 'am/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa 'am/ le lo cananam/ mnyam par gzhag pa 'amaM/ mnyam par mgazhag pa 'tshe/ dran pa dang ldan pa dang/ dran pa/
pa rnams bcom ldan 'das dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun dang/ 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims dag la dga' zhing/ dad pa dang/ bkur sti dang/ bla mar bgyid pa dang/ rimibagyid/
pa dang/ byang chub rnam gsum gang yang rung ba dag la rab tu zhugs pa// bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos sbyin bas de lta bu dag gnas shange gnyis ba de dang dur bdag cag yid kyis dga' shing dadang/
dang/ bkur sti dang/ bla mar bgyi ba dang/ ri mo dag gis gnas par bgyi lags so// yul 'khor de dang/ de'i grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ltos dang/ ri brag der bdag gi 'khog

klu dang/ klu mo dang/ klu rgan po dang/ klu rgan modang klu'i bu dang/ klu'i bu modang/ klu'i 'a khor dang/ klu'i ba 'or mo dag dus ma 'gas par ji char dang/ ser drag dang/ mar mo chudang/ than chen dag gtong bar bgyid

yaM lhagrumo che dang/ shinatutsho ba dag 'byung bar bgyid dam sems can mAl lo tog dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu dang/ 'bru dang/ sman gyi ro dang/ longs spyod dang/ yongs su spyod pa dag mag 'tshal/
bar bgyid na/ klu de dag gis bdag bslus pas/ de dag thams cad kyi lus 'khums par gyur cig/ de dgardzu 'phrul nyams nas 'gro mi nus par gyur cig/ ramasand kyis kun tu gdungs
par gyur cig/ dbang po thams cad tshong b.ram gyur cig/ longs spyodadang/ yongs su spyod pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ las byed ma nus par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ bud ng+ha dza ye/
bA lha ke/ a ma ni me/ b+hu tas la le/ a na mad d+he/ phrad bya ni'i/ a ban la me/ khi la shame/ nasku pi pAle/ jis jihi/ skan d+hapA le/ b+ha Nan/ kri ye swA/
) der thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams bzhin dang/ mig yid du 'ong bas shin tu dgod cing thal mo sbyar nas/ legs so zhes bya ba byinato/ 'di skad du/ skyes bu sa po khyod/
tsha sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa yin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar bya bani legs so legs so zhes smras nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i klu'i 'khor dodag shugs drags pos
'khrugs shing sngas la kun tu 'gal zhing mngon par mi dga' ba dang/ kun tu 'khor bar gyur to// de'i tshodri za'i drang srong dga' bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba stan las las te/ bcom ldan 'das
ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'a khor dang bcas pa bdag la dgongs su gsol/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus su gang dag
rgyal rigs gdol pa blun po mkhas so snyam pa'i nga rgyal can 3 nga rgyal dang rgyags pas nyams pa/ 'jig rten pha rol la mi lta ba/ g.yo sgyu can/ snying rjem mnyis pa/ dge slong la mtho 'tsham
! par bgyid pa nas/ thani bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du skyabs su mchis nas nye bar gnas pa/ skra bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos pa la mtho 'tsham pa dag 'byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du rab
tu byung ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung 'bar bar bgyid pa dag la mtho 'tsham pa'i rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis mnas
bsgag par bgyibani/ longs spyod kyis 'khrugs par gyur cig/ rgyal phran gyis 'khrugs par gyur cig/ rgyal bos 'khrugs par gyur cig/ nang dmag dang/ pha rol kyi dmag tshogs dag gis
'khrugs par gyur cig/ mu med pas 'khrugs par gyur cig/ nad kyis 'khrugs par gyur cig/ gzas 'khrugs par gyur cig/ bya ma rtas 'khrugs par gyur cig/ rtse dgas 'khrugs
par gyur cig/ pha tshanagyis 'khrugs par gyur cig/ 'khor gyis 'khrugs par gyur cig/ 'byung ba chen pos 'khrugs par gyur cig/ yi dogs mthubo ches 'khrugs par gyur cig ces bgyi ba/
nas/ rgyalarigs 'khrugs par gyur cig/ bram ze dang/ dmas rigs dang/ bud med dang/ seng ge dang/ stag dang/ spyang ki dag gis 'khrugs par gyur cig ces bgyi ba'i bar du rgyal
gis gdong pa de dag mnas bsgag par bgyi lags so// tad+ya thA/ pa ne ya pa na pa le/ mahAportan khri/ dru matsati/ ku sum/ b.raTe/ yukate/ sam b+hA ke/ b+himadrib ke/ su lo pan ya// pa
ri bla ri/ b+hu ma du/ ka me/ ni'i tshan tan/ dzas la/ men tre'i/ be'i ma pa ta/ mthA khAdze/ na ye na/ hing ku le/ pa bad tsha/ bIsi// d+han mu tse/ sang go ke/ pal min d+ha dal/ b+hu mi pa'e/
ca bya/ 1rom da le/ ban ga dze 1 tu 'apaTe/ A ba ta zla/ na la driny+tsi/ dzihAkran/ u ta ru ke/ gan d+har b+he/ si misAhA/ gang dag rgyal rigs gdol pa 'jig rten pa rol la mi lta zhing/
ha bcom ldan 'das kyi shanathos rnams la mtho 'tsham pa de dag de ltar gyur cig/ de'i tshathams cad dang ldan pa'i driza'i 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la
mtho 'tsham par bgyid pa'i rgyal rigs gdo' pa de dag la/ bdag cag ci dgar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ bdag cag dang rang gi gnas na red mo la chags shing yongs su spyod par bgyid dam/ dga'
skyid nyams su myong bar bgyid na/ bdag cag kyang mna'i khongs su gtogs par gyur cig/ de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa 'khor nyid lhags pa rnams kyis lags so zhes bya ba byin no//
de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar babatud nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang

ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam par phye ba mngon par shes pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi srog shing zhes bya ba'i gzus kyi sgo chen po bshad par bgyi ste/ rgyal mtshan gyi srog shing zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po'i
sgo gang gi rna lam du grag pa de'i rna ba'i nad dgarab tu zhi bar bgyid do// de'i 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug la sogs pa nyon mongs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyid do// gal tenab/

srabusu par 'gyur ro// rgya mtsho'i shun po man dzan la gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ rgyal rigs kyi rnga la bltas nas// rnga de'i sgra gang dang gang gi rje rnalam du grags pa/
de dang de'i 'dod gos dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug la sogs pa nyon mongs pa rnams srabs par 'gyur ro// de dang de dag bcom ldan 'dis kyi bstan pa la shin tu dka' zhing bkur sti dang//
bla mar byed pa dang/ ri mor byed pa dag rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// chos kyi rjes su 'brang bas 'jug par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pha rol lta ba dang/ longs spyod dang/ yongs su spyod pa dang mi/
'bral la/ sems can thams cad kyi mgatu 'ong ba dang/ snying du sdug par 'gyuro// tad+yathA/ pUrba ma g+ho/ A ma la ma ti/ kr-idatil/ blub/ pan khan Di'i dud ma khe lo'i/ mdas tul/

go'ur san lho'i na kA ba ra me'i/ bud+d+hA ri 'i pong ga le'i g+hi me/ lo hita ra bi/ nang ga la sUr+ya/ b+ha ga b.riNe/ an jur pa u ra/ ka ra byungo/ kesha lo ti/ sam b+haM/ b+hu b+haM swAhA/ de nas de nyid du
bcom ldan 'das kyiso legs so zhes byab gnang ngo// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khorades kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pas/
'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung dbyas dang sgra rjod par bgyid pa/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam gyi tshul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po
[f ]@#// bshad par 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bdag la rjes su yi rang bar mdzad du gsol/ den mthu che zhing stobs che la pha rel
sa gnon pa snang bar bgyid pachen po lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams kyi thos pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gter dang/ ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gter du 'gyur ba
lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan bs kyi slad du/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sdom pa la gnas pa 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang/ dge sbyong gi sdom pa dang/ bsnyen par

rdzogs pa'i sdom pa la gnas pa snod du gyur pa dang/ snod dum gyur pa dag gi gdugadad rgyal mtshan gyi smonalan gyi tshul zhes bgyi ba'i gzung chen po bde lhag mthong gi sbyor bas nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du klog
yaM na phyir zhing nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag la rtogs par 'gyur ro// nyin mtshan bdun 'dasanas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po 'an 'bum snyad du yang
dang yang dran par bgyid pa de ni/ rgyal rigs rnams dang/ bram ze'i rigs rnams dang/ rje'u rigs rnams dang/ dmas rigs rnams dadapar bgyid pa nas/ sems can thams cad kyi
bar du shin tumangon par dad par bgyid pa lags so// thams cad longs spyod pa dang/ yongs su spyod pa rgya chen po mchog dang mi 'bral zhing/ mtho desal gzhol bar 'gyur pa lags so//
desas rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur lags so// tad+ya thA/ triN sang nyika/ pi dri Na bi ma ba/ ka ra pa ke/ b+hu ta sA me tsa/ pa ra dza me/ a b+hakA/
atu ya lo be/ a cad ma/ ni mi re/ shrI ta bistar/ ang gu dza dz+had she/ jidza ranosI'i an gshud d+he/ mo gash+lo ke/ ku la ba te/ ma gdAbA/ kye g+ho 'u ba swA'i/ a b+hI te me sgyur/ swa ra 'dza//
rma timanasAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam gyi tshul zhes bya
ba'i gzungs chen po 'di bshad pas/ sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi thos pa'i mig kun tu ston par byed la/ nga'i bstan pa'ang ston par byed pa ni legaso legs so// de nas de nyid du thams cad
dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te 'di skad du/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyismon
lam zhes bya ba'i gzusachenapo 'di rdzogs bar bshad pas/ de ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus su theg pa chen gol yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems canade dag thams cad kyi thos pa mang po'i tshogs
rgyas par byed pa dang/ rton pa ni skyes bu dam page gas so legs so// de'i tshe 'jam dpalo gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs to/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar pa grwacud nas
'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gling bzhi pa'adi'i me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ shing dang/ 'bru dang/ lcan dang/ lo tog dag
bsrung bar 'tshal lo// sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang/ yongs su spyod pa dang/ rtswa dang/ 'dab ma dang/ lo ma sa la rten pa rnams bsrung bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das nang gudapa la rdul

zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po de da ltar 'dir gling bzhi pa de dag gis sngonam thos ma mthong bas 'di ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung bar gyur te/ 'dus pa chen bo de lta bu dag byung bar bgyis lags so//
nang gu dang 'a rngul zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'dini mthu che bas lo tog thams cad 'phel bar bgyid pa lags so// sa bon dang/ myu gu dang/ sdong bu dang/ 'dab ma dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras/
budang/ shing dang/ 'bru dang/ sman dang/ ro rnams skyed par bgyid pa dang/ 'phel bar bgyid pa dang/ snum mchis par bgyid pa dang/ 'jam pa bgyid pa dang/ mang por bgyid pa lags so//
sems can thams nyid dad par bgyid pa dang/ tshul khrims can du bgyid pa dang/ thos par bgyid pa dang/ shis par bgyid pa dang/ byams pa dang/ snying rjecan du bgyid pa dang/ thabs dang ldan
par bgyid pa nas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du ston par bgyidapa lags so// tad+ya thA/ an nu b+hU mi/ grwa pA kA b+haM dza/ gu la tsa lo mi/ phaT kA lo me/ shriyAkA/ ku su me/
nab kumun ke/ rwa dza bar me/ tshuT na ba/ ba ma Te/ ba shu lang ge/ a ba b+hasu ne/ myus ga d+ha ke/ lo ma b+hu dza ke/ gam d+haM ra/ ba sume/ anom yang// sa re/ pa lA sha ye sa/ btsun pa

bcom ldan 'dasaneng gu dang la rngul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags de sgreng bar bgyid dam/ skad chen por klog gam/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di chu la lan stong gi bar
du bzlas brjodabagyis nas/ zhing dang/ shing dang/ lo tog sna tshogs la gtor tam/ rje dang/ dza dradang/ dung dag la bsngags nas// de dag gi sgra gang du thos pa'i lo ma dang/ ma tig dang/
'bras bu dang/ 'bru dang/ sman gyi ro dang/ na la rten pa'i lo tog thams cad sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa'i rgyu las ma gtogs par/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ yi
dgas mthu bo che dang/ bdud dang/ bdud kyi bu dang/ bdud kyi 'khor gyi tshogs gang gis kyang gnod par bgyi ba 'ame/ chud gsanapa 'am/ tshig par bgyi ba 'am/ bskam pa 'am/ mdas
'phrog pa 'am/ mthu chung bar bgyi ba bam/ mamachis par bgyi ba dag tu rdzas thogs na/ sems canadang/ sems can gyi gras su gtogs pa gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ denas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rigs kyi bu khyod gling bzhi pa 'dir sbyin pa chen po'i dpal gyi shing rta la zhon nas/ rigs kyi bu 'dir bu
na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam du sems can dpag tu med pa rnams rton par byed pa ni/ rigs kyi bu khyod legs so legs so// de nas de nyid du byung chub sems dpa'i
'khor thams cad kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byinate/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bya ba'i legs so legs so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
'tsha chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis// byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces skyas so// byams pa khyod la bdag gis dpal me tog gsarapa zhes bya ba gzusachen po sbyin
gyis/ gakhrusachen po des na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byams pa chen po'i go bgos nas/ 'dir sems can rnams la tshig gis chos stonan/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs bskyod
pa'i tshes de dag sems can gang dag gis thos pa ni sdig pa'i sems dang/ sdig pa'i lta ba dag spong bar byed do// sdig pa'i grogs po dang/ sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dag spong bar byed do//
sems kyis byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yid la byed par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang/ sems 'jig rten pha ro'agal lta ba can du 'gyur ro//
sems ma dege ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag las ldog par 'gyu'o// sems dge babacu'i las kyi lam dag la rnam par gnas par 'gyur// sems sems can thams cad la mngon par dga'
bar 'gyur ro// gzungs chenapo 'di ni sems can thums cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir/ chos kyi char 'bebs par byed pa'o// ragu bcom pa thams cad rab tudad
par byed cing/ bshes gnyen thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa 'o// tad+ya thA/ lib tu sngare/ kAshA ya// bar me/ sa me bag lhe/ drurang ga dzale/ su to// sumahA kare/ su habung
gu/ go'u ab le ka da le/ sid+d+hi b+hi ba ke/ rdzu nan pa bar/ a ba nid+ma lung de/ so so re tsal/ ab b+has ra/ b.rAya// shad tre e kahad toyi/ samA d+hikaraNe/ bA la dza ba ti/ mah+phad du tu ku
se rtswa a ra Nani'i/ mA lA ma sha mi ni la ku sum sAhA/ dpal me tog gsar pa zhes bya pa'i gzungs 'di'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyed kyis byams pa chen po'i go bgos
nas sems can rnams 'chos ston na/ de'i sgra than sems can srog rlags su gyur pa phra mo nud du gang dag gi rna lam du grags pa de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa nye bar zhi bar byed pa dang/ de dag gi sems
dge ba'i tshu 'ganas par 'gyuran/ mir gyurang rnams la lta ci smos kyang ci dgos/ sems can la la dag gis tshor dbab pa'i phyir/ dri za dang klu'i gnas dag tu gzungs chen po 'di bzlas/
brjod byas te/ na le sham gyi phyi ma dang/ o ran da'i mar du bsres pa la des lan stong du bsngags nas/ gos kyi mtha' mar phur ma byas te khron por bcug na/ desan de la klu rnams dga'
bla// bar 'gyur te/ char gyi rgyan chen po'ang 'bebs par byed do// de'i tshe yul de'adus pa'i glu dang/ klu chen po rnams kyis dpal me tog gsar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po
'di thos nas/ semasaras pa dang/ sdang sems med pa dang/ sems rab tu dga' ba dang/ sems byams pa dang ldan pa dang/ sems 'jig rten pha rol la lta bar gnas par gyur to// sems
dkon mchog gsum la dad cing/ bkur sti dang/ blo mar byed ba dang/ ri mor byed pa dag thob bar gyur to// sems dud 'gror skye ba'i rang gi sdig pa'i las dag rab tu 'chags pa dang/ sems
theg pa chen po bla na med pa la 'jug par gnas par gyur to// klu dang/ klu chen pod dag thams cad kyi nang nas mthu ci yod pa dang/ shi nus pa dag gis// denabcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/

tsho kha cig ni gser mang po'i char mngon par 'debs so// kha cig ni de la dang/ a ka ru dang/ rgyasos dang/ gor shi sha dang/ tsan danasngal gyi snying po'i phye ma dang/ tum la'i lo ma'i char dag mngon/
par 'bebs pa nas/ khacig na ut+paladang/ me tog sna tshogs dang/ sa bcos dusna tshogs dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bo dan sna tshogs dang/ gser skud dang/ mutig gi dol la
gyi bar dag gichar mngon par 'bebasaso// de nas klu dang/ kluchen po de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ tshig mthun por 'di skadaces gsol to/
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar bdag cag ni dkon mchog gsum la sems shin tu legs par rab tu zhugs pa lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag cag 'di rnams kyis dam/
banub bar bgyi bani/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs gang dang gang dag na/ dpal me tog gsar pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chenapo 'di rang du sgrogs pa

dang ! de bzhin du gzungs lhagamachu khyim snying po zhes bgyi ba dang/ mtshonama'i stobs zhes bgyi ba dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam gyi tshul zhes bgyi ba dang/ nang gu dpal sprul zhes bgyi ba/
dang/ nga la me tog gsar pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po rnams dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhis bshad pa'i gzungs de dag dang/ klu'i snying po bzhi po dag/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grol rnal ngang/
ljongs dang/ ri brags kyi gnas gang dang gang dag tureser tsam yang ston tan/ brgyad dram/ rab tu sgrogs pas/ dran par bgyid pa de dang de dag tubadag cag gis dus dus su char dbab pa dang//
gdugs dang bser ma dug gtang bar bgyi/dus ma lags par ni ma lags so// de dang des bdag cag gis phyir dgra dang/ nang 'a khrug dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ gnod sems dang/ nad/
dang/ mings dang/ mu ge dag rab tu zhi bar bgyi lags so// de dang der bdag cag gis skyid pa dang/ lo legs pa dang/ dga' bar 'gyur ba dag bsgrub par bgyi lags so// de dang der sems
bya// tsana rnams kyis bon dang/ myu gu dang/ sdong bu dang/ 'dab ma dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ shing dang ! 'bru dang/ sman dang/ ngo dag mi nyams par 'phel
bar bgyi lags so// longs spyod dang/ yongs su spyod pa phal che zhing/ dri zhim pa dang/ ro zhim pa dang/ snapa dang/ 'jam pa dag tu bsgrub par bgyi lags so// bdag cag gis 'dzam bu
gling 'di'i rgyal po rnams kyang gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems dang/ phan pa'i sems dang/ khonam mchis pa'i sems dang/ rtsodapa ma mchis pa'i semasasu bsgrub par bgyi lags so// de bzhin du/
bram ze'i rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs dang/ gnod sbyin rnams nas/ dge bsnyen dag gi bar dag tubyams pa'i sems dang ldan par bsgrub por bgyilags so// gang na gzung
chen po 'dirab tu sgrogs pa der ni phan tshun sems 'thun par bsgrub par bgyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu de dag thams cad la legs so legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo// thams
cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no// den byang chub sems dpa' ri'i snying pos kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'dus kyis//
dpal lha monan mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dpal cho ga shes khyod la snying brtse ba'i grogs 'di dag yodan/ 'dir sems can yongs su sminapar bya ba'i phyir/ da dung du ci'i phyir gdul
pa'i tshogs rnams gzhug par ma nus/ dpal lha mo chen mos gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ smon lam gyi khyad par gyis sas rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan

pa'i thatshad du de lta bu r skyob len cing/ grogs dgaba'i bshes gnyen 'thun pa de lta bu dag dang phrad pa thob lags so// de ltar bdag kyang grogs dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'thun pa khyod lta bu dang phrad pa
'gasas// ban med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang de'i lag tu thob ste/ de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang brjod par bgyi lags so// byang nubasems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes
gnyen gyis yos su zin pa/ brtson 'grus btsums pa ni/ thams cad mkhyenapa'i ye shes la shin tuganas par blta bar bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dpal mo/
ga shes khyod kyis ji skadas pa de ltar yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ smon lam gyi khyad par gyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa thams cad du de lta bu r skyob len la/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag la brtson zhing/ der brtson pa brtan pa dang/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no// grogs dge
ba'i bshes gnyenade lta bu s yongs su zin pa yin no// rnam pa thoms cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de'i lag tu thob pa yin te/ de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par yang brjod par
[9]@#// bya'o// des rnam par gnonApa'ang brjed par bya'o// mngal gyi skyon las thar par yang brjod par bya'o// mi slob pa'i sa la gnas pas zag pa zad par yang brjod par
bya'o desangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis dgongs pa dang/ byin gyis brlabs par ya nga brjod par bya'o// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la shin tu gnas par yang brjod par bya'o/
de nas brgya byin gzi brjid dri ma med babcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ni'i slad du 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten
'dir klu dang/ klu chen po rnams sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang/ yongs su spyod pa dag la gnod par bgyid lags/ bkagasal pa/ lha'i dbang po rgyudang rkyenaganyis kyis 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten
'dir klu dang/ klu chen po rnams sems can rnams kyi lo sa spyod dang/ yongs su spyod pa dag la gnod par byed do// gnyis gang zhen/ 'dod chags kyi dbang dang/ khro ba'i dpang gis dus ma yin
pa'i sprin dug 'byung bar byed cing/ rdzimar dang ser drag dag 'bebs par byed do// lhags pa dang ma bdag 'byung bar byed do// des na 'dir sems can rnams su bon dang/ myu gu dang/ 'dab
ma dang/ me tog dong/ 'bras bu dang/ 'bru dang/ sman dang/ ro dag tshig par byed do// skems par byed de// 'bul bar byed do// ma rung bar byed do// des na sems can rnams longs
spyod dang/ yos su spyod pa dang mi ldan pas lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi sdig pa'i las mi bzad pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag kun tu spyod par byed do// las kyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa des na ston
deg ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa thams cad kyang sreg par byed do// sems par byedo// thal bar rlog par byed do// dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag spong zhing/ ngan song gsum po dag la gzhol bar byed de/

kha cig gos dang/ bza' ba dang/ btung ba tsam gyi phyiratshe gcig gis de lta bu r sdig pa'i las mtshams med pa dag gi bar du kun tu spyod par byed de/ de dag bskal pa mang bo zhig gi bar du phyir mir skye ba
thob par mi 'gyur ro// gal te de dag yun ring po 'das nas brgyal brgyalam na mi'i lus thob na'ang kha cig ni yun lag nyams par 'gyur ro// kha cig ni dran pa nyams par 'gyur ro// gdol pa'i
rigs su'ang skye bar 'gyur ro// g.yung po'i rigs dang/ smig ma mkhan gyi rigs dang/ bkren pa dbul po'i rigs rnams su'ang khyu bar 'gyur ro// bza' ba dang/ btung ba'i los spyod dang/

yongs su spyod pa dag dang yang bral bar 'gyur la/ yang rgyu des na dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bralanas/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi las kyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa dag kun tu spyod par byed do// yang kha
cig nganasengo gsum po dang/ mnar med pa dag tu'ang gzhol bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar longs spyod dang 3 nye bar spyod pa dang mi ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'khor bar yun ring du nyam thag par
'gyur ro// ngan song gsum po dag tu sdug bsngal mi bzad pa sna tshogs dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ sdug bsngal gang drung brad na byung ba thams cad nizas
dkyi rkyen las gyur pa lags te/ zas ma mchis na sdug bsngal 'byung ba'ang ma mchis lags so// de nas de'i tshe brgya byin gzi brjid dri ma med pas tshigasasu bcad de 'di skad ces gsol to// sred
pa'i dug gis bsgyur bas na/ du ba dang ni dgod par bgyid// nyi bar gnas shing ltung bar bgyid// kun tu spyod cing rnam par rgyug/ sa gzhi dag la til brdungs ltar// sdug bsngal 'khrul
'khor gnod par bgyid// lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad la// de ltar sred pas gnod par bgyid// kye ma sridapa'i zhags pa yi// srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthor gtugs pas// de ltar zhags
'di rgya che ba// kha zas dag gi rgyu las byung// so so'i skye bo rgyu gnyis kyis// srid pa'i rdul gyis yan lag bcings// ri dgas zhags pas bcings pa ltar// 'bros pa dag tunus ma/
lags// lhar bcas 'jig rten sems can dag/ srid pas gar bgyid rtsol ba ltar// garazhung dag la gar mkhan rgyas// de ni gar bgyid rtsol mi nus// sred pa'i dug gis bsgyur bas na//
ji ltar skye bo myos pa ltar// btung ba chos bgyid bslad pa yis// myos pa dag tu mi bgyid do// sride pa'i gnod sbyin gdon dag gis// skye bo rnams nas 'khyal pa ltar// 'byungopo'i gdon
gyis smos pa dag/ 'khyal pa dag tu mi bgyid do// nor 'dzin de dag 'dzin pa btang// srid pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par spangs// gangagis sred pa bsams nas kyang/ de dag 'khor bar mi/
gnas so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// zhesdang khro bas skye dgu badrams// segs kyang g.yengs 'gyur de yisan// dge ba thams
chud mi 'tshal zhing// bzod brlag las la spyod par bgyid/ mi dge ba la gnas bgyid pa// pha ma dag la rim gro chung// gang dag mtshams ma mchis bgyis pa// dkon mchog gsum la banas
par bgyid// snying brtse snying rjem mchis pa// 'jigs bgyid gtum po drag shul can// khro sems dbang gis de dag ni// sems dmyal mnar ma mchis par gnas// se mas can 'di dag
khro ba'i rgyas// gcig la gcig ni za bar bgyid// yang dang yang ni ngan song du// sdug bsngal du mas rab tu gzir// sdig pa'i sems kyis brid gyur cing// dge ba'i bshes gnyen sbyangs nas/
kyang srid pa'i mtshor ni ltung ba ste/ mun pa mun nag gzhol ba po// de 'dra'i sems can don slad du// byang chub sems dpa' snying brtse ba'i// bsam pas bdag bde btang nas kyang//
sems can sdig pa bsal slad du// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na// bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos gsum gyis// sdig pa'i sems can grol bgyid cing// chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng bar bgyid/
sems can 'ga' yi don slad du// lus dang srog dag btang nas kyang// dka' thob brtul zhugs spyod ldan pa// dka' ba dag ni mang du spyad// gang tshe sems can/
'ga' slad du// bskal brgyar sdug bsngal sel bgyid na// dka' thub brtul zhugs bzed par bgyi// sems can yongs su smonaslad gnas// de 'dra'i bsam dang ldan pa yis// sems
canasred pa'i bsam pa can// so mas ni byang chub sngo bgyid stsal// de nas dpal lha mo chen mos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug la bre bo lo tog
gis bkang ba de phul nas smyos pa/ gling bzhing 'di'i sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang/ yongs su spyod pa dag gis rgyun sa bon dang/ me tog thams cad 'phel bar bgyi ba dang/ grub par
rgyu bgyi ba'i slad du skyes bu dam pa khyod la lhung bzed dbul lo// desan dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par chad pa/ ma rus pa/ gtum po/ drag shul can kun sdug bsngal thams cad las bsgral/
ba dang/ byang chub kyi sa bon la bzhag par rdo thog go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug gis bre pi lo tog gis bkang ba de blangs
nas phyogs bcur bltas te/ 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems pa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor dang bso pa thams cad dgongs su gsol/ gang gis
gling 'dir sa bon dang/ myu gu dang/ 'dab ma dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ 'bru dang/ sman dang/ ro dang/ sa'i bcud dang/ gzi byin dang/ sems can gyi gzi byin dang/ dam pa'i/
sakyi ro dang/ sing ku dang/ gzi byin dag ma nyams shing 'phel bar bgyid pa dang/ dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi bcad par bgyid pa dang/ gang gi de longs
da dung/ nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyidapa dang/ sdig pa las zlog par bgyid pa dang/ byang chub kyi sems la dgod par rdzothogs pa dang/ gang gis
'doresems can de dag thams cad kyis ngan song rnams yongs su spangs nas/ mtho ris la gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang 3 gung gis dpal lha mo chen mo de'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de
ltar phyogs bdun gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes pa thams cad 'dir dgongs su gsol/ tad+ya thA/ munishib/ munin te/ muni pa la/ munis li/ san
ta us kiti/ ku nu praN+NanIl/ ba ma bsam+b+habi dza ba/ stilale sAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba gnang nas/ dpal lha mo chen mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
dpal cho ga shes khyod kyis gleng bzhi pa 'dis bon dang/ myu gu dang/ lo tog 'phel bar bya ba dang/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ khyod nisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khog rtog
gapa dang bcas pa ma lus pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs so// de nas lha'i dbang bo brgya byin ko'u shi kas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom
