gsol/ nganas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i mtshan la bka' stsal pa/ mos pa'i mtshan khyod kyis skye bo mang po la phan pa dang/ bad pa'i phyir zhu ba zhus pa legs/
sa legasaso// khyod kyis ni ti zhus pa nyon cig dang/ ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// khyod kyis zhus pa yang dpag tu med pa'i bal phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das/
la/ byang nub sems dpa' mos pa'i mtshan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dran pa sngon 'das pa'i dusano/ bcom ldan 'das mtshan rin chen gtsug tor zhes bgyi
ba de'i mtshan lan cig tsamu spros pas kyang ltar skye ba thob bo// slad kyis yun mi ring ba zhig na rgyal bo lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces pa'i khams yul dgon pa'i nags shig la/ lu ma chen po zhig
mchis pa'i nub bskams te/ de'i nang na chab nya stong phrag bcu zhig gdugs kyis gdus nas 'gus du'u bzhi mtshis pa la/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs zhes bgyi ba zhig gis chab 'de dag
mthong ba dang snying rje'i sems skyes te/ chab dang bras kyi sbyin pa sal nas/ dgung mang po mi thub cing 'tsho ba yun mi ring bar 'tshal te/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis bcom ldan 'dus/
rin chen gtsug tor gyi mtshan lanagasum brjodapas/ nya de rnamasakyis thos pas// tshe 'phos ma thag tu sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lhar skyes so// de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di dag
dang ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la sman pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshon bstan cing bsgrugs par gsol/ bcom ldan 'dasashAkya thub pa'i mtshan yang thos na/ dpag tu ma
mchis shing brjod du ma mchis pa'i skye go la sman pa dang bde ba thob cing/ rtag tu longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang/ dpag tu ma mchis pa'i bsod nams kyi gterard cing/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i bdag nyid kyang mngon sum du rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du gsol pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba skams shing/ nyon mongs pas 'khrul pa'i sems can rnams yongs su thar
[/ ]// par 'gyur ba'i slad dubastan par gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang nubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mos pa'i mtshan la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
ka bu gal te ngas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan rdzogs par bstan na/ bskal pa khri phrag brgya stong gi par du bstan kyang rdzogs pa'i mthub med do// nuthams cad kyi thigs
tsa pa'i grangs ni bgrang zhing shes par rdung gi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mtshan ni brjod cing shes par mi nus so// ri rab lhun po rnams kyang srang la gzhal zhing bgrang bar
rung gi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mtshan ni brjod cingashes pas mi nus so// 'jig rten thamAcad kyi rdul thamA cad ni bgrang zhing shes par rung gi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
thams cad kyi mtshonabarjod cing shes par mi nus so// nam mkha'i mtshams dang mtha' na shes par rung gi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mtshanani brjod cing shes par
rgyu minus so// de bas na ngas khyod la dus gsum gyi sa sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnamasakyi mtshanamado tsam zhig bstan te/ de gang zag 'ga'aa rnabar lan cig tsam thosan/ mi de ma 'thos ma
thag tu lha'i gnas su skye'o// thos nas mos pa dang gus pa byas la// yi ger bris sam/ mtshan nas brjod cing phyag 'tshalan/ 'khor ba dpag tu med pa'i sdig lci ba kun byang ste/ bsod
nams tshad med ba thob pas/ gang zag de dus zad nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yid la smon pa bzhin du skye ste// nga yang mthong la/ ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa bzang po'i sangs/
rgyas rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis/ 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyed la sogs pa rnams chos thob par 'dod na/ tshul bzhin du
gos legs par byon la lus bsra ste 3 sems mi g.yeng zhing dran pa mi g.yel bar shin tu yid la byas te/ sems rtse gcig tu bsdus la phyag tshol cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de 'bum
ma'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rinaMchen rgyal ba la gus par phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin
gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang la gus par phyag
'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la gus par phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad bsdus shing 'dzin pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// dpag cing
gzhal ba las 'das pa'ang gus par phyag 'tshal lo// zla dang dpe med pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// chos mu med pa la gyos par phyag 'tshal lo// bsam dbag dka' pa 'khas par ]
nyu// phyag 'tshal lo// stobs kyi stobs la gnas pa'i stobs la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la gus par phyag 'tshol lo// khams
gsuman btsun pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad kyi lam ston pa chen po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba thams cad gcod par mkhas pa la gus par phyin

bkaM 'tshala'o// pha rol gyi mthar phyin pa la gus par phyag 'tshol lo// 'jig rtena rnams las thar pa la gus par phug 'tshu'aga'o// 'chi 'pho'i lam dang yongs su bral ba la rgyus par phyag 'tshal lo//

ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba mngon dubares pa la gus par phyag 'tshigasa' lo// nam mkha' ltar rtse la'angami gnas pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// mang po'i nang na chos kyi rgyal po chen po la
gus par phyag 'tshol lo// bdud bzhi'i tshogs bcom pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// bu gcig pa'i ma ltar byams pa chen po la gus par phyag 'tshol lo/ 'tsharabs gar byang gar
rgyu skyes kyang/ sangs rgyus thams cad mthong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin mngon par rtogs la/ mya ngan las 'das pa chen po nyid du phyin par smin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus can
thams cad gang la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod pa'i phyir ro// khakhor mang po rnams sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyarate/ sems rtse gcig tu gus par mchod cing legs par nyon la yid
0 ]la zung zhig/ nga yas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshanabarjod pas// mtshams med lnga po'i sdig las kyang// rnam par grol ba sems skyed nug/ dge ba'i rtsa ba/
med pa'i mi// de yi phyir yang ngas bshadade// de yis rtogs par ma nus kyang// sa bonatshig par rang 'byang ngo// yang dag bden pa 'ba' zhig yod// theg pa chung ngu'i mtshan bas lan//
theg pa chen po de nyid yod// theg pa rnam gnyis bsal bas na// theg pa gcig po kho na yod// dge ba'i rtsa ba med pa'i mis// tshig 'di thos par mi 'gyur te// sangs rgyas grangs med sngon
mchod pas// da ltar bcom lnga na mtshan thos so// len cing 'dzin pa'i gang zag ni// phyogs tsam las ni rnam grol te// rnam dag sa la'ang bde bar gnas// daltar nga yi chos 'di la//
len 'dzin klog cing 'don pa dang// bcom ldan mtshan la phyag byas shing// sangs rgyas mdzad la bsgrubs pa yis// bdud tshogs las dang bral bar 'gyur// phas pham bzhi dang mtsho/
med lnga// 'dod chen po yang byang gyur nas// ma 'ongs dus nami de dag/ byang nubo 'ching rgya gdonami ze// gang zhig mos par mi byedan// nganasong gsum du nges pa ru lhung/ phyis
'tshol brtson zhing mos bskyed na// sangs rgyas grangs med mthong 'gyur bas// rtse gcig sems kyis phyag 'tshal rigs// sdig pa thams cad byang 'gyur te// de bas gus shing mos par
da/ gyis/ de nas 'khor mang po rnams thal mo sbyar te/ lus dang semasanan tanadu bsdus shing bslangs nas/ mi g.yo zhing mi 'gyur bar lus kyi yan lag lnga sa la gtugs
nas/ sems rtse gcig gis shin tu legs par nyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshananas brjod de bka' stsal pa/ sdum 'das pa'i de bzhinagashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
bar rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas grangs medab rnams la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ni bla mar mi snang stong phrag nyi shu la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
mar me mdzad stong phragasumachu la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs po rab tu rtogs chen ye shes rgyal ba la gus par phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bu bcu drug la/
gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gsheg pa stongapa'i rgyal bo la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang la grus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegasalaM
rgyu gzi brjid dbyangs kyi rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sanadabang mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgos pa shin turnam par dag pa laphyag
'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od grangs med pa la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa smral ba'i sku thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa yon tan nyi zla ltaradang
zhing snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo rnam dag yongs su mkhyen pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gtsang mas brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
dbazhin gshegs pa klu dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'ilen gyi rgyal bo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug gi sngon dubs ston kyi rgyal po ye
shes pad+mal phyag 'tshalo lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shing sAla'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid
mchog rin chen rgyal bo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa khod snang rnam dag rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za ba'i 'od 'bum phrag brgyal phyag 'tshal lo//

ba zla ba'i mdog la phug 'tshul lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag dgongs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa drem med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagashegs pa blo gros rgyamaro
kya// la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ku'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo//
la ba'is la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ba klur par 'i mchog la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser mdog la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi snying

phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagashegs pa the tsum rmugs pa sel la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sngags spyod 'dul la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa rnam dag la

pa bdud rtsi bro la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagashegs pa rgyal ba'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagashogs pa seng ge'i sgra la phyag 'tshal/

ba klu dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin pa/ shegs ngang ge ne gzi brjid rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa

la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan bsrung 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yid bzhin rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog bcug

la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhinagashegs pa tsan dan dpung rgyan rgyal bo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// bzhinagashegs pa dge ba'i blo la phyag

zla 'tsholo/ de bzhinagashegs po sku mdog kun tu bstan pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od mi g.yo ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud kyi rgyal
bo rnams btul ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od stong la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa shes rab rgyal ba la phyag 'tshol lo// dbazhin/
gshegs pa byams pa 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten rnam dag 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag pa'i bod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
gshegs pa rab zhi bla 'od la phyag 'tshal 'go/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchog btsun ye shes rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rinachen bla re mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
bzhin gshegs pa klu'i gdung bla ma'i ye shes gtso bo'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal// dubazhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa de zla 'od 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo//
de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab ba dan rgyal ba bkod pa'i rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri med snying bo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo//
dbazhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od 'phro snang ba la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gsheg pa gser 'od kun tu snang ba'i snying la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgra dbyangs dbang phul/
sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal pa gsung mchog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'ong rtag rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshogs
ba spyan ras gzigs rgyal thabs baa pa la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab rgyal thabs brnyes pa'i na bza' la phyag 'tshol lo// dbazhinagashegs pa chos kyi mtshan nyid
ka kyi dgongs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sum bsgra'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de
bzhin gshegs pa me tog ut+pa la'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa brtsonapas rgyal ba stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab stobs kyi rgyal po/
la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rab dga' 'khrugs med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsung dbyangs tshod med rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
bamakhas pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi rgya mtsho'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab ri dbang rgya mtsho thogs med rgyal bo la phyag 'tshal lo//
de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen thogs med la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad thogs med rgyal po la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rtag tu
rgyas pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// deng zhin gshegs pa mngon par rmongs mi mnga' la phyag 'asol lo// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa sngal pa'i sku thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/
'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bcu la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa brgya la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa stong la
phyag 'tshayaM lo/ de bzhin gshags pa khri la phyag 'tshal lo// de rnams la phyag 'tshalan/ bskal pa grangs med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig sgrib rnams bsal bar 'gyur ro//
'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag gcig la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bcu la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegos ba 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal
lo de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag steng la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag khri la phyag 'anol lo// dpazhin gshegs pa 'bum phragi khrag khrig bye ba gang+ga'i klung gi bye
mamed dpag tu med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa rnams la phyag 'tshal 'gro// de rnams la phyag 'tshal na/ bskal pa grangs med pa nas 'khor ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba ma lus bar 'byang bar 'gyur ro/
gal te gang zag la las snga ma 'das pa dpag tumed cing bgrang ba las 'das pa'i sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan thos na/ mi de bskal pa khri phrag brgyad cu'i bar du sems can dmyal
ba'i sdug bsngal dus ltadang// de bas na da gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams la// gang zhig gus par phyag 'tshalan// sdes byang sems kyis rang bzhin 'thob/
mi dge waMcu dang mtshams med lnga// phyin chad 'di dag re spyod de// yang dag rjes blos rgyun mi 'chad// theg pa chen po'i tshul khrims rdzogs// de phyir da ltar gus phyag 'tshal// gang phrag
ka/ gnyis ni ma gtogs te// gcig ni phyogs snyoms chos la skur// gnyis pa de ni 'dod chenab// gal te 'khas sems dag na// de ni 'dod chenam yin te//
sas rgyas grangs med rtag tu mthong/ la las rtsa ba bzhi nyams shing// mtshams med lnga por bcas pa drag/ mos pa rnam dag bya nusan// des na chos bzhin gnas par rung// kun gyis

gus par phyag byas pas//mi dag chu yi las rnams bsal// kun gyis theg chen khrims thob ste// de phyir da ltar gus phyag 'tshal// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi mtshon bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems
dpa ba stong phrag brkus me skye ba'i chos la bzod pa so sor thob bo// nyan thos brgyad brgyas kyang theg pa chen po'i sems cung zad skyes so// dge slong lnga stong gis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob
D+ha brda rnalhadang mi 'bumani chesal chos kyi mig rnam par dag go da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tumed pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal posnang 'bum phrag/
bcu rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gser phyi mdog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med snang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'a khye'o
ba 'od snangargyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa gsung brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa seng ge'i thang ka'i mtshan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegA
pa seng ge'i nga ro 'phyag 'a[&]la'e/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od yon tan ri'i rgyal po la phyag 'a srol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dge gnas yon tan rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen pas brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bar dka' la phyag 'tshal lo/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo//
de bzhin gshegs pa'i rab gnon pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga shes pa dkonamchog yon tan la phyag 'arol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba la phyag 'amaM' le//
de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa riganyen brgyun la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i nga ro rgyal bar dka' la phyag 'tshal lo//
de bzhin gshegs pa 'od nargyal po la phyag 'tshul lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mi ba/yod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'atsal lo// de bzhin gshegs/
ba zhing gi bkod pa la phyag 'tshal le// depazhin gshegs pa mos pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i bla re la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od la phyag
'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can la phyag 'a tsAl le//
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ de bzhin gshegs pa yog par dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser thug la phyag 'tshal
ga de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs po 'brug sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi snying po nyid la phyag 'tshol lo//
de bzhin gshegs pa 'phrul stobs chos chen mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan me tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan lo ma la phyag 'tshal lo//
de bzhin gshegs pa yid dam pa la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagashegs pa bdud rtsi'i rdzalaphyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gsheg
ba rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'di las lhag med bod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
pa bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od snang gsal bsod nams kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgras/
bdud bzhi bcom ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'jigs ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagashegs pa bo rtu'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs ]

de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag stong la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag khri la phyag 'tshal lo// bye ba phrag khrig gang+ga'i bye ma dang mnyam pa dpag tu med cing bgrang ba las
'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// gal te gang zag la las da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa'i mtshan thos na/ gang zag de
'a// bskal ba khrag khrig drug cu'i bar dusems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dumi ltung ngo// de bas na gus par phyag 'tshal lo// gang gis da ltar phyogs bcu yi// bcom ldan/
'das la phyag 'tshal na// ma dag lam lasarnam grol zhing// mtshams medalnga la sogs pa byang// rnam dag sa la rtag gnas shing// shAkya'i chos la bde bar gnas// ngan songagasumani
yongs su skyes// sangs rgyas byams pa mthong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas stong yang mthong 'gyur te// de phyir da ltar gus phyag 'tshal// gsabacu'i sangs rgyas kun mthong ste// rtag tu
rnam dag zhing du skye// dam pa'i chos kyang thos pa dang// dbazhin gshegs pa rtag par rtogs// phyogs bdunasas rgyas bcom ldan 'adus da ltarab zhugs pa rnams kyi mtshan bstan pa'i tshe/

gang+gA klungaganyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa thob po// lha dang mi 'bum phrag bzhi bcu nu gnyis kun gyis bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems skyes so//
ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bskal pa bzung po'i de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa rnams la phyag 'a[&]la lo// de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dag pa'i
la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tshol lo//
dbazhin gshegs pa mi dang mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam glingagaser 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
gshegs pa rin chen snangab la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas mtshanam la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagashegs pa/
'od stangamtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab ri'i rgya mtshos phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med
mnga' dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin bshegs pa rin po ches brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dug
phrag brgyamanga' mdzod pa'i rgyal thabs b.res pa la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mdzan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong nadagag la phyag 'tshal lo//
dbazhin gshegs pa 'od mtshan khri phrag gnyis kyis brgyan pa bi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa khri phrag sumamtshanamathun kun tu yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs/
pa'aphyag len rten rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagashegs pa bzhi khri brgyad stong 'ong mi 'gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagashegs pa rin chen zla ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo
kra ba zhin gshegs pa mdog dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang dam pa'i mdog la phyag/
ka'atshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bgegs kyi tshogs thums cad bcom pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ de bzhinagashigs pasgra'i tshogs la
phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinugashegs pa stong phrag bcu'i 'od snang bas brgyan pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag brgyud abargyan pa'i 'od snang ba la phyag 'tshol lo//
de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen pad+mas brgyan pa la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhinagashegs pa yon tan gtso bo'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser mdog 'od snang la phyag
'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa lnga brgya pad+ma'i rgyal bo la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu bo che mi 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma
bzang pos brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pado ting nge 'dzinamanga' dbang rgyal bo la phyag 'tshal lo// da dung ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag 'tshalalo/
de bzhin gshegs pa bcu la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs ba brgya la phyag 'tshol lo// dobazhin gshegs pa stong la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagashegs pa khri la phyag 'tshal lo/
de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum la phyag 'tshol lo// de rnams la phyag 'tshalan/ bskal pa dpag tu med pa tshunand kyi 'chi 'pho'i sdig to lci ba kun basal bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs/
kha 'bum phrag gcig la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bcu la phyag 'tsho'alo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
'bum brag stod la phyag 'tshalalo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag khri la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig gang+ga'i byem dang mnyam pa dpag tu med cing bgrangaga'/
'das pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zag la la zhig gis da dung ma gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tumed cing bgrang ba las 'das pa'i mtshan 'di thos na/ mi de bskal pa khri drug
cu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dumi ltung ngo// debs gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// phyi ma'i dus kyi sangs rgyas la// la las gus pas phyag 'tshal na// sgrib pa gsum dang
mtshams med lnga// 'dod mangs dag ni ma gtogasaM par// kun kyang bsal cing 'byang bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas chos la'ang bde b.raganas// sangs rgyas tshad med kun kyang mthong/
yang dag chos kyang rtag tu thos// dengs daltar gus phyag 'tshal// la las phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi// bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshalan// 'das pa'i kha na ma tho bsal//
[p]bya// ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi// mi dge bcu yi las byas pa'ang// da ltar mngon du bsal cing 'byung// ma 'ongs pa na chos nyidamathong// de bas yang dag mes
na par bya// 'dri klog kha ton phyag 'tshal na// de dag tshe rabu gar skyes kyang// mi dge log pa mthong mi 'gyur// rtag tu yang dag rnam grol thos// mtha' 'a khob yul du yodAmi skye//
rgyal po ngan pa yong ma mthong// bskal pa 'bum phrag bzhi khrir phung// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi mthong ngo// debasad ltar gus phyag 'tshal// mi dge bcu las byas bsalo//
gzungs su 'dzin pa chen po thob// da dung ma byon pa'isangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshon de bsgrags pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag lnga bcus phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnasaso//
dge slong ma bdun brgyas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu redado// lha dang mi 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis kyis chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go/ mdo sde gzungs su 'dzin pa chepo
gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis la/ mdo'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// lung du bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// tshigs su bcad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal// dbyangs kyis bsadapa'i sde
la phyag 'tshal lo// ched du brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshalalo// gleng gzhi'i sde la phyag 'tshol lo// rtogs pa brjodapa'i sde la phyag 'tshol lo// daltar dang 'das pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal/
lo/ skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde la phyag 'tshal lo// shin tu rgyas pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// chos rmad du byung ba'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// gtan la phab par bstanapa'i sde la phyag/
'tshal loko/ mdzod chen po bzhugs so 'tshal la phyag 'tshal lo// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la phyag 'tshal// mgongal las mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa/

u// byang chub sems dpa' brgya la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' stong la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' khril phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'
khri phrag gcig la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag sum cu la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag nyis
brgyal phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag sum brgyal phyag 'tshol lo// byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag bzhi brgya la phyag 'tshol lo// byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag lnga
brgyal phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag drug brgyal phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag bdun brgya la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag brgyad
brgya la phyag 'tshalal// byang chub sems dpa 'a khri phrag dgu brgyal phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag stong gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal
lo da rnams la phyag 'tshal na/ bskal pa dpag tu med pa tshunand kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba'ang bsal bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo 'bum phrag gcig la
phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag bcu la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag stod la
[:]phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag khri la phyag 'tshol lo// byang dub sems dpa' 'dum phrag khrag khrig khri'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag
'tshal lo// de rnams la phyag 'tshal na bskal pa dpag tumed pa tshun chad kyi 'khor pa'i sdig nye ba'ang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khrag khrig phrag gcig la
phyag 'tshal lo/ byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bcu la phyag 'tshol lo// byang chub sems dpa' brag khrig phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag
stong la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag khri la phyag 'tshol lo// byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag 'bum la phyag 'tshal lo// de rnams la phyag 'tshal na/ bskal
pa dpag tu med pa tshunachad kyi bo ra ba'i sdig lciba'ang bsal bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gAgacig gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems

drab ga gang+g+haganyis kyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' garlagasum gyi bye ma snyedal phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' garlabazhi'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshol lo// byang chub
sems dpa' gang+gAlnga'i byem snyad la phyag 'tshol lo// byang chub sems dpa' gad+ma drug gi byan sedal phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' gad+mo bdun gyi bye ma snyedal phyag 'tshal lo//
byang chub sems dpa' ga brgyad kyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' gad+madagu'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' gang bcu'i bye
ga ma snyad la phyag 'tshol lo// byang chub sems dpa' ga brgya'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA stong gi byem byed la phyag 'tshol lo// byang chub sems dpa'o ga/
'tsha bri'i khyim med la phyag 'tshol la// byang chub sems dpa' gad+ma 'bum phrag brjod kyis mi lang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de rnams la phyago/
'tshul na/ bskal pa grangs med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdug lci ba'ang dag par 'gyur ro// gang zag la laga'aphags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyimtshan thos
na/ mi de bskal pa 'bum phrag bzhi bcu'i bar du dumal ba'i sdug bsngal du mu ltung zhing/ khams gsumagyi 'khor bar mi gtogs te/ rtag tu rnam par thar pa'i rgyal ba'i khams su gtogs
par 'gyur ro// mtha' 'khob yul du yong mi skye// dge med yul du'ang de bzhin te// lus ngan len par mi 'gyur zhing// log par lta bar mi skye'o// ma rabs rigs su du mi skye//
mu stegs can du'ang mi skye ste// lus kyi yan lag kun dang ldan// dam pa'i chos ni rtag tu thos// dka'athub sdom pa ma byas kyang
tsa chen po'i spyod lamams// rtag par sangs rgyas bdag nyid mthong// de phyir gus par phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan chos la bde bar gnas// ma 'ongs dus nasangs rgyas 'grub/
byang chub soms dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyi mtshanabasgrags pa na/ rigs kyi bu bo dang/ rigs kyi bu mo 'bum phrag brgyad tshubargyad kyis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bru bu thob bo/
lha dang mi 'bum phrag bzhi bcur dgus phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// sems stor ba'i dag slong 'bum phrag bdun du phyabargyad kyis sems kyi bdag nyid slar red de// dgrabcom pa'i/
'bras bu thob bo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo 'bum phrug bsdus gzus chen po rId nas/ ma 'ongs pa'i dusan byang chub kyi snying por mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
de nas bcom ldan 'dus la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo seng ge rgyus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ltar na/ theg
pabangagacig tu bas te/ gnyis dang gsum du ma mchis so// rtogs pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i 'gyod tshangs kyi mdo 'di'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yum/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam chen po/ rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi mig/ log par lta ba thams cad kyi sdudab/ sems nyams pa rnams kyi skyong ba/ ngan 'gro gsum gyi sgo ni
wa @#// gcod pa/ bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sgo ni 'a byed pa/ nyanathos rnams ni rims kyis theg pachen po la gzhol bar 'gyur lags te/ dbadag cag gis kyang gzungs/
sngags chen po 'di gzung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o// gang zag gang la lasatshul khrims kyi sdom pa dang/ mdo sde 'di la sgom zhing klog par byed na/ de la yang de bzhin du bsrung zhing bskyab par
bgyi'o// yang gang la la zhig mdosde 'di la mchod cing rim gror byed pa dang/ zhag bdun gyi b.radu spyod cing sgom par byed pa la/ bdud sdig to can dkrus pa'i skabs tshol ba zhig mchisan
yang : bdud des kyang dkrug pa'i skabs mirId par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis mido sde 'di yun ring du gnas pa dang byang chub kyi ngo ba nyid mthar thug pa'i bar du'ang bskyod
wa bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di srungab ni/ dkonamchog gsum srung ba yi nano// yang nga'i bstan pa'angabasrung ba yin no//
denas yang byang chub sems dpa' sengage sgras/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar krazungs sngags smras pa/ namo bud+d+hAya/ namo d+han+d+ha ya/ namosang g+hA ya// a dan te/ dar ni/ tad+ya thA/
A kA shanas sa b+harA/ sarba rmanis sa b+habA/ i sha ma ta pe pa bshAn/ pIm le su ba re/ d+harma a ti kan pA lanisadz+dzAny+tsa/ yam le/ tsa le tsa le hu'uhulu/ bshadade/ bishadade/
mnatuman tuman trAs swAhA/ gzungs sngags 'di dus gcig la lan brgya rtsa brgyud bzlas shing/ mchod rten la lan bdun bdunabaskor ba dang/ de bzhin du zhag bdun gyi bar du mdo sde
gzhan mi bsam par rtogs pa chen pos yongasas rgyas pa'i 'gyod tshangs kyi mdo sde 'di la sems rtse gcig tubya'i/ gzhan du mi g.yeng bar bya'o// gzungs sngags 'di sangs rgyas
'bum phrag brgyad brgyas gsungs te/ bdag gis kyang bshadado// gal te gang zag la las gzungs sngags 'di la skur cing sna pa bgyidan/ sangs rgyas de red la skur ba lags so/
gzungs sngags 'di la skur ba'i gang zag ni tshe rabs su'ang bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu mi 'grub par 'gyur te/ khams gsum las kyang mi 'dab no// de ci'i slad du zhin/ gzungs sngags
'di nisems stor nga las/ slar rnyed par 'gyurapa dang/ gzungs sngags 'di lanAcig tsam thos pa 'am/ thos nas yi ger bris shing/ sha dang chang bcad de tha gcig par bgyid cing
khrims srung ba dang/ bag ma mchis pa'i dudams g.yeng ba mi bgyid pa dang/ gdu 'dzi'i nang du mi 'jug pa dang/ rtag tu byams pa la sgom zhing/ bsam gtan la dam par lta ba'i gong brag
da ni/ saMskal pa dpag tum mtshes ba nas sogs sogs pa'i sgrib pa gsum dang/ sdig lci ba la sogs pa'ang gzungs sngags 'di thos te/ sems thag pa nas zlos shing 'dzin pa dang
nyin gcig bzhin du klog cing kha tonabagyid pa dang/ yid m dus brjod par bgyid na/ gang zag de mngon par byang chub pa'i bar du ngan song du mi ltung ngo// de nas
yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'aseng ge'i sgral bka' stsal pa/ khyod dkon mchog gsum skyong ba dang/ skye bo mang po lag sems shing/ srid pa gsum las bsgral
zhing gdon pa dang/ slob pa grangs med pa la phan pa chenapo byedape dang/ log par lta ba thams cad zlog pa'i phyir/ gzungs sngags phye zhing bstan pa legs so legs so// rigasakyi bu
khyod kyi ming dang gzungs sngags kyi sgra 'disems canal las thos nas mos pa dang gusab skyedade/ ma skur ba'i mi de nitsha'adil 'ang bde ba gnas/ shi 'phos nas kyang rtag tusangs rgyas mthong
zhing dbang ma thongal/ khyod dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po so so rang gis rig pa mngon par 'tshang rgya ba the
tsom mi zabar 'gyuro// kun nas nyon mongs thams cad sangashing/ dge ba thams cad kyis de bzhinagashegs pa'i lamagrub pani/ kun kyang mos pa dang/ dang ba'i dbang gis so//
nga 'das pa'i phyir rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis nyin gcig gam/ mtshanagacig gam/ dus gcig gam/ skad cig la phyogs bcudus gsum du gshegs pa'isas
rgyus dang/ gsung rab mdosdebacu gnyis dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam la phyag 'tshalanus shing/ theg pa chen po'i tshulabazhin du yid la byed pa dang/ don dam pa'i bden pa ji bzhin par yid l
byed pa'i gang zag de ni/ thang cig yud tsam cig gis mi dge ba bcu dang/ mtshams med pa lnga dang/ mnyam pa nyid la skur ba dang/ kun nas nyon mongs ba'i las thams cad kun ma lus par
byang bar 'gyur ro// yang dge slong pa dang/ dge slong ma 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ dge tshul pha dang/ dge tshul mas ngo bo nyid kyi sems stor ba dang/ rang gi nu bzhibashig pa dang/
sdom pa brgyad nyams pa dang/ lcib drug dang/ mi dge ba bcu dang/ mtshams med pa lnga byas pa dang/ mnyam pa nyid la skur ba yang/ phyogs bcu sa gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyus
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan lamesaM pa skyong de phyaga'atshal na/ de lta bu'i lasAmi dge ba kun m lus par byung bar 'gyur// de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu/ de nas sangs rgyas 'od nges
pa zhes bya ba de'i drung nas de'i tshorgyal bu dge mthong mi sum stong dang/ blo buradu skad cig gcig gis dus der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas//
mgrin gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la sogs pas bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas mi dge ba'i las bgyis shing bsags pa ni brjod
kyis kyang mi rdzogs te[:]la las ni mi dge ba bcu bgyis/ lulas ni mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis/ la las nim nyam pa nyid kyi chos 'askadapa la sogs pa bsamakyis/
mi khyab cing brjod kyis mirdzogs pa'i sdig pa bgyis pa de dag dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams drang/ gsungarab bcu gnyis kyi mdo sde la brtenanas/ byang chub sems dpa'amang po'i
mdun du mthol zhing bshags par 'tshalan/ de gnang bar gsol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa 3 'jigs pa'i sems bskyed pa dka' ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
bskyed pa dka' ba las bskyed pa ni legs legs so// khyed kyis mi dge ba bcu bshags pa dang/ mtshams mod ba ljabashags ba dang/ 'dod chen la sogs pa bshags nas/ de
bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mthong par 'dod pa de legs kyis/ yid la sems pa bzhin du mtho'acig/ de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi byams pa'i
gsung thos nas// chos gos tshul bzhin du bgos nas/ thal mo sbyar te spyi bos gtugs nas// phrag pa g.yas pa chos bzhin du phyung/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la gtugs te/ bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// phyogs bcu'i chos la phyag
'tshal zhing skyabasasu gsol lo// phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// yang shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrugs mi mang la phyag 'tshal zhing skabs
su gsol lo// yang lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rinachen 'byung ldan la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// yang nub phyogs kyi de bzhinagashegs pa snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal zhing
skyabasasu gsol lo// yang byang phyon kyi de bzhin gshegs ba gdon mi za bar grub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// yang steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa sos brtsegs pa'ang phyag
'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// yang 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum gzugs la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// shar phyogs na 'phag pa kun tu bzang po
labang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// lho phyogs na 'phags pa 'jig rten gzungs la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// nub phyogs na 'phags pa smanaras gzigs/
dbang phyag la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// byang phyogs na 'phags ba bla rgyas la'ang phyag 'tshol zhing skyongs su gsol lo// stong gi phyogs na 'phags po nam mkha'isId
gola'adi phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// 'og ma phyogs na'aphags pa yon tan brtan pa la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// thog ma'i ston pa bcom ldan 'dasadi bzhin
gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyur ba la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyingago la'aduphyag 'tshal zhing skyabasasu gsol lo//
'jig rten gyi khams gzhanan/ 'a9pa'i skusangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// daltar bdag cag gi ston pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thubapa
la'ang phyag 'tshul zhing skyabs su gsolalo// bcom ldan 'das dum med par grogs pa dang 'jam dpal gzhonanur gyur la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabasasu gsol lo// kun dga' bo
dang 'od srungs la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// 'phags pa'i lam bzhis mngon par byung ba rnams la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// sems bskyed pa dang po
pa rnams 'ogang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo//mdzod chen po gsung rab mdo sde bcu gnyis dang/ yang dog par mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo sde la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// ros kyi
mdo sde gzhan ji snyed bzhugs pa la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ sku gdung brgyad du bgos pa'i gzugs rnams la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// da ltar bzhugs
pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi don la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo// phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa da
bar snang gi lha dang/ gnam gyi steng dang/ sa'i steng dang/ sa'i 'og gi lha dang/ ri'i lha dang/ tshal gyi lha nga/ shing drung gi lhadang/ rig sngags 'chang dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
dang ldan pa rnams dang/ lha'i mig dang ldan pa dang/ lha'i rna ba dang ldan pa de dag thams cad kyis gzigasashingagason te/ kun kyis dpang mdzad par gsol lo// sems can
thams cad la ma mthol ma bshags pa zhig mchis na'ang sdig pa thams cad byang bar gyur cig/ bdag cagalasogs pa sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i khams tshun chad nas/ daltar
gyi las ngan pa 'di thob pa'i bar du rmongs shing bslad pa'i sems kyis/ log par mthong ba dpag tu ma mchis pas/ las dang nyon mongs pa dang/ mi dge ba'i las bgyupani brjod kyis/
mi tshogs to/ sdig pa mang po cibagyis pa rnams bdag nyid kyis ma tshor ma rig pas/ mi dge ba'i sems rab tu rgyas pa'i dbang gis 'jig rten pha rol ma mthong zhing/ tshe 'di 'ba' zhig
mthong ba lags te/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags la mos pas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ring du gyuracing/ mi dge ba'i las kyis bar chad du gyur cing bsgribs pa 'am/ sdig pa'i thogs bo
la brten pas/ dge slong pha dang/ dge slong ma la mi rigs shing tshul ma lags pa'i las bgyis pa 'am/ pha dang ma la mi rigs shing tshul ma lags pa'i las bgyis pa 'am/ yang yang
nyam gyi dbang gis phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi nor dang yo byad la sogs pa spyad pa 'am/ dge 'dun sde lnga labangami'igs shing tshulam lags pa'i las bgyid pa dang/
'jig rten gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu dbag tu med pa sed bshad pa drang/ byang chub kyi dgakha'i rtsa ba'i sems canal ngenadusmadapa 'am/ chos kyi mkhan po la skur pa 'am/ dam
pa'i chos ni chos ma lags par bshad pa 'am/ chos ma lags pa ni dam pa'i chos legs par bashadapa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtag ces bgyis pa 'am/ dam pa'i chos kyang mi
rtog ge zhes bgyes pa 'am/ dge 'dunakon mchog kyang mi rtag go zhes bgyis ba 'am/ phan pa'i sbyin pa la ma dad pa lag 3 chos log pa dad cing 'dzin pa de lta bu'i slad du/ da 'jig/
shing skag pa ni dpag tu ma mchis/ 'dzom zhing gnong ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs rje
dang byams pa mnga' bas/ kun la snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags n/ bdag cag la sogs pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas
srid pa na 'khor ba'i tshe/ sdigalce babagyis pa de dag thams cad 'gyod cing bshags pas mos pa gnang bar gsol te/ slan chad kyang mi bgyid par gyur cig/ yang bcom ldan 'das
bdag cag lasogs pas bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa 'am/ 'das ba dang/ ma byon pa dang/ de ltar bzhugs pa'isangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
kyi sdom pa dang/ tshul khrims nyams pa 'am/ 'dod chen po'i las padapa 'am/ mi dge ba'i tshig rtsub mo sanas/ dge ba'i chos la skur ba'i sdig lci ba'i las bgyis pa'ang slar baspyod cing/
bshags ma myong ba dang/ yid la 'dzam pa dang/ ngo tsha ma mchis pas mi dge ba bcudang mtshamasamayachis pa la'i dngos po skye ba la sogs pa bgyis pa 'am/ thog ma nas yid la 'jigs shing 'dzem/
pa ma mchis pas de lta bu'i steg ldeb bkyis par bdag nyidakyis nges par 'tshal kyang// nongs pa bsubs shing dad pas byin pa blangs pa mthol zhingam bshags pa ma/ dam pa'i chos yun ring
du gnas par bgyi zhing/ rim gro mchod pa'i bsam pa ma mchis te/ de la mi snyan par sad cing yang leg par bltas pa 'am/ ngagag sgo nas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i shes pa mang po bgyis pa
bam/ yang 'di skad ces kyang smos te/ sangs rgyus dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dunagasum ma mchis zhes bgyis pa la sogs pa mi dge ba bcu dang/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga'i sdig lci bde
lta bu bgyis pa'i slad du/ da'ajigs shing skrag pa ni dpag tum mchis/ 'dzem zhing gnong bani bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ dkonamchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo// sangs rgyas bcom
@#u lda na 'dus rnams ni thugs rje dang byams pa mnga' bas kun la snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnamasani dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/
bdag cag la sogs pas 'gyod cing mthol bshags pas tshangs pa gnang bar gsol to/ bskal pa dpag tu mamachis pa nas srid pa na 'khor ba'itshe/ sdig lce ba bsal cing slan chad kyang
mi bgyid par gyur cig/ yang bcom ldan 'das bdag rug la sogs pas bskal pa dpag tum mchis pa nas log par mthol bas/ lceb bzhi ni sbom por bshad/ sbom po bzhinirtsi
parab shad pa'am/ zhig panim zhig pa zhes bshad/ ma zhigapa ni zhig par zhes bshad pa'am/ lcibani yang bar bshad/ yang banirtsi bar bshad pa 'am/ gtsang ba ni mi gtsang bar mthong
mi gtsang bani gtsang b.ramathong pa la sogs pa log par mthongab 'am/ 'jig rten gyi gtsug lag ni bshad cingabastod/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la gus pa ma bgyis shing/ mi dge ba'i don rnams
la gzhung gzung zhing bsams pa dang/ ma brtags pa rnam pa brgyad 'chang bu'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag ba ni bdud kyi tshig ces bkyis/ bdud kyi tshig yang dag pa ni
bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' zhes bgyis pa 'am/ bar 'ga' ni mu stegs kyi ston pa drug gis rnam par bshad pa la mos shing bzung ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das
0par zhugs te/ dkonamchog gsum la rtag pa ma mchis snyam sems la 'khrul pa byung ba la sogs pa lta ba log pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de lta bas na 'jigs shing dogs pa dang/ 'dzamazhing/
gnong ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo/[” ]/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni kun la snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa'
rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags te/ bdag cag la sogs pas 'gyod cing mthol bshags bas tshas pas gnang bar gsol te/ sunamadakyang mi bgyid par gyur nug/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa las/ gal te rtsa bu bzhi 'am/ mtshams med ba lnga 'am/ yang dag pa'i no la skur pa btab pa ma mthol ma bshags na/ nges par sems can dmyal bar
ltung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang/ dam pa'i chos dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ nyan thos rnams dang/ rang sas rgyas rnams kyis kyang de la skyabs mdzod par mi spyodapo/
dgi 'dun dang/ pha ma dang/ lha rnams dang/ 'jig rten gyi mis kyang de la skyabs byed mi nus so zhes thos pasan/ de'i phyir 'jigs shing dogs pa dang/ 'dzom zhing gnang ba'ang bsam gyis
mi khyab so/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mngadang/ ma gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas stong dang/ daltar gyi sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku bcomaldan
[7 ]// 'das shAkya thub pa rnams dang/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'dasazams cad ni thugs rjedang byams pa'i mnga' bdag lags te/ kun la snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag la sogs pas 'gyod cing mthol bshags pas gnang bar gsol te/ bskal pa dpag tum mchis pa nas nyon
tsha mongs pa'i sgrib pa ma/ las kyi sgrib pa 'am/ rnam par sminapa'i sgrib pa 'am/ snyib bzhi dang/ mtshams med pa lta dang/ mi dge ba bcu la sogs pa'i sdig lcib rnams bsal bar gyur
cig yange bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la sogs pas bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas srid pa nas srid pa na 'khor ba'i tshe/ sdig lci ba rnams bsal nas slan chad kyang mi bgyid par
sgo gyur cig/ yang bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la sogs pas bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas/ daltar gyi tshe 'di'i bar dudage 'dun gyi spyi'i nor dang/ phyogs banu'i dge 'dun gyi spyi nob
la thugs thub tu spyad pa 'am/ daltar gyi dge 'dun gyi nor 'thugs thub tu spyad pa 'am/ dge 'dun ste lnga'i no dang/ dge slong ngo cog gi nor 'a zugs thub tu spyadapa 'am/ yon bdago
thams cad kyi rdzas la thugs thub tu spyad pa 'am/ ba gagis yang dag pa'i chos dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ 'bras bu bzhi thob bo zhes sas pa de lta bu'i las ngan pa'i rgyu des/ kun
nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyur gyur te/ khyim nas rab tu byung nas/ rtsab bzhi'i sdom pa zhig pa dang/ lci ba'i chos brgyad dang/ sdom pa drug dang/ dge bdun gyi lhag ma sum cu dang/ ma nges pa'i/
chos gnyis dang/ sngo nga ba'i ltung byed sum cu dang/ ltung ba dgu bcu rtsa gcig dang/ so sor bshags pa'i chos bzhi dang/ bslab pa mang po'i chos rnams dang/ shin tu zhiba'i chos bdun
rnams dung/ nongs bgyis nas phas pham pa bzhidang/ mtshams med pa lnga la thug gi bar du re re nas bgyis pa 'am/ yang dag pa'i chos nyid dam/ mdo sde zab mo' skur ba 'am/ 'dod
chenapo'i las bgyis pa'ang bcabs shingagasangs nas/ nyin zhag re re zhing 'phel bar gyur pa de dag la sogs pa/ de ring spyi bo mang po la snyan pa'i slad du bdag cag nyid kyis phyogs
bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'gyod cing bshags pa 'tshal lo// so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis bskal ba dpag tu mamachis pa nas sangs rgyas dang pha ma'i drin glo bar ma chud cing/
rnam par byang ba'i chos ma 'tshal bsami dge ba sna tshogs bgyis pa 'am/ bdag cag gi rigs sems pas dar zhing rgyags pa'i tshe/ mi dge ba'i las rnams bsams bzhin du bgyis
kyang/ nongs par ma mthong bas/ byis ba lta bu r blunapa'i sug las bgyis pa 'am/ mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du nye bar mchis shing/ nyon mongs pas sems dkrugs pas//
ba00 ]bya#// 'dodapa'i yon tan lnga la mchog ma 'tshal te/ mi dge ba'i las rnams bgyis pa dang/ 'gro ba bzang mos bslas ba'am/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gte
mug gi mdud pas sems dkrugs shing bskyodapa 'am/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid la sogs pas rnam par bsdus pa'i sdig mang po de rnams 'gyod de dam lus par bshegs so//
yang sangs rgyas dang/ dam pa'i chos dang/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la gus pa'i tshul gyis bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa de lta bu'i sdig mang po di dag kun 'gyod de mthol zhing so sor
bshags so/ yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams la gus pa'i tshul gyis rim grom bgyis pa de lta bu'i sdig mang po de dag kunu'agyod de mthol zhing so
sor bshagasaso/ gti mug pas rmongs shing bsgribs te/ dregs shing le lo dang rang nyam kyis mi dgeb rnams bgyis pa de lta bu'i sdig mang po kun 'gyodadi mthol zhing so sor bshag
sa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad bdag gis mchod nas/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad sa bcu la gnas par bgyis te/ kun gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa
nyid thugasas chung ba dang ldan bar bgyis par gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal bu dag mthong la bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so// rgyal rigs dram
chen po rab tu legs so legs so// rgyal rigs dramachen po bdag nyid kyi dge sdig gi las la rtog pa mkhas te/ 'jigs shing skrag pa chen ngos 'gyod nas/ sdig pa'i las/
rnams mngon par bshags pa'i steng du/ sems canathams cad kyi phyir yang mthol zhi so sor bshags pa de bsan/ khyod ni rgyal rigs dra ma chen po nyid yin te/ bdag sdig pa
dge ba dang bral gyi steng du/ sems tsan thams cad kyang sdig pa dang bral b.rabyas padang/ bdag nyid kyi phyir son lamam btab par/ star sems can gyi don du smon lam btab
ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang thag pa ste thag rang pa ngang ba
dang mi sum stong gis mthol zhing bshags zin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas bstodapa/ bcom ldan nyag gcig rab kyi mchog/ khams gsum rgyanalag yab yum
dang/ thams cad sems pa'i ye shes lags// kun la snyoms pa'i dpe ma mchis// sangs rgyas dkonamchog la phyag 'tshal// byis pas shes rab bdag phyir spyad// nor
rdzas byin la lan 'dod phyir// byams chenasangs rgyas dmen te// dgra sdang nye byams snyoms mdzad pa'i// brtson 'grus che la bdag skyabs mchi// rkang gnyis kun la sas/
rgyus gtso// shes rab spyan ldan makhyen gzigs khyab// lha rnams shes rab de ma 'tshal// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad la// bdag cag kun gyis
gus phyag 'tshal/ de bzhin sangs rgyas bdag skyabs mchi// dus gsum sangs rgyas mchod byas 'du// de nas phyog bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis// rgyal bu dag/
ma mthong dang/ mi sum stong la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas chos 'ditshol 'dod na// thos pa mang po'i mi phyir 'brongs// dge bas man mo bzhin du bkur/
sangs rgyas myur du 'grub bar 'gyur// tshul khrims rnam dag sring byed na// ming ni dge slong nges pa yin// stong nyid gang gis brtag nusan// de yis rnal 'byor sgrub pa yin//
wA brtson 'grus la las sgrub nus na// de yis 'phags lam spyod pa yin// la las mya ngan 'das bsgrubs na// de ming yang dag bde ba yin// tshul khrims sdom pa'i dge tshul
zladang/ rnam dag khrims 'dzin dge slong dag/ zlob phyed cing gso sbyong bya// chos gos brtags po rnams bgos te// lhung bzed 'khar gsil sogs bkur zhing// dag
bas bsod snyoms lagatsang blang bya// lha rnams thams cad dga' mgu ste// gus pas phyag 'tshol thal sbyar nas// lha rnams nged kyis mi 'di dag/ de yi mngag gzhug bsgrub
par bya// dper na lha dbang brgya byin la// sum cu rtsa gsum lha gzhan rnams // rim gro gus pa byed bzhin bya// tshe 'di legs pa nyid thob ste// tshe rabs gzhan gyi pag
mi khyab// rab tu byung zhing tshul khrims sdom// sangs rgyus bka'adrin lanabasgrub yin// rgyal bu dag mthong da yang nyon// ngad byang chub ma gtogs par// 'jig rten mi
rnams thums cad kyiso// mos pa rnam dag sems bskyedade// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rtag bzhugs par// mya ngan 'das par mngon par shes// chos dang dge 'dun dbazhin
te delta bu yi mi rnamasani// bcom ldan bka' drin lan bsgrubs yin// da yang rgyal bu dag mthong nyon// 'jig rten mi rnams thams cad la// bye brag dbye ba'i sems med/
par theg pa gcig chos mngon shes te// phyogs bcur sde ma 'das pa dang// da ltar ma 'ongs dus rnamasal/ sangs rgyasatheg chenAgacig pu las// gnyisadang gsum
zhis byar med par// bye brag dbye ba'i sems med de// de ltar mos sems bskyed nus na// de lta bu yi rnams ni// sangs rgyas bka' drin 'tshob pa yin// rgyal bu dge mthong
da yang nyon// nga nibadas te gshegs phyin// mi yi nang na 'ga' zhig/ sems can rnam pa thams cad la// sangs rgyas snying po nyid yod ces// rtag tums pa'i sems bskyed
[pa ]gyu/ na de lta bu yi mi rnams ni// bcom ldan baka'adrin lanabasgrub yin// la las thang cig dge spyad de// 'bras bu srid par mi bsgrub la// bla med 'bras
bur sngo byed nu// sangs rgyasabaka' drin 'tshob pa yin// dadargyal bu dag mtho nyon// nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og na// mi yi nang na 'al la dag/ dkon mchog gsum la rim grogs//
skad cig mdo sde 'di bklags te// mkhan la sri zhus yon phul na// de lta bu yi mi rnams ni// bder gshegs drin la lan bsgrub yin// la las nor zas sna 'ga' yang//
gos drang kha zas bdog rnams kyis// kun la khyab par sbyin byas na// bcom ldan baka' drin 'tshob pa yin// rgyal bu dge mthong du yang nyon// nga yi chos 'di tha ma'i tshe// la
lasam 'ga' gros btab cing// thang cig mdo sde 'di mnyonan/ byang chub sems dpa' 'bum brgyal// yon phul bas ni 'dinganam/ theg mchog rdo sde 'di lta bu // sangs
rgyas byang chub yum yin pas// sangs rgyas byang chub dad bsams shing// 'di la rim gro gus bskyed la// gnyis med phanatshunasems snyoms na// sangs rgyas bka' drin
lan bsgrubs yin// rgyal bu dge mthong dayang nyon// la las chos 'di thama'i tshe// sangs rgyas bka' drin sgrub bsams te// thang cig bsam gtan thun zhugs na//
khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams // srogabyin pas ni 'di don che// dge 'dun bsam gtan dkrugs skuran// khams gsum gang ba'i mi rnams dang// sems can
thams cad bsadu dang mtshungs// bsam gtan dge 'dun dkrugs skur na// de yi sdig kyang de bzhin no// la las dge ba spyod mthong na// dpyas shing skur te ma mos na// dkon
mchog gsum gyi rigs kyang gcod// bcom ldan bka' drin bsgrubs pa min// de nas rgyal bu ga mthong dang// mi sum stong bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ chos bstan
zin nas/ dga' mgu yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs spyi bol blangs so// 'phags pa rtogs pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i mdo las/ phyag 'tshal ba'i cho ga dang/ 'gyod
changs kyi le'u ti'i rdzogs so////glegs bam mang po la gtugs te mtshan rnams ci nusabs bas so// ka@#// rgya
gar skad du/ Ar+yarat+name g+hanAm mahAyAn sUtra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog sprinaces bya ba theg pachen po'i mdo// kabam po dang po/
sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skadabadag gis thos
shu bya// pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ga yan/ ga ya mgo'i ri la dge slong bdun khri nyis stong gi dge 'dun chen po dag dang thab gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams
sacad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnan par grolab/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ rungashes pa//
glang po chen po/ byabacas pa/ byed pabyas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ sridapar kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par
grol ba la// sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa// chos kyi dbyings las mkhas pa// chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/ sems red padang bkur sti thams cadudang bralab/
legs par rab tu byung ba/ legs par bsnyen par rdzogs pa/ brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam la gnas pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa'i
zla 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad bribazhistong gi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang yang thabs gcig ste/ thams cad kyang skye ba
gcig gis thogs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon du phyogs pa// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'bab pa/ thams cad mkhyenang/
0 nyidal bab pa/ chags pa med pa'i gzus dang ting nge 'dzin thob pa// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la shin tu gnas pa/ mngon par shes pa chen pos ma par rol pa/ lam gyi
rgyan ma bcad pa sgrib pa dung/ chod pa dang/ kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bralab/ byams pa chenapo dang/ snying rjechenanges phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kyi khams thams cad khyab par
byedapa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'grol mkhas pa/ stong pa nyid sbyong yul ba/ mtshan ma med pal gnas pa/ smon lam la gnas pa thams cad bral ba/ sems can
thams cad la phan par brtson/ sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad la mkhas pa// ye shes mtha' yas pa/ sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ sems rgya mtsho ltar zab pa/
semasari'i rgyal po ri rab ltarami bsgral ba/ sems pad+ma ltar ma gos pa/ semagarin po che ltar shin tu yongs su drag pa/ sems gser ltar shin tu yongs su byang ba rnams la 'dilta ste/
byang chub semasadapa' sems dang ba chen po rin po che tog dang/ lag na rin po che dang/ lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang/ rin po che'i cod pan dang/ gtsug na rin po che dang/ rin po che brtsegs
pa dang/ rinapo che 'byung gnas dang/ rin po che'i rtse mo dang/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshanadang/ rdo rje'i snying bo dang/ gser gyi snying po dang/ rin po che'i snying po dang/ dpal gyi snying po/
dung dge ba'i snying po dang/ dge ba dri ma med pa'i snying po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang/ ye shes kyi snying po dang/ nyima'i snying bo dang/ ting nge
'dzin gyi snying po dang/ pad ma'i snying po dang/ rnam par grol ba'i snying po dang/ kun tu zla ba dang/ spyanas gzigs dbang phyug dang/ mthu chen thob dang/ kun tu bzang po dang/
kun nas mig dang/ pad+ma'i mig dang/ dri ma med pa'i mig dang/ yangs pa'i mig dang/ kun du skyod lam dang/ kun tumadzes deng/ kun tu spyod pa'i blo gros dang/ ye shes kyi blo gros
dang/ chos kyi blo gres dang/ rgyal ba'i blo gros dang/ bla ma'i blo gros dang/ rdo rje'i blo gros dang/ khyad par blo gros dang/ seng ge rnam par rol dang/ sgra chen po'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po
dang seng ge'i sgra sgrogs dang/ sgra dbyangs brjod pa zab mo sgra sgrog dang/ gos pa med dang/ drim kun bral dang zla ba'i 'od dang/ nyi ma'i 'od dang/ ye shes kyi 'od dang/ ye
shes kyi dpal dang/ bzang po'i dbal dang/ zla ba'i dpal dang/ pad+ma'i dbal dang/ rin po che'i dbal dang/ 'jam dbal gzhon nur gyur ba dang/ bzang skyongal sogs pa skyes
bu dam pa bcu drug dang/ byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang/ rgyal pomi bo bzhi la sogs ba rgyal chen bzhi'i rjesakyi
lha'i bu rnams dang/ lha'i dbang bo brgyabyin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang/ lha'i bu rab 'thab bral la sogs pa 'thab bral gyi lha'i bu rnams dang/ lha'i bu yongs
su dga' ldan la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang/ lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang/ lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la sogs
pagazhan phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams dung/ deng dpon dam pa la sogs pa dkar po'i phyogs kyi bdud kyi bu rnams dang/ tshangs pa chen po la sogs pa tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu thams
cad dang/ lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang/ lham yonakyi dbang po thag bzas ris dang/ stobs can dang/ sgra gcanAdang/
de dag la sogs pa lham yinaMb stong phrag dum dang/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros padang/ gzi rinadang/ rgya mtsho dang/ mtha' yas dang/ nor rgyas kyi bu dang/ de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal

po brgya stong dum dad// dpal gyi gzi brjidal sogs pa klu'i rgyal po'i khye'u brgya stong du ma dang/ klu'i bu mo mang po rnams dung/ de ma yin pa gzhan lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/
lcam yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po brgyastong dag dang thabs gcig go/ yang de'i tsho g.ya na/ g.ya'i mgo'i ri'i dpag tshad bzhi kho ra khor yug tu:
0 nyung/ sku'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi rdul phra rab tsam yang gang lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang
lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mim yin pa dag gis ma gang bar gyur pa'i sa phyogs sam/ bar snangagi phyog de med/ 'khor de lta bu 'dus shing ba bod pa'i dbus na/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi seng ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad phyed pa la// lhagu ras bcos bu brgyasong du ma ni bting/ rinaponu'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas ni bla re bres/ dar gyi lta
ste brgya stong du mni sangs/ me tog sil mas nigator ba zhig bshams te/ seng ge'i khri de'i kho ra khor yug go sa'i phyogs de nges rdo rje la yid du 'ong zhing lag mthil ltar mnyam pa dang/
lha chag chag legs par btab pa dang/ phyag bdar legs par byas pa dang/ dri rab tu zhimazhing lha'i me tog brgya stong du mas gtor bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs
spyod ba'i phyir phyogs de na gser gyi pad+maging rta'i 'phang lo tsam 'dab ma brgya stong dumayodapa/ tshubani'i/ snying po ni an+darIl/ thob ni rdzo'i snying po ste/ rab tu zhim zhing yid du 'ong
la/ regan dga' bar 'gyur ba dag skyes par gyur to// seng ge'i khri de'i grwa bzhir ha cang yang mi nye ba nasarinapo pa'i shing srid du dpagatshad phyed dang gnyis/ sboms su rgyang grags gsum gyi'o//
[n ]'khor ba pa'i skyes so// seng ge'i khri legs par b shams pa de 'a/ bcom ldan 'das blo ni rab tu rnam par dag/ chos kyi 'khor lo ni rab tu bskor/ bdud dang phyir rgol bani bcom/ 'jig

rten gyi chos rnams kyisanim gos lam bsnyengasang shing mi 'dzemaste/ seng ge ltar bag tsha ba med pa/ mtsho dang 'dra bar dang ste/ rtog pa med cing shin turnam 'dang ba/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar zad cing
gting dpag dka' la/ rin po che'i 'byang bganas su gyur pa/ ri rab ltar mngon par 'phags pa/ ti ma ltar rab tu lhun pa/ blob ltar rab tu sim pa/ klu chen po ltar chos kyi char pa mngon par
'dengs kha/ tshas pa chen po ltar 'jig rten kun las mngon par 'phags pa// slob ma shin tu dul ba mtha' yas pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor mnga' ba/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig
rten skyod byeb brag khrig brgya stong du mas zhal du bltas shing/ ma khengs ma dud par bazhugs de/ 'khor tshogs pa de ni lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar lham me lhan ne/

lhang nge ba'i dbu'i gtsug gi gtsug tor gyi gseb nas 'od zer kun tu snang zhes bya ba 'od zer gyi 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma yod pa byung ste/ dbyung nas phyogs b.ru thams cad du 'jig rten gyi bams rabs
byams thams cad snang bar byas te/ phyir 'ong nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo phye ba bam
sa @#// btsums par yang mi mngon no// 'dilta ste/ dperan nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi gseb tu zhugs kyang/ nam mkha'i khams kyi gseb phebadag
btsums par mi mngon pa de bzhin du/ de'i tshon 'od zer de dag zhugs kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo phye ba 'am/ btsums par mi mngon no// 'di lta ste/ dper na bye ma'i phung po la ma ram/
'bru mar ram/ nu zhugs nami mngon pa de bzhin du/ de'i tshodod zer de dag zhugs kyang bye ba 'am btsums par mi mngon no// de nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dis 'jig rten gyi
khams gadz+hI klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa/ pad+ma can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten kyi khams de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan
pa bde bar gshigs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyurab/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i spyan zhes bya ba de/ byang
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di lta ste// theg pa gcig la btsums nas chos stonate/ saukyi zhing de na nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dag dang nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am//
rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i ming yang med/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing denas te skye ba ma gtogs par bud med dngamangalan gnas te 'byung zhing skye ba'i sgra yang mi grag go/ 'jig rten gyi khams
wa de'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang/ blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'ashastag go/ 'jig rten kyi khams de na bza' ba dang/
btung ba dang/ bras kyi bya ba yang mi shes so// byang chub semasadapa' de dag thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi dga' ba'i zas can dang/ ting nge 'dzinagyi dga' ba'i zas nadang/ chos kyi
dag 'ba'i khras canano// de bzhin gshegs pa nga nyid kyi 'od kyis 'jig rtenagyi khams de khyab cing dri ma med par gyurab ma gtogs par 'jig rten gyi khams denazla ba dad/ nyim dang
skaram dang/ gza' rnams kyi 'od kyang mi shesaso// 'jig rten gyi khams de lag mthil bzhin dumanyam par gyur pa las 'jig rten kyi khams de na rtsa dang/ shing dang/ bong ba dang
rtsig pa dang/ ri la sogs pa yang mi snang ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams du'adrab dan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba de'i ming shosapa/
tsam gyis sems can gyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ba zhig gnas ste/ de'od dos reg ste bskul nas rang gi gnas nas phyung ste/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan
la ba der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ pad+ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag/
kyang 'od des re ba ste bskul ba dang/ ra rang gi gnas nas byad ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyan de ga la ba der song ste phyinanas/ bcom
ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ pad+ma'i snying po lasoso ci rigs par 'a khodad// de nas byang chub semasadapa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
klob stan las langasanas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tugawar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangapad+ma'i snying po la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagashegs pa pad+ma'i spyan ga la ba de logs
thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i 'od bzang po dri ma mamanI pa rnam par dag pa yid du mchi ba lus dang/ sems/
shin tu dga' bar bgyi ba byang ba 'di su'i lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang 2 bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i nanges/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam/
par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu nub phyogs nasangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dinas 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ mi mjed ces bya ni/
'jig rten gyi khams yodado// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde b.ragashegs ba/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa//
sa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan thos pa tsamakyis sems can rnams bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba zhig bzhugs te/ des 'od bzang bo dri ma med ba rnam par dag pa yin du 'ong ba lus dang sems shin tu dga' bar byedapa 'di spyad
ngo// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i spyanade la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'a chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam pa sel bas 'di skad/
ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur
ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyenagang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i sman des/ byang chubusems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa
thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di ltar sems canas gang dgagis
bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i ming thos pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par shog cig ces smon lam btab bo// byed

u'adas nyi lags/ sems na de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ma thos sam/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu thos so// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das

bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang de ltabu de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa yang lags l/ phyir mi ldog pa yang ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs
ba de'i mtshan thos pas sems can de dag gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bonaskyes pa mthong nas sems canade drag phyir mi ldog par lung stonato// mtshan thos pa kho nas dem thag tu de dag phyirami
ldog par 'gyur pa yang ma yin te/ dogs na rigs kyi bu don de nyid rab tu grub par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bshad do// rigs kyi bu 'di ltaste/ dper nashing la la'i sa bon gyi rnam pa zhig
0 yod de/ sa bon de la sa bon gyi nyes pa thams cad med pa/ myug skye ba nas/ rdzogs pa'i bar du rkyen rnams yod na/ rigs kyi bu sa bon de la jiskadaces bya/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan/
bas nyes pa thams cad dang bral bas na/ de ni yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'o// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir/
mi ldog pa'i sa bon yod pa 'i sems can rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no// deskad kyis bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa pad+ma'i sman de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag mi mjed kyi 'jig
rtenagyi khams de blta ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la yang phyag 'tshal ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang/
patsunaparab gyi ba dang/ ri mor bgyi ba dang/ bkur sti bgyi ba dang/ mchod par bgyi ba'i slad dumachi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pa'i
sngan des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i dus la da bab par shes na khyod song zhig/
nyu// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagashegs pa par 'i snga'adel/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'di skad skyes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
cag kyang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams debaltab dang/ bcom ldan 'das bzhin gshegs bdwagrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la yang phyag 'tshal
ba dung/ bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang/ btsun par bgyi ba dang/ mor bgyi ba dang/ bkur sti bgyi ba dang/ mchodapar bgyi ba'i slad dumachi'o// ngaskad ces gsol pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i nanges/ byang chub sems dpa' dngag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dgu de'i dus la dbab par shes na khyed de shig
'jig rten gyi khams der ngag yod par gnas pas gnas par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhan/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can dudagani rab tu 'dodachags mang ba/ zhesdang
zla mang ba/ gti mug mngang/ dge sbyong dmi 'dzinapa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ phar mi 'dzin pa/ mar mi 'dzin pa/ chos ma yinab/ 'dod pa mang ba/ b.rung ba/ gtum pa//
zhe gcod pa/ mu cor ba/ pho theg can/ g.yengs pa/ brkam// le lo can/ tshul khrims 'chal pa/ sdigo pa'i chos can/ phrag dog dngaser snas yongs su dkris pa/ nyon
mongs pa du mas zhebar nyon mongs par gyur pa rnams te/ sems can de 'dra ba de dag gi nang na de bzhin gshegs pa de tshos ston to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das ganga'adi 'drab 'i sems can rnams kyi nang na chos ston pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dka' ba mdzad pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no//
rigs kyi bu dag de bzhinate/ gang 'di 'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyinang na chos ston pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs paredaka' ba mdzad pa yin no// rigs kyi bu dag gang de lta bu r kun nas nyon
mongs par gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ dge ba'i sems gcig tsam bskyod pa'i sems canade dag kyang dka' ba byed pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ gang yongs su dag pa'i 'jig
rten gyi bamasan/ sems canayongs su dag pa yod pa lta ci 'tshal kyi/ gang dag de ltar kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas grol gtog ba srid du yang dad pa med pa
dang/ se gol gtogs pa srid du yang sangs rgyus laskyabs su 'gro bdung/ chos la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ se gol gtogs pa srid du yang tshul
khrims yang dag par gzung ste/ spyod pa 'di ni ches ngo mtshar to// de bas kyang gang dgose gol gtogs pa srid duyang 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa'i sems yang dag par gza[=1]
00/ @#// gaste gnas pa 'dini ches ngo mtshar to// de bas kyang gang dag se gol gtogs pa sridedu yang snying rje ba'i sems nye bar bzhagaste/ blan med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tusems bskyed ba 'dini ches ngo mtshar to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngomatshar to//
de nas sgrib pa thams cad m par sel ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das de las/
'di lta bu 'thun pa'i rjes su bstan pa de mnyananas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgongos phyag 'tshal te/ rang rang gi gnas nas dong ngo// dong nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa
la mchod pa'i phyir/ la lasani rin po tshe'i shing me tog drang bcas pa/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa/ nu zheng du ldan pa rnams mngon par sprul/ la las nib cha ma'i shing rnams / 'o
lasani shel gyi shing rnams / la las ni dpag bsam shing rnams // la las ni gser gyi shing rnams / la las ni me tog gi shing rnamasaM/ la las ni 'bras bu'i shing rnams /
la lasani gos kyi sprena rnams / la las ni rgyan gyi sprin rnams / la las ni skyes kyi sbyin rnams / la las ni 'phreng ba'i sprin rnams / la lasani phye ma'i sngan rnams // la las ni/
ba gdugs kyi sun rnams / la las ni rgyal mtshan gyi sprin rnams / la las ni sil snyanakyi sprin rnams mngon par la to// mngon par lanas gcig tu 'dus te/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang lhan cig tu mam dred kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ga 'kha dor dong ngo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnal
bar sel bas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces sbas so// kye ma'o grogs po dag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams sdug bsngal lo// dengs na
gang gis sems canade dag thams cad bde ba mchog gis bstabs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba legrwapar mngon par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'adi kun gyis lug
so zhes smras nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i ltamanyan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par selabs/ jilta bu'i
'phrul mngon par byas pas/ byang nubasems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i lus las 'od dang badri ma med pa rnam par dag pa yid du 'ong ba lus dang sems shinatu
dga' bar byed pa byang ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab cing snang bar gyur pa dang/ gang stong gsumagyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i
sems can dmyal ba pa'i lus su gnas pa dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i lus su gnas pa dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i lus su gnas pa de dag 'od des
ka reg nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang bralate/ bde zhing khrob dang/ gnodasems dang ya nga bral te/ ban tshun du la mar 'du shes par gyur pa dang/ yang stong gsum gyi stong chenapo ni
'jig rten gyi khams 'din/ 'jig rten gyi bar mun pa mun nag gang du nyim dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu cheb/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa/ 'di dag
gis kyang lham me lhan ne lhang nger ma gyur pa/ de dag kyang 'od des khyab nas snang b.ragyur te/ gding skyes pa resemasacan de dag kyang gcig gis gcig mthong/ stong la/sumakyi
stong chen po'i 'jig rten kyi khams 'di'i gung khor yug gi ri rnams dang/ khor yug gi chen rnams dung/ ri btang bzung dang/ ri btang bzung chenapo rnams dang/ de
yin pa'i ri nag po gzhan de dag kyang 'od des kyang khyab ste snang bar gyur pa dang/ slar nitshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad/ 'og tu nimanar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po yan chad
po'i bar du gang 'od nges snang bar ma byas pa'i sa phyogs de gang yang med pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par byab mngon par byas so// de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag
ba gis kyang ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas pas/ zas 'dod pa'i sems can rnams ni zas thob/ btung ba 'dod pa rnams ni btung ba/ gos 'dod pa rnams
ni gos/ bzhonapa 'dod rnams ni bzhon pa/ nor 'dod rnams ninor thob/ long ba rnams ni mi'i thob/ 'on pa rnams ni sgra thos sgren mo rnams ni gos can du gyur//
myos ba rnams ni dran pa lob/ sdug bsngal ba rnams ni bde bar gyur: sbrum pa rnams nibade bar btsus pa/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrulamangonapar bye ba mngon par byas so// de nas
sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa byang bsems dpa' de dag thoms cad yul ga ya dang/ ga ya mgo'i ri ga lo bdir nye ba dang/ skyes bu dam pa de dag nye bar
gyur ma thag tu stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'o jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i dra bas khebs par kun tu snang ngo// stong gi bar snang las kyang lha'i par 'i char mngon par rab tu
bab bo// lha'i me tog gi sbyin rnams dang/ lha'i gshing thog gi sprin rnams dang/ lha'i 'phreng ba'i sprinu rnams dang/ lha'i sos kyi sprin rnams dang/ lha'i gos kyi nananas/
dang/ lha'i phyoma'i sprin rnams dang/ lha'i chos gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bden gyi nagyi char mngon par rab tu bab bo// dedag mngon par rab tu bab
gapas sems can gang la reg pa de thams cad rab tu bde bar gyur/ yul ga ya dang/ ga yu mgo'i ri la shing thuma' ba dwang/ sa phyogs thamal pa gang
yod pa de dag thams cad kyang med par snang ngo// sa phyogs de dag rin po ma'i shing rnams dang/ dpagabasam gyi shing rnams dang/ me tog gi shing rnams dang/ 'bras bu'i shing
rnams dang/ tsanadan kyi shing rnams dang/ a ka ru'i shing rnams kun tu snang ste/ de dag kun tu bzang por 'dug par gyur to// bar snang na lha'i sil snyan dag sgra 'byin cing/
sil snyan de dag las 'di lta bu'i tshigs bcad pa 'di dag kyang byung ngo// lum bi'i tshal rab mchog tu gang skyes pa// mnyam medagazhar yang nyon mongs dbang mi 'gyur// namamakhas/

zla dri medagazi ldan de la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags// chos tshul 'di dag sgyum ge rgyudang// chu zla 'dra bar gang gisartogs gyur pa// bsod nams zhing
rab de la phyag 'tshal du// ribamchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags// chos rnams sna tshogs 'dzab dong 'drab dong/ kar la lta 'drar gong sa rab rtogs pa// mi g.yo bsod namA
sa thagater la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags// gang gis bskul pa brgya phrug mang por ni// thugs rje'i thugs kyi tshogs kun rdzogs mdzadang// dri med
bla zhal de la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di 'a bdag cag lhags// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya mang dang// lha yi tshogs kyis de bzhin gang mchod ba// gti mug mun bral
del phyag 'tshol du// rib mchog rab 'di bdag cag lhags// gang gis mchog gis chos kyi gter brnyes shing// thugs rje skyed kyis 'jigartenadag la btang// mnyam med
phan mdzad de la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab bdi la bdag cag lhags// gang zhig thugs zhi rtag par byams pa'i yid// pad+manus ltar nyon mongs ma gos pa/ yon tan mchog
rab mnga' la phyag 'tshol du/ ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags// mtshan gyi me tog rgyas pa yongs su dag pa'i sku// dpe byad bzang po'i 'bru chags 'gro ba'i 'tshob gang/
yal ga mtha' yasarin chenashing la phyag 'tshal du// bdag cag thams cad lhan cig mchod pa thogs te lhags// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ma thag tu/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u

kaces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ modang ldan pa mo'u 'galagyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka'astsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu shar phyogs nasangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig

zla nyid dang lhan cig tu/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs pa de dag gi snga ltas bde yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal mazag tu/ donas byang ba

srid pa'i mya nganargalang po// nyon mongs rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad du yang rgyal che ste// kun nas rab tu lhan ner bzhugs// kun nas rnam par grol ba po/ phyag 'tshal
mtshungs mtshungs med la// rab tu mi bsgulari bo bzhin/ gting tshod yangs brgya mtsho 'dra// skyegs kun nas mi bskyod pa// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi 'khor
lobaskor ban// gzod nas zhi zhing ma skyes pa// rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa yin// chos rnams mgon po khyod kyis bstan/ la la la ni lam yang bstan// la la yang dganyid la bkod//
la la yang dag mya nganazlas// 'al byang chub lung yang bstan// bag la nyal dang bsam pa mkhyen// khyod kyis mi mkhyen ci yang med// de phyir 'dul ba'i bya ba rnams // gzigasangs
khyod kyi bka' 'grub bo// byang pa sIng por bzhugs pa na// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// dri ma sna tshogasagazhan rnams kyang// khyod kyi ye shes me yis bsregs//
