brgal nas sems can rnams sgrol zhing// grol nas skye dgu grol mdzad de// srid pa'i mya ngan 'khyams pa yi// 'jig rtenatshol ba khyod lags so// srid pa'i btson
'bar sems can dag// yuring mi shes gnyid log rnams // sad par mdzad po mgon po khyod// gnyen gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyi sras mchog 'di dag kyang// thams cad
byang chub sladadu zhugs// dam pa'i chos ni nyan 'tshol na// 'dren pas de dag bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'dus la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par spel bas//
tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ pad+ma'i snying bo la phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag tham
cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas pad+ma'i snying bo la so so ni rigs par 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba stan las langs te/ blagos
phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangapad+ma'i sing po la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsolato// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba
la 'di skad des bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rtag tu skabs phyes/ de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang/
dris ba de dang de nyid du ludang stan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib
pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa phun sumatshogs pa rnams lags/
jiltar na tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams 'gras 3 jiltar na bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na
bsam gtan phunasam tshogasab rnams lags/ ji ltaran shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na thabs mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na smon lam phun sum
tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na ye shes phunasam tshogs pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems
@#ku/ dpa' sa dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ji ltarananu dang mtshud pa rnams lags/ jiltar na me dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na rlung dmar dngamadud
po ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na nam mkhag dang mtshungs pa rnams lugs/ ji ltar na sgrub lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na nyi ma dngamatshungs pa lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na seng ge lta bu /
rnams legs/ driltar na dul ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na cang shes pa rnams lags/ ji ltaran pad+ma lta bu rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nabyang chub sems dpa la sems rgya chab
rnams lags/ ji ltar na sems rnam par dag pa rnams lags/ ji ltar nasemasanem nur ma mchis pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 'byung chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho lta bu rnamA
lags/ ji ltar na blo zhib pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rig pa'i myos pa na rnams lags/ ji ltar na grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams lags/
ji ltar na rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ ji ltar nusemasacan thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
tshig gzung ba rnams 'gas/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltaran byang chub sems dpa' chos brjodapa rnams lags/ ji ltar na chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams lags/ jiltar na chos kyi dbyesal
bal mkhas pa rnams la gas/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na
smon lam la gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams lags/ jiltar na snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams lags/ jiltar na dga' ba la
gnas pa rnams la gas/ jiltar na btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'dusaji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa rnam par rol parnamasalags/ ji ltar na
mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar nabyang chub kyi sems mi stor ba rnams lags/ riltar na tshe rabs dran pa rnams lags/ jiltar na dge ba'i bshes gnyenadung
ma bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su sngangs pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltakhan byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid thob
bar 'gyur/ ji ltar na lus rdo rje ltar srab rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ri ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon rnams lags/ ji ltar na lam la mkhas pa rnams lags/
jiltar na lam ma log par ston pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rtag turgyun mi 'chadapar sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan
bya@#// 'das ji ltar dbyang chub sems dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar nas gosagasum pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na phyi pa can rnams lags/
bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod sems ba rnams lags/ jiltaranastanagacig pa rnamasalags/ ji ltagan bras phyis mi lenapa rnams lags/ bcom
lcaldan 'das ji ltaran byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na shing drung ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na bla gab med pa rnams lags/ jiltar na dur khrodabanams lags/
ji ltar na rtog pa pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na gzhi jibazhin pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nabyang chub semAdapa' rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na mdo sde 'dzin
b rnams lags/ jiltaran 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams lags/ jiltar mchog dang/ spyod yul dang/ spyod lam phunasum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar naser sna dang phra dog dang
bral ba rnams lags/ jilta na sems can thams cad la sems soms pa rnams lugs/ ji ltar nade bzhin gshegs pa la mchodapa dang rim gro bgyidamakhas ba rnams lags/
ji ltar nang rgyal bcom pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na dad pa mang ba rnams lags/ ji ltar nanardzob la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar don dam pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/
ji ltar narten cing 'brel pa 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams lags/ jiltar nabadag shes pa rnams lags/ ji ltaran 'jig rtenashes ba rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/
byang chub sems dpa' sas rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye/ ji ltar namangal gyi drims ma gos par skye/ ji ltar na khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na 'atso
ba yongs su dag pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na yid yongs su mi skyo ba rnams lags/ ji ltarand de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin bgyid po rnams lags/ jiltar na bzhin/
'dzum zhing khrogater ma mchis pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na mang du thos pa rnam lags/ ji ltar na dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams lags/ ji ltar nachos kyi rgyal po'i sras
rnams lags/ ji ltar na brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong bas bsub rnams lags 1 jiltar nabasam pa dang bag la nyal ba 'tshal ba rnams lags/ jiltar/
na semA can yongs sminapar bgyi ba'i chos 'tshol ba rnamA lags/ ji ltar na des pa rnams 'gA/ji ltar na 'groslu ba bdeb rnams lags/ jiltar bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams lags/ji lta tshul du/
shis ba rnams lags/ ji ltaranaganas bca' ba rnams lags/ jiltaran rtsi'i rgyal po de shing chen po lta bu rnamA lags/ jiltar nabasodanams bgyi ba la brtson ba rnams lags//
'ji ltaran sprul pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya// de skadartsis gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to// rigs kyi bu legs so legasaso// yang rigs kyi bu khyodaskye bo mang po la phan pa dang/ skye bo mang po la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang/ skye bo phal po che dang/
lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang/ phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod 'di lta bu'i don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir
khogs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'dras legs so zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyiltar mnyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu chosabacudang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//
ba gang zhan/ 'di ltaste/ chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin b phunasumatshogs pa rnams yin/ zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams
yin lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi'i ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs ba rnams yin/ snying rjeba'i sbyin ba phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi kharas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin//
bsti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mchod pa dang rim gro'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa phunasumatshogos pa rnams yin/ yongs su dag
pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs ba yin zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems
dang 'a thang zing med pa'i semasakyis chos rnams 'dzin cing/ kun chub par byed do/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i phyir ma yin/ shes kyi zhe 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin/ grags pa 'dod pa'i
phyir ma yin te/ gzhan du na de 'di ltar sems can 'di dag gi gabasngal thams cad ji ltar zad par bya snyam ste/ chos de dag kyang zang zing med pa'isems kyis gnyis su med pa gzhan
dag la'ang yang dag par ston to// ji ltar rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po la yang dag par stonapa de ltaragadrol pa 'am/ gdol bu la 'ang yang dag par stonan/ do ma yin pa grong rdul gyi
mi dang/ yul gyim gzhan dag la lta ci smos/ chos kyi sbyin pa des khes par yang mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no//
ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bdag gis dbyig pa bor ba dang
mtshonam bor ba yin te/ gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyidal gzhog go/ sems can thams cad la par 'du shes pa yin/mar 'dushes pa yin/khur 'du shesab yin/rtsa lag tu'adushes pa len/
n+d+ha nyedu 'am/ snag gi gnyen mtshams dag kyang rung bar 'du shes pa yin no// de ci'i phyir non/ de 'dis ma du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang skye ba 'pho ba de dang de dag tu/ sems can
gyings su gang khyed kyi pa 'am/ ma 'am/ bu bam/ rtsa lag gram/ nyadu 'am/ snag gi gnyenamatshams gang yang rung ba'i gnasasum gyur pa'i sems can de lta bu med do zhes gsungs so
nyamanas/ du srogachags su gyur ba phra mo phyir yang bdag gis ga dag gis kyang phan 'dogs ban/ srog chags chen bo che ba gzhan dag la lta ci smos te/ doltar na byang chub sems dpa'
mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa phunasumatshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpasem
tshacan gangadagami dgib 'i las rab tu byed pa mthongan/ dedag zang zing gis bsdus shing/ bdezing gis bsdus nas/ mi dge ba'i gnas de nas bsangs te dge ba'i gnas su 'god/
waThado de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sbyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub bo// byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa nA/ mi dge ba'i chos phrag/
dag drung/ ser sna dang/ nganasems gsum sangs pa yin no zhes gsungs te/ de bsan bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab cing sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o snyam ste/ de sbyin pa
yang sbyin zhing sbyin pa des khengs par yang mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zang zing gi sbyin pa phunasum tshogs pa yin no// ji lto na byang chub sems dpa' la lan du phan
'dogs pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin b yang/ 'dod pa'i phyir sbyin pa mi sbyin/ phan 'dogs su re ba'i phyir ma yin/
donagyi phyir ma yin/ g.yog gi phyir ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi tshul gyi phyir ma yin gyi/ gzhan duna'adisnyam du sems te/ gang byang chub sems dpa' napa'i ngang tshul can du 'gyur ba 'di
ni chos nyid yin no snyam ste/ de rgyu de dang/ rkyen de dang/ gzhi des phan btags pa'i lan duphan 'dogs pa thams cad la mi re bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed du/ de ltar na byang chub sems
dba'alan du phan 'dogs pa latshor ba'i sbyin pa phun sumatshogs pa yin no/ riltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rjeba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub
sems dbab sems can sdug bsngal ba dang/ bkres pa dang/ skom pa dang/ gcer bu dang/ gos nganab dang/ bgo ba nganapa dang/ mgon med
dang/ dpung gnyen med pa dang/ skyabs med bdang/ gnas med pa dang/ rten med pa lta bu bsod nams med pa dag mthong na/ ded la snying rje ba'i sems rab tu skyed cing de nyid
snyam du sems te/ sogs canagang dag gi phyir bdag gis thun medab yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag ni sdug bsngal ba mgon med
pa/ dpung gnyen med ba/ skyabs med pa/ gnas med pa/ rten med ba 'di dug yin te/ kun tu 'khyamananam zhig bdag sems can dodag gi mgon dang/ dbudaganyen
ts+tshA dang/ skyabs dang/ gnas dang/ rten du 'gyuranAmanas/ de nyid rjes rab tumi zadade/ bdog cing yod pa'i dngos pos sems can de dag la lan 'dogs so// phan btag
ba'i mod la skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des kyang khengs par mi 'gyur te/ deltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rjeba'i sbyin pa phunasum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
mi brnyas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems pa'i sbyin ba na/ bor ba'i sbyin ba mi sbyin/ b.rAs shing sbyin pa mi sbyin/ gshozhing sbyin b mi spyin/ nyon
ba/ mongs gi nga sbyin ba mi sbyin/ byug ngas rgyags shing dregs te sbyin pa mi sbyin/ grags pa 'dod cing sbyin pa mi sbyin/ mang du thos pas rgyags shing dregs pas sbyin pa mi sbyin gyi/ ci sbyin
pade yang bsostang du byas shing sbyin pa sbyin par byedad// btsunabar byas shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// rimar byas mdo cing rang gi lag nas sbyin pa sbyin bor byedado// de ltaran/
byang chub sems dpa' mi b.ras pa'i sbyin pa phunasum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsti stang gi sbyin pa phunasumatshogs pa yonazhen/ byang chub sems dpa' slob/
bon dang/ ma khanabo dang/ bla ma lta bu dang/ tshangs pa mtshungs bar spyod ba gang dag mthong na/ lus kyis zhus pa dang bcas pa yin/ sems kyis ri mo dang bcas pa yin te/ des
gus pa bskyed/ ri mo bskyed nas kus bar skya ba dang/ phyag 'tshal ba dang/ bsu ba dang/ thal mo sbyar ba dang 'a 'dud pa'i las dag byed do// de dag gis dge ba dang ldan pa'i bya
bde dang de dag la'ang grogs su 'gyur te/ deltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs ba yin no// ji ltan byang chub sems dpa'amachodab dang rim gro'i sbyin ng/
thunaatshogs pa yinazhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la bya ba de dag byed de/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas la bya ba dag byed rkyen/ 'di ltaste/ dbazhi
gshegos ba'i mchod rten dag dung/ dbazhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la sos sam/ metog gam/ bdug pa 'am/ phyag pa 'am/ skyang nul lam/ de bzhin/
na gshegs pa'i mchod rten zhig pa bcos pa rtag mis te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas la bya bo dag byed do// ji ltar na chos la bya ba dag byed rkyen/ dachos nyanato// 'chang go/ klog go/
lcamiger 'dri'o// kha tonabyed do// kun chub par byedado// sems so// ma log par bsgom pa'i sbyor bar gom par byede/ de ltar na chos la bya ba dag byed do// ji ltar na dge 'dun
la bya ba byed rten/ chos gos dang/ bsod soms dang/ mal cha dang/ naba'i gsos sman dang/ yo byadarnamasadang/ thanamuyang kho bor gang tsam yang dge 'dun la 'bul te/ de
ltar na dge 'dunu labya ba dag khyed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa dngarimagro'i sbyin baphunasum tshogs pa yin no// jiltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa

phun sum tshogal yin zho na/ 'dilatsang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nyin pan/sbyin pa 'gabadag lha lam/lha la la zhig tushog cig ce'am/ rgyal bo ma/ rgyal po la la zhig tu shog cig ces de ltasemami bskyed de de lta
a na byang chugasemA pa' mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi
00 'di la byang chub sems dpa' spyin pa 'di dag ji skad dubashad la so sor rtog pa'i rab zhin can yin te/ sbyin pa ci dang ci sbyin yang/ sbyin pa de dang de la so sor rtog pa'i drang bzhin
can yin no// ded ltar so sor rtog pa lagrang 'di sbyin pa'i nyes ba dur/ sbyin pa'i dri gdang/ sbyin pa'i bar du gcod ba de dag mi 'byuste/ deltar narigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
yongasudag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ rigs kyi'u chos b.ru bodi dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems duba' sbyin pa phun tshogs b rnams yin no/ rigs kyi
buchos bcu dang ldanon/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phun sum tshogs bcas yin/ khatsugangazhin/ 'di lta sto/ so sor bar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa rnams yin/
byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa rnams yin/ 'onamongs pa thamasacad kyilongasasugadung ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ tshul bzhinam yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral ba
rnams yin/ las kyi 'jigs pa rnams yin/ kha namakho bas 'jigs pa rnams yin/ 'jigs par ltab rnams yin/ yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa rnams yin/ mi gnas
pa'i tshul khrims pa rnams yin/ gakhor gsum yongasasu dag pa'i tshul khrims ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so sor thar pa'i sdoms
gabasams pa rnams yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di labyang chub sems dpa' de bzhinagashegs pas mdo sde 'am/ 'dul ba ma/ gnas gang yang rung ba la dag bslab
pa'i gzhi 'di dag gang bcas bde dag ston pas bstan pa'o snyam du bsams te/ gnas de dang de dag la shin tu legs par slob kyi/ rigs la 'dod chags ngas ma yin/ lta ba la 'dod/
pasum yin/ 'khor ba la 'dod chags pas ma yin/ gang zag gi skyon gyi phyir bslab pa'i gzhi de dang de dag la ri mo byed pa ma yin te/ daltar na byang chub sems dpa'aesir thar pa'i
sdom pas bsdams pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin zhen/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'disnyam so sor thar pa'i
[% ]/sdom pa tsam gyis ni/ bdag gis blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngonapar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus sa/ dbazhin gshegs pas mdo sde de dang de dag las byang
chub sems dpa'i yang dag par skyed pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gnas rnams kyang gang/ 'di dag gangabs pa de dag la bdag gis bslab par bya'o zhes rnam par
dpyod do// byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par spyad pa de dgazhigang/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gnas de rnams kyang gang zhen 'dil byang chub sems dpa' gang gi phyir de la
sems can rnams dud par 'gyur ba'i gnas ma yin par mi spyod/ dus ma yin par mi spyod/ ulam yin par mi spyod/ dus ma yin par mis ba yin/ dus mi shes pa ma yin/ yul mi
shes pa ma yin/ tshod mishes pa ma yin te/ sems narjes su srung ba dung/ bdag gi byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs bar bya ba'i 'i/ spyod lam phun sum tshogs shing 'jam
bar bdang/ dal bus smra ba dang/ 'du 'dzi mi mang ba dang/ rab tu dbenabal mngon par phyogs pa dang/ bzhin gyi mdangs rab tu dang ba yin te/ de ltar nabyang chub sems dpa'
chog phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i bslob pa'i sdom pas bstams pa yin zhe na/ dbazhinagashegs pas mdo sde de dang de dag la
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'di dag gang bcas ba'i bslab pa'i gdedag la gus par byed pa yin/ brtson byed pa yin te/ de lta nubyang nubasems dpa' byang
sems dpa'i bslab pa'i sdom pas bstams pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' na mosab thams cad kyis yongs su gdung ba dang bral ba yin zhen/ 'di la byang chub sems
dpa' 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdung ba 'am/ zhesdang gis yongs su gdung ba 'am/ gti mug gis yongs su gdung ba 'am/ nyon mongs pas yongs sub rung ba gang yang rung ba la
bya// 'am yo byad kyis 'byongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba gang da dung bu la las yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur te/'dod chag kyiganyen po la rten cing/ 'dod chag skyeba'i rkyen rnam yongs spyod do//
ka 'dod chags kyi gnyen po de dag ni gang 1 bdod chags skye ba'i rkyen de dag ni gang zhen/ mi sdug pa bsgom pa ni 'dod chags kyi gnyen po'o// yul gyi bzang mo ni 'dod chags skyepa'i
rgyu rkyenato// mi sdug pa bsgom pa degang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ lus 'di la sgra dang/ grwa dang/ sen mo dang/ song/ rdul dang/ dIm dang/ pags pa dang/ sha dang/ rus
ba dang/ rgyus po dang/ rtsa drang/ mkhal ma dang/ snying dang/ mchin pa dang/ glo ba dang/ rgyum dang/ gnyom dang/ pho ba dang/ sul mangs dang/ long ka dang/ lhang
ba dang/ mchir pa dang/ phyis dang/ mchil ma dang/ rngul dang/ snabs dang/ ngar snabs dang/ zhag dang/ chu ser dang/ rkang dang/ tshel dang/ mkhris pa dang/ bad kan
dang/ ga dang/ khrag dang/ glad pa dang/ glang rgyus dang/ gcin dag yodade/ dngos po de dag la byung chub sems dpa' yongs su rtog pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/ yongs su
rtog pa'i rang bzhin can de 'di snyam du/ byis pa blun po mi gsal ba mi ma khas pa de yang dngos po 'di dag shis nas/ 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed na/ shes rab ldan pa'i rang
mtha' bzhin can lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi sdug pa bsgom pa la ngamang ba yin no// yul gyi bzang bo de gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems bsamags/
bar 'gyur ba'i bud med kyi gzugs bzang ba/ yid du 'ong ba/ mdzes pa/ mig tu sdug pa/ sems 'phrog pa mthong yang des de lta bu dag mthong na/ 'di ltar yongs su rtog ste/
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang yul ni rmi lam dang 'dra ba dag ste/ byung nas med par 'gyur ba yinan/ mkhas pa'i rang bzhinasu zhig rmi lam lta bu'i yul dag la 'dod chags skyed par byed
ces gsus so snyam ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpag 'dod tshogs kyi gnyen po lo rten cing/ 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su rtsod ngo// jiltaran byang ba sems
dba' zhe sdang gi gnyon po la rten cing/ zhe sdang skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su slong zhi na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams 'byams pa mang ba yin/ de gzhigang dang/
rgyu gang dang/ rkyen gang gis khro zhing gnod sems su 'gyur ba dang/ khon du 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i rgyud dag rkyen de dag yongasasu slong ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zhi stag
ginyin po la rten cing/ zhe sdang skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong ba yin no// jiltar nabyang chub sems dpa' gti mug gnyen la rten cing/ gti mug skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs
su song zhe na/ de de ltar yongs su rtog pas gti mug dang bral bar 'gyur// gti mug dang bral bas 'dod pa ma 'byor tam yo byadam 'byor kyang so su yi 'chadapa med de/
de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs ba thams cad kyi yongs su gdung ba dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar nabyang chub sems dbab tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba yin zhe
na 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gcig po lkog tusong ste rab tu dbenapa na gnas shing/ 'di ltar bdag ni ma 'dres par gnas pa ste/ bdag ni rab tu dbenang na 'dug pa'o// bdag/
na de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la zhugs pa 'o// dge sbyong ngam bram ze gzhan dag ni kun kyang 'dres par gnas pa/ 'du 'dzomadab/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba
tsa las nyams pa'o snyam du sems mi skyed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhinam yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dban las kyis 'jig pa yin
zhen/ 'de la byang chub sems dbang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang/ dge slong rnams bsod nams dgagus par bya'o// tshul khrims gus par bsrung ngo// shes rab nusapar
bsgom mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams gus par byas pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ 'dod pa dang/ 'thad pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ yid du 'ong bar nyams su myong bar[:/:]
ma 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so snyam du dpyodado// de de ltar mngon par yid ches pas mi dge ba'i chos thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na las kyis 'jigs pa yin no// ji ltar
nabyang chub sems dpa' banam bro bas 'jigs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa la kha na ma tho ba phra mo tsam dag la'ang 'jigs par lta zhing/ sdig pa chung ngu yang khyad du mi
gsod ba yinate/ 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang/ dge slong rnams dug chung ngus kyang skyes bu 'chi bar 'gyur// dge slong rnams gachananges kyang skyes bu 'chi bar 'gyu'o/
de bzhin du sdig pa chung dus kyang ngan song rnams su phyin par byedado// sdig pa chen pos kyang gnasong rnams su phyin par byed do zhes gsus so snyam du sems so// de de ltar yongs su
rtog pa'i khonam tho bas 'jigs pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa minano// ji ltar na byang nub sems dpa' 'jigs par lta ba yin/
zhen/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bram zedang/ rgyal rigs dang/ grong dal gyi mi dang/ yul gyi mi rnams kyis yid 'artan du rung ba yinate/ bram ze dang/ rgyalarigs dang/
grong rdal gyi mi dang 3 yul mi rnams byang chub sems dpa' de gcig pu gnyis su med pa la 'gron bu dang/ gser dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ bskrusmadang/ dung dang//
man shel dang/ byu ru la sogs pa nor dang/ yo khyad kyi rnam ba dag 'dems kyang/ de la byang chub sems dpa' brnab sems kyang mi skyed do// gal te byang chub
sems dba' mchod rten gyi'am/ dge 'dunagyi dngos po'i phyir las su bskosan yang/ ngos po des kyang nyebar mi 'tshoste/ de 'di snyam du sems shing bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang/
byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag gi lus las sha zos kyang bla'i/ gzhan gyi zas sam/ skom mam/ yo byad kyirnam pa gang nyid yang rung ba dag ma byin la ma gnang bar spyad pa nimi rung ngo zhes
'gi gsungs so snyam ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig par lta ba yin no// jiltar na byung chub semasadapagung yang drag par blangs pa la brtan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems
glu dpa' bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lho rnams kyis gtses sam/ nor dang 'khrig pa'i yarnalag gis brjod kyang mi g.yo mi 'gyur zhing nyams par mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa la yang
ba dag par blangs pa la brtan pa yin no// ji ltakhan byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims srung natshul khrims 'dis bdag lhur
shog cig ce'am/ lha la lar shog cig skye 'cha/ rgyal bor shog cig rtse 'am/ rgyal po la lar shog cig ces sems mi skyedado// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims
ba yin no/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims ba zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lus kyis yongs su dag pa yin no// ngag dang
yid kyis yongs su dag ba yin/ ji ltarin las kyis yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ deg lus kyis ngan du spyod pa 'dodag thams cad du thams cad yongs su song ste// lus kyis ngan du
spyod pa de dag kyang gangazhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang/ mabyin par len pa dang/ 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa ste/ de ltar na lus kyis yongs su dag pa yin no// ji ltar na dag gis/
yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ de gang 'di dag gis ngan du skyod pa de dag thamAcad du tham cad yongs srang ste/ dgagis ngan du spyod pa de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rdzun du ba dang/ khram
dang/ tshig rtsub po dang/ tshig bkyal ba ste/ de ltar na ngag gis yongs su dug yin no// ji ltar na yid kyis yongs su dag pa yin zhen/ degang 'di dag yid kyis ngan du spyod ba de dag
thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/ yid kyis ngand spyod pa de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ brnabasems dang/ gnod sems dang/ log par lta bu 'o// de ltar na yid
kyis yongs su dag pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub soms dpa' 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims can yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu bo de dag dang ldan n/
byang samasadapa'alu wan/ byang chub sems duba' tshul khrims phunasum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcud ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa phun
ma tshogs pa rnams yin no// bcugabazhin/ 'di lta ste/ nang gi brjod ba phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ phyi'i bzodab phunasumatshogs pa rnams yin/ chos kyi bzod pa phun sum
tshogs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ nyitsho ba ma yin pa'i bzod ba phunasum tshogs pa rnams yin/ tha dadapa med pa'i bzod pa
phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ gos pa la mi lta ba'i bzod pa phunasum tshogs pa rnams yin/ ma bar mi 'khrug pa'i bzod pa phunasum tshogs pa rnams yin/ sing rje'i bzod pa phun
( sum tshogs ba rnams yin/ dam bcas pa nyams su lon par byed pa'i bzod pa phunasumatshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nang gi bzod ba phun
tshogs pa yin zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di dag nang gi mya nganadang/ se sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug ba de dag
bzod cing dang du len la yongs sa yi mi chadade/ de ltaron byang chub sems dpa' nang gi bzod pa phun sumatshogs ba yineno// riltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyi'i bzod pa phun sumatshogs pa
0 ]yinazhen/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'am las sos pa ma/ las smos pa'am/ nye du las sos pa 'am/ mkhan las smos pa 'am/ slob dpon las smos pa'i tshig gi lam/
ngan du brjod pa dang/ nadub pha rolas thos sam/ sangs rgyas sam/ chos sam/ dgo 'dunal mi snyan par brjod pa thosan/ mi bro zhing gnod par mi sems la/ khon du mi 'dzin
te 3 di bzod cing dang du len la gnod sems mi mang ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyi'i bzod pa phunasum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi bzod
ba phun sum tshog pa yin zhin/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di dag mdo sde zab mozab mo dag las de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstanapa rgyun chad ba/ mtshams sbyor ba la sa rnam
par grol ba ba med ba 'de lta ste/ chos thams cad thog ma nas zhi ba'o// chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes bstan pa dodag thos kyang mi 'jigs mi snang gabar
mi 'gyur te/ da 'di ltar chos 'di dag ma shes sam ma thos par ni/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus sosnyam dusems te/ de'i phyir
gang chos de dag 'dzin ba dang/ sems pa dang/ sgom pa dang/ yongasasu rtogs dang/ chos pa 'di ni chos kyi bzod pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi bzod pa phun
mas bya@#// sumatshogs ba yino// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhan/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bro ba'i bsam
ba skyes sam/ gnod sems kyi bsam pa skyes na/ 'di ltar bro ba 'di gang nas 'byung/ gangadu bgag/ gang la 'byang zhing ji ltar 'byung/ ci'i don du 'byung zhes yongs su rtog ste/
sa de ltar yongs su brtagasan/ khroba'i skyo ba'ang yang dag par rjes su me mthong gag pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong/ gong la skye ba de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong/
driltar skyo ba de 'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong/ rkyen gang gis skye kha'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de de'i phyir bzod cing dang du len la// kun nas ldang pa mi mang ba yin te/
ny+nyo de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i bzod pa phunasum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar nabyang chub sems dab na nyitshab ma yin pa'i bzod pa phunasum tshogs pa yinazhe na/
byang chub sems dpa' ninyin par bzodal/ mtshan mo mi bzod pa'am/ mtshan mo bzod la nyin par mi bzod pa 'am/ bdag gi yul nabu'od la gzhan gyi yulanami bzodapa ma/ gzhan gyi
smiM yul bzod la bdag gi yul na mi bzodapa bam/ bshes pa la bzod la mi bshes pa la mi bzodab ma/mi bshesapa la bdo'abashes pa lami bzodapa ma yin gyi/ byang chub semA dbabani dus thamAcad du'ang
tha7 bzod/tshul thagacud du 'bad/thamAcad la'ang bzod ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dang 'a nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i bzod pa phunasum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'/
tha dad pa med pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshog pa yin zhe na/ 'di byang chub soms dpa' pa dang/ tsha dang/ bla ma dang/ bu dang/ bu mo drang/ chungam dang/ khyodu 'am/ snag gi
gnyen mtshams la bzod la/ gzhan la mi bzod pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni tha nAgadol pa gzhon nu yun chad la'ang bzod de/ daltar na byang chub sems dpa' tha dad pa/
med pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgos pa la mi lta ba'i bzod pa phunasum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chubusems dpa' don gyi phyir
bzod pa ma yin/ 'khrig pa'i phyir ma yin/ banathogs su re ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'jig rten kyi tshul gyis ma yin/ ngo tsha bas bzod pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni rtag par
yang bzod pa mang ba yinate/ doltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgos pa la mi lta ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i 'bod
ba phun sum tshogs pa yin zhen/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i nam de la lob skyeba'i rkyen gang gis zil gyis non nakhu tshu gyis 'tshog par 'gyur ba'am/ lames 'tsho bar 'gyur
ba 'am/ byig pas rdeg bur 'gyur ba dang/ mtshon gyis 'debs par 'gyur ba 'am/ mi ga tshogs pa'i tshig gis ngan du brjod pa de lta bu'i rkyenam byung gi bar du/
[“ ]bzodapa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'/la te la la zhig brtsegs sam/ bsdigs sam/ spos sam/ brgyadan/ de byang chub sems pa 'a 'di snyam du bdag nyidakyis las
'di dag byas te/ bdag nyid la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// mas ma byas/ bsam byas/ nye du dang snag gi gnyen mtshams gang yang rung ba dag gis ma byas te/ las 'dingag
bdag nyid kyis byas pas/ de'i phyi'i bdag nyid la rnam par smin par 'gyur gyi/ phyirol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par ma 'gyur/ de bzhin du chu'i bams dang/ me'i khams
dang/ rlung gi khams la rnam bar smin par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nang gi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ dubazhin du tshu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi
khams lo rnam par smin par mi 'gyur rom du sems gzhag bar bya'o// de de ltar ma log par rtogs pas de'i rgyu/ de'i rkyen/ de'i gzhis rnam par dkrugs kyang bzod/ rnam
ts+tsaM par ma dkrugs kyang bzodade/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rdzo'i bzod
mas phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i rgyal po'am/ blon po chen po phyug cing nor mdu ba/ longs spyod che ba/ sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi bdag por
gyur la/ de la sems can de dag gis mo snyan bar brjod kyang rung/ bkyal kyang rung/ gotsus kyang rung ste/ mi khro zhing gnod sems su mi byed la/ bdag por gyur pa lta bu r mi
ston/ gzhan du na de'i 'di snyam dusems can 'di dag ni bdag nyid kyis bsrung ba ste// sems can 'di dag ni bdag nyid kyis yongs su bskyang bar byas pa yin la/ de ltar na yongs sa srung ba
'barlag par bya ba nobadag gi mi ma'o zhes de de'i phyir snying rje'i sems nye bar bzhag ste/ bzod cing dang du len la gad sems mi mang ba yin te/ de ltar nabyang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bzod
pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rig kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dum bcas pa nyamasas lon par byed pa'i bzod pa phun sumatshogs ba yin zhe na/ 'dil byang chub sems dpa'
'di snyam du bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs nga 'isang rgyas de dag gisan sngar bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mangon par rdzog
par sangs rgyas te/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'dam du bying ba'i sems can rnams bsgral bar bgyi'o zhes song ga'i sgra bsgrags kyis/ de ltar sems can thams cad bsal ba dang/
ma// sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang/ sems can thams cad dul ba dang/ zhi ba la rab tu dgod par brtson pa la bdag nyid bro ba mang ba dang/ gnod sems
mang ba dang/ mibazod pa mang pa dang/ bogs med pa ni bdag gi mi ma'o snyam du sems so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sman pa zur ma can zhig yod la/ sems can rnams
kyang rab rib kyis mdongs par gyur nas/ sman pa des 'dis ma du bdagagis sems can 'di dag gi rab rib kyi skyon bsal bar bya'o zhes bsams la/ de nas smanupa de bdag nyid kyang
mdongs par gyur na/ rigs kyi bde ji snyam dusems/ jig snyan pa des sems can de dag gi rab rib kyi skyon thams cad bsal bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de
ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal yob 'di ltar 'jig rten mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis mdongs pa'i gti mug gi
drim shes rab kyi mig gis bsal bar 'dod la/ bdag nyid kyang mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis mdongs na/ bdag gi mi cha'o snyam du sems te/ dade'i phyir bzod cing dang du len la gnod
sems mi mang ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dam bcas pa nyams su lon par byed pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi ba chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na
tha30 byang chub sems dpa la bzod pa phunasum tshogapa lad yin na// 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin bam po gnyis ba// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang
ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhen/ 'di ltaste/ rdo rje lta bu'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson
'grus can rnams yin/ mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ rlabs po cha'i brtsonabagrus can rnams yin/ 'bar ba'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ rgyun du
chud pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ rnam par dag pa'i brtsonA'agrus can rnams yin/ thun mong ma yin pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ mi b.rAs pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/
sems pa med pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar nardo rje lta bu'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin zhin/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can
kyi khams yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs mya ngan las bsgrub dang/ masgral babasgral ba dang/ mgrol ba dgrol ba dang/ dbu ma phyin padabug dbyung ba dang/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas
ba mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyaba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te/ de de ltar na brtson 'grus brtsams shing gnas pa'i drung du bdud sdig to can 'ongs nas/ byang chub sems
sa @#// dab 'a de la rigs kyi bu 'di lta bu'i brtson 'grus thong zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bus kyang sems can gyi khams longs su mya ngan lasam 'das pa/
yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang/ ma rgyal ba bsgral ba dang/ ma grol ba dgrol ba dang/ dbugs ma phyin ba dbugs dbyung ba dang/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa mngon
bar rdzogs par 'tshong bar bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus 'di lta bu brtsams te/ dani brdzun dang/ 'drid ba'ichos can byis pa'i skye bo slu ba'o// rigs kyi bu ngas ni sems can brtson
'grus brtsams pa gcig 'gag kyang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma shes so// rigs kyi bu ngas nisems can bye ba du
mnyan thos kyi theg pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg bas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa shes kyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de'i phyir brtson 'grus zlos shig/ don med par nyon
mongs pa la sten pa bor gyur tu re zhes dad pa dang bral bar byed cing/ kyal ka byed kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' 'disam du sems te/ kye ma 'di ni bdud sdig can bdag la kyal ka
byed par 'dod dosnyam ste ko des de lta bshis na/ bdud sdig can de la 'di skad du sdig can khyed bya ba nyung du gyis shig/ 'jig rten gyi sko sham gyis khyed la ci zhig bya/ sdig can/
'a bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang las bdag gir bya ba ni 'jig rten pa yin te/ las kyi bgo skal spyod pa'o/ lngalas kyi skye gnas pa'o/ las la rton pa'o zhes gsungs te/ sdig can
khyod kyang las bdag gi bya ba yin te/ 'as kyi bgo skal la spyod pa/ las kyi skye gnas po/ lus la rton pa yin gyis/ sdig can khyod gang nas 'ongs pa'i lam nas song zhig/
ngal kyal ka byas pas khyod yun ring bor don med pa dang/ gnod po dang/ sdug bsngal du gyur tu re zhes nga sgo'o// bdud sdig canade yang bdag gi sems ni sems kyis tshor bar
gnas/ yib yib ste/ de'id du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad du/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad kyis kyal ka byas te/ 'dun pa
bzlog kyang mi 'gyur ma 'jum/ zhum par mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje lta bu'i brtson 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrogs pa'i
brtson 'grus can yin zhen 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i rnam pa ji ltakhus yaring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhan
dag kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' de la grangs su yang nye bar mi 'gro/ chadang/ bgrang ba dang/ dpe sa/ rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gron/ nyan thos dang rang sas rgyas thams/
gnadalta ci smos te/ de'i sems 'byung ba re la brtson 'grus kyi stobs bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin cing sdig pa mi dge ba'i
na chos thams cad rab tu song ba de lta bu'i brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtha'
gnyis dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus can yin zhen/ 'di la byang chub sems dpal ha cang brnyanangs pa 'am/ ha cang zhan pa'i brtson 'grus mi rtsom ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ hacabarkun
sa pa'i brtson 'grus ni yab yab bor 'gyur/ ha cang zhan panilekhor 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus can yin no/ ji ltar na
tho byang chub sems dpa' rlabs po che'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ dbazhin gshegs pa'i sku ci 'dra bar bdag gi
lus kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ gang dengazhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba dang/ 'od 'dom grang ba dang/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs pa dang/
ye shes thogs pa medacingathag yas pa dang/ sangs rgyasakyi che ba nyid dang/ sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog nyid de yang bdag la yod par 'gyur zhes brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ de ltaran
0 byang chub sems dpa' rlabs po che'i brtson 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'bar ba'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na gser
ram bu rin po che dril dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba ni/ lham me/ lhan ni/ lhang nge ste/ deni a la 'a 'bababa'i gser ro// a la la 'bar ba'i nor bu rin po che zhes bya'o//
de bzhin du byang chub sems dba'i brtson 'grus kyang brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba yin no// brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon de dag gang zhe na/ le lo ni brtson 'grus
kyi dri ma dang skyonano// soms las ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no// bras latshod mi shes pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dril dang skyon no// bdag mi shes pa ni brtson 'grus kyi drim
dang skyonano// tshul ma yin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no// tshul bzhin ma yin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dri mdungaskyonan// 'du 'dzin brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon te/ de dag ni/
brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang brtson 'grus kyi skyon zhes bya'o// de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' la med pa yinate/ de'i phyir de'i brtson 'grus de 'bar zhing drim med pa dang/ 'od gsalazhing
yongs su dag ba dang/ yongs su byang ba yin no// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'bar ba'i brtson 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyan du chud nga 'i btsan/
kyu/ bgrus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod lam thams cad du brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ cinas kyang lus skyobar mi 'gyur ba dang/ sems skyo bar mi

'gyur ba de ltarab rtson pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus rgyun du chud pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i rgyun du chud pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub
sems dpag rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ doltar rgyun du chud pa'i brtson 'grus can de'i gang sdig pa mi dgo bo'i chos byang chub kyi lam gyi bar du/ gnod pa dang ldan pa de
dag sangs pa yin/ gang yang 'di dag dge ba'i chos mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'thun pa/ byang chub kyi lam gyi tshogs pa dang 'thun pa byang chub kyi phyogs byang chub tu 'brang ba de dag 'phel
ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ yangs par 'gyur te/ de la mi dge ba'i sems skyo ba phra zhing rlung ba 'grab yang mi skyen/ che ba lta ci smos te/ deni rnam par drag pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bya ste/
zla daltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems
dpa' 'disnyam du sems te/ gal te phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig mnar med pa'i mi'i phung bo chen pos byur bur gang bar gyural/ 'jig rten gyi
khams de dag 'dus pa na/ sems can cig gcig sdug bsngal zhing skyabs medamagon med de/ gnas dang rten me da nga zhig yod na'ang/ sems can gcig po de'i don gyi phyir/
me'i phung bo de la rkang gis 'bogs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'das nas/ sems can gcig po de thar par bya bar bdag spron/ sdug bsngal phal la lta ci zhig smos snyam ste/
danibyang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ mu stegs can thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems
dpa' thun mong ma yin pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi b.ras pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dasam du mi 'gyur ba
ni byang chub thob par dku la ste/ bdag gi brtson 'grus 'di ni chungashig zhan la bdag kyang le lo can de/ byang chub ni mgozid la me 'bar ba bzhin du bskal pa mang po/ bskal pa brgya
phrag mang po/ bskal pa stong phrag mang po/ bskal pa brgya stong phrag mang bor bsgrub dgos pas/ bdag ni de lta bu'i khur bkur bar mi spro'o snyam du sems mi skyed de/ byang chub sems
dpa' ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag dang/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba
tha/ de dag dang/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshul 'di dang 'dra ba dang/ lam 'di dang 'drab dang/ brtson 'grus 'di 'dra bas/
namangon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin bshegs pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa
sgo sha stag las mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ma yinakyis// bdag kyang ci nas kyang blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur khrar
sems can thams cad dang thun mong gi brtson 'grus dang/ sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyis bdag gis kyang de lta de ltar brtsal lo// 'bad do// bdag sems
can thams cad la phan par brtsonapa la ni/ sems can dmyal ba na gnas kyang bla'i/ bdag la phan par brtsonan mya nganalas 'das pa ni ma yin nosnyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ de ltar
lhan byang chub sems dpa' mi b.rAs pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems pa med pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems
dpa' brtson 'grus rtsom na/ brtson 'grus de'i ro myong bar mi byed de/ brtson 'grus des gzhan la mi smod/ bdag la mi bstodade/ de 'di snyam du shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can su
a zhig bdag gi las la brtson bas gzhan la smod snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems pa med pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no// rigs kyi bu mos bcu po
de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa'abasam gtan phun
sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ bsod nams kyis brtan pa rnams yin/ skyo ba mngab rnams yin/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin/ mang du thos
b rnams yin/ ma log par gdams ngag bsgom pa la brtson pa rnams yin/ chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la zhugs pa rnams yin/ dbang po rno ba rnams yin/ sems la ma khas pa
rnams yin/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la mkhas pa rnams yin/ de la ma zhan pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyis brtan pa yin zhe na//
'di la byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tubasags shing/ mo rabs dad pa de dang de dag tu spyad pa legs par spyad pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyan gyi yongs su
bzung ba nito/ de bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'am/ rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'am/ khyimo bdagagi rigs shing sA la chenapo lta bu gang dang gang du skyes kyang/
@#// khyim de'i mi dad pa yin te/ deskyes kyang rgyu de dag dang rkyen de dag de bas kyang 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang yangs par 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang mi 'bral
ba yinate/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gam/ byang chub sems dpa' dag go de skyesanasngon dge ba'i rtsa ba la goms
rnabs 'di ltar dpyad de/ kye ma'o skye dgu'adi ni sdug bsngal ba'o// kye ma'o skye dgu 'dini nyam thag pa'o// kye ma'o skye dgu 'di nin ba'o/ kye ma'o skye dgu 'di ni gnas pa'o/ kye
ma'o skye dgu'adIni yun ring po nas nad par gyur pa'i/ kye ma'o skye dgu 'di ni gti mug gis ldongs pa'o// de yang 'dod pa'i rgyu dang 'dod pa'i phyir te/ de bas na 'jig rten gnas pa de lta
bul/ bdag gis 'dod pa rnams la bsten pa ni bdag gi mi cha'o// 'dod pa zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su brtags pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rnamagras
du mar 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes pa 'di lta ste// 'dod pa rnams ni gsal shing lta bu 'o// 'dod pa rnams ni mtshon mdung thung lta bu 'o// 'dod pa rnamasani ral gri'i so lta bu 'o// 'dod
po rnams ni sbrul gyi mgo lta bu 'o// 'dod pa rnams ni snga gri'i so lta bu 'o// 'dod pa rnamasani dbu ba rdos pa lta bu 'o// 'dod pa rnamasani rul ba'o// 'dod pa rnams nidring ba bo zhes/
[/]gsus so snyam te/ de de ltar skyo nas skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smig dag bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par yang dag par rab tu 'byung ngo// de rab tu byung nasag thob
pa thob par bya ba dang/ khong du ma chud po khong du chudabar bya ba dang/ mngon du ma byas pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsam pa yin no// de rgyud dang/ rkyen de dang/ gzhi des
kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i tshul du bshadapa dang/ don dam pa'i bdenapa'i tshul du bshad pa'i thos ba 'dzin to// de gnyis ka la yang mkhas pas gdamasongag yang dag par som mo//
gdams ngag ma log par bsgom pa la brtson pas chos kyi rjes su 'thunapa'i chos la 'jug ste/ chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos de'ang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba
dang/ yang dag pa'irtog badrang/ yang dag pa'i ngag dang/ yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang/ yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang/ yang dag pa'i dran pa
dang/ yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de lam khong du chud pas dbang po rnob dang/ dbang po gsal ba dang/ bshes pa'i dbang po can yin no// de dbang po rno zhing dbang bo gsal
sprul de shes pa'i dbang po can yin pas dben pa mang ba yin te/ do bdu ba thams cad kyi thams cad du yongasasu song ngo// 'du 'dzi thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs slong ngo// sgrub
thubya/ kal dga' ba dang/ 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang/ rtse ba'i rnam bar rtog pa dang/ lcal rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi
thams cad du yongs su song ngo// shes kyi khe 'dod pa dang/ grags pa 'dod pa dang/ red pa 'dod pa thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su spong ste/ des lus dang sems rab tu
dben pas soms la ma khas ba yin te/ desems la 'di snyam du bdag gi sems 'di ci dge ba la spyod dam/de ltami dge ba bam/ 'on te lung du ma bstan pa 'am/ chos gang la spyod ces rnam par dpyade
gal te dge ba la spyod na/ de la sems dga' ba dang/ ras pa dang/ mgu ba skyed do// dgo ba'i chosad dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum du tshu bdun no//
'on te mi dge ba la spyod na/ de la spyod pa mang ba dang/ rtog pa mang ba yin te/ mi dge ba'i chos de dag spong ba la brtson pa yin no// mi dge ba'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// 'dod
chags dang/ zhe sdong dang/ gti mug go/ de la 'dod chags rnam pa gsum du rnam par rig par bya ste/ chen po dang/ 'bring bo dang/ chung ngu'o// de la 'dod chags chen po gabazhe na/
gang lus thams cad du khyab ste/ sems kun nas gzung zhing gnas pa dang/ gong gis de la gzhol zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems mi thob pa ste/ de la gzhol ba de la ngo tsha ba dang
'dzem pa thams cad kyi thams cad du med par 'gyur te/ driltar na ngo tshab dang 'dzem pa thamAcad kyi thamA cad du med ba yin zhen/de gcig pu lkog tu seng ste/ de nyir rjes su rnam par sems/ de
nyid rjes su rnam par rtog cing/ de nyid la legs par shin tu smonapa dang/ de nyid la yang yon tan du lta ba yin te/ de ltar na de la ngotshamed pa yin no// jiltar na 'dzem pa med pa yin/
zhen/ de rgyu de dang/ rkyen de dang/ gzhi des bam 'a mabla ma lta bu gzhan dag dang rtsod cing phyir bzlog ba dang/ rgol bar byed cing des ngo mi mol de la yon tan du lta ba yin te/ de lta na/
de la ngo tsha ba med pa yin te/ de rgyu de dang/ rkyen de dang/ gzhi des nganasong rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ de ni 'dod chags chenapo zhes bya'o/ de la 'dod chags 'bring po gang zhe na/ gang
gis 'dod ba rnams la bsnyen par gyur na/ byub grub kyibar du rten gyi/ bya'agrub nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems thob pa dang/ 'gyod pa thob pa dang/ sems la mi chab thob pa
ste de ni 'dod chags 'bring bo zhes bya'o// de la 'dod chags chung du gang zhi na/ gang gis 'dod pa rnams bsnyen par gyur kyang/ mnabs pa dang/ phyags pa dang/ lus kyis reg
btsam mam/ tshig tu smra ba tsam mam/ mthong ba tsam gyis tshim par 'gyur ba den/ 'dod chags chung ngu zhes bya'o// mdor na 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad la chags pa'i sems su gyur
[/ ]@#// pa ste: don 'dod chags zhes bya'o// de la zhe sdang gang zhe na/ zhe sdang yang rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste/ chen po dang/ 'bring po dang/ chung ngu'o// de
la zhe sdang chen po gang zhe na/ zhe stang gi rnam pa gang gis zhe sdang zhing rngam/ 'khrugs gtum par gyur nas/ mtshams med pa lta las gang yang rung ba la la byed pa 'am/ dam pa'i chos spong
ba gang byas pa la mtshams med pa lnga bsdoms pas kyang/ grangs su yang nye bar mi 'gro/ cha dang/ bgrang ba dang/ dpe dang/ rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba de lta bu byed de/ de rgyu de dang/
rkyen de dang/ gzhi des lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba chenapo dag tu skyo zhing/ gal te brgya la mir skyes na yang/ gnag cing mig dmar 'gatum zhing gnod sems mang bar 'gyur te/

de rgyu de dang/ rkyen de dang/ gzhi des yang sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur bdeni zhe sdang chen po zhes bya'o// de la zhe sdang 'bring po gang zhen/ gang gis zhe sdang bar gyur te sdig ba mi

bod ba'i las byas na myur ba myur ba skyen pa skyen pa la goral god du 'gyod cing de'i gnyen po la yang sten pa ste/ de ni zhe sdang 'bring po zhes bya'o// de la zhe sdang chung du gang zhe na/ gang gis zhe
sdang bar gyur nas/ tshigs tsamo dang/ mi snyan pa tsam dang/ ngan du brjod pa tsam gyis mi dge ba la sogs pa ste/ de'ang de la brgya la bar 'ga' 'byung ste/ 'byung na yang skad cig de nyid dang
sa yud tsam de nyid dang// thang cig de nyid la gnyen po la sten te/ dezhe sdang chung du zhes bya'o// de la gti mug gang zhe na/ gti mug kyang rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste/ chen po dang/ 'bring
po dang/ chung// de la gtilug chen po gang zhe na/ gang ji skad du smos pa'i gnas pa de dag la nyes kyang dgagazhid mya ngan du mi byed/ sme sngags mi 'don/ 'gyod med pa yin te/ de ni
gte mug chen po zhes bya'o// de la gti mug 'bring po gang zhenA/ gang gis mi dge ba'i las la byas kyang la gon la gor du 'gyod cing tshangs pe mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi drung du 'chags
mi 'chab la/ de la yon tan du yang mi lta ba bzhinate/ 'dini gti mug 'bring po zhes bya'o// de la gti mug chung ngu gang zhen/ gang gis rang bzhin gyi kha na mtho ba ma yin pa bas pa'i kha na ma
glob bslab pa kun tu spyad pa'i lamaganyis gsum las 'da' ba ste/ de nigati mug chung ngu zhes bya'o// de la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems phyir bzlog pa la ma bas pa yin te/ de de ltaras/
la mkhas pa la/ gang 'dod pa rnams la dga' ba dang/ 'dod pa rnams la bdun pa dang/ 'dod pa rnams la lhag par chags de lta bu med pa yin te/ deci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar sems la mkhas

ba'i phyir ro// 'on te lung ma bstan pa la spyod na/ de la dran pa dang ldan zhing nan tan du byed la de brtag pa la yang brtson pa yin te/ de la ji ltar na lung du ma bstan pa la spyod pa yin zhe na/ gang gi/
ba/ @#// tshe sems phyi rol du yang mi rgyu/ nang du yang mi rgyu/ dge ba la yang mi byed/ mi dge ba la yang mi spyod/ lhag mthong la yang mi spyod/ zhi gnas kyang mi 'dzin cing/
zhum la gnyid kyis non par gnas pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu nyal nyal b.las sadapa mig gnyid kyis sgribs pa'i sems mi gsal ba de bzhin du/ de'i tshe sems de mi gsal bar
'gyur ba ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang/ yang dag par gzhag pa la mkhas ba yin te/ de ltar na
byang chub sems dpa' sems la ma bas bayino// de de ltar sems la mkhas pas chos 'di dag ni sgyu ma lta bu 'o// chos 'di dag ni rmi lam lta bu 'o// chos 'di dag ni dge ba'o// chos
'di dag ni mi dge ba'o// chos 'di dag ni 'byung ba'o// chos 'di dag ni mi 'byung ba'o zhes chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste/ de 'di snyam du chos de dag thams cad ni sems la gnas ba/
rgyusems las byung ba/ sems sngon du 'grobasto/ sems shin tu bsil/ shin dubatul/ shin tu khong du chud par byas na/ chos de dag thams cad kyang shin tub rtsil ba dang/ shin tu
btul ba dang/ shin tu khong du chud par 'gyur te/ des chos rnams de ltar mthong bas de rgyu de dang/ rkyen de dang/ gzhi des sems zhi bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan du byed de/ de semasanyid/
la sems 'dogs so// sems nyid kyis sems zhi bar byed do// sems nyid la sems rab tu gzhog go/ de de ltar zhi gu la brtson pas sems rtse gcig tu red par 'gyur te/
rtse gcig tu med nas mnyam par gzhag go/ sems mnyam par bzhag pa la dpen ba las skyes pa'i dga' ba mngon du 'gyur te/ de yid dga' bar gyuranas 'dod pa dag las dben pa/
sdig pa mi dgo bu'i chos rnams la dbyin pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ spyod pa dang bcasapa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bad ba can bsam gtan dang bo rdzogs par byas te/
gnas so// de rtog pa dang dpyod pa mi snang bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed cing dga' ba dang bde ba'i ro de yang myang bar mi byed de/ mi rtog go snyamanas bsam gtan dang po las sems bskyed
do// de rtag pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhingachags pa med pa'i yid du gyur pas nang yongs su dung ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu 'gyur bas/ ga pa med pa dpyod ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin los
skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis ba rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de duga' ba sdug bsngal yin par khong du chud par byed de/ sdug bsngal lo snyam nas btang snyoms la
gnas pa yin/ btang snyoms la gnas pas dranab dang ldan zhing shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa/ bdeb la gnas pa//
ba nyu// btang snyoms pa'o zhes rjod pa ste dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs bar byas te gnas so// de bsam gtan gsum pa stong ngosnyam nas/ bsam
gtan bzhi pa la sems gtong ste/ des bsamabatan bzhib thob pas bdag tu 'dzin pa'i phyir ldog go khadag tu 'dzin pa'i phyir log pas bde ba yang slong/ sdug bsngal yang spong ngo//
de bde ba yangs ste snga nas sdug bsngal yang sngangs shing/ yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal yadam yin/ btang snyoms dang dran pa
yongs su dag pa bsam gtanabazhi pardzogs par byas te gnas so// dedag gi lus drang nam mkha'i lus su gcig tu mos par byed de/ de ltar mos pas gzugs kyi 'du shes las thams cad
du thams cad yang dag par 'das pa yin/ thogros pa'i 'du shes kyang nub pa yin te/ dernam ba thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du
shos rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ nAm mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs bar byas te gnas so//
de'i tshe de'i rnam par shes pa nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang ldan pa yin te/ dernam par shes ba mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te
ba0: gnas so// de rnam shes mtha' yas skyemached las yang dag par 'dus nas/ ci yang med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de ni yang med pa'i skye :
mched las yang dag par 'dus nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de'i gong na gang sems kyi mtshan ma med pa'i rgyu ba thams cad 'gag
pa slebab thams cad dang bral ba 'di'i 'gog pa zhes bya skyo ! de ni shis par bya'o snyam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' snyoms par 'jug gi/ de la mngon par dgong ba'i rten gyi gnas
mi bskyed do// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems khonamed pa 'gas 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yas pa rgya chenapor gyur pa tshad med pa/ mi gnyes ba shin tu bsgoms pas
phyogs gcig tu mos te/ khyab par byas nasardzogs par byas te gnas so// gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin duganyis ba dang/ de bzhin du gsum ba dang/ de bzhin du bzhi ba dang/
bla dang/ 'og dang/ thad kar rnam pa thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di la byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems khon med pa/ 'gran zlumed pa/ gnod pa med pa//
yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/ mi gnyis ba shin tu bsgoms pas mos te khyab bar byas nas rdzogs bar byas te gnas so// de bzhin du snying rjedang ldan pa dang/ dga' ba dang btang
byabya// snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod ba med pa/ yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa shin tu bsgoms pas phyog
[QL]gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so// gcig tu ji lta ba bzhin du ga tis pa dang/ de bzhin du gsum pa dang/ de bzhin dubazhi pa dang/ bla dang/ 'og de/
( thad kar 'jig rten 'di thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di la btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems khon med ba/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/
yungs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med ba/ mi gnyis pa shin tu bsgoms pas myos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnasaso// de mngon par shes pa lnga skyed do// de la ya nga
zla ma zhen pa yin te/ gong du yang byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byedapa'i tshogs rnams yongs tshol lo// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa'
bsam gtan phun sum tshog ba rnamA yin no/ rigs kyi bu tshes bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// bdu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
bdag med pa la mkhas ba rnams yin/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'dusabyas la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'khor ba'i rgyun la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'khor ba
ba07 ldog pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ theg pa chen po la mkhas pa rnams yin/ bdud kyi las yongs su myong ba la mkhas pa rnams
yin ma log pa'i shes rab can rnams yin/ mnyam pa med pa'i shes rab can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdag med pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/
rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis gzugs la rtog/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la rtog ste/ de gzugs la
rtog pa na/ gzugs kyi skye ba mi dmigs/ kun 'byung ba mi dmigs/ 'gog pa mi dmigs so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i
skye ba mi dmigs/ kun 'byung du mi dmigs/ 'gog pa mi dmigs so// de'ang don dam par yin gyi/ tha snyad kyi rang bzhin du ma yin te/ des don dam pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang/
tha snyad kyi rang bzhinagang yinapo'i rang bzhin de gnyis ka yang brjod pa'irang bzhin du mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir brtson 'grus kyang nyams par mi byed da/ mgo 'am gog la me 'bar ba bzhin
du sems can rnams kyi don du rtsol zhing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdag med pa la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems
gdung ba las kyi rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyadade/ 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni gar gyi ltad mo dang badrang/ dri
'bra'i grong khyer lta bu rang bzhin gyis stong la/ sems can 'di dag kyang sems can ma yin na/ 'on kyang bdag tu 'dzin ga la mngonazhen pas de dug de'i phyir lam khong du chud pa mi thob bo//
dudag ni 'di sum du gal te bdag gam/ sems cananam/ srog gam/ skyob po 'am/ gsodra 'am/ skyes bu 'am/ gang zag gam/ nyid las skyesasam/ shod bu med na dge ba dang/
mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med par 'gyur ro snyam du sems mod kyi/ sems can med du zin kyang las kyi rnam par sminapa'ang mngon nosam ste/ de la byang chub sems ngang la
de ji ltar sems can de'ang med la/ ji ltar dge ba dang mi ge ba'i las rnams kyi rnam bar smin pa la yang mngon ba de yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ya ngu dag pa jilta ba bzhin du drab tu shes te/ de
ltar na byang chub sems dpa' las kyi rnam par smin pa la mkhas ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas la mkhas pa yinazhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dus/
bsakyi chos rnams la yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rtog par byed cing 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dus byas kyi chos 'di dag ni mi gnas pa/ mi g.yo ba/ zil pa'i thigs pa lta bu / ri bo'i
'bab chu lta bu yinan/ de la mkhas pa su zhig 'di lta bu'i chos rnams la zhen pa dung chags pa byed pa 'am/ de dag med par gyur pas myan du byed sum nas/ rgyu de dang/ rkyen de dang/ gzhi
des skyo ba dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba dang/ 'gog pa la sems gtong// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus byas la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
'khor ba'i rgyun la mkhas pa yin zhen/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar byed do// kye ma'o 'jig rtenanaganas pa 'dun ma rig pas mdongs pa/ 'khor ba la phyogs pa/ sred pa'i
zhags pas bcings pa ste/ len pa 'bar len to// de len pa'i rgyus dgo ba dang/ mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byedade/ de dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed pa dang ldan
pas/srid pa'i nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur te/ rwa'i rgyu las skye b.re'agyur ro// skye ba yod pas slabar 'gyur// rga ba'i chos canani 'chi bar 'gyur ro// 'chi ba las mya nganadang/ !
sngags 'don pa drang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rgyun chags pa nyid du 'gyur te/ delta na sdug bsngal gyi phung bo chen po 'ba' zhig po de zo chun rgyung mo'i 'khor
lo ltar 'khor ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyun du 'gyur ro snyam ste/ de'ang byang chub sims dpas yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dog pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems
00/ dpa' 'khor ba'i rgyan la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba ldog pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar
dpyod de/ ma rig pa med par gyur pas 'du byed la zhen par mi 'gyur/ 'du byed la zhen pa med par gyur pas rnam par shes par mi 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa med par gyur pas/ ming dang/
gzugs dang/ skye mched drug dang/ reg pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ sred pa med par 'gyuro// sred pa med par gyur pas len pa mi 'byung ste/ len pa med pas srid pa'i nying mchims
sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro// srid pa'i nying mtshams sbyor ba med par gyur pas skye ba mi 'gyur/ skye ba med par gyur pas rga shi dang/ mya ngan dang/ smre sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang
yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams rgyun chad par 'gyur/ dobung byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems
dpa' 'khorab ldog pa la mkhas pa yin no// jiltaran byung chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang/ rang sas rgyas kyi theg pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar
u0f38 dpyadare/ chos 'dis ni rgyun du zhugs bar 'gyur ro// 'dis ni lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur/ 'di ni phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur/ 'dis ni dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ srid pa'i
kun tu sbyor ba nad pa nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ro// chos 'dis ni rang sangs rgyas bse ru lta bu r gcig pu spyod par
'gyur ro snyam ste/ de thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu rtog par byedu de/ chos de dag mngon du yang mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de
'di snyam du sems te/ sems can gyi khams bdag gis bzung/ bdag gis seng ge'i sgra bsgrags te/ sems can 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pan gnas pa thams cad/
bsgral lo zhes dam bcasal/ gcig pu 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas 'byung ba ni bdag gi mi cha'o snyam ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang/ rangasas
rgyas kyi theg pa la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems drapa' theg pa chen po la mkhas pa yinazhen/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa la bslab pa thams cad la
yang slob la/ slob pa yang mi dmigs/ bslab pa yang mi dmigs 3 gang slob pa de yang mi dmigs so// rgyud dang/ rkyend dang/ gzhi des chad par lta
bar yang mi ldang ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi las ba la mkhas pa yin zhe na/
@#bya// 'di la byang chub sems dpa' mi dge ba'i grogs po thams cad du thams cad yongs su longaste/ micha ba'i yul la gnas pa dang/ 'jig rten
rgyang 'phen pa'i gsang tshig la sten cing sgom pa dang/ rnyed pa dang/ bkur sti dang// mchod pa dang/ rim gro la che cher 'dzinab thams cad kyi thams cad du
rgyayongs su spyod ngo// nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gzhanagang byang chub kyi lam gyi bar chad du 'gyur ba de dag kyang/ thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su sdongazhingade dag gi/
gnyen po la yang ste ]deltar nabyang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi las yongs su sang bal mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma log pa'i shes rab
can yin zhe na/ 'dil byang chub sems dbang 'jig rten pa'i bstanabacos dang/ gsang tshig dang/ las dang/ bzo'i gnas thams cad la shes rab
stong ste/ de yang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir te/ shes kyi zhe 'dodapa dang/ grags pa 'dodapa dang/ rnyed pa dang bkur
sti 'dod pa'i phyir ma yinagyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i che ba nyid brjod pa'i phyir te/ del yon tan du lta ba'i phyir ni ma yin no// gzhan dun
de 'di snyam du sems te/ gsung rab 'di dam pa ste/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba'o snyam nas// de de la yon tan du lta bas/ mu stegs
can gzhan gyi lta ba can du mi 'gyur te/ daltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma log pa'i shes rab tsan yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
mnyam pa med pa'i shes rab can yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang bcas pa/ rmongs pa dang
bcas pa/ skye dgu dge sbyong bram zer b.rus pa'i lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'is ngas rgyas ma gtogs par gang dang shes rab mnyam pa de lta bu'i sems can sems can gyi sa na med de/ de ni 'jig rten lha dang/
bcas ba/ bdud dang bcas pa 3 tshangs pa dang banus pa/ skye dgu dge sbyong dang bram zer b.rus pa lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin
du bcas pa'i nang na/ shes rab kyi bye brag gis zil gyis ma non pa yinato/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i mnyam pa med pa'i shes rab run yin no//
rags kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dang ba shes rab phun sumatshogs pa rnams yin no/// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sems
dba' thabs mkhas pa rnams yin no// bshu gang zhen/ 'di ltasA/ yongs su sngo ba'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yani/ mu stegs can rnamabar zlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa rnams mni/ yul las
( rnam par zlog pa'i thabs mkhas ba rnams yani/ 'gyod pa'i yid la gcags pa sol ba'i thabs la mkhas ba rnams yin/ sems can la dpung gnyen byed ba'i thabs la mkhas pa rnams lan/
soms na 'tsho ba'i thabs nye bar spyod pa la mkhas pa rnams lani/ len pa'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/ gnas nas gnas su slong ba'i thabs mkhas pa yani/ yang dag par 'dzin du
zla 'jug dang/ yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang/ yang dag par shani tu dga' bar byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par drang/ rim gro bya ba'i thabs mkhas
ba rnams yino// ragis kyi bu de la dza ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su sngo ba'i thabs mkhasab yazhi zhen/ gas kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di dag me tog gi rnam pa 'am//
'khras bu'i rnam pa nga yir bya ba me da pa yongs su bzung ba medakha de rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas byachub 'am bdaba' rnams la dbul la// se ba'i rtsabade yang bla na med
thal ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// de gang 'ang deg bdug b.lishangangam/ sbos kyi sharingam/ zhi po ma'i shang ngam/dpag bsam shingan me tog gi shing na/ rgyu

'brasabu'i ring gA'i bya ba mad pa yongs su gang ba med pa de dag kyang nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dbul lo// dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// de mdo sde rnams lasamachod pa dang/ rimagro bya ba gang 'di dag rgya chen po rgya che ba dag nyon cing de dag snying thag pa nas lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog gas
sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su bsngo'o// gang phyogs bcu na byang chung sems dpa' rnams dang [.]de ma yin pa'i sems can dag dge ba'i las rnams byed cunge/ byang chub kyi

tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed ba de dag la snying thag pa nas rjes su yi rangasta/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'aphyong nub tu yongs su bsngo'o// de de bzhin gshegs pa'i
mchod rten nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs la mo tog ba/ma/ bdug pa 'am/ spos gsolan/ sems can thams cad kyi 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi dring bsal bdang/ de bzhin gshegs/
pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri thob par yongs su bsngo'o/ de phyagabader dang zhal zhal byedanasems can thams cad kyi spyod la mamisdug ba mad par 'gyur ba dang/ spyod lamamadzes ba phun sum tshogs par
yongs su bsngo'o// de ma tog gi gdugs gsolan/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang/ nye ba'i nyon mongs ba'i gdung ba med par bya ba'i phyi'i yongs su bsngo'o//
de gtsug lag khang gi nang du 'gron/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad myang n las 'das pa'i grong khyer du gzud do snyam du sems bskyodad// de phyi'i 'byungs 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i//
btson nas 'don to snyam du sems bskyed do// de gnas khang gi sgo 'byed na 'di ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyis bde 'gro thams cad kyi sgo dbye'i snyam du sems bskyed do// de sgo gcodan
'di ltarangana'agro thams cad kyi sgo rnams gcad do snyam du sems bskyed do// de 'dug na 'di ltar sems can thams cad byang chub kyi skade po la dgod do snyam du sems bskyed do// de glo g.yas pa
shu nyal na 'di ltar sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'da' bas longs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam du sams bskyed do// de de nas ldangana'ang ltar sems can thams cad nyon mongs

pa kun nas ltung ba rnams las bslang ngosAm dusems bskyed do/de 'dus kyi ched la 'gro na 'di ltar sems can thams cad skyes bu chenapo'i 'gros su 'gro bar gyur cagi snyam du sems bskyed do// de der 'dun
'ad ltar sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gi zug rngu dbyung ngo snyam du sems bskyed do// de bkrubashal byedan 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
ba ]pa'i dri ma'i skyon rnams bkru'osnyam du sems bskyed do// de lag pa bosAlan 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i drang ba rnams bsal le snyam du sems bskyed de// de rkang pa 'khru na
'di ltar sams can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdzal rnam pa sna tshogs bsal lo snyam du sems bskyed do// de so shing ban 'di ltaramacan thamAtshad kyi dri ma rnam pa sna tshogs bsal lasA mi
du sams bskyed do// de la lus kyi g.yob thams cad sems can thams cad la phan pa dang/ bad bar yongs su bsngo'o// de de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la phyag 'tshal na/ 'di ltar
sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar shog cig snyam sems brgyud de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su go ba'i thabs mkhas nga yani
no/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mu stags can rnam par zlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhan/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta ste/ mu stegs can dpyod pa dang/ kun tu rgyu dang/
gcer bu pa la sogs pa'i mu stegs can gyis gnas de dang de dag tu 'phrul pa dag mngon par sprul te/ de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs byed cing de 'di snyam du sems te/
kyi ma'o sems can 'di rnams nga rgyal gyi za legyis non nas/ bdag gis sngar slob dpon gyi tshul gyis gdul b.ran mi nus kyi slob mar khas blang ngosAm sta/ de dag gi khrod du rab tu 'byung ngo
tu// de rab tu byung nas ji ltar sbyod ba dang/ spyod yul dang/ mang du thos ba dang/ spyod bya dmanatshogs kyis kyang mu stegs can gzhan de dag zil gyisanon ba de lta de lta bu'i rtsol lo//
'bad do// brtson 'grus rtsom// dadag gi nang na slob dpon dang bla ma lta bu r bkur bur 'gyur/ gi zung zhing ngag mi gcog bar 'gyur te/ kyesams can de dag nye bar gyur pa'o snyam du shes
nas grogs po dag 'din skyob dang/ 'dod chags dang bralabadang/ 'gog par 'gyur ba'i am yin no zhes mu stags can de dag gis bsngags pa ma yin pa rjod par 'gyur te/ des mu stabs zhu/

sa gzhan de dag gnas de rnams las bslang nasang bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la 'god do// der sol gyi mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dag ga gan du tshangs bar spyad pa spyod do// de tshangs pa la

zla spyad pa spyod cing chos de thob par buba'i phyi'i spyod cing rtsol la// 'bad do// de tshol zhing 'bad pas bsam gtanadang tange nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug ba rnams sgrub sta/ ci nas kyang man bar
shes pa lnga dang ldan pa gzhan de dag pas ches mchog tu 'gyur bdang/ chos 'bar bar 'gyur ba dang/ slob dpon gyi mchog tu 'gyur ba dang/ mkhas par bkur bar 'gyur ba de ltar bsgrub bo// des
sams can de rnams yongs su smin pa'i dus dang tshod shesanas/ grogs po dag lam 'di ni skyo ba dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba dang/ 'gog par 'gyur ba'am ma yin no zhes bsamag tan dang/
[rs ]ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa brjod pa ma yin te/ des sams can de dgaganas de las bslangs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'god do/ de
ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mu stags canarnamada' zlog pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yul lasarnam par zlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa ya zhen/ 'di la byang
chub samasadaba' ge mas can gang 'batu 'dodachags can rab tu 'dod chags mang bsams can mthongan/ desade dag 'dul ba'i thabs gzhan med do snyam nas/ des nga dug gi drung du bud med
sprul pa bzang mo blta na sdug pa bud mad thams cad kyi mchog dag sprul te/ sems canAde rnams de dag la rab tu chags par ga nas sprul pa'i bud med de/ mal nge nyid du 'chiba'i dus byed du 'jug
go/ de yang skad cig de nyid dang/ yud tsam de nyid dang/ thung cig de nyid la rngul tsang dring ba dang 'jug par 'gyur te/ de dag gis kyang de mthong nas sngangs skrag skyo bar red de/ bdag cag 'di
'dra ba'i dring ba'i nang nas gang thar par byed pa su zhig yod ces nyam thug par 'gyur ro// de'i tshan byang chub semasadapa' sems can de dag gi mdun du 'jugasta/ byang chub gsum las gang
yang rung ba'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba'i de ltar sems can de dag la chos ston te/ de ltar na byang chub semasadapa' yul las rnam par zlogapa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub
sems dpa' 'gyod pa'i yade la gtsugs pa sel ba'i thabs mkhas pa lan zhen/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can su mtshams med pa'i las byed pa 'am/ mdag pa'i
[% ]las byed pa mthongan de 'gan du song sku/ de skyes bu su'i phyare yad ma pad zhingamidaga' bganas nas de skad zer ro// des kyang smras ng/ rigs kyi bu bdag gis mtshams chung nga'i las byas pa sa
de'i phyir bdag la yun 'ang bo'i gnod pa dang/ phan pa med pa dang/ sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur grang nas yang mi bde zhing mi dga' bar gnasaso// de'i phyir de la byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa
'dzan du 'jug go/ nyes pa'ang 'chags su 'jug go/ de la chos bstan pa zab mo zab mo yang byed do// de ste 'gyod pa mi gtong na de'i phyir de la byang chub sems dpa' thog mar 'di lta ste/
[ ]rdzu 'phrul lam/ sems kun rjod bas/ yang dag par bde ches pa skyed do// de nas sams canade yang dag par yid ches pa bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de la dga' ba dang/
mgrub dang/ rangs pa red par 'gyuragro/ de dga' bo dang/ mgu ba dang ) rangs pa red pas/ de chos bstan du rung bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' de dang 'thun par 'dzazhi bar 'gyur

'o/de nas byang chub semasangaba' des de'i mdun du 'di lta ste/ pha mar sprul pa mngon bar sprul te 'di skad zer ro// kye skyes bu khyod ltos pa 'gyod bar ma byed cagi/ nga yang khyod kyi grogs te las
'di lta bu s su yang shin tu sams can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/ don thams cad la nyams nga ra 'gyur ba med do// las de shes kyis bsaladu ma nus pa yang ma yin no zhes de skad smras nas//
ba ma srog dang bral la/ srog dang phral nas kyang rdzu 'phrul de ston to// de nas sams can de 'di snyam du sems te/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pasakyang za ma srog dang bralan/ bdag 'dre ba lta zhig
tsagos snyam mo// byang chub sems dpa' de yang de'i tshe/ sems can de la gnas kyang de'i las de sbrang ma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar 'gyur ba de lta de lta bu'i chos ston par byed de/ de ltar na byang chub
sams dpa' 'gyod pa'i bde la gcags pa la nga'i blabasamakhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sams can la dbungagaton byed ba'ajibs ma khas ba yin zhe na/ 'di la byang
chub sems dpa' sems can gang chos bstan pa'ang zhang nus pa dag mthong la/ de dag kyang shin tum dge ba'i las byed par 'gyur na/ de dag gdul ba'i thabs su byang chub sems dpas 'phrulab
dag mnabar sprul ta/ de la sems can gong rnams rgyal pos 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag la rgyal bor sprul pa mngon par sprul par byed do// sams can gang rnams blon po chen ngos 'dzul
bar 'gyur ba de dag la blon po chen por sprul pa mngon par sprul bar byed do// sams can gang rnams bram ze dang/ rgyal rigos dang/ grong rdal gyi mi dang/ lul kyi mis 'dul bar 'gyur
bdedag la/ bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ grong rdal gyi mi dang/ yu la gyi mir sprul pa dang/ sams can gang rnams lhas 'dul ba de dag la lhar sprul pa dang/
nyagang 'gan rdo rjes 'dul ba de dag la/ lagan rdo rjer sprul pa mngon par sprul par byed do// sams can gang rnams 'jigs pas 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag la 'jigs pa ston ) soms can
sgo gang rnams ba rdeg pa dang/ bsdigs pa dang/ gsad pa dang/ bcings pas 'dul ba de dag la de 'dra bar ston/ sums can gang rnams dras pas 'dul ba de dag la re sa pas 'dul//
