sems can gang rnams mtshams med pa byed pa la dod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dag la brgyud par 'dod pa de dag thabs sna tshogs kyis 'dog cung zil gyis gnon par gyur/ phyogs
gzhan du bkar bar byed do// mtshams med par 'gyur ba'i dngos po slas te/ de 'dra bar de 'a mdun du sprul pa ston to// yang na sams can dmyal ba ston to// mngon par shes pa ma skye
pa'i byang chub sems dpa'atshe'i mtshan ma shes ba ni byed 'dod pa dang 3 gsod 'dod pa'i sems can de dag mthong nas ) sAng rje chen po'i sams rgyas te de yang 'di snyam du kum sems can
'di rnams ni bung bar 'dod pa'o// kye ma sems na 'di rnams ni brlag bar 'dod pa'o snyam du sems shang/ de dag des lag ma thal du sku ru ra'i 'bru bzhag pa ltar mthong nas ma dga' ba'i
[p/]sams chen po bskyed de/ de yang 'di sAm du sems so// bdag sems can gcig gi phyi'i yang sems can de phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyangs su rab tu ma bzhag gi bar du mnar
med pa'i sngag bsngal bzar bar babod nasoms can 'di rnams kyang mi dge ba'i las byas te/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmya 'a ba chen por skye bar 'dod pa khrubasagazhan gyis ni bzlog par mi nus te/ sems
can de rnams tshe yang thung/ dad ba yang med ba dag cig la ) yul gzhan du bkar ba 'am/ zal gyis mnan par bya ba de lta bu'i dbang ni bdag la med na/ sams can 'di rnams mi dge ba'i las 'dis
lus zhig nas/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar mi 'gyur grang zhesade'i phyir snying rjebasams 'bar bzhag nas/ la sa bdag gir byang dang 'thun par byas nas sems can de
rnams la byams pas khyab par byas te/ thapas gzhan gyis na mi nus nas chad pa rab kyis 'tshos te/ de ltar na byang chub sams dpa' sems can la dpung gnyen byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no//
ji ltar na byang chub sems dang 'a sems can 'tsho ba'i thabs re bar sbyor nga la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gang rnams 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba shes par mi lcogs
mi nus te/ zas dang gos lhur 'dzin cing de kho nas chog shes par rtsi ba mthong na/ de rnams la sems dpa'i yi ge dang/ bstan bcos dang/ lag rtsis dang/ grangs dang/ shod thabs la sogs pa'i
las dge ba dang ldan pa mi ston to// mi dag ba dang ldan pa mi ston to// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can 'tsho ba'i thabs lta bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar nabung

chub sems dpa'alen pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam thob na yang len te/ dngos po ngan pa zhig thob na yang len to// de ci'i phyir zhe na//
de la ltar sems te/ sams can 'daduganasar sna can/ brkam pa/ chags pas zil gyis non pa/ 'dzums pa yin te/ rgyu de dang/ rkyen de dang/ gzhi des chu'i phung po chen pos non pa bzhin du 'go
ba'i rgya mtshor nub cing 'bying bar byed pa de dag la/ de ni yun ring por donadang/ phan pa dang/ bde bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/ de blangs nas bdag gir ma byed/ chags pa'i sams mi skyed de/ gzhan du na
sams can thams cad dang thun mong du/ sangs rgyus dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dunadag la bya ba byed do// sems can sdug bsngal ba'i rnanas la phan nga ra byedado// sbyin pa'i bdag po de yang yang
ngag bar gzengs bstod pa dang/ yang dag par shin tu dga' bar byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lan pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas nas go/nas su
slong ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lcags shing nus pa zhig la/ de

mkhas yang nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thob par rtsol zhang 'bad de/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa mthong na/ de gnas de nas bzung ste tha na 'khor 'byed pa yang byas nas/ theg pa chen po la 'jog ste/ de
ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i gnas nas gnas su slong ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang/ yang dag par gzengs stod pa dang/
yang dagapar shin tu dga' bar byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sams bskyed ba'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi sems skyed du 'jug/ byang chub kyi
sams paspyod pa'i sams can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba/ tshul khrims tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa dag na brtson 'grus la 'jog/ sems can gang rnams bslab pa kun spyod ba phra mo las

'gal ba dag rgyu de dang/ rkyen de dang/ gzhi des sems kun khengs shing da bod de dga' mgu rangs par yang mi ring pa de dag la/ de ci nas kyang gnas de nas ldang ba de lta de lta bu r chos ston par byed de
de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag bar 'dzani du 'jug pa dang/ yang dag par gzengs stod ba dang/ yang dag par shin tu dga' bar byed pa'i thabs mkhas ba yin no/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang
chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod ba dang/ ram spo bya ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub samasadapa' rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ redapa chung du yang
[# ]/chos kyi da pas chog par 'dzani ba yani/ de gcig bu lkog tu song ste rab tu dben par gnas nas/ de 'di ltar sams te/ ma la bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod

rab dang rim gro bya pa bas ma mo snyam nas/ de de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs sems te/ de ltar sems pa de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgom pa yongs su rdzogs bar

'gyur ro// ji ltar na tha'ol tu phyin pa drug sgom par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ de la gang mchod pa dang/ rim gro bya ba mngon par byed pa 'di ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mchod pa dang
rim gro bya ba de la gang sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i sams skye ba 'din de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba de dag la gang sams mngon par mos shing

dga' ba 'din de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba de dag nyid la gang sems mi skyo ba 'din da'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mchod pa dang 'am gro bya ba de dag da

la gang nye bar rtog pa 'di ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba de dag nyid la gang sna tshogs pa 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub
sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa rnams yin no//
gas kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n 3 byang chub sems dang 'a smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// btsugang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ mi dman pa'i smon lam ba rnams yin
ma zhum pa'i smon lam ba rnams yin/ sams can thams cad kyi don la brtson ba'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyis yang dag par bsngags pa'i smon 'am ba rnams yin/ bdud thams
cad shin tu tshar gcod pa'i smon lam ba rnams yin/ gzhan gyi drang la mi 'jog pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ mtha' yas pa'i smon lam ba rnams yan/ mi smug pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/
gongs su mi skyobu'i smon lam ba rnams yani/ legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi dman pa'i smon lam pa yan zhen/
rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang 'a srid pa'i bde ba 'dod cing/ smon lam mi 'debs te/ 'gas kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi dman pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems
dpa' ma zhum pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ni khams gsum las skyob dang ) 'dod chags dang bral ba dang )'gog par smon lam mi 'debs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems
dpa' mazhum pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam pa lan zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems can
gyi khams ji snyed pa ma lus pas de thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas nas/ bdug byis sangs rgyus kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 'o//
zhes smon lam 'debs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can kloms cad kyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
rgya yang dag par bsngags pa'i smon lam pa yan zhan/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar byang chub kyi sems ma skyes pa'i sams can gyi khams ji snyed pa de thams cad byang chub kyi sems bskyed/
du bcug ste/ mthar gyis byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod du btsud nas/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa rnams la mchod pa dang bkur sti bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gsol ba gdab bo:
yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba rnams kyang sams can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir bzhugs su gsol lo zhes smon lam 'debs te/ de ltar na byang chub sams dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/
yang dag par bsngags ba'i smon lam pa yanino// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad shin tu tshar gcod pa 'i smon lam pa yin zhen/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' na 'di ltar
bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'isangs rgyas kyi zhing na tsa nas kyang bdud kyi sgra 'am/ bdud kyi rigs kyi lha rnams 'byung bar yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis bya'o zhes smon lam
rebs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad shani tu tshar gcod pa'i smon lam ba lanen// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpo' gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i smon lam pa yin na/

byang chub sems dba' na gzhan gyi rdzing la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam ma 'debs kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag nyid kyi sa shes rab kyi sa dpyad de/ semasacan gyi
khams sdug bsngal ba la bltas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i smon lam ba bzhin//
ltar na byang chub sems dang 'amatha' yas pa'i smon lam pa mni zhe na ) byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi tshogs rnams kyi phyogs 'ga' zhig bzung nas/ 'tsho ba'i smon lam mi
'debs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ sems bskyed bor byas nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bltas te/
byang chub sems dpa' gang dag phyogs bcu na gnas pa dang/ gang dag dka' ba spyod pa la gnas ba dang/ gang dag byang chub kyi snying po la gnas pa dang/ sangs rgyas gang dag mngon par rdzogs
khar sangs rgyas pa dang/ gang dag chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bde rnams la sAng thag banas bsams te/ da dgags chos bstan pa ji sAd pa de dag la mos par byed do// mos par gyur nas rjes
su yi rang ngo// rjes su yi rang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sgo ste/ de ltar na byang chub samasad pa' mtha' yas pa'i son lam pa yin no// ji

ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi skrag pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di byang chub sems dpa' las dang po nga yin yang tshesazab mo zab mo rnams thos pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba zab mo thos pa dang/

byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rol ba zab mo thos pa dang/ thabs la mkhas pa'i tshul zab mo thos kyang mi skrag/ ma dngang/ ngangang bar mi 'gyur ro// de 'di snyam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing byang chub kyang
mtha'ags/ sangs rgyas kyi yul yang mtha' yas 1 sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa yang mtha' yas te/ den bdag 'dra bas shes par mi nug/
kyi sangs rgyas dag nyid kyis mkhyen gyi/ bdag gis ma shes so snyam du sams te ) de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'am sgrig pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su
ma skyo ba'i smon lam pa yin zhen/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sanas can dmu rgod sems can gdul dka' ba rigs te/ de rnams kyis yachud nas 'di la bu'i dmu rgod 'di 'di lta bu'i gdul
dka' ba'i sems can 'di dag gis chog go zhes te/ de'i phyi'i yongs su skyo zhing rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur te/ gang nasams na 'di lta bu dag gi mnge yang mi zlos pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs
su dag bar smon lam 'debs so// sams can gyi don la ma phyogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'an 3 yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de la byang chub
sags dang 'a shes rab can ni/ 'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad n/ sams can gang rnams ngan pa brtog 'gyus chung ba blun borkyen pa lug ltar zhugs pa'i rang bzhin can yong sa
mya ngan las ma 'da' ba'i chos can sams can gyi khams ma lus pa 'di las bsags pa sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis spangs par gyur pa yod pa de dag
bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus bar gyur la/ bdag gas de dag byang chub kyi snying por 'dug tu bcug ste/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chung man par rdzogs pa'i 'tshang rgya bar
bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ byang chub samasadapa' de ltar sams bskyed pa re re la yang bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang rab tu g.yo'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyang de'i bsngags pa gsung
bar 'gyur ro// de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par 'gyur// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mar dumangon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu ste/ de ltar na
byang chub sems dang 'a yongs su ma skyo ba'i smon lam pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub mas dang dga' gas par gong su rdzogs pa'i smon lam pa yin zhes/ rigs kyi bu 'di
gal byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub kyisang bo la 'dug ste/ bdud kyi dpung gzhom pa dang/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs bar 'tshab
rgyab dang/ yang de las 'dus par smon lam ma 'debs pa 'di ni le gas pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam pa zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na mar ram 'bru mar gyi stong ba de chad du gang ste//

tshu lhag pa'i rdul phra rab tsam gyi thogs pa yang ma shong na/ de'i phyi'i e ma 'o snod gang ba/ e ma'o stod shin tu gang ba zhes bya'o// de zhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa' sangs
rgyas pa la sogalam legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i bya'i/ smon lam ma rdzogasab rdul phra rab tsam yang med do// de bas na legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i son lam zhes bya sta/ rigs kyi bu chos
! bcu po de dag dang ldan/ byang chub sams dba' smon lam phun sumatshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs phun sumatshogs nga
mas yano/ bcug nga nan/ 'di lta ste/ thal gyis minon pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi tshugs pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yan/ bsod nams kyi stobs phun sum
ra tshogs pa rnams yin/ shes rab kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yan ) rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/
dbang gi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yan/ gzungs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams lan/ rnam par mi 'khrugs dag ni byan gyi rlabs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/
bka' mi gcog pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chupa sams dpa' zayigyis mi non pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhen rigs kyi ba 'di
byang chub sems dpa' pha rol rgol ba kun gyis mi non pa yin te/ de ltaran bral gyis min pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yani'o// ji ltar na byang chub sems dang 'ami tshugs pa'i stobs phun sum
tshogs pa yin zhen/ 'di la byang chub sems dba' de'i stobs la gang stobs kyis grub pa'isams na de lta bu sems can gyi 'ganamed de/ de ltar na byang chub sams dpa' mi tshugs pa'i stobs/
na sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhen ) 'di la byang chub ge mas dang 'a ma bskyangs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs 'jig rten pa
'am 'jig rten las 'das pa de gang yang med de/ de ltar na byung chub sa mas dpa' bsod nams kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// jaltar na byang chub sems dang ba shes rab kyi stobs
phun sum tshogs pa yin nan/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ma gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis mthong ba dang/ mngon du
00@#// ma byas pa dang/ khong du mchud pa de dag med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs jun sum tshogs pa yanano// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'/
'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhen/ 'di la byang chub semasadapa'i khor tshul khrims nyams pa la yani/ lta ba nyams pa ma yin/ chog nyamasapa ma ya na/ 'tsho ba nyams pa ma
sgo lan gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ni/ nga chub sems dpa' mtshungs par spyod pa rnams nyid yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khob gyi stobs phun sumatshogs pa yin no// ji ltar/
na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhen/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi yul thams cad dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyis rdzu
'phrul gyi yul thams cad brib gyis non te/ de yang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pa mchog gi zil gyis gnon to// de 'dodan 'dzam bu'i gling gi skra 'gan gcig gi rtse mo la 'jog go/ de bzhin du nga//

bzhi ba dang/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang/ stong gnyis dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang de bzhin no// 'dod na gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khamA
rdzub gra rab gcig la 'jog go/ de bzhin du gang+gA klungaganyis kyi bye ma snyed khams dang/ gsum ngang/ bzhi dang/ lnga dang/ bsu dang/ nyi shu dang/ sumacudang/ bzhi bcu dang/ lnga bcu nas//

'a/brjod du med pa'i bang gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra 'bu gcig la 'jog kyang/ rdul phra rab de la gang ba dang/ bri bar yang mi mngon te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de rnams kyang phan

tshun du 'dres par mi 'gyur/ sems na de rnams la gnod par yang mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dang 'a rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yazhino// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbang gi
stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhen/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod na) stong gsum gyi stong chen ngo 'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis gang bar byin gyis rlob bo// de 'drongan brjod du

med pa'i yang brjod du med ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams gyi bar du ni ngo tsha rnamapa sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang bar byin gyis rlob sta/ de ltar na byang chub sems dang 'dabang gi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji
ldan byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi stobs phun sumatshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dragan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

ji snyad tsage don tha dad pa dang/ tshig dang yi ge tha dad pa dang/ brjod pa thadad pa dang/ tshul thad pa'i chos bshad pa de dag byang chub sems dang 'a skad cig yud tsam thang cig gcig la thams cad 'dzanang ra
byed khong du chud par byed/ sgomabar byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dang 'a gzungs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dang 'a rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i byin gyis
ka/ rlabs kyi stobs phun sum tshogasapa lanazhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpas byinagyi
rlabs byan du brlabs pa la gang rnam par 'khrags par byed pa'isams can de lta bu sams can gyi 'o san med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrug pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs
phun sum tshogs pa yan no// gsakyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i bka' mi gcog pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ thabs mkhas pa ma gtogs par gang byang chub sems
dpa'i bka' gcog pa'isams can dalta bu sams can gyi re sa na ma mthong sta/ 'gas kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bka' mi gcog pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos
bcu bo de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs phun sum tshogis ba rnams yin no/// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ya na go/
bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang zag la bdagamad pa 'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ chos la bdag med pa'i tshashes phun sum tshogs ba rnams yin/'tshob na yan pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs/
b rnams yin/ nga nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi la shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams ni/ mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams la ni/
semasacan mas cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta pa'i la shes phun sum tshogs ba rnams yin/ lhun gyis grub pa'i ya shas phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye shes
na sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'dus pa'i cha shas phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de 'a ji ltar na byang chub sems dang 'a gang zag bdag mad pa shes na/
samatshogs ba rnams yan zhan/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sam sa dar sa phung po rnams skye ba yang yang dag par mthong/ 'jig pa dang 'gog pa yang yang dag par mthong ngo// des phung po skye ba
rnams snying po med pa dang/ byed pa mad pa dang/ gsog tu yang dag nga ra mthong/ dang po 'gag pa rnams 'jig par yang dag par ma brong sta/ de 'di snyam du sems/ phung po 'di dag ni bdag pas
mad pa/ sems can med pa// srog med pa gso ba med pa dang/ gang zag med pa yin mod kyi 'on kyang byas pa so so'i skya bo bdag tu 'dzin ba la mngon par zhen pa 'di dag ni/ 'di ltar bdag/
cag gi phung po rnams bdag go/ bdag cag gi byung po rnams la bdag yod do// bdag cag gi bdag la phung po rnams yod de// bdag cag gi bdag ni phung po can no snyam ste/ de dag bdag tu 'dzin
pa la mngon par zhen pas/ de khon nyid khong du mi chud do// de khon 'ang khong du ma chud ngas mga' ma'i 'khor la ltar 'khor ban 'khyamano snyam dusams shing 3 de thams cad kyang byang chub sems
ka/ dang ga yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gang zag la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yazhino// ji ltar na byang chub sems
dpa'achos la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos su sgro 'dogs pa dang/ chos la skur pa yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de 'ad/

sAm du glo bug du byung ba'i chos la kun brtags pa'i mang gdugs te/ chos la yang de'i ngo bo nyidi ma yin/ yi ge de dag kyang de'i ngo bo nyidim yin mod kyi/ 'dan ming tsam dang/ tha snyad tsam du bya'i/
'di la mngon par zhen par bya'o/ glo bur du byung ba'i chos de yang thams cad kyi thams cad du med bam yin te/ gzhan gyi rkyen dang/ gzhan gyi rkyen la sdod pa dang/ gzhan gyi rkyen rnams kyis 'byung
zhi rkyen dang bralan 'gag pa'i chos 'di ni yodado zhes deh+phams cad byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhinadu rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang nub sa mas dpa'achos la bdag med pa'i yahU~M
bunasumatshogs bzhin// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyi tshib ma yin pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' nyitshab ri la shes skad cig gcig la 'jug cing
skad cig gnyis pa la mi 'jug bam lanagyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes mthong ba na/ skad ge thams cad la thogs ba med par 'jug ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i yi

sa shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi gshis phun sum tshogs pa yin zhen/ 'di la byang chub sems dang nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzani rnamA
kyang bag tu shes/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shes/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shes ) de bzhin gshags pa 'i ting nge 'dzan rnams kyang

ratushes so// des ting nge 'dzazhigang dang ting nge 'dzan gyi spyod yul gang la nyan thos spyod pa de dag yang rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzin gang dang ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la rang sangs rgyas

spyod pa de yang rab tushes/ ting nge 'dzin gang dang ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod 'ul gang la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de yang rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzin gang dang ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la de bzhin gshegs
pa spyod pa de yang rab tu shes te/ de bzhin gshegs pas skabs phyi na 3 debazhan gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu shes kyi/ rnam par sman pas grub pas rang gi ya shes kyis nan tanano// tangare

'dzin gzhanA rnams nim par sman pas grub pa'i rang gi ye shes kyis rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'jigyi spyod tshul gyi yi shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems

dang 'byon gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin she na ) 'di la byang chub sems dang sa nyanathos kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang dza lta ba bzhin du rab tu shos/ rang sangs rgyas kyi blon gyi rlabs kyang ji lta
ka ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ byang chub sems dpa'i byin rlabs kyang ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shesan/ sems can de ma yazhi pa gzhan dag gi lta na smos te/ de ltar na byung chub sems
dpa' byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yan no// ji ltar na byang chub sems da pa' mi 'phrogs pa'i yashes phun sum tshogs pa yan zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i la shasan mu stegs can
thams cad dang/ bdud thams cad dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'am 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji
ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi spyod pa la rnamapar lta ba'i mig shes phun sum tshogs pa yan len/ 'di la byang chub sems dud 'a ye shes yongs su dol/ pa/ dang zhang dog pa med da
wi sams can gyi khams la rnam par lta sta/ des de na sems can la 'a byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag dang/ la la byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa dag dang/ la la byang chub kyi sems bsgrags pa dag
dang la la byang chub kyisams ma bsgrubs pa dag dang/ la la sa dang po la gnas pa dag dang/ la la sa banu nga 'i bar la gnas pa dag dang ) la la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas de dag dang/
la la mngon par rdzogs par sas rgyas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dag dang/ la la bya ba kun byas te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag dang/ la la nyan thos kyi thog bas yongs su mya
ngan las 'da' ba dag dang/ lal rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su myang n las 'da' ba dag dang/ la la bde 'gror skyob dag dang/ la la ngan 'gror skye ba dag mthongang )de ltar sems

can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ste/ de ltar na byang chub sams drapa' san sa can thams cad kyi spyod nga la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun sumatshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sanas
dpal ldan gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa 'am ) 'grong pa 'am/ 'dug pa 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ban wun gyis grub rung/
shes 'byung ste// 'di lta ste ]dbazhu mi gnyinge kyis leg pa'i dbugs 'byung ba dang/ rdub pa dgag lhun gyis grub cing 'byung ngo// byang chub sems dang 'a'i shes de yang de bzhin du blta'o//
ye shes de yang thams cad du mi chags par 'jug ste// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'achos thamag
cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi yi shes phun sum tshogs pa ni zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad mtshan nyid mtshungs nga ra yod rab tu shes/ mtshan nyid gcig par yang rab tu shes
mtshan nyid du mar yang rab tu shes/ rgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang rab tu shes/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid du yang rab tu shos te/ de ltaran byang chub sems dpa' chos
grwa/ thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// 'gis kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa
yin zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang zag pa med pa'i ye shes 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa dang ldan pa yin// gis kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogasapa mnano// rigs kyibu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no/
dkonamchog spran ban po gsum pa/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dba' sa dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhen/ 'dilta ste/
rgyu gangs shing tshad medapo rnams yani/ sems canathams canakyi 'tsho bar gyur pa rnams yin/ gnod pa dang lan du phan 'dogs pa dang bral ba rnams lan/ chos kyi sprin chen po kun bzed/
ba rnams yin/ sams can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa rnams yani/ dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gyigawAr gyur pa rnams gzhi/ ni bo che'i snod du gyur ba rnams yini tsachen po'i stod
sgyu du gyur pa rnams yan/ mi bskul ba rnams yan ) mi sdangs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltaran byang chub sems dpa' yangs shing tshad med pa yin zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltasta )

[nz/ ]dper na sa chen po ni thams cad du langs shing tshad mad pa yan no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gyis kun tu yangs shing tshad med pa yin te/
de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yangs shing tshad med pa yanen/ )da ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin zhe na/ gas kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dparan sa chen
po'i 'di ltar yo byad rnam pa de dang de dgags sams can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yaneno// de bzhin du byung chub sems dpa' yang sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang bzad pa dang/ brtson
'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab la sogs pa byang chub kyi tshogs rnamasang/ phan par 'gyur ba'i yo byad rnam pa du ma de dang de dag gas sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin te/

de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'as mas can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yazhe no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnod pa dang/ lan du khan 'dogs pa dang bral ba 'gazhanA/ 'di la ste rigs kyi bu dpar

nas chen po na gnod pas kyang zhe 'gras par mi 'gyur// phanapas kyang rjes su chags par ma 'gyur te/ de la gnyis su 'du shes pas 'byung ngo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang gnod pa dag gis kyang
zhe 'gras par mi 'gyur/ phan 'dogs pa dag gis kyang rjes su chags par mi 'gyur te ) de ni sems can de dag la chags pa dang/ khong khro ba yang mi skya sta/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnod
padang/ lan du phan 'dogs pa dang bral ba na no// ji ltar na byang chub sams dang la chos kyi sprin chen po kun bzed pa yin zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste// bar na sa chen po gi sprin chen bo

las bab pa'i chu'i krung chen po kun bzed de ]bzod cing kun 'dzin to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sprin chen po las chos kyi char ba chen po rag tu phab pa kun bzed
cang bzedul 'dzin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sprin chen po kun bzod pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa yin zhen/ rigs kyi
bu'adi lta ste/ dper na sa chen po nasams can thams cad 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i gnas su gyur pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dang 'a sems can thams cad kyi bde 'gro dang mya ngan las 'das par
'gro ba'i gnas su gyur pa mAn te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'asams can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur ba yazhino// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gyi gzhir gyur ba yin
zhe na: rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dparan sa bon thams cad ni sa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa las skye'o// de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon thams cad kyang byang chub sems
dpa'igazhir gyur pa las skye sta/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dag pa'i chos kyi sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa yano// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i snod du gyur pa yin zhen 1 rags kyi

[4 ]/bu bad lta ste/ dpar nas chen po na rin po che rnam pasnyatshogs kyi snod yane to/ sa chen po la rin po che sna tshogs kun snang ngo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yab lon tan rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi snod

du gyur pa yan te/ byang chub sems dpa' la yon tan rin po che sna tshogs kun snang ste// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i snod du gyur pa yin to/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ni chen po'i snod du

gyur ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rtsi chen po gang dag nad rnam pa sna tshogs zhi bar 'gyur ba dag kyang sa chen po la gnas te 'jig rten na stangango// de bzhin du gang dag gis nyon mongs pa'i da

rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams zhi bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rtso chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' la gnas shing 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dang 'a chen po'i snod du gyur

pa yin no// jiltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi bskyal ba yan zhen shu rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po na 'di ltarapisha sbrang dang/ sbrang bu dang/ rlung dang/ nyim dang/ sbrul gyis rig pa'i sdug/
bsngal thams cad kyis ma bskyal ba yin no// de bzhin du byung chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste 3 sanas can thums cad las byung ba'i phyir nang gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyisam bsku la ba 5na te/ de
lArAn byang chub sems dpa' mi bskul ba yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi sdangs pa yin zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar nas chen pon glang po che'i rgyal po'am/ ri dgas kyi
rgyal po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra thos kyang mi skrag/ ma dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang dub sems dpa' yang bdud dang mu stegs thams cad kyi sgra thos na mi skrag/
mdangang/ dngang bar mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi ba de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi sdangs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sa chen po dang mtshungs pa rnams
yan no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' chu dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// banu gang zhanA/ 'di lta ste/ dgaba'i chos la gzhol ba rnams yin/ dkar
po'i chos khrums cad skyed pa rnams yani/ dga' ba dang )dad pa dang/ rangs pa'i gagar ba can rnams yani/ nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad sul ba nas yani/ drang zhing rnyog pa med dogs la/
b rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i los su gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhabar byed pa rnams yin/ 'dod bal sred pa zlog pa rnams yani/ zab cange gting dpog dka' ba rnams yan/ mtho dman 'gengs
pa rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa rnams yani// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dag ba'i chos la gzhol ba yin zhen gis kyi bu 'di sto/ dbar

nanun gzhol bar 'gro ba dang ! gzhol ba'i rgyu ba 5no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos dag pa'i chos la gzhol zhing/ dge ba'i chos kyi phyir rgyu ba 5na te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'

[e ]dge ba'i chos la gzhol ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dkar po'i chos thams cad skyed pa yane zhen/ 'bigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na tshun rtswa dang/ shing gel ba dang/ rtsa dang/ nags

tshal thams cad skyed de/ skyes pa rnams kyang phyir zhing rgyas par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ting nge 'dzin gyi chus byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad rnam par bskyed do// skyes

pa rnams kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyashang du gyur kyi bar du phyar zhing rgyas par byedado// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing du gyur pa dag nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs
dag gis semasan rnams 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dar 'dakar po'i chos thams cad bskyod pa yazheno// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang dad pa dang/
rangs pa'i gnyer can yan zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na chu na ngo bo nyid kyis gsher po can yin te ) gzhan yang gshar bar byed do/ de bzhin du byang chug gnas dar la yang ngo bo nyid kyis
dga' ba dang/ dad ba dang/ rangs pa'i gsher ba can yin te/ sems can gzhan yang dga' bo dang/ drad pa dang/ rangs pa gshe ba can du byed do// de la dga' ba ni 'jig rten las 'das
pa'i chos tshol ba'o// dad pa ni sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la rten pa'o// 'dus pa ni gang sams dag ba ste/ de ltaran byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang// dad pa dang/
[z ]/ ra ngas pa'i gsher ba can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad sprul ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste ]dpar na chu'i shing gi/

rnam pa dang/ rgyu'i rnam pa'i rtsa ba dag gi rgyun rnams grul la// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la nga sgom pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chus nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'irgyunu thanas cad sku la te

brgyar yang khyob par byed pa nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu mad ba grangs med pa'i bar du yang khyab par byas nas// sams can thams cad la ya shes kyis snang bar byed do// ye shes

bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dpon rlung mar na 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'di lta ste/ rdo rje'i de la 'khor rnams dang/ khor yug ra deshadang/ khor yug ri chen po rnam
dang/ glange chen po bzhi yongs su 'dzin pa'i gsar gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang/ rgya mtsho ni kho tsho'i 'byung gnas dang bcas pa rnams dang/ ri rab dang/ rarab chen po dang/ de ma yin pa rin po
[2]]tsho'idang/ gangasadang/ ri spos kyi ngad ldang ba dang/ grong rdal dang/ nags tshal dang/ gzhal med khang dag dang/ 'dzam bu glinge dag dang/ gling chen po bzhi dag dang/ stong dag dang/ stong
gnyig pa dag dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po dug 'god pa rnam par phye ba sna tshogs pa mngon par sgrub bo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung bar yang phyogs bcu kun tusems na
thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po phun sum tshogs pa khyobar bsgrub 'o/ sud do/ yongs su gzhog go/ de la ji ltar gangs kyi ri phun sum tshogs pa de ltar 'jig rten pa'i bsod/
nams phun sum tshogs pa rnams pa'o// jilta nagling chen po bzhi pa dang/ ri rab phun sum tshogs pa de ltar na nyun ltos kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams ba la'o// ji ltar stong gi
'jig rten gyi khams thun sum tshogs pa de ltar na rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o ]/ji ltar stong gnyis kyi 'jigarten gyi khams phunasum tshogs pa de ltar ni byang chub sems
dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// ji ltar na stong gsum gyi stongan po'i 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de lta na/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i 'jig rten
gyi khams thams cad nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa shin tu rnam par dag par grags pa/ mchod pa la dmagis nga mas nad yang dag par gnas pa rnams kyi thams cad mngon du ga
te de bzhan gshegs pa'i sku bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa rtag tu mnyam par gzhag kha phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// de largya mtsholta na ting nge 'dzani rgya mtsho rnams
blta'o// gling dang/ bar gyi gling dang de'i gzhan dang/ glang chen po bag la sogs pa ltar ni sbyor ba dang/ gajus dang/ sams can yos su sman par bya ba dang/ slob pa'i dge 'dun la sogs pa blta'o//

rgyu grong rdal dang/ nags tshal dang/ gzhal med khang ltar na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan bkod ba rnams blta'o// dpag bsam gyi shing gi nags tshal rnams ltar ni/ sa dang/ pha rol

tu phyin pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ rig pa dang/ ye shes snang ba dang/ dbang dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang
sgo 'jigs ba dang/ ma 'dres pa dang/ thugs rje chen po la sogs pa dbang sgyur ba dam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i chos rnams blta'o// rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsod nams brgya

pa'imtshan gang zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na yongasasu brtag pa gamyong// phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyad dag na sems can gang ji snyad yod pa

de dag thams cad stong gsum phrag bcu'i 'khor la sgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur la/ de lta bu'i 'khor lo sgyur ba'i dngos po 'di dang ldan pa 'is mas can de dag gi bsod nams kyi

[4 ]phung po ji tsam pa 'di bsdoms pa dang/ 'khor los sgyur ba chenapo dus gcig ldan par gyur te/ rnam grangs nges shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'das te/ de snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su
gtogs pa'i sams can de snyadatsage 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po de 'dra ba nyid dang so sor ldan par gyur la/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkha'i khams kyimathus
gtugs pa dgan/ sems can yod do cog ji sdod pa de dag thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po de lta bu sha stag dang so sor ldan par gyur te/ de bzhin du bgrang ba de nyid kyis 'jig rten gyi

khams ji snyad la de stod du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams brgya byin gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa'i brgya byin sha stag tu gyur la/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung

grangs med pa'i khyim sdod du gtogs pa'i brgya byin rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de dang/ brgya byin tshug gcig dang ldan par gyur te/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyangs kyis klas
ba nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad/ sems can gang ji snyada'akhod ba de dag thams cad brgya byin de dang 'dra ba sha stag tu gyur la/ bgrang ba de nyid kyis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'dzag
rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad tshangs pa chen por gyur la/ bsod nams de thams cad gcig tu bsdoms pa dang/ tshangs pa chen
kya@#// po gi gtsug ldan par gyur la/ tshangs pa chen po ji lta bar sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin du gyur te snga ma bzhin du bgrang ba de nyid kyis nyan thos dgag dang/ rang sangs rgyas

dag dang// byang chub sems da pa' sa chen po thong pa 'od zer gyi sprin chen po'i dbang bskur pas dbang bskur ba dbang bcu thob pa sha stag tu gyur te/ de ltar rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i sems can thams cad phyogA
danu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang/ nam mkha'i khams su gtogs pa dus gsum pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa des dus gsum gyi nam mkha'i khams su gtogs pa dang/
'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdulaphra rab bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig mngon par 'grub bo// nga sprugadung du thams cad du

ts+tshA gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po brgya stong grangs med pa bcur bsgyur bas/ dpo byadabazang po brgyad cu las/ dpe byad bzang po ra re mngon par 'grub bo// dang khyad bzang por gtogs pa'i bsod
nams kyi phung po de thams cad brjod du med pa bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa dgu las mtshan ro re mngon par 'grub bo// de yang brjod du med pa bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin

! gshegs pa 'i snyan mtshams kyi mdzod spu zla ba nya ste/ dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor stong bas kyang lhag par mdzes pa'i 'od dang ldan pa mngon par 'grub bo// de yang brjod du med pa bye ba stong phrag
bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing ) bltar mi snang pa gtsug ter gyis yongs su brgyan pa mngon par 'grub bo// de yang brjod du

med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag stong phrag drug cu pa/ dmigs pa thams cad las gsung gi sgra mtha'
yas pa 'byung ba lhun gyis grub pas sems can thams cad bsam pa yongs su tshim par 'gyur ba ! 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du go bar byed pa mngon par 'grub ste/ gas kyi bu de ni sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan nus bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dang/ ye shes kyi tshogs ma zad pa dang ldan zhing kun tu
rgyus par byed pa bkod pa dang ldan pas sams can thams cad nye bar 'tshob yin te/ rigs kyi bu yongs su brtag pa bzung na/ gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyangs kyi
krus pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i sa mas can rnams bcu pa chos kyi sngon la gnas pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i lus dang/ ngag dang

lad kyi rgyan 'chang ba dbang bsul dbang sgyur ba sha stag tu gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu gtsage tu gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po la/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar las byas pa'i snod zhi
po masna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis smras pas/ nam mkha'i tshadatsam gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed so so nas thogs te ) phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bskal bar yongs su bkang zhing skad

nuge skadatsug tu blangs shing khyer lang spu'i khung bu gcig tu gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de gang ba 'am bri b.ra'amangon te/ gas kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshags pa'i bsod nams brgya ba'i mtshan
ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// de la sa bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sams bskyed pa'i sa dang/ rab tu dga' dang/ dri ma med pa dang/ 'od byed pa dang/ 'od 'phro can dang/ tu
sbyang dka' dang/ mngon du gyur dang/ rang du song dang ) mi g.yo ba dang/ legs pa'i blo gros dang/ chos kyi sprin dang/ sangs rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'od de/ sa bcu gnyis po de dag go/ de la byang
chud kyi sa nas bskyod pa'i sa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dang 'i byis pa'i spyod pa dang/ lag pa'i nan tan thams cad las yang dag par 'das te 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi brgya
byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang khyad zhugs shang 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa rnam pa thams cad du dbal dang ldan pa'i
lus dang ! ngag dang ) yid kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chu med pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa 3 sgrib pa med pa 'i stobs kyi shugs 'chang pa//

'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par skad cig re re la 'gro zhing 'ong na/ dri zhim po dang )'od zer gyi dra ba'i tshogs chen po gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'byung ba ) pad+mas rkang ba
yongs su brtanang/ stong gi 'jig rten khams kyimatha' dang mnyam pa'i stan gyi rgyan dang ldan pa// chos thams cad shin tu rnam par gnon pa'i lhag mthong rnam pa ra bsgoms pas glegs
pa med cing yid du 'ong ba'i dmigs ba'i mtshan ma chen po bcu la sogs pa grangs mang pa'i ltas bzang po mthong ba/ phyir mi ldog pa phyogs kyi nags tshal thabs po mtha' yas pa thams cad du 'ong
kyi dra ba bsam gyis ma khyab par rab tu 'gyed pas zhing dpag tu mang pa'i rgyan byed pa/ 2 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi mnga' bdag dpag tu mad pa skad kyi bdag gi gzugs

b.rAn gyis dra bang bskur ba yang dag par gnod pa'i dbang dang byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pa 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rin po che char gyi snang ba'i sgo dang ga tu mad pa thams cad
gtan pa med pa kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i chos spyin chen po'i sprin gtong ba lhur byed pa/ blta na bzang zhing yid du 'ong 'amadzes shing dge la 'gro ba thams cad dang mi mthun pa med cing/ nayod
par bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par rab tu g.yo bar byed cing 'gro ba ngan 'gro la sogs pa la sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su skyob pa/
[g]ka/ mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas mchod pa dang chos kyi go 'dzin nus nga/ tingang 'dzin gyi gzungs dang/ rnam par thagrwa pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ rig ba grangs med pas

rnam par rol pa chos mtha' yas pa la dga' zhing mos pas brang wange mad par phyi ma'i mtha' bskal pa'i mthar thug par rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub pa'i dga' ba'i shugs kyi snang ba thob pa/ bskal
pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ther 'bum dpag tu medabar theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i sgom pa sna tshogs yongs su rdzogs la/ gzhan gyi don gyi nan tan nor phyin pa'i bsod nams dang/ yi shes kyi

btsa tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa grub pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba brgya stong phun sum tshogs pa'i mos pa chen po'i yang chen pos spyod pa'i chos nyid kyis sa dang po de ma thag tu thob par gang gnas pa 'di ni byang chub

sams dpa'i byang chub kyi sams bskyed pa'i sa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor 'angos sgyur ba'i rgyal po na mo'i kha dog las ni 'das la/ lha' kha doganA ma thob pa yin te/ de bzhin du byang
chub sams dang 'a yang 'jig rten pa dang/ nyan thos nga ) rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad las ni 'das pa yin/ donadam pa'i byang chub sems dang 'i sa nim klob pa yin no// sangs rgyas
kyis kun tu 'od ni mtha' dang dbung med pa ma lus pa dri ma med pa'i chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba ste/ kun tu shin tu lta ba sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad thob par byed pa'i mtshan dado//
0 de la ting nge 'dzin rnams gang zhen/ bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams te/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ rin po che chen po kun tu 'phags pa dang/ shin tu
gnas pa dang/ mi bskul ba dang/ phyir mi ldog pa dang/ dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang 3 nyima'i 'od kyi gzi brjidi dang/ dren thams cad grub dang/ ma shes sgron ma dang/ da ltar gyi sangs rgyu
mngon du bzhugs pa dang/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin te ) de dag la sogs babyang chub sems drang 'a rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin ni mthA' yas so// gzungs ni bcu gnyis te/ bcu gnyis gang
zhen 'di lta ste/ dbang bskur ldan rung/ yi shes ldan ngang/ sgra dbyangs rnam nga ra dag pa dang/ mi zad pa'i za ma tog dang/ 'byol ba many+dza' yas pa dang/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya dang/ dang
bkod pa dang/ chags pa med pa'i sgor 'jug pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnam pa ra nges pa la 'jug pa dang/ sangs rgyas rgyan gyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang kha dog mardza' dag
pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i kha dog rdzogs pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i gzungs te/ de dag la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// mngon par shes pa ni drug ste/ drug gang zhen/ 'ang lta ste//
lha'i mig dang/ lha'i rna ba dang/ pha rol gyi sam sa shes pa dang/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shis pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par shes pa dang/ zag pa zad par shes pa'i mngon par shes pa

[e]@#// ste drug po de dag go/ dbang na bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshe'i tshad bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med pa'i byin gyis rlob pas tshel dwapang ba dang// ting nge 'dzin brjod du med pa'i/

yang brjod du med pa'i nges par rtog cing 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sems la dbang ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bkod pa'i rgyan du mas brgyan par byin gyis rlob ba ston pa'i tshul gyis yo byad la

dbang ba dang ) dus ji lta ba bzhin du las kyi rnam par sman pa byin gyis rlob pa ston pas 'das la dbang bo dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba ston ja/sa skye ba la dbang ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi
khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gang bar skyon res mos ba la dbang bdang/ dus dang zhang gang du 'dod par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ston pas smon lam la dbang ba dang/ 'jog

yartan gyi khams thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul ba mthoms pa ston pas rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang/ chos kyi sgo snang ba mthub dang dbung mad pa yongs su ston pas chos la dbong ba dang/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ ma 'dres pa dang/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang/ mno par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dam
pa dang/ dus thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi grangs la sogs pa skad cag gtsag la yongs su shes ba rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i khrims/
cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ston pas yi shes la dbang ba so/ bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpa'i
stobs bcu gang zhen/ 'alta sta/ bsam pa'i stobs dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang/ sbyor ba'i stobs dang/ shes rab kyi stobs dang/ smon lam gyi stobs dang/ spyod pa'i stobs
dang theg pa'i stobs dang/ rnam 'phrul pa'i stobs dang/ byang chub kyi stobs dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i stobs te/ bcu po de dag na byang chub sams dpa'i stobs rnams so//
de la byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'jil sta/ gzungs kyis thos pa 'dzin cing don bstan pa la ma 'jigs pa dang/ bdag med pa khong du chud pas gzhan gyis gtso ba'i gzhi
ma mi 'byung zhing rang bzhan gyis spyod lam smad du med pa'i las gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsung ba chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang/ chos bzung ba yun ring du mi brjed pa dang/ thabs dang
shas ra bamathar phyin pas sems can sgrol zhing dod pa ston ba dang/ ngag ba'i bar chad du mi 'gyur ba'i mi 'jigs pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma nyams shing theg pa gzhan gyi mi
'byung bar dbang yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ sams can gyi donarnam pa thams cad du yang dag par thob par bya ba la mi 'jigs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dang 'a mi 'jigs pa rnams go/
[s/]// de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ma bstan pa'i sbyin pa can rnams yin/ ma bstan pa'i tshul/
khrims can rnams dang/ ma bstan pa'i bzod pa can rnams dang/ mkhastan pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams dang/ ma bstan pa'i bsam gtan can rnams dang/ ma bstan pa'i shis rab can rnams
dang bsdu ba'i dngos pos sems can thams cad sdud pa rnams dang/ yongs su mo ba 'a chos shas ba rnams dang/ thabs mkhas pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dbang gas theg pa'i
mchog gis 'byung ba ston pa rnams dang/ theg pa chen po las ma nyams pa rnams dang/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo ston pa rnams dang/ zung dang sol ma'i rgyud la mkhas pa rnams
zla yan ye shes sngon du 'gro bsamangon par 'du ma byed cing kha na ma tho ba med par tshe rabs thams cad du mngon par zhugs pa rnams dang/ lus dang ngag yid kyi las kyi mtha' dge ba bcu dang ldan pa
rnams dang/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad bzod pa'i lus len pa sa sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su mig to ba rnams dang/ 'grob thams cad mngon par ston pa rnams da
byas ba so so dang nyan thos ma bcad pa ji snyid cag gi nang na yang dge ba mang po'i na po che'i shing pag bsam ltar brtan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems khongs su ma nyams pa
rnams dang/ chos thams cad kyi thabs sbyin bas dbang bskur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal ba bstan palas maldog pa rnams te/bcobargyad po de dag ni byang chub semasadapa'i
chos 'dres pa rnams so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas dang gzhu sam yazhi ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ 'dus pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ daltar gyi las kyi
rgyu'i rnam pa'i sman pa len pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ dbang po mchog dang/ mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs
dang thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzan dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang ba dang//
ldang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ shi 'bo dang skya ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang/ zag pa zad par mkhyen pa'i stobs te/ bcu po de dag ni
de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams go/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa dang/
khag pa thams cad zad par shes pa la mi 'jigs pa dang/ bar du gcod pa tshos rnams gzhan du ma 'gyur bar nges pa'i lung bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad
ga grub par 'gyur ba 'byung ba'i lam de nga zhan du 'gyur ba la ma 'a jigs pa ste// bzhi po de dgan de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams so// de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'khrul ba med ba dang/ tsamad pa dang/ bsnyal ba mad pa dang/ sems mnyam par ma gzhag pa med pa dang/ grwa dad pa'i
( 'du shes mdab dung/ so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang/ mos pa nyams pa med pa dang/ brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang/ dran pa nyum sa ba med pa dang/ ting nge
'dzin nyams pa med pa dang ) shes rab nyams pa med pa dang/ rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang/ 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ya shos mthong ba 'jug pa dang/
tsho ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang/ da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang/ lus kyi las bla mas cud la shes sngon du 'gro

zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang bdang/ ngag gi las thams cad la shes sngon du 'gro zhing ya shes kyirjes su 'brang ba dang/ yid kyi 'a sa thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ya bras kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste/
bco brgyad po de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'i rnam pa sum cu/
00 ]rtsa gnyis dang ldan par khyo gas bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin du 'byung ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams/
cad ni bdag med pa yanan/ sams can rnams ni bdag med par ma mos pas de'i phyir sams na rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyugs rje chen po skya'o// chos thams cad na sams can
med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni sems can du slaba'o zhes sams can rnams 'de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skya'o// chos thams cad ni srog mdad yin// sems
can rnams ni srog tu skya'o zhes de'i phyir sams can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po skya'o/ chos thams cad ni gang zag med pa yin na/ soms can rnams ni gang zug/
la gnas so zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshags pa'i thugs rje chen po skyogo/ chos thams cad na mad pa yinan/ sems can rnams na yod par lta'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin
gshegs pa'i thugs rjechen po skyako/ chos thams cad ni gnas med pa yanin ) sems can rnams ni gnas la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skya'o//

bo med pa yin na sems can rnams yongs su gzung ba la brtson nozhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rjechon po skye'o// chos thams cad na dngos bo mad du yin zhu/

larten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skya'o// chos thams cad ni 'chi 'pho dang ma skyes pa yin ) sems can rnams na 'chi 'pho dang
skya ba la rten to zhes sems rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skya// chos thams cud na kun nas nyon ma mos ba yin na/ sems can rnams ni kun nas nyon
mongs so nas thams can rnams la de bzhin gshags pa'i thugs rje chen po skyo'o// chos thamasacad na 'dod chags dang bral ba yin na ) sems can rnams ni 'dod chags par

nga nyam nga bar zhugs te lam gol pa la gnas pa yin rgyus/ de dag yang dag pa'i lam du gzud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i shugs rje chen po skye'o/
ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni brkam zhing 'dod pa'i bal gyis non pa// chog ma shas shing gzhan gyi nor la 'brog pa yin gyis/ de dag 'phags pa'i nor dad pa dang/ tshul
khrims dang/ thos pa dang gtong ba dang// shes rab dang/ ngo tsha shes pa dang/ khrel yod pa'i nor la dgod de zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o//
kyi ma se mos na de ngagan bu smad dang/ khyim dang/ nor dang/ 'bru la sred bas/ 'khor bsto/ snying bo med pa lasAng bo'i 'du shes pa yan gyis/ de dag la shani tu ni rtag par bya'o zhes
