la 'tsho ba yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyi'i chos ston to zhes sams can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skyogo/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni chos mi shes pa ste/ red pa
dang bkur sti dang/ tshigs su bcad pa la spyod kyang bdag cag na chog shes pa snyam du 'dzin gyis/ de dag la gang 'do sdug bsngal shin tu zhi zhing bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa sa shinatu chog
par bya'o zhes sa nas na rnams la de bzhin gshags pa'i thugs rje chen po skya'o/ kye ma sems can 'di dag na khyim gyi gnas sdug bsngal gyi snod gan du 'onamongs pa la rtag tu dga' ba yan
gyis/ de dag las byung zhing khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'ongs par bya ba'i phyi'i chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sdugasarje chen po skalo// chos thams
cad gi rgyus lta bar 'gro ba bsgrubs pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshand mnan/ de la semasacan rnams ni 'phags pa'i rnam pa go'al ba la le lo byad kyis/ de dag la rnam par grol ba ltar
blang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams par ches bstan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skya'o// sems can rnams ni chags pa med pa'i ya shes dam pa khyod
par du 'phags pa 'a yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'di btang zhi gang 'di nyan thos kyi rig pa pa dang/ rang sangs rgyus kyi theg pa dman pa tshol ba yin gas/ de dag la gang
'dis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la dmags par bya ba'i phyi'i/ rgya chen po la blo mos par bya'o zhes sams can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skya ste/ rigs kyi bu rnam sum du rtsa
gnyis po de dag dang ldan na/ sems can rnams la de bzhin gshags pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// de bas na de bzhin ga mas pa thugs rje chen po la gnas pa zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi ku
byang chub sems duba' gang la la zhig sams can dag la rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis pong ngag dang ldan pa'i snying rje chen po sku na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pon bsod
nams kyi zhing gatri brjid chen pos rgyas ba phyir mi ldog pa sams can gyi don la brtson par rig par bya'o// snying rje chen po'i chos kyi slo' li ru 'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na/ srog rlag

stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// srog chags brgyad stong ni mi skya ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// lta ba bu stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis
ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul mang tsang dri mngang bral ba rnam par dag go/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de dag la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang ! byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dang ba
[sgyur gyi chos rnam par dgod pa ni dpag tu med grangs med de/ da das phyi ma'i mtha'i mur sdug ba'i bskal bar de bzhin gshegs pas bstan kyang mtha' mang na/ sems can rnams kyi dga'
ba dang/ dad pa dang/ rangs ba bskyed pa'i phyi'i phyogs tsam zhig bstan te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems kun thams cad la chos dkar po las 'thun par 'byung ba'i dbugs 'byung ba
dang rngub pa'i srog nye bar spyor pa la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin dpag tu med pa kun 'adus ba yin zhen/ rigs kyi
bu 'di lta sta/ dper na rlung mar ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor mu medatsang rgyu cha la brtan zhing sra bas 'jig rtenagyi khams 'dzag pa dang 'byung ba char sprin dang bcas pa/ rgyam tshodang glang chen
po bzhi par bcas pa/ ri rab ngang/ re ba dang bzung dang// ra btang bzung chen po dang/ gangs dang khor yuga'i ngang khor yug ri chen po dang/ ri spos kyi ngad ldang dang/ grong
rngal dang 'bab chu dang/ nags tshal dang/ gzhal med khang gi rnam par bcas pa dag yongs su 'an to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po yang
gzungs kyi rlung mar gyi dkyil 'khor mu me da nga sa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas kyi sprin gyis phab pa'i gtan pa med pa'i chos kyi chos kyi rgyun chen po thams cad yongs su 'dzin/
to 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad chags pa'i tshe/ ji skad du brjod pa'i ri rib dang/ rgya mtsho dang/ gling chen po bzhi pa dang/ ra btang bzung dang/ ru btang bzung/
chen po dang/ gangs dang/ khor yug ra dang/ khor yug ri chen po dang/ ri spos kyi ngad ldang dang/ grong rdal dang/ 'bab chu dang/ nags tshal dang/ gzhal med khang gi rnam pa lta bu bsod nams/
brgyapa'i mtshan dang/ sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ dbang dang/ stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par
rig pa dang/ ma 'dres pa dang/ snying rje chen po la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyan sum tshogs pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin to// 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jug rten las 'dra

pa'i chos kyi phung po brgya stong du med pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yongs su 'dzin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi char sprin dang dug tu med pa kun
'dzan nus pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye bathams cad rnam par 'byed cing yo ngas jus 'god nga
lan nan/ rigs kyi bu 'ang lta ste/ dper na rlung mar na gzhal med khang dgod pa'i rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs thams cad kun nas gzhog ra ra byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed de//
nags tshal dang/ shing dang/ yal gdang/ 'dab ma dang/ ldum bu dang/ myu gu dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ lam dang/ sdong po la sogs pa dang/ sems can/
thums cad kyi yana'ag dang nying lag rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs su rtag tu rgyun mi 'chid par yongs su gzhog cing rnam par 'byed de/ gsal bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub
sams dpa' rlung mar yang so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ srobs pa'i ye shes ma thogs ma chags shing mtha' yas pas 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bunasam
tshogs pa thams cad sgo sna tshogs nas yongs su gzhog par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed/ snang bar byed/ yongs su ston par byed/ theb par byed cing rnam pa 'di dag 'di lta ste/
chos 'di ni ngan song sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni bde 'gro sgrub pa'o// 'di dag na bdag por sgrub pa'o// 'di dag na sems can dmyal ba sgrub pa'o// 'di dgan byol song gi skye gnas sgrub pa'o/
'di dgan gshin rje'i 'jig rten sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni ma'i sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni lhor sgrub pa'o/ 'di dag ni 'khor los sgyur bar sgrub pa'o// de bzhin du mdor bsdus te/ 'di dge ni brgya byin
dang tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni gzugs dang/ g.yog dang/ yid gzhungs pa dang/ dpal chen po'i sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni rig pago/ 'di dag ni sgyu rtsal le
[©]/ 'di dag na bzo'i gnas so// 'di dag na bstan bcos sna tshogs la rnamar thams cad du mkhas pa'o// 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa ste/ nyan thos su 'gyur ba'o// 'di ni rang
sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ste/ rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'o// 'don sgrig pa chen po ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa bdag dang gzhan gyi don yang dag par thob par byed pa kun tu bzang po
thams cad mkhyen nyid du 'gyur ba'o// de bzhin du mdor bsdus te/ 'di dag ni sa rnam sa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang// rig pa rnams dang/ dbang rnams
gzungs rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ ma 'dres
pa rnams so zhes rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' na de dag la sogs pa rnam pa tshad med pas/ gzungs bdu bkod pa la sogs pa la mkhas pas chos bkodra pa rnam par bkod pa dag
byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongs su 'god pa yin no// ji ltar na byang
chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsam gyi shing la sa shani tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par gdon mi za ba'i me tog yid du 'ong ba'i mar rtag tumangon par 'babs pa yin zhen/
[}]rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rlung mar na dpag bsam shing gi nags tshal dag las gang gis lha dang mi rnams shani tu dga' ba dar yod bde ba skyes nas/ mya ngan med par rnam par rtse zhing/
dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chadapa' kha dog dang/ stobs dang/ mthu dang/ 'di bde ba las yongs su mi nyams pa de lta bu'i spos dang/ ma tog dang/
rgyun dang/ gos dang/ sil snyan dang/ rol mo'i sa la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i mngon nar 'debs// yongs su skyod tsang 'byani par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems
dpa' rlung mar yang yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas/ sems can dag la gang nas sems can
de dgaturgyunama'achad bar chos kyi dga' ba la mos shing 'dun pa dang/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yad kyi las lan ma tho ba med pa dang/ gzakharjidadang ldan pa dang/ yongs su skyo ba'am
'gyur ba dang/ lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cud nyams su myong bar byed pa dang/ mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang/ shes rab kyis snang bar gyur pas rtag tu khyad par gyi
rnam par 'dod bar 'gyur ba'i mdo sde dang/ dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang/ lung du bstan pa'i sde dang/ tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang/ ched du brjod pa'i snga dang/ gleng gzhi'i sde dang/
@#// rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang/ 'di lta bu byung ba'i snga dang/ skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang/ shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang/ rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang/ gtan la brab par/
bstan pa'i sde dag dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos rin po che'am tog la sogs pa 'char mngon par re bas so// rjes su 'thun pa dang/ rjes su mi mthun pa dang/ rnal zhi dang/ spyi'u tshug
[P {]kyi rgyud la sogs pa'i gtam rnam par gdon mi za ba nye bar sgrub bo// tha snyad kyi dmigs pa thams cad la bdag med pa zhi zhing rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid rjod cing ston la rnam par
byang bar byed do// chos thams cad sgo kun tu yang dag par gzhol ba yongs su ston te// sgyu ma'i rnam pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa la 'jug pa lta bar sbyor ro// la shes sgyu ma rnam par rgyas
lha par byed do// chos thams cad la dga' bar rtse ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams kyis sems can rnams yongs su rgyas par byed do// 'dri ba thams cad kyi lung bstan pos tshim par byedado/
mtha' dang dbu med pa'i rdzu 'phrul la mkhas pa skyed do// de ltar na byang chub sams dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsam gyi share las shin tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par rnam par
gdon mi za ba'i ma tos yid du 'ong ba'achar rtag tu mngon par 'babs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su
bsags pa tengange 'dzan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtshodang/ rab dang/ 'od dang/ zla ba dang/ nyi ma dang/ chos kyi tshul dang/ nags tshal dang/ khang pa dang
dag kha'i khor yug ga la sogs pas yongs su bskor pa'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khon/ gdul pa yongs su smin pa yang dag par gnas pa bla na med cing lus med pa'i gnasasu
'gyur bar 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba yin zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dparan rlung ma ni bskal pa'i mthar thug ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jage
par 'gyur ba 'i dusan gang ga'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang/ ri rab dang/ khor yug ra dang/ rgya mtsho la sogs par bcas pa kun
nas 'jig cing rnam pa'athor ba dang/ rmag med par byed cing nam mkha'i rang bzhin du byed pa de ltabur stobs kyi shugs thogs pa med bar snang ngo// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems
dwapa'i rlung mar ya nga bska lapa mang po tshogs bsags pasams can bsod nams dang ye shes sna tshogs rnam par bkod pa'i ri mthon po dang ldan pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobu/
kyishugs dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang/ rnam par 'phrulapa chen po yongs su bstan pa dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med par rab tu bskor ba'i sgra skad kyi dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pas !
chos kyi phung po 'drung mar gyi da kyil 'khor gang gis 'dul ba chos snang ba'i lhag mthong dam pa dang ldan pa bzod par mi nus pa'i 'du byed kyi stobs cha nas cung mnyam du
gshog pa tshul bzhin pa de la byas nas yang dag par semasanang du gnas pa'i tang nga 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa la parten te srid pa dang/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ sku mched kyi 'du byed kyi
lus thams cad bshag dang rnam par btogs te lus mad par phyes nas/ yang dag pa ma yazhi pa kun brtags pa rnam par bshig ste/ 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su 'das pa/ bsam gyis
mi khyab cing gzugs med pa'i bsod nams phun sum tshogs ba dang/ gzugs thams cad yongs su bstan pa rnam pa bshig pa sa gnas gyur pa rnam par dag kha/ phyi ma'am bla' mur thug par gnas
ba rnam pa thams cad du mtha' dang bral ba rnams thob par byed pa de lta bu kun nas rab tu gtong ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sams dpa' bskal pa grangs med khar dkar po'i dkyil
'khor yongs su bsags pa ting nge 'dzin dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang/ ra re ba dang/ 'od dang/ zla ba dang/ nyi ma dang/ chos kyi tshul dong nags
tshal dang/ khang pa dang/ dag pa'i khor yug ra la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dug pa dang longs su smin pa mang po yang dag pa raganas pa//
[/ ]bla na med cing lus med pa 'ganas 'gyur bar yo shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sanas dpa' rlung mar lta bu /
yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sal bas 'di skad ces gsol to// a la la de ltar bcom ldan 'dus kyis rnam pa thams cad kyi
mchog dang ldan zhing/ sams can rlabs po che rnams yongs su tshal par 'gyur ba'i chos bcu bo 'di bstan pa bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom
ldan 'das lha dang ma gang la la chos 'di dag la mos shing nan tan bgyid na/ de dag thams cad jisnyad du gsungs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa/ bde ba dang bcas pa// yid bde ba dang bcas
par thob par 'gyur te ) brgya ni dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa zhig bgyid na yang/ gzhan gyi don la gzhol zhing tshe 'di dang/ tshe rabs gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs
pa thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// dede bzhin te/ sems can gang de lta bu'i chos rnams la nan tan du byed pa de dag
ni 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang/ kun tu rnam par bltas pa dang/ mi dge ba'i ches thoms cad rab tu spangs pa dang/ dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa dang/
'jig rten thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ro// gang spong ba'i skyes bu glen pa de dag ni mun par gzhol ba ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad la ston pa'o// lha dang/ mi dang/
) lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya ngan du bya ba'o/// dkon mchog sprin bam po bzhi pa// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na//
byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// banu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dri ma med pa rnams yin/ mchags pa rnams yin/ zhi ba rnams yin/ shes
rab mtha' yas pa rnams yazhi/ so so ma la shes mtha' yas pa rnams mni/ chos kyi dbyangs mnyam pa 'di rjes su song b rnams yani/ chos thams cad nam mkha'i dbya nges kyi
ngo bo nyid du mos pa rnams yani/ so so ma rten ba rnams yin/ mtshan ma'i spyod yul las 'das pa rnams yani/ rtog ge'i spyod yul las 'das pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos/
bcu po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// 'a dAs kyi bu gzhan yang chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'ang
mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ yid du 'ong bdang/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs rnams la chags par yang mi 'gyur ) khong khro bar ma 'gyur ba dang/
yid du 'ong ba dang/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra rnams dang/ dra rnams dang/ ro rnams dang/ reg rnams dang/ yade du 'ong ba dang/ yad du mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la chags par yang
mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang/ rnyed pa dang/ ma rnyed pa dang/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang gragasapa dang/ ma grags pa dang/ bstod pa dang/
snang pas chags par yang ma 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang ma 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byu nubasems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no//
rigs kyi bu chos rta'u dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' zla ba lta bu rnams lanen/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu som par byed pa dang/
mthong na dga' ba rnamasadang/ chos dkar po rnams skyabar byed pa dang/ chosanag po rnams 'bri bar byed par dang/ rab tu bsngags pa rnams yazhi/ lus yongs su dag pa rnams
ni bzhon pa mchog la zhon pa rnams yin/ rtag tu brgyan pa rnams yani/ chos kyi dag kha ba la mos shing 'dun ba rnams yazhi/ 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba rnams yin no// rigA
kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim bar byed pa nas/ ji ltar na 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i bar du yin zhe naM/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
dpar na zla ba shachen 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi lus bsal ba dang/ yade du 'ong bar rab tu sam par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba/
[« ]sharana'ang 'di lta ste nyon mongs pa'i gdung bgrams tshadadang bral ba dang/ dga' ba dang/ dad pa dang/ sangs pa dang/ yad du 'ong bas sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu saMm par
byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta sta/ dper na zla shar na 'di lta ste/ zhi ba dang/ dang ba dang ( sams shan tu dga' bar byed pas sems can tham sa cad mthong na dga' ba yinan// de bzhin du
byang chub sems dang 'i zla ba shar na'ang 'di lta sta dbang bo rnam brar gsal ba dang/ sams kyi rgyud dang ba dang sprod pa dang/ spyod lam dang 3 yon tan phun sum tshogs pas se nas can

thams cad mthong na dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yin no// rigasakyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na slob ya re gyi ngo la zla ba nya sta/ rnam pa thams cad du rgyas par gyur kyabar du nyi ma re re zhing 'ba' 'a//
yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sams dpa' zla ba yang thog ma sems bskyod ba nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dugag bar du nyi ma re re zhing chos dkar po rnams 'phel
zhing yongs su rdzogs bar 'gyur te/ nam byang chub kyi snying bo la 'dug gi bar de rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta sta/ dper na zla ba mar gyi ngo la bab pa dang/
zla ba'i dkyil 'khor kha dog dang/ snang ba dang/ chu zheng yang yongs su 'bri sta/ bco lnga la rja ltar rnam ba thams cad kyi thams cad du mi mngon pa de ltar 'brigo/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
dpa' zla ba yang nam 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ya shes zlog par gyur pa de ni/ de'i mi dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du rab tu 'gro ste/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi snying po' thams cad
kyithams cad du med par 'gyur bad ltar rab tu 'bri'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba shar na bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ grong pa dang/ lul gyi mi skyes pa dang/ bud med/
khye'u dung/ bu mo rnams kyis rab tu bsngags par byed pa mni no// de bzhin du byang chub samasadapa' zla ba shar na yang lhadang/ mdang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zur banus pa'i 'jig rten gyi
khams rab tu bsngags par byab yon no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta sta 3 dper na lha'i bu zla ba'i lus 'di ltar rang gi bgonganams kyi las rnam par smin pas grub pa ni yongs su dag pa ste/ 'og
pa med cing dang ba dung gsal ba yanano// de bzhin du byung chub sems dpa' zla ba'i lus kyang 'di lta ste/ chos nyid kyis mngon par grub pa rdzus te skyes pa/ pha ma'i btsogapa dang mer mer po
las byung ba ma yin te/ yongs su dag la rog nga med cing dang ba dang gsal ba yin no// gas kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni bzhon pa mchog la zhon te gling bzhir snang par byedade/
@#// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa mchog la zhon te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par snang bar byed do// rigs kyi bu la

'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni rtag tu brgyan cing rgyun ma b.ranges pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang 'di ltar yon tan gyi rgyan rnams kyis rtag tu brgyan pa yin no// shes

kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu zla ba na rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par lha'i 'dod pa'i dga' ba la mos pa yin no// de bzhin du byung chub sems dpa' zla ba yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos kyi dga'/
ba la mos shing 'dun pa yin gyi/ 'dod pas dga' ba la dga' ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
zla ba yang 'di lta ste// bsod nams chen po dang/ ya shas chen pos 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sam par
byedanas/ 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang 'dra ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu tshos
bcudang ldan n// byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma lta bu rnams yin no// cu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ marig pa'i mun pa sa lab rnams yin/ 'dul ba'i sems can rnam par 'byed par
bya 0 byed ba rnams yin/ phyogs bcu thums cad du lhan nar khyad b rnams yan/ dge ba'i chos mngon par shar ba rnams yan/ dedag gi zag pa nub par gyur pa rnams yani/ snang bar
byed pa rnams yin/mu stegs can ngan pa'i lus rnam sa zil gyis mnan te 'dug pa rnams yin/ mnyam ba dang ma mnyam pa kun ston ba rnams ni/ chos dkar po'i las kyi mtha'
thams cad 'byung bar byed pa rnams yani/ skya bo dge ba la dga' ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar nabyang chub sems dpa' na rig pa'i mun pa sa ba nas/ ji ltar skya ba dgeb
la dga' ba'i bar du yin zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na mun pa mun nag thams cad rnam bar sa la to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na'ang ma rig pa'i
mun pa thams cad rnam par sel to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na pad+ma rnam par 'byed par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar ban yang 'dul ba'i
sems can gyi pad+ma rnam par 'byed par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma sharan phyogs banu thams cad du lhan ner byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma la/
na yang phyogs bcu thams cad du shes rab kyi gzi brjod dang/ lo shes kyi 'od zer gyis rab tu lhan ner byed kyang sems can rnams la gnod par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyabu 'di lta ste/
[7/ ]@#// dper na 'dzam bu'i gling du zhi ma'i 'od zer dag nam snang ba de'i tshe na shar nyes bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyima'i la shes kyi 'od zer rnams nam snang ba
de'i tshon/ dge ba'i chos rnams sharaces bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma'asnang ba nam mod par gyur pa de ni tshan nub ces bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub
sems dpa'i nyi ma'i nyon mongs pa rnams thams cad du nam mad par gyur pa de'i tshon/ zag pa zad ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na 'dzam bu'i gling gi
sems can rnams la snang bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sAms dpa' nyi ma shar na yang sems can thams cad la lu shes kyi snang ba byed cing/ gtumug gi mun pa rab rib kyis
khebs pa rnams sa la to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma kAran 'od thams cad kyi 'od med par byed kyang/ nyi man ngas 'ad thams cad kyi 'od mi snang bar bya'o snyam du ma sems
mod kyi/ 'on kyang chos nang thob pas 'od mad nga ra 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dang ba nyi ma shar na yang mu stegs canangan pa'i 'od dang ) mu stags can ngan pa'i lus thams
cad 'od med par 'gyuratshod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma ni ngas 'di dag 'od med par bya'o snyam du mi sems te/'on kyang chos nyid thob pas 'od med par 'gyur go// rigs kyi
du 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la mnyam pa dang mnyam pa legs par ston to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'am shan yod ams can thams
cad la la shes kyi snang bas mnyam khu dang mi mnyam bra legs par ston to// rigs kyi bu mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'din 'phags pa lam gyi tshig bla dgas so// rigs kyi ba ma mnyam pa zhes bya
ba 'di nalamangan pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na rmo brko'i las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung ngo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang dge
ba'i chos kyi las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung ngo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar na skye bo dag ba ni dga' bar 'gyur la[ ]mi srun pa'i rang bzhin can dag mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/
de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang skya bo dge ba rnams dang/ mkhas pa rnams dang/ shesa'abakyi rang bzhin can rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur go/ lam nganapar zhugs
pa rnams dang/ mi srun pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang/ byas pa'i rang bzhin can rnams drang/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhanican rnams dang/ 'khor ba la mngon par dga'
ba dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa las phyir phyogs pa'i rnams ni mi dga' bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma rig ba'i mun pa sel ba nas/ skye bo
ga/ dge ba dga' ba'i khur du yan no// rigs kyi bu chos bzhu bo de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyim lta bu rnams lan rigs kyi bu chos bcu/
dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhan 'di lta ste/ bgam tsho ba rnams ni/ mi rtab pa rnams yani/ mazlogs pa rnams yin/ song ba'i sgra
bsgrugs pa rnams yani/ mi 'jades nga nams yani/ nags tshal dang nags kyi mdub na rgyu ba rnams yin/ ri'i phug gnas pa rnams yin/ len pa med pa rnams yani/ bdag gis brtson
'grus dang/ stobs dang/ mthu thob pas bdud kyi sde rab tu 'dzem pa rnams lani/ dge ba'i chos kya'i tog srung ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpar bag mi tshab
nas dge ba'i chos kyi la tog srung ba'i bar du yin zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng gnagar 'gro yang bdag dang 'dra ba med par mthong bas bag mi mazhing skrag par 'gro'o// de bzhin
du byung chub sems dpa' seng ge yang bdag dang 'dru ba med par mthong bas gar 'gro yang bag mi tsho zhing mi skrag par 'gro'o/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na seng ge ni wathams cad kyi sgras ma ba
pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dang 'i sa ngag yang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis brtsad pas brgal kyang mi rtab cing rgod ba dang zhum par mi 'gyur ro/ gas kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar
0 nasang gan bskugasan bya'i ldog pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems ngang 'a seng ge yang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis bsgugs na mi zlog cing mi zhum par 'gyur ro// gas kyi bu 'di lta
ste dper na song gi ni sgra bang gis ra dogs phra mo thams cad dang/ wa thams cad phyogs bcur 'byor bar 'gyur ba de lta bu sgrog go/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang bdag med
pa'i sang ge'i sgra gang gis bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa gzhun mu stags can gyi ri dgas rnams dang/ gzhan mu stags can gyi wa thams cad phyogs bcur 'byar bar 'gyur ba de sku
bu klog ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sang gan bag tu 'dzan pa las bzlog par bya ba dang/ sams can gzhan dag 'dul ba'i dbang du bya ba ma gtogs par de dag la gnod par byiba'i phyir bdag med
pa'i sang ga'i sgra mi sgrog go/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na song gin kun tu tshul mi 'jigs pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sang ga yang spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i na
tan la lta yang ma 'jigs pa lan no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na seng ge ni rang bzhin kyis nags tshal dang nags kyi mdab na rgyu yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpasang
ge yang rang bzhin gyis dben pa mngon du phyogs shing/ nags tshal dang/ nags kyimadaban spyod pa yan// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na sang chen ri phugan gnas pa yin no/
de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ga yang ye shes kyi brag ga'i phug na gnas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpaganasangagen mi len par 'gro ba yin no//
cha de bzhin du byang chub sems dba' song gi yang nyon mongs pa'i khar thun ga cad bor zhing len pa med par 'gro ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpanasong gi na gtsag bu gnyis su med pa bdag
( gi brtson 'grus dang/ stobs dang/ mthu thob ngas pha rol gyi snga 'jom mo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang gcig pu gnyis su med par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas
bdag gi brtson 'grus dang/ stobs dang/ mthu thob pas bdud kyi snga 'dzom mo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste 3 dpar na grong gi mang ba [“] na sang ge rgyu ba der ri dgas phra mo dag gas la toga rnams
chung gi gson to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' snying po yang yul dang yul gyi phyogs gang na 'dug pa der mu stags can gyur dgas phra mo dag gis dge ba'i chos kyi lo tog chud mi zes
to ga sa kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bag mi tsha ba nus/ dge ba'i chos kyi lo tog srung ba'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
dpa' sang gi lta bu rnams yin no/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' dul pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ byarachub kyi sems
[/]brtan pa rnams yin/ byang chub kyi sems kyi byi dor shani tu byas pa rnams yan ) dbang po bsdams pa rnams yin no// lam du zhugs pa rnams yan/ khur chen po khyer ba rnams yani
samasacan gyi don rnams la yongos su mi skyo ba rnams yin/ yang dag pas 'tsho ba rnams ni/ tshul bcos pa dang/ kha gsag gi rid pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yani/ g.yo sgyu dang/
bral ba rnams zhi/ drang ba'ong ba zhican bsod ng ba rnams yin te/ rogs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n byang chub sems dpa' dul ba rnams yan no/
rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub semasadapa' cang shes pa rnams ni// bcu gang zhon/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang bas rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams yan
sgrib pa med de kun nas ldang pa blams cad dang bral bas lam gyi rgyunam chad pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i drakA' mi gcog pas bka' bzhin byed pa rnams yan/ chos kyi
dbyangs kyitshul rtogs pas chos thams cad kyitshul mnyam pa nying khong du chud pa rnams yin/ dma' ba dma' ba'i yid kyis gdol bulta bu r 'jig rtonan spyod pa rnams yin/
rtag tu rgyunama'achad par bsod snyoms blang bar 'du shes zhe bar gzhag pas/ nga rgyal dang/ rgyags pa dang/ dregs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/'di ltar de mngon sum du shes
[/ ]pa 'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rngams cad la nem nur med pa rnams yin/ chos rang gis rig pa'i phyir gle tsam mang ba rnamasu yin/ rang gi lam mthong bas gzhan gyi
ma bkra zhing pha rol gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin/ ba tu zhugs pa sa 'dzagi rten na sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chosadacu bo de dag dang ldan/ byang chub
ny+nyo sams dad 'a nang shes pa rnams yin// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dang 'o pad+ma lta bu rnams yin no// branu gang zhe na/ 'di ltasta/ ma gos
pa rnams yan/ sdig pa chung ngu dang yang lhan g mi gnas pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims kyi dri zhim pa rnams yazhi/ gtsang ba rnams yone/ bzhin 'dzum pa rnams yin/ ma sgrub pa
rnams yin/ mthong na bkra shis pa rnams yani/ blo rnam bar bya ba rnams yin/ blo yongs su sman pa rnams yin/ shin tu yongs su bzung ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la
ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma gos pa yan pa nas/ jaltaran shin tu yongs su bzungaba'i bar duyani zhin/ rigs kyi bu'ang lta ste/ dpar na pad+ma ni chu'i nang nas 'byung yang mi chags
par skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar de'i chos 'di thob pa'i phyi'i ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dang 'khor ba'i chu las 'byung yang mi chags par skyo'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
04 ltar de'i thabs dang shes rab kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' thabs ma khas pa na 'khor ban spyod kyang 'khor ba'i nyes pa dag gas mi gos te/ de'i thabs de ni shes/
rab kyis yang dag par zin pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad+ma la chu'i thig pa chung ngu yang mi chags so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la sdig pa chung ngu yang mi
chags so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpa' na sa'i phyogs gang du pad+ma skyes par gyur pa'i sa phyogs de dris khyab par 'dug go/ de bzhin du yul dang yul gyi phyogs gang na byang chub
sams dpa' gnas pa de thums cad tshul khrims kyi dris khyab par 'dug go/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pardzun sa'i phyogs gar skyes pa'i sa phyogs de gtsang zhing dram ze
dang rgyal 'gos dang/ grong pa drang/ yul gyi mi thams cad kyang 'du ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ga' skyes kyang rung/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dang/
gtsang sbra kun spyod bas gtsang pa yin te/ lha dang dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dra wa dang/ lha ma mi na dang/ nam mkha' ldang dang/ tshwa 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/
mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams 'du ba yin ) sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongos ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa yin no//
bya[@]// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pad+ma ni ba bya na 'di lta ste/ sams can rnams kyi yid du 'ong bas 'dzum pa lta bu r snang ngo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
chayang khro gnyer ched tsang dbang po shin tu dang bas bzhin rtag tu 'dzum pa yin no// gas kyi bu 'di lAn+ta/ dper na pad+man rang bzhin gyis 'jan zhing ma rtsa ba pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub
sgrasamasadapa' yang rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing dal gyis sna ba yin/ mi brlang zhing ma nor ma smra ba'i rang bzhin can yin no/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na pad+ma ni rnam dang/ ltos dang/

u0f8b yud tsamadag lamathon yang 'di lta ste don 'grub pa'i phyir bkra shos shing rab tu bsngags pa yanan// dbazhan du byang chub sems drapa' mthong ba yang 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa 'od thob par bya
ba la dus thams cad du gang bkra shas shing rab tu bsngags pa yin no// 'gas kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na pad+ma nanam rgyas pa de ni rnam par bya ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nam

shes rab dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog rgyas pa de ni blo rnam par phye ba zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta sta ) dpar na pad+ma ni nam yo ngas su snyan par gyur pa de ni/ bltas na mag gi dpang
a: po tsham da ra byed/ mnyan na rna ba'i dbang po tsham par khyed/ bsnams na sna'i dbang po tsham par byed/ myangs na lci'i dbang bo chami par byed/ reg na lus kyi dbang po tshim par byed/ sems

[e ]btu dag lta bas yade kyi dbang po tshim par byed do// de bzhin du byung chub sems dang 'a yang nam shes rab kya snang ba yongs su smin par gyur pa de'i tsho/ bltas na mgi gi dbang po rnam par dag pa
byed/ mnyan na rna pa'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ tshul khrims dang yon tan gyi dri bsnamasan sna 'dabang po rnam par dag par byed/ myangs pa na lce'i drang nga de rnam par dag par byed//
reg pa dang bsnyen bkur byed na lus kyi dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ yon tan rjod ba rnam par bsams pas yid kyi dbang po rnam par dag par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dporan
pad+ma na skyo ba'i tsha 'di lta ste mi dang ma ma yin pa dag gis shan tu yongs su bzung ba yin te/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dang 'a rnams /
dang dom yazhi pa gzhan brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang ) 'dzag rten skyong ba dag gis shin tu yongs su bzung ba yanin// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma gos pa nas[？ ]shin tu
yongs su bzung ba'i bar du yin te/ gas kyi bu chos bcu po de dag drang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma lta bu rnams yin no/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na//
byang chub sems pa'i sems rgya che ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa thoms cad yang dag pa ra bsgrub bo zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos
thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyod do// sems can thams cad gdul lags sams rgya cher spyod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad

byang chub kyi snying por 'dug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes sams rgya cher skyod do// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyus nas
'jig rten du dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang chos dang ldan par sngon ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor 'a bskor ro zhes sems rgya cher skyong ngo//
'jig rten gyi khams mtho' yas mu med par song sta/ sams can gyi don bya ba'i dngos po de dang de dag gis sems can rnams kyi don bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyod do// shes rab kyi gru sbyar/
te sams can rnams 'go pa'i rgya mtsho'as pha rol tu bsgral la zhis somasargya cher skyed do/ mgon med ba dang/ skyabs med pa dang/ gnas med pa dang/ rten mang po drang/
dpung gnyen med pa dang/ rtsa 'ag med pa 'i sems can rnams kyi rtsa lag bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// lha dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang/
a dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lham yon du bcas pa'i skye dgu'anang du sangs rgyas kyi khyamchog nyid bstan to// sangs rgyas kyi sang ge'i sgra sgrog go/ sangs rgyas/
[/]kyirnam par rol bas rnam par rtse 'o// glang po che'i lta stangs kyis blta bar bya'o zhes sems rgya che bar skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi che bas sems can rnams gdul bar bya'i/ spyod pa
ngan pa su la man/ dka' ba spyod pas ma yin/ zhan pa'i spyod pas ma yin/ zhum pa'i spyod pa sa ma yanin zhes so mas rgya cher skyed do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dgadang ldan n/
byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcudang ldan/ byang chub sems dpa' soms rnam par dag pa rnams yin no// bcu gang
zhe na 'di lta ste/ bsam pa mi g.yo bas bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yina'adi lta ste/ bsam pa la sgyu med pas ngasam pa sa shun tu gnas pa rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/
nyan thos kyi byang chub yade la byed pa mi skyed pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bde la byed pa mi skyod pa dang/ brtson 'grus chung ba'i yade la byed pa ma skyang nga sa tshul bzhin ma
yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnams yani/ 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang bral bas dri ma thumA cad dang bral ba rnams yani/ 'di lta sta/ sbya'i spyod lam dang bral bas
lus kyi tshul 'chos dang bral ba rnams yin ) 'di lta sta/ yang dag pa'i don kun ston pas ngag gi tshul 'chos dang bral b rnams na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyis 'du 'dzi mang pa dang/
ga/ sridi thob// chos nyid thob pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur te/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur pa na ba/
ba yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dag pa rnan sa mnano// rigs kyi bu chos banudang ldan n/ byang chub
sams dpa' sems nem nur med pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhen ) 'di lta sta/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba
dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a yang dag par bsgrub pa dang/ byang chub dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang/ theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan
ba dang/ tshul sna tshogs bstan pa dang/ ngabazhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo dang/ sems can gyi bsam baji lta ba bzhin du 'dulaM ba la mngon par dad do// rigs kyi
bu de lta ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dad pa nas/ ji ltar sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs
kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'dod bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku dang ) zhi ba'i sku dang/ mi mnyam pa'i sku dang/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
pa'i sku dang/ tshad med ba'i sku dang/ phal la med pa'i sku dang/ rdo rje sku zhes bros pa'id na yang dag pa'o// 'di na de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de sem/
nur med/ the tshom med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang pa la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
gi gsang ba lumangon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba de bzhin gshigs pa mngon du lung ston pa dang/ gsang ste lung ston
pa dang/ ldem po drag gis kyang sems can rnams la lung ston mod kyi/ de bzhin bshegs pa la 'khrul pa 'am/ ca co med de/ de'i phyi'i de la brdzun du smra ba'i nyis par
mi 'byung ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa na skyon thams cad spangs pa/ dra ma thams cade sngangs pa/ rdul thabs cad sngangs pa/ yongs su gdung ba thams cad
dang bralo ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa// dbang du gyur pa/ zhi ba ) dang ba/ yongs su dag pa// rnyog pa med pa rnam par gsal ba sku/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la
'khrul ba 'am/ tsaco 'byung ba de na gnas ma yin zhing skabs med do zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam sta ) gnas 'di la de nem nur
ngag gis 'dod pa chung ba dang/ sams kyis smon pa med pa'i phyir/ sems kyi tshul 'chos pa dang bral ba rnams yani/ rlung khrod byas pa yang chud ma gsonan mang
bo lta ci smos te/ byas pa gzo ba rnams yani/ byis pa tshor ba rnams yin te/ dgos pa byas pa la mi spyod/ mi skyung/ yon tan ma yin par mi lta ste/ gzhan du na cung zad
byas pa yang tshor zhing de laston par byed/ gzengs stod par byed/ yang dag par dga' bar byed/ rab tu bsngags por byed ! de la yon tan du lta ba yin no// ji ltar lta bde ltar
byed pa rnams yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gis snyan par ston tsang sems kyis mi mthun par sems pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gis ston rung semA
kyas ngan du bya ba'i sbyor ba mi byed/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngagags 'jam par ska zhung sems kyis zhe la non ti shar gnyer ba ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyis des nga
ston cing sems gyis 'khon gyi mdud bar 'dzin pa ma yin byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyis ri mor bya ba ston tsang sems kyis brnyas par byed pa ma yazhi/ byang chub sems dpa'
kyi rnams tshul mi 'chos/ kha gsag mi byed/ ser sna dang phrag dog gis kun tu glag sa pa ma yin/ sgyu ngang gsos mi spyod/ byang chub sems dpa'a rnams 'thab sman mi byong/ phan tshun
du dpa' ba 'jug pa ma yanigyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus kyis kyang ri mo skud pa yin/ ngag gis kyang yang dag pa'i don su/ las su yang sgrub bo/ byang chub sems/
dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur pa ma btab pa yin no/ ji ltar na de bzhinagashegs nga 'ibastan
pa la skur pa ma btab pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod do// skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smug dag gon nas/
yang dag par dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo// de rab tubyung ba na rgyal bos mnar ba med par rab tu 'byung/ rkun pos 'tshe ba med pa dang/ bu lon gyis
'tshob med pa dang/ 'jiges bas 'tsho ba med ba dang/ 'tshe ba chad pa'i 'jigs pas skyog pa med par rab tu 'byung ngo// de dang de rab tu byung nas dge ba yin zhes tshol ba yin te/ de
dge ba calan zhes tshol pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la snyan bar byed/ ston par byed/ bsnyen bkur byed do// de dag las chos kyang nyanato// thos nas kyang nan tan du byed/
nga rgyal gyi zil gyis mnon ba nite/ dong rgyal dang bral bsam 'go par 'dzani b.lan/ ma leg par 'dzin pas lam shin tu rtogs pa thob go/ de lam shin tu rtogs pas chos
! gru med/ the tshom med de/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ga gsang ba 'amangon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhinugashegs pa'i yid gsab/
ba la mngon par dad can/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i yade kyi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa/saru dgongs pa'i don gang sems dang 'grogs pa
sems la gnas pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gyur pa ma gtogs par nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas skrums cad dang/ byang chub samasadapa'athamA
cad dang/ sams cad thams cad kyis shes par mi nusaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni zab cing gang dpag bka' ba/ brtag par bya ba ma yin
pa rtog ge'i spyod yul las shin tu 'das pa/ drapag tu mad pa/ rgya che ba/ yangs pa) nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa/ rtog ge thams cad kyi yul las 'dres par thob pa 'di
ni yang dag pa'o// 'dra na de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur meng/ bla tsamamad pa yin te/ dra ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i yad kyi gsung ba la
mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub pa la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di byang chub kyi rgyu/
byang chub kyi gzhi/ byang chub kyi phyi'i/ byang chub sams dpa' de dag sems can gyi don la mngon du phyogs dang/ sams can gyi bya ba dang/ sams can gyi byed pa dang ) yongs
su mi so ba dang/ mi skag pa dang/ khur chen po khur ba dang/ mthu bstan pa dang ) brtul ba brtan pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par sgrub pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
rnams mthar gyis yang dag par sgrub pa dang/ thogs pa med pa'i blo dang/ mtha' yas pa'i blo dang/ ma mnyam pa'i blo dang phal la med pa'i bro dang/ brtson 'grus brtan pa/
dang chog brtan pa dang/ dam bcos pa las mi g.yo ba dang/ dam bcas pa phal la mad pa de dag thams cad rim gyis 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang/ yangs par yongos su rdzogs nga ra
'gyur ro zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di na de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur mad/ the tsom med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
yang dag par sgrub pa la mngon par dud do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba la mngon par dad cen/ de 'di snyam du sems so//
gang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sAng por 'dug nas/ lha'i mige chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa sgrib pa med pa thob bo// lha'i rna ba dang/ gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang/
sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'ishes pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par shes pa dang/ brag pa zad pa shes pa dang/ dus gsum pa skad cog gtsag pa dang ldan
pas shes pa/ )chags ba med pa// thogs pa med pa// sgrib ba med ba sgrib bo// de'i phyi'i sems can gyi khams la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lta ste/ sams can 'di rnams ni
lus kyi ngan du spyod ba dang ldan pa/ ngag gi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yod kyi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa// 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa leg par lta ba rnams te/ leg
par lta ba'i las dang chos yang dag par blangs pa'i pa'i/ rgyu de dang/ rkyen de dang gzhi nges lus zhaganas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan 'gro log par ltang ba sems can dmyal bo dag
tu skye 'o// sams can 'di rnams ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yod kyis legs par srid pa dang ldan pa// 'phags pa
la skur pa mi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba rnams te/ yang dag par lta ba'i las drang chos yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir/ rgyu de dang/ rkyen de dang/ gzhi des lus zhig nas
bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha'i nang du skye'o snyam nas de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams la bltasate/ sams can gyi khams de nyide dag bo dang mi dge ba'i
las rnams la rnam par lta'o// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas gang 'di ltar bdag nyid rnam par sangs rgyas nas/ gzhan yang
rnam par sangs rgyas par bya'o zhes dam bcas pa'i bdag gi smon lamade yongs su rdzogs so// bdag gi brnag pa de yongs su rdzogs so zhes thos pa 'di na yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho
na'o// 'di na ma spu bya'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur mad/ the tsom med de/ gang la byang chub sems dpa' de rnam par sangs rgyas pa de ni byang chub ces bya'o// bdag nyidi rnam
par sangs rgyas pas drisanardzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub
sams dpa'atheg pa gcig gi tshul bstan pa la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sams so// gang 'di thog pa ni gcig gon 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thig pa'o zhes shes pa 'di ni ya nga
drug pa'o/ 'dunid kho na'o// 'di ni marlu ba'o// 'dun de bzhinano// ma nor ba'o// gzhan ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ theg ba gzhan rnams kyang 'di las 'byung ngo//
rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dzam bu'i gling na gang glang yod pa rnams ming gis tha dad par shes mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag ni 'dzam bu'i gling du 'du'o/ 'dzam bu'i gling la rten ngo/
'dzam bu'i gling ga grangs su 'gro'o// dre'aphyir na gling gcig kho na ste/ 'di ni 'dzam bu'i glang ngo// de bzhin du theg pa thams rbadra na de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa'i
'du'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa la gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa 'as byung ngo// de'i phyir theg pa ni gcig pa kho na sta/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg
pa'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di' de nye ma nur mad/ the tsom med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems ngong 'a theg pa gcug gi tshul lan pa la mngon par dad ngo// dza ltar na tshul sna tshogs
[“ ]bshad pa thos pa 'di na yang dag pa'o// 'din du khona'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o// denI'i phyir zha na/ 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir ) de bzhan gshegs pa'i dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du gnas
rnams la chos ston te sAm ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur mad/ the tsom na nga de/ de ltar na byang chub sams ngang 'tshul sna tshogs bstan pa la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chubs mas
dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo la mngon par dad rten ) du 'di snyam du sems so/// gang 'di de bzhi gshegs nga 'igasung sgra'idabyangs zab mo rjes nga 'di yang

rtswa dag pa'o// 'din de kho na'o// 'don mi slu ba'o// de ci'i phyi'i zhe na 2 dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyidabyangs kyang zab cing snyan pa yin/ bskal pa brgya stong du mar dag ba'i ma
bya ba bsgrubs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lta ci smos snyam ste gnas 'di la de nam nur med/ the tsom med de/ deltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i
dbyas zab mo la mngon par dad do// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sams dpa' sam can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so//
gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa bsam pa dang brag la nyal mkhyen tesems can mos pa tha dad pa dang/ 'dul ba tha dad pa rnams la gsung sgra'i dbyangs gcig brjod pas 1 the tsom
gcod tsang yongs su snyan ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams 'dul lo// san/sa can rnams kyang so so nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdag la chos ston to// de bzhin gsheg
pa bdag la chos ston to sAmabyed kyang de bzhin gshegs pan mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog go zhes thos pa 'di ni pang dag pa'o// 'din de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam sta/ gnas
'di la de nem nur mad ) the tshom med de/ 'gegs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad do// rigasakyi bu chos bcu po de
dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' sems nem nur mang pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi patshes bcu ngal ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba rnams /
[/]bya@#/ yin no// banu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ 'an po cha'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa rnams yani/ zabacang gting dpag dka' ba rnams yani/ rgya che zhing tshad med/
pa rnams yan/ bags kyis gzhol ba rnams yani/ nyon mongs pa'i ro dang lhan cige ma 'dug pa rnams yani/ ro gag pa rnams yin 3 chu bo kun bazud pa rnams yin/
dus 'a sam g.yo ba rnams yin/ 'byung po mang po'i gnas su gyur pa rnams yin/ ma zad pa rnams yanano// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin ngo ma'i
'byung gnas su gyur pa yin pa nus/ ji ltar na ma zad pa'i bar du lan zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta sa ) dupar nargya mtsho chen po na rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/
'dzam bu gling gi mi thams cad kyis rin po ma byung bas mi zad do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang yon tan rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ sems can thamA
cad kyis yon tan rin po byung bas mi zad do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po na zab nang gting dpag dka' ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems
dpa' ye shes yang dag par grub pa yang zab nang sAms can thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta sta/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di lta ste/ mu tshad
[p/ ]chod pas na yangs shing rgya che ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems drapa' yang 'di lta ste/ blo tshad med pas na yangs shing rgya che ba yin no// 'gas kyi bu 'di lta ste// dper/
nargya mtshon na bon bags kyis gzhol/ bags kyis 'bab/ bags kyis bab bo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dung 'a yang thams rud mkhyen pa nyidi la gzhol/ thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid la 'bab/ than ras cad mkhyen pa nyid la bab bo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyu mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig tu mi 'dug go/ de ci'i phyir zhun/ de
ni rgya mtsho chen po'i chos nyid do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i bodang mi dge ba'i grogs po rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ de ni byang chub
sams dpa'i chos nyid do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen por chu bo ji snyad 'bab pa de thams cad kyang ro gcig pa yin tA ) 'di lta ste/ lan tshwa'i ro'o// de bzhin
du byung chub sems dpa'i yang chos dkar po rnams ji snyad sdud pa de thams car ro gcig pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ro'o// rigs kyi bu 'dil sta/ dpar nargya
mtsho chen po ni chu bo tshad med pa kun bzed kyang de la dri ba 'am/ gang bar yang minangon no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi chu po tshad med pa kun bzad kyang de la khrib/
'am/ gadra bar mi mnganano// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las mi yol lo// de bzhin du byang chubs mas dang 'a yang 'dulabar
bya ba'agams can yongs su snyan par bya ba'i dus las ma yol lo// rigs kyis 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po na 'byung po mang po'i gnas so// de bzhin du byang chub sems
(dpa' yang sems can thams cad dang/ chos dkar po thams cad kyi gnas so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po na sams can thams cad kyis rlu banus kyang mi zad

bzhin du mthong ngo// lus kyis mngon du byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu gang dag

ma lan/ blosal tsam mam/ bsam pa tsam gyisan rang gis rdzigapa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu de lta bsanadapa nyonatsagi/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
dparan 'bregachen po la sos ka'i zla ba thal ma la la zhage shar phyogs nas nub phyogs su 'gro la ) de nas mi gzhan zhig nub phyogs nas shar phyogs su 'ong ste/ de yang sos ka'i
tshabs yongs su gdungs par gyur nas skom gyis rten pa de/ shar phyogs nas 'ong ba'i mi de la 'di skad ces sas pa/kye skyes bu kho bo sosaka'i tsha bas yongs su gdungs te/
skom gyis nyonan/ gangan mtsho'am/ lteng ka 'am/ rlung gang chu bsal ba dang rnyog pa med pa gsal bas gang bayod de/ gang du bdag tshab dang skom pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
ba'i lam bdag la ston cig ces zeral/ shar phyogs nas 'ongs ba'i ma de yung lam shes pa/ lamal mkhasapa/ lam mthong ba/ lam gyi mtshan ma mthong bzhag/
ma'i to/ desan nu'inyis pa dang bral ba'idu sngan chad mthongal/ sngon myangs shing sngon lang zhugs pa yin te/ des midi la 'di skad du kyi grogs po lam 'di nas lamakha brag
00 bya@#// mthong gi bar du song la kye skye bu khyod kyis g.yon gyi lam bar te/ g.yas kyi lam nas nags tshal sngon po dang nags tshal de'i dbus na/ mtsho 'am/lteng ka'am
rdzing chu bsil zhinge dang brtog pamed pa gsal bas gang ba mthong gi bar du song la ) der skyes bu khyod skom pa dang/ tsha ba mdabar phyes shig ces zer na/ rigs kyi bu khyod ji snyam du
sems// sos ka'i tsha bas yongs su gdungs te/ skom gyis nyen pa'i ma ris) chu thos ma thag dang ) bsams pa tsam gyis tsha ba med par 'gyur ram/ skom pa dang bral bar 'gyur
ram chu de'i bsal ba yang rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'dras mi de nam der phyin nas/ des chunger zhugs te 'tshal bar
gyur pa de'[& ]/ma de tshab ma mchis par 'gyur ro// sgom pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ro// des bsu'i ba ya nga rang gas rig par 'agyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal pa//
de bzhin du rigs kyi bu thos pa tsam dang/ bsams pa tsam gyis rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus so// de la rigs kyi bu 'brog ces bya ba de ni 'khor ba'i 'brog gi tshig bla dgas so
mi sos ka'i tsha bas yongs su gdungs shing skom gyis nyanang zhes bya ba de ni nyon mongs pa'i gdung bas yongs su gdungs shing/ yul gyi srid nga sa nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshig bla
drags so// lam shes pa'i mi zhes bya ba 'di na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la mkhas pa tshos myong ba chos rang gis rig pa rnams kyi tshig bla dgas so// rlupasal
zhing dang la reg pa med pa/ gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di ni don dam pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// yang rigs kyi bu dpa nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyamadu sems ) gal te de bzhin

gshegs pa tshe'i tshad bskal par bzhugs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi mdun du 'di lta ste/ lha'i bdud rtsi dri zhim ba dang/ gtsang pa dang/ gya nom pa dang/ shin tu 'chi ba dang reg na bde ba las/
brtsams te bsngags par brjodan rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sem sa/ trAsams cand dag gis lha'i bdud rtsi de'i bsngags par rang gis rig par 'gyur ma ]gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dbas na khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis ji ltar thos pa tsam mam/ bsams pa tsam gyis rang gis rag pa'i ches khod
du chud par mi nus par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang dar nyon cig ! rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mi zhigashing thog gi rnam par sngon sems can sus kyang ma phyungs pa zhigamudra
par gyur la/ des mi gzhan zhig gi mdun du shing thog gi rnam pa de'i bsngags pa 'di lta ste/ kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dang/ ro phun sum tshogs pa dang/ dri zhim pa las botsamA
[c]// ta brjod na rags kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ ci mi des shing thog gi red dang gas rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'jus ma lags so// bcom ldan
'dus kyis bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis ji ltar thos pa tsam mam/ bsams pa tsam gyis so so rang gis rig nga'i chos khong du chud par mi nus par
ragi par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnamapar sal bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das legs par gsungs so// bde bar gshegs pa shin tu leg
par gsungs so// bcom ldan 'dras chos kyi tshul 'di su dag gi rnam thos par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de dag gi chos 'di khong du chud pa nyid du rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/
bcom ldan 'das rags kyi bu de dag gi chos 'di thob par bgyi ba la 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa kA rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// dad
bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'ad thobapar bya ba la 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyogaro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po dedag dang ldan na ! byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyanges
la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' stong ba nyid sbyod yul ba rnams yaneno// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste ! stobs
[e/ ]kyi stod pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ 'jigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ tshul khrims kyi phung po'i stong pa nyade
kyang rab tu shes )ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ shes rab kyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po 'i stong pa nyid kyang rang
tushog/ rnam par grol ba'i ya shes mthong ba'i phung po'i stong pa nyidi kyang rab tu shes/ stong pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes )don dam pa'i stong pa nyidi kyang rab tu shes te//

po'i rgyu dang/ de'i rkyen de dang gzhu des stong pa nyid du dmags pa dang/ stong pa nyid du 'dzin bdang/ stong pa nyid du lta ba dang/ stong ba nyid la gnas pa'ang mi dmigs/rgyu de ngang/ rkyen de dang/ gzhi nges che da
par yang mi lhung ngo// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyide spyod yul ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na//
byung chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams yano// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyi rol gyi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams yan/ nang gi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams
yani/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin ) rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ g.yo ba thams cad dang
bral ba rnams lani/ sgyu ba khrums cad dang bral ba rnams lan/ dmigs pa'i bya ba k+khams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par shes pa ni dmags pa rnams /
yin/ rnam par byang bar bya ba'i dngos po ma dmages pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dug dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'amtshan ma mngu nga la gnas pa rnams yin no//
de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sal bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan ma ma
mchis pa la gnas pa dang de'adran/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ci 'dra bar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni bsam gyi mi khyabab/
! de ci'i phyir zhe na bsam pa'i yul dang bral ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rjes su bsam pa na/ sems can thams cad chos par 'gyur gyi/ de bzhin
rgyu gshegs pa'i chos nyid kyi pha rol lam tshu rol mthong bar mi 'gyur/ mi dmags te/ bla mar na dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyi'i zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gsheg
banazabacang gtong dpog dka'al bsam gyis khyab pa/ dpag tu med pa/ rgya che ba/ nam mkha' dang 'dra ba/ rtog kob thams cad gyi yul las 'des da// dmigs pa na
0 khams cad kyi yul las 'das pa ste/ de ni brtag pa'am/ bsam ba 'am/ gzhal ba 'am/ tshad gzung bar minusaso// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sal bas
gsol pa/ gal te zhus nas khu bu lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rags kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu skabs phyis khyod kyis dris shig/ byang chub
sams dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sol pas ga so la pa/ bdag stodan ni bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pam lags pa'i chos su gsungs nang nga ltar chos kyi rje bcom ldan 'das 'di
bas bdag la bstod ba mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod kyis dri ba tshul bzhin du dris so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu
nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshags pa na sems can 'di dag la ci nas kyang phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir bdag stod
[fo@ ]pa ma gtogs par/ nga rgyal gyi zal gyis non pa dang/ red pa'i thel gyis nyen pa dang/ bkur sti'i thal gyis non pa dang/ grags pa 'dod pa dang/ shes kyi kha 'dod/
pa'i phyi'i tshul 'chos pa 'am/kha gsagamed tsang yang dag pa ma yin par bdag stod pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ se mas can 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la dga' ba dang/ dad pa
dang rangs pa nye bar bzhag pas chos bstan pa skal ba yong par 'gyur ) dge ba'i chos rnams kyi snodadu 'gyur te/ de yang de dag la yun ring por don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde bar 'gyur ro//
byang chub sems dba' sgrib pa klams cad rnam par sel bas gso la nga// bcom ldan 'das tsalags/ sems can 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu ma 'tshal tam ) bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi ba mi shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i sems can rnams ni rgya chung ngu la mos pa/ dman tshogs la mos pa/
shes rab chung ba ) dad pa chung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngus brtan pa dag ste/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi che ba mi shes pa sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi yon tan
gyi bsngags pa brjod pa mdzad de/ de'ang nan gyis sgrub bo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sman pa mkhas pa zhig yod la/ sems can rnams kyang nad kyis nyen par rgyun/ sa'i
[e/ ]phyogs de na'ang sman pa de gtsage lur zad de/ gnyis su med la/ de'i yon tan gyi che ba sus kyang ma shes pa dang/ de nas sman pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag/
ni sdug bsngal ba/ nad kyi nyan pa/ smanal mi mkhas pa gnod pa la ston pa yan gyis/ bdag gis de dag gso bar bya'o snyam nas/ snyan pa des sems can de dag gi mdun du/ kye
somasacan dag bdag na sman pa stand la mkhas pa'o/ nad kyi gzhi lamakhas pa'o// sman la mkhas pa'o zhes bdug gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa bdag nyid kyis brjod dang/ sems
can de dag 'dzin sman ba'o zhes bya bar shes shing ) lad ches par gyur nas sman pa de la tan to// de nas sman pa de sems can de dag gso zhing nad de zhi bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu
daji snyam du sems/ sman pa de bdag la stod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ma legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu de bzhin
gshegs pa yang sman pa'i rgyal po chen po bla na med pa sta/ nyon modras pa'i nad la mkhas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi gzhi la mkhas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i nad gso ba la mkhas
nga sa 'os kyi sman pa chen po stobs pa yin kyang/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis na bor gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis mi shes te/ nyon mo ngas nga nad kyis nad par gyur pa'isam
[r]@#/ ]can rnams gzigs nas/ de dag gi mdun du bdag gi yon tan dang bsngags babadag nyidi brjod de/ de nas nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par 'gyur ba'i sams na de
dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa'i che ba blosanas yid ches par gyur pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rten to// denas de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal
bo bosachos kyi snyan da ngag gsanyon mongs pa'i rgyud rab tu zhi bar mdzad de/ chos kyi sman chen po de dag kyang gang nan/ 'di lta ste/ mi skrag pa dang/ byams pa dang/ rten
cing 'brel par 'byung la sogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pani don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas/ bdag la bdag nyidi stod pa mdzad do// rigs kyi bu chos
bcudang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang bral ba yanano// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa la smon kyang sbyin pa la gnas ba rnams
zla yin de bzhin du tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dung/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab dang/ khrims gsum ba dang/ byang chub dang/ lam dang/ mya ngan las
'angs pa la stson kyang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu de tsa'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas thams cad dang bral ba ste/ mi gnas par
[ne ]'jig rten thams cad du rnam par spyod do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan nA/ byang chub sems dang 'a smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang bral ba rnams yin no//
gas kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub semasarang 'a byams pa'i bdag nyid can yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zhi ni ba med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/
tha dad pa med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ chos kyi byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yon/ nges par rtog ra 'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gnod pa med pa'i byams pa/
dang ldan pa rnams yin/ phan pa'icags pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gnod sems med pa'i byams pa dang
ldan pa rnams yano/ phyogs bcu kun tu khyab ba'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnamus yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yanato/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag
dang ldan n byang chub sems dpa' byams ra 'badag nyid can rnams 5zhin// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag 'dican
rnams yin no/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can sdug bsngal ba dang/ skyabs mang ba dang/ mgon med nga dang/ nyin m da ba dang/ dpung gnyen med ba dag ma thong na/
00/ byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub tu sems bskyed/ chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir 'bad rtsol/ pan 'thus rtsom ste/ dka' bar spyod pa brgya dag kyang/
byad do// de dag ches thob nas sems can rnams la phun par byed do// 'di lta ste/ sems can ser sna can rnams spyan pa la gzhog par byed/ tshul khrims ngan ba can rnams tshul
khrams la gnod sogs ma rnams bgrod pa la ) le lo can rnams brtson 'grus la/ sems 'khrug pa rnams bsam gtan la/ sams can shes rab 'chal pa rnams mthong nas/
shes rab la gzhol bar byed kyang/ sems can gyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ rtsub ba/ ri bdag gis nyon sung/ byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang
a ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sAng rje'i bdag nyid can rnams man no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan nA/ byang chub sems dang 'a dga' ba la gnas pa rnams yin no//
rgyabacu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ bdagan 'khor ba'i btson ra rab tu 'bar bas byung ba'o zhes btudaga' ba skyed do/ bdag gis 'khor ba'i dpyang thag mun range po nas thogs pa chod do zhes
dga' bskyodado// bdag ni rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs mang po 'i chu srin gyis dkrug pa'i 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal tozhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag gis yun ring po nas bsgreng ba'i nga
[/ ]rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bsnyal la zhes rab tu dga' bskyed do// badrag gis nyon mongs pa'i ri rnams ye shes kyi rje rjes brtson lta/ ji ltar rdul kyang mi snang ba de ltar bcom mo zhes rab tu/
dga' ba skyed do// bdag nyid ni dbugs phyin pa yin gyis/ da ni gzhan yang dbugs dbyung bar bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag 'di na 'jig rten gnas pa yun ring po nas gnyid
la srid pa'i snyom pas yongs su ban pa gti mug gis yongs su bsgribs pa nang nas sad pa yin gyi/ da ni gzhan yang rnam par sad par bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag nyid
nin 'gro dang/ na song dang/ log par ltung ba thams cad las rnam par grol ba lan gyis/ da ni gzhan yang ngan so nga dang/ ngan 'gro dang/ log pa ra ltung ba thams cad las rnam
par grol bar bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba spyod do// bdag 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par yun ring po nas 'khyam ste/ grogs med tsang gnyis su med par yang yang 'khyam zhing/
lamal mkhasu ba ) lam mi shes shing yul mi shes pas lam stor ba red de zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag ni khAmasacad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer dang nye bar gyur to zhes
rab du dga' bskyed do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba lo nas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chosabanudang/
@#/ ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams man no// banu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams
la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ mig gis rnam par shes bar bya ba'i gzugs rnams kyis smos par mi 'gyur/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ rmabyung bar mi 'gyur ba rnams dang/
de bzhin du rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang/ snas rnam bar shes par bya ba'i dra rnams dang/ lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i re rnams dang/ lus kyis rnam par shes
par s+ya pa'i rig bya rnams dang/ yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams la btung snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin ta ) yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams
la kyis skyas par mi 'gyur/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ rma byung bar mi 'gyur ro// 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang/ sngag bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang/ 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal la btang
snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ 'du byed kyi sdug sngal dang/ sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang/ 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis sbas par mi 'gyur ) gnod par mi 'gyur/
rmabyung bar mi 'gyur ro// bya ba byas pa'i sems can rnams la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ de dag la dga' bdang/ dad pa dang/ rangs pa skyod tsang de dag 'di
snyam du sams te/ gang bdag gis bsgral bar bya ba de drag nyid brgal bar gyur te zhes btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos nu po de dag dang ldan na/
byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon ra ra shes nga sa rnam ra ra ro'ang
banu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shi 'pho 'ang ston/ skye ba'ang ston/ btsas pa dang/ phyis pa'i spyod nga dang// sras kyi nang na rtse ba'i ston/ mngon par byung ba yang ston/ dka' ba spyod
pa'ang ston/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'ang ston/ bdud 'dul ba'ang ston/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang ston/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'ang ston/ yongs su mya ngan
las 'das pa chen po'ang ston to// denas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam por sal bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
rgyu gang dngarkyen gang gis byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam po nas/ shi 'pho ston pa nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen ngo 'i bar du ston pa 'a gas/ bcom ldan 'as
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas/ sems can gang dag rtag par 'du shes pa yod pa de dag gis/ byang chub sam dpa' 'jig rten thams cad 'a sa khyang zhugs pa/
'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa ) 'jig rten kun gyi phul du byung ba mi nyanas pa// 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams kyis ma gos ma rlags pa// shi 'pho
nya bar mthong na rtag pa'i 'du shes ldogatsangami rtag pa'i 'du shes 'byung ste/ mi rtag pa'i 'du shes la gnas pas bag yod pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa
sams can gang dag bag med par spyod pa yod pa de dag byang chub soms dpa' la dga' ba yod/ dadapa yod/ rangung yodakyang yul la mngon par zhan pas byang chub sems dpa'i drung du/
mi 'dong/ mi stan ]bsnyen bkur mi byedatsang/ de dag 'di snyam du sams te/ byang chub sems dpa' yang bzhugs la/ bdag cag kyang 'khod de dus kyang rang du yod kyis 'drong bar bya'o snyam
! du sems pa// de dag gi bag med pa zlog pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems da pa' 'chi 'pho ston te/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' 'phro mthong nas/ skyo ba la gnas par 'gyur zhing/ de dag
skyo bar gyur nas bag med pa mi byed de/ bag yod pas blan mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges par 'gyur ro// bags kyi bu sems can gang dag skye bas 'dul ba yod pa de dag
gis byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug pa'i mthunang na/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung bar 'gyur ste/ de dag tshanas kyang thun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu nges par 'gyur/
ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa 'ama'i mngal na 'dug bzhin du chos ston to// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub sems dba' btsus pa dang/ phyis pa'i spyod pa dang/ sras kyi nang
na 'dug pas yongs su smin par bya ba yod ba de dag yongs su sman par bya ba dang/ dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams bsrung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa dang/ byas
pa'i spyod pa dang/ sras kyi nang na 'dug pa ston to// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub semasadapa' mngon par 'byungab dang/ rab tu 'byung bas yongs su smin par bya ba yod pa de dag
yongs su smin par bya ba'i ri/ byang chub sems dpa'aman par 'byung ba ston cing rab tu 'byung ngo// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag lha dang/ kludang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang lha
ma yin la sogs pa spyod bdaman palamos ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i dka' ba'i spyod pas longs su smin par bya ba yodapa de dag yod pa de drag yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ mu stegs can gzhan
tshar gcud pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyod pa ston to// rigs kyi bu samasacan gang dag gis yun ring bo nas bdag cag gas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por
'gro ba'i che/ mchod pa'i las la brtson par bya'o zhes smon lam btab pa yod pa de dag la ) byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sAng por 'gro ba ston la/ de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'
'gro ba la so so'i tshul bzhin du ma chod pa byed do// de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byas pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges
par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag nga rgyal dang/ rgyugs pa dang/ dregs pas rlom pa yod de/ de dag de las bzlog pa'i phyir byang chub san sa dang 'a byang chub kyi snang ngo
la 'dug cing/ bdud btul ba ston to// sems can gang zhig la gnas pa de dag la sa gong du khyad par thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub semasadapa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba
ston to// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sgra sna tshogs dang/ natso sna tshogs gang yod pa de
dag thams cad med cing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang zhi bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis mthu de mthong nas bdag cag kyang de ltar byang chub kyi sAng pol 'khod de// blun
mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes smon lam 'debs so// rags kyi bu sems can gang ston par bkur ba dang/ ston par khas 'che la/
dedag gis 'byung ba dang ! byama'i chos man par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa yod pa de dag tshar gcod pa dang/ sems can dge ba'i rtsab yongs su smin cing snod du gyur pa rnams
la lom bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa// ka ka'i grong rdal du song nas lan gsum du bzlus te rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i chos kyi 'khor
la skor gro/ gas kyi bu sems can gang dag yongs su myang n las 'das pas 'dul ba yod de/ de dag 'dul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ston te/
rigs kyi bu 'di ni rgyu/ 'don kyin te/ des byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas/ shi 'pho stonatsang yongs su smyungan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du ston to// shes kyi
bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam pa rol ba rnams yazhi// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
mi khom pa brgyad rnam par sbyangs ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi dge ba'i chos las phyir ldog pa rnams yan/ de bzhani gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa las mi
'da' b rnams yani/ sor sna dang bral ba rnams lan/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnams yani/ bsod nams bya ba la brtson ba rnams yin/ shes rab phun sum tshogs pa
rnams yane/ thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin/ smon lam kun sum tshogs pa rnams yani/ skyo ba mang ba rnams yani/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yan no// rigs kyi bu byang chub
[7 ]@#// sems dpa'ani mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang gis sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye zhing/ de dag tu skyes nas kyang/ tshor ba mi bzad kha ]rtsub pa/ tsha ba/
la yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur ba'am/ yun ring po la gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/ sums can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag la gnosapa'i sams skyed par 'gyur ba de lta bu r mi 'gyur
gyi byang chub sems dpa'an reng bzhin gyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa yin te/ de ltar na de na sems can dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
ni de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa las ma 'da' ba gang gis dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ba'am/ de dag tu skyes nas kyang dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal mi bablad pa myong bar
'gyur ba mad do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' na gang sar sna 'gyur ba rgyu de dang/ rkyen de dang ) gzhi des yi dgas kyi nang du skye zhing/ de dag tu skyes nas kyang yi dwags kyi sdug
bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa myong bur 'gyur ba med/ byang chub sems dpa'ani gang du smyus pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa thob pa'i rkyen dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i lo par
lta ba'i rig sa su mi skye'o// de ci'i phyi'i zhin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sngon spyad pa ste/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa yin pas de dag yang dag pa'i lta ba'i rigesu skye ba
ya te/ de dag tu skyesazhas kyang rkyen phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing/ rkyen de dug de bas kyang 'phel ba dang/ rgyus pa dang/ rangs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i
ni dbang po ma tshang ba'i rnam pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du mi rung bar 'gyur bar dbang po dang mi ldan par 'gyur ba ma yAnigyi/ byang chub sems dpa'an/
bsod nams bya ba la brtson zhing bsod nams kyis brtan pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam/ chos sam) dge 'dun la bya ba gang byas shing bsnyen pa dang
bstan pa dang/ bsgoms pa dang/ mang du byas pas/ dbang po phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i bya ba de dang de dag byed cing/ dbang po phun sum tshogs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi
snod du 'gyur ba yano byang chub sems dung 'a rnams mtha' 'khob kyi yul gang na sems can blun po rnangs pa lug ltar lkugs pa'i ngang tshul can/ skal ba med pa// legs par bshad
pa dang nyes par bshad pa'i don shes par bya ba'i mthu med du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod dun gyur pa// mar mi 'dzan po/ phar mi 'dzin pa/ dge sbyong du ma 'dzin pa/ bram zer mi
'dzin pa dag ginang du mi skye'o// byang chub sems dor ba 'di bus kyi yul gang na sems can dbang po rnob/ dbang po gsal ba/ mkhas pa mkhas par bkor ba/ skal ba yod pa/ leg
par bshadapa'ang nyes par bshad pa'i don yongs su shes par bya ba'i mthu yod kyang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa/ mar 'dzazhig ) phar 'ayi pa//
ga sbyong du 'dzin pa/ bram zer 'dzin pa dag ga nang du skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ sngon gyi shes rab dang ye shes kyi stobs kyi mthu dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'a rnams na gang
na gnas pas sangs rgyas skyes pa du ma 'bras bu med par 'gyur ba dang/ soms can gyi don 'grub par 'gyur ba lha tshe ring bo'i nang dum skyego/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'dod pa'i
khams nyid du gang na sems can la dngul bar bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas skyes pa mnyes par byar yod pa skya'o// de'i phyir zhe na/ de thabs la mkhas pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'
rnams ni gang na sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa dang/ chos mi thos pa dang/ dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byar med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag tu skya'o/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni
dkon mchog gsum phun sum tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang rtag tu se'o// de'i phyir zhan 'dan ston gyi smon lam phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas
de lta bu dag thos kyang skyo ba mi mang ba dang/ dmu rgod gyi ngang tshul can ma la'i gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams na gnas 'di lta bu dag thos ma thag tu skyo bar gyur nas ma dag pa'i chos 'di/
[o]dag spang ba'i phyir dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa rnams
yin no// rig sa kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems ma stor ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste g.yo dang sgyu mad de drang zhing/
tshargyu med la sems dang ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang/ de 'dzin pa'i gang zug rnams la yad gnyis dang nem nur dang/ the tsom mdab rnanas yin chos la slob
dponagyi dpe mkhyud dang bral ba rnams yani/ chos kyi ser sna dang bral ba rnams yan ) chos kyis 'phungs par 'gyur ba'i las kyi mtha' dang bral ba rnams yin/ ji skad du smras pa de
lta bu r byed da mi slu ba rnams yin/ theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzan pa rnams yan ) de yongs su 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la chos dang mtshungs pa'i 'du shes kyis zhe sa dang ri mo dang
