bcas pa rnams yin ) theg pa chen po la gzhol/ theg pa chen po la 'bab) theg pa chen po la bab pa rnams yani/ chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la ston par 'du shes pa dang/
dgaba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes skyed pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpe 'a byang chub kyi sems ma stor ba rnams yin no/
rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe rabs dran pa rnams yin no// banu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/
rnams yani/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa rnams yan/'gyod pa mod pa rnams yin/ sgrub pa med pa rnams yin/ dga' ba tshang
ba rnams yin/ sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnams yin rdzus te skye ba rnams yin/ rnam par shes pa ma chos pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyu
mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dam pa'i chos la rim gro yod cing bkur ste yod pa yani/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzanipa'i gang zag rnams la rim gro yod cing
ya ]bkur sti yod pa yin te/ rgyud dang/ rkyen de dang/ gzhu des lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzatsang 'chang ngo/ klog go/ kun chub par byed do// gzhan
la yang rgya cher ston to// de dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brtson pas/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang/ gang [） ]sems kyi tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yin/ tshul khrims yos
su dag pas 'gyod pa med pa yin te/ de yang rim gro mad pa ma yin gyi/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro// 'gyod pa med pas sgrib pa med pa yin/ sgrub pa med pas
dga' ba mang ba yan/ dga' ba mang pas sgom pa mang ba yan ) sgom pa mang bas sems mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// sa nas mnyam par bzhag pas 'gro ba yongs su dag
da ra 'gyur/ 'gro ba yongs su dag pas rdzus te skyo bar 'gyur/ rdzus te skyes pas rnam par shes pa rmongs pa yin no// rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa'i phyiratshe rabs dran pa/
yan te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dranano// gnyis dang ) gsumadang/ bzhu dang/ lta dang/ banu dang/ nyi shu dang/ sum cu dang/ bzhi bcu dang lnga bcu nas/ tshe rabs brgya
stong du ma'i bar du rjes su dran no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe rabs dranang rnams yono// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n
byang chub sems dpa' dag ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang/ thos pa dang/ dran pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/
chos mnyan ba dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ dge 'dun mchod cing bstan bkur dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus par smra ba dang/ phyag
bya ba dang/ ldang ba dang/ thal mo sbyor ba dang/ 'dud pa'i las dang ma bral ba rnams yin mang du thos pa'i gang brag chos smra ba rnams dang ma bral ba rnams yane/ nga rol tu phyin pa
[/ ]kya@#// mnyan ba dang ma bral ba rnams yAn/ byang chub kyi phyogs chos mnyan pa dang ma bral b rnams yani/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mutsun ba dang ma bral ba rnams yani
tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi mnyanab dang mi bral ba rnams yani/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin te/ ragis kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sa/
dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams ni no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n ) byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams yin/
banu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pas sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs par rig par bya'o// lta ba nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spras
pa dang/ cho ga nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par sbyangs pa dang/ 'tsho ba nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par sbyangs pa dang/ 'du 'dzi la dga' ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang/ 'a la
( can gyi gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang/ 'khor ba la dga' ba'i gang zag rnam par sbyangs pa dang 2 byang chub la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang/ khyam pa dang
stan pa rnam par spangs pa dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pas sdig pa'i grogs bo rnam par spangs par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dba' des gnas
'di dag rnam par spangs pa'atshi ) gang zag de dag la zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par mi bya'o// khong khro ba'i sanas dang/ b.rAs pa'i sams bskyod par mi bya'i/ des 'di ltar
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sems can rnams ni khams so sor ston te/ ston par gyur nas chud bro bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal gyis/ de bas na bdag gis ston pa yongs su
sbyangs par sems nye bar gzhug par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldanon ) byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams yin no
rigs kyi bu tshes bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyidi thob par 'gyur ro// bdugang zhen ) 'di lta sta ) lus mnyam pa rnams
yin/ lus yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ lus rma med pa rnams yin/ lus legs par sgrub pa rnams mni/ chos kyi 'dus rnams ban/ lus brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting
dpag dka' ba rnams yani/ lus bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams lan/ lus zhi ba rnams yun lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin/ ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa rnams yanano/
rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cang rnam par sel bas
[p]@#// gsolas/ bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyid bzhin gshegs ba'i sku'i chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lus mnyam pa nyid 'thob bo// de ci'i phyir zhon/ lus kyi mamanyam pa thams cad dang bral ba dang/
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur par phu'i ro// sa gnyis pa la byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir lus yongs su drug pa 'thob nga
sa gsum ba la byang chub sems dpa' khro ba dang gnod sems thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir lus rma med pa thob bo// sa bzhi la byang chub se mas dad 'a sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grung
pa'i phyir lus legs par grub pa thob po// sa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa'i phyi'i chos kyi lus 'thob bo// sa gang la brtag par bya ba ma yan yang
gting dpag dka' ba'i chos yongs su grub pa'i phyir lus brtag pa bya ba ma yin zhingagating dpag dka' ba 'thob bo// sa bdun pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub pa dang/ thangs
mkhas pa yang dag par grub pa'i phyir lus bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob bo// sa brgyad pa la spros pa thams cad dang bral ba dang nyon mongs ba med pa'i phyir lus zhi ba 'thob bo/ )
sa dgu pa lus tshad med pas khyab ba'i phyir lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa 'thob bo// sa bcu pa la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi lus 'thob bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes par du
ba thams cad yang dag par grub pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dang 'a sgrib pa sprams cad rnam par sal bas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das na lags ) de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos
nyidi dang byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi chos nyid la tha dad du bgyi pa na tshis sam ) bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba ) rigs kyi bu 'u sa snga dad pas tha dad du bya ba mad do/ yon tan gyi
mthus na tha dad du bya ba yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sal ngas gsol pa 2 bcom ldan 'das ji ltar lus tha dad pas sdu dad du bgyi ba ma mchis la ) yon tan gyi
mthus bladad du bgyi ba mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu lus lus zhes bya ba 'din tha dad pa med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus lus su brjod pa'i mtshan
nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro// yon tan dang na thu'i mtshan nyid tha dad par blta'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol ba/ ) bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang lta

bur yon tan gyi mthu'i mtshan nyid tha dad du blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ) gegs kyi bu de bas ni don 'di nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dang bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di
lta ste/ dper na byi dor ma byas ba'i nor bu na po che dang/ byi dor byas pa'i nor bu rin po chen 'di lta ste/ nor bu rin po che nor bu rin po che zhes bya ba nor bu rin po cha'i grangs su 'gro/
mod kyi/ ji ltar du dor byas ba'i nor bu ni po che mthu dang yid du 'ong bas khyab par byed pa lhagan/ byi dor ma byas ba ma 'a no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che yang de
bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che dang bcas su do bzhin gshags pa'i sku'i chos nyid kyi grangs su 'gro med kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'i
skunor bu rin po che'i drung du longs su dag pa zhes mi brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ dbazhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che ni sems can gyi khams tshad mdab dang nam mkha'i khams tshad mad
pa'i 'od kyis khyab par byas te gnas so// de ba'i phyir zhen/ den gAn du yongs su dag pa drang dra ma thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir te/ byang chub sems dpa'ilus nor bu rin po man/ de
zlatsam du khyab par byed pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ de ni de ltar drima'i lhag ma las pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpar na tshes gnyis kyi blab na zla ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su

'gro ba nas ) zla ba nya'i bar gyi zla ba yang zla ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro med kyi/ tshes gnyis kyis zla ba ci 'dra ba de lta bu r zla ba na ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyi'i zhen/ 'di ni de ltar chos 'di
thob pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bsus te/ lus kyi grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' lus ni de/
bzhin gshags pa'i sku'i drungan lham mar mi 'gyur/ lhan ner mi 'gyur/ lhang nger mi 'gyur ro// roges du 'di lta ste/ dang ra na zla ba nya ba'i drungan tshes gnyis kyi zla pa ji lta ba de bzhin du
dang zhin gshegs pa'i sku dang byang chub sems dang 'i lus kyang lus subarjod pa'i mtshan nyid kyisamtshan nyid gcig modakyi/ yon tan gyi mtshan nyid kyis ni ma yin no// rigs kyi
bu chos bcudang ldan/ byang chub sems dpa' lus rdo rje lta bu r sra ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug drag gas mi tshugs parnamA
yani/ khro ba dang/ gnod sems kyi tha ba dang/ dri ma dang/ nga rgyal dang/ rgyugs pa dang/ dregs pa dang lta ba phuni tsa log dag gsam tshugs pa rnams yazhi ]'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po
dag gas ma tshugs pa rnams yani/ nasong gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi tshugs ba rnams lAni/ sems can gyi sdug bsngal mi tshugs pa rnams yani/ skye ba dang/ na ba dang/ na ba dang 'ami
pa'i sdug bsngal dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ mu stegs can dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mtshugs pa rnams yoni/bdud thams cad dang/ bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams
cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams lan/ nyan zlos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma tshugs pa rnams yani/ 'dod pa 'a spyod pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnamA
yane to/ rigs kyi bu chosakhacu po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' lus rdo rje ltar sra ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu tshes bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa2
ded dpon chen po rnams lan no// bcu gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ bkur ba rnams yani/ mchod par 'os ba rnams ni/ phyin bar byed ba rnams la/ brten par byakha rnams yani/ nya
bar 'tsho bar bya b rnams lani/ brgyags shin tuphun sum tshogs pa rnams yan/ tshogs shan tu bsags pa rnams yin/ mi ngoms pa rnams yin ( thog mar 'grob rnams yin/ thams
la cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyeche ngor byin par bya ba la mkhas par bya ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bkur ba lan banas) ngaltar nA thams cad

rgyu ma khyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa'i 'du ni zhezha/ gas kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dba' na ded dpon chen po ni rgyal po dang rgyal po 'phrin po chen po dag gis bkur ba
yanano// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon mnabo la nga sangs rgyas rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams kyis bkur ba mnano// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon
0 chen po ni dram ze dang/ rgyal rages dang/ grong pa dang/ u la gyi mi rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa rnams lazhino// de bzhin du byang chub sems dba' ded dpon chen po yang slob pa dang//
ma slob pa dang/ gzhan yang lha dang/ kudang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ mamakha' lding dang/ mi 'am tsa ring/ lto 'phye chen po dag gis mchod bar 'os pa lan
na rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen pon 'brog dgon par 'gron po mang bo 'phyan pas gtses pa dag legs par bde zhing longs su mi skyo bar phu'i bar byed pa yin no//
dbazhin du byang chub sems dpa' red dpon chen po yang 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen po nang na ) sems can 'gron po mang bo nyon mongs pa'i 'phyan pas gtses pa legs bar bde
nga yongs sum b.ran par byed pa lanano// rigs kyi bu'adi lta ste/ dper na ded dponachenapo la btonan/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ 'phongs pa dag 'brog dgon pa nas 'byung/
bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po la brten na/ mu stegs can gzhan sbyod pa can dang/ kun tu rgyu dang/ gcer du ba rnams 'brog dgon pa min
kho nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni rgyal bo dang/ las byed pa'i mi dang/ zho shas 'tsho ba dang/ de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan/
rnams da bar 'tshob nano// de bzhin du byang chub sems dung 'ded dpon chen po yang 'a khorab la mngon par dga' ba'isams can rnams nye bar 'tsho ba yin no///
sa bags kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ngedadapon chen po zhim phyogs su 'gro bar chas te/ 'gron po mang po dang lhan rtag tu grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba'i phyir 'brog dgon par zhugs pa//
de'i tshe/ grong khyeratshan por phyin gyi bar du brgyugs phun sum tshogs pas 'brog dgon pa de nas legs par bde zhing yongs su skyo bamed par 'byung bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems
dpa' dad dpon chen po yang nam sangs rgyas kyis rten pa'i phyogs su 'gro bar 'dod tsang bsams na'agron po mang po ded de/ 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon ba chen por 'jug par 'dod la/
u0fc4 thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya bar 'dod pa de'i tshe/ bsod nams kyi brgyags kyi tshogs shin tu phun sum tshogs par 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpe
de dpon chen po na 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'di lta ste/ gsar dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ bai DUr+ya dang/ dung dang/ man shel dang/ byu ru la sogs pa mang po bsags shing phyogs su
'gro'o// de bzhin du byang chub soms dpa' ded dpon chen po yang nam thams cad mkhyen pa nyidi kyi grong khyer chen por mngon par zhugs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshogs shin tu
bsags shing 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu 'angalta ste/ dper nA ded dpon chen po na nor bsags pas chog mi shes pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang chos kyinor
bsags pas chog mi shes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po na 'di lta ste/ nor phun sum tshogs pa dang/ gtso bo dang/ dbang red nga dang/ ngag mnyan ngas
'gron po mang bo thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang 'di lta ste/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang 2 yongs kyi gtso bo dang/
chos la dbang ba dang/ ma log par smra bas sems can 'gran pa mang po thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba yan no// rigs kyi bu 'ang lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni grong khyer chen por phun
par bya ba la mkhas pa yazhin// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dponachen po yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer tshon por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar
na byang chub sems dpa' bkur ba yan pa nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang
chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams yanano// rigs kyi bu chos bcudang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' ma la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhen/ 'dalta ste/
[s]@#// (lam mnyam pa yang rab tu shes/ lam nyam nga ba rab tu shes ]'am bde ba yang rab tu shes ) 'jam pa'i lam yang rab tu shes/ lamachu che ba dang chu med pa yang rab tu/
shes/ lan gyi dgongs ma' dag kyang rab tu gyos/ lam gyi tshugs dag kyang rab tu shes/ lam 'khyog pa dug kyang rab tu shes/ lam drung po dag kyang rab tu shes/ lam 'byung ba ya nga rab tu
rgyu shes so// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dang 'a lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' lam
ma 'a ga par ston pa rnams ldan no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa' lam ston gyi/ nyan thos kyi 'a mami ston to// nyan
thos kyis 'dul ba'i sams can rnams la nyan thos kyi lam ston gyi/ byang chub sems dang dri lan mi ston te// thams cad mkhyen pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la thunas cad mkhyenang
'de kyi lam ston gyi/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'am mi ston to// rang sa ngas rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang sangs rgyus kyi lam ston gyi thams cad mkhyenang nyid kyi'am mi ston to//
bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sams can rnams dang// chos su 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa rnams la bdag med pa'i lam dang stong pa nyid kyi lam ston gyi/ bdag dang/ sems can
0 dang/ srog dang/ gso ba dang/ skyes budang/ gang zag gi lam mi ston to// mtha' gnyis la gnas pa' sems can rnams 'amatha' gnyis dang bral ba'i lam ston gyi/ mtha' gnyis la
gnas pa mi ston to// sams g.yengs pa'i sams can rnams 'a zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ga lam ston gyi/ g.ya nga ba'i lam mi ston to// sngos pa la mngon par dga' ba'i mas can rnam
lade bzhin nyid kyi lam ston gyi/ phyis pa spros pa la dga' ba'i 'am mi ston to// 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams la mya ngan las 'des pa'i 'a ma ston gyi/ 'khor ba'i 'a ma mi
ston to// lam gol bar zhugs pa 'i sems can rnams la lam srol ma dod pa ma yin pa dang/ tsher ma nod pa'i lan ston gyi/ nyon mongs pa'i tsher mas gang ba'i 'a ma mi ston to// rigs kyi
bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam ma log par ston pa rnams yin no// rigs gyi bu chen bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyunam 'chad
par sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnams mnano// bcu gong zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so// tshor ba rnams dang/ sa nas rnams dang/ chos rnams dang/
yul rnams dang/ dgon pa rnams dang/ grong dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal bo'i pho brang 'khor rnams dang/ rnyed pa dang/ bkur sti dang/ grags pa dang/ sgra dang/
tshigs su bdud po rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas ba rnams dang// 'ba'i nyon mongs pa dang yongs su nyon mongs pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa thams

cad la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dang 'a lus la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhug cing gnas shon/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang

lus dang ldan nga'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu brtags shing de ngas su spong ngo// de'i 'og ga rkang pa'i mthale nas brtsams te yar na klad pa'i bar du lus kyi nyes pa
la rtog go/ lus la bdag med par yang rtogago/ lus mi brtan pa dang ) 'jig pa dang/ chu rgyus kyis grags pa dang/ dri mi zhim pa dang/ dri nga ba dang/ kha dog mi sdug par rtog ste/ de de ltar
rtog pa'i tshi ) gang lus la lus su 'dod pa dang/ lus la 'dod chags pa drang ) lus la dga' bo dang/ lug la bdag gir 'dzin pa dang/ lus la zhen ba dag mi 'byung ste/ rgyu de dang/ rgyan
de dang/ gzhi des lus dang ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du na lus dang ldan pa'i chos rnams de nyid kyi dbang du 'gyur te/ de ltar na lus la dran pa shin tu nye bar
gzhag cing gnas pa'o// ji ltaran byang chub sams dpa' tshor ba rnams la dran pa shAn tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas shon )'di 'o byang chub sems dang 'a 'di snyam du sems te/ tshor ba gang ji
snyad pa de thams cad sdug bsngal na/ byis pa phun ci log gis phun su log tu 'gyur ba rnams ni bde bar 'dzan te/ byas pa rmongs pa rnams sdug bsngal la bde ba zhes bya ba 'dzin gyi/ 'phags
pa rnams kyis ni thams cad sdug bsngal bar thugs su chud snyamanas de sngang ba'i phyir nan tan du mdzang la ) sems can gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid 'a 'god kyis ) bdag gis kyang de drag gi

rjesasu bslab par bya'o snyam ste/de de ltar rtog pas tshor ba rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so// de tshor ba drag la chags ba yang med/ khong khro ba yang med nang du dag sbyang ba'i du rab
tu zhugs pa yin no// gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid la 'god de/ de ltar na tshor ba rnams la dran pa shin tu 'bar gzhag cing gnas so// ji ltar na byang chung sems dpa' sa mas la dran pa shin tu/
nye bar gzhag cing gnas she na/ de 'di snyan du sems te/ sems 'di na mi rtag pa la rtag par mngon par dga' bgo/ sdug bsngal la bde bar mngon par dga' ba'o// bdag med pa la bdag
tu mngon par dga' ba'o// mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar mngon par dga' ba'o// g.yo zhing mi brtan la myur du 'gyur bko/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rtsa ba'o// ngan song rnams kyi sgo'o/
'ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi gzhi'o// bde 'gro rnams chud gson pa'o// 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang ) gti mug rnams kyi rkyen du 'gyur ba'o// chos thams cad kyi bdag
por 'gyur ba'o// chos thams cad na sams thog mar 'gro ste/ sams yongs su shes na/chos thams cad kyang yongs su shes par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang 'jig
rten senAs kyis bris pa ste/ mi ltar sems nasams kyis ma mthong ngo// dge ba 'am yang zhum dge ba'i las ni samus kyis bsags pa'o// sems ni mgalam bskor ba ltar 'khor/
sems na rta ltar rnam par 'khyam/ semasan nags kyi ma ltar rnam par 'tshig/ sems ni chu chen po bzhin du skyod/ de de ltar rtog ra sa sems la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas te/
sanas kyi dbang du mi 'gro'i/ sems nyid de'i dbang du 'gro ste/ sems de'i dbang du gyur bas chos thams cad dbang du gyur pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mas la dran pa shin

[%]tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so// ji ltar na byang chub sems da du' chos rnams la dran pa shin tu nyedur gzhag cing gnus shan/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang
gti mug la sogs pa dang/ de dag la gnas pa gzhan dag la 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos rnams so zhus yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de 'dod chags kyi gnyen po la stan/ zhe sdang dang
gtimug gi gnyen po la ston cing de dag spang pa'i phyi'i brtson pa yin no/ chos 'di dgan dge ba'o zhes bya bar shes na/ chos de dag la sems gtong zhing dran pa nye bar gzhog ste/chos de dag kyang
yang dag par byas shing gnas so// gzhan 'dra bslab pa de nyid 'god de/ de ltar na byang chub sams dpa' chos rnams la dran pa shan tu nye bar gzhug nang gnas so// ji ltaran bya
chub sems da pa ba khul rnams la dran pa shin tu tre bar gzhag cing gnasashen/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yad du 'ong ba dang/ yid du ma 'ong ba'i gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/
ro dang/ reg bya la chags par 'dzin par yang mi 'gyur ) khong khro ba'isams kyang mi skyod do/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ de ltar bdag dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la chags pa skyid
pani bdag gi mi cha so/ de ni bdag byas ba dang/ rmongs pa dang/ ma gsal ba dang/ mi mkhas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chags par gyur nas zhen pa sna 'gyur ro/
zhenanas rmongs par 'gyur ro// rmongs nas dag pa 'am/ mi dge ba'i chos rnam par sgom par mi 'gyur te/ de'i rgyus ngan song du 'gro bar gsungs so zhes nga 'di snyam du de ltar bdag chos
gsog rnams khong khro ba'i sems bskyed pa ni bdag gi mi cha ste/ don bdag ma bzod pa dang/ dang du mi len pa dang/ khong khro ba kun nas ldang bar 'gyur te/ 'phags pa rnams kyis ni zad par
'gyur/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod ba rnams kyis ni dpya bar 'gyur ro zhes de de ltar rtog bas/ lul rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas te/ sul rnams kyis na mi smras shing/
[s/ ]@#// rmakhyung bar mi 'gyur la/ gzhan yang bslab pa bcas pa de nyid la 'god/ de ltar byang chub sems dba' yula rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag nyung gnas so// dri ba
na byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa rnams la dran ba shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas shin/ de 'di snyam du dgon pa zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa med pa rnam par dpyod po rnams kyi gnas so// zhi
b.ran par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so// dgon pa la ni lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang drizagazhan gyis mas mngon par shes pa dag kyang yod de/ de dag bdag gi sems dang sems bag
byungaba'achos rnams rab tu shes na/ bdag tshul bzhazhim yan pa'i yadi la byed nange soms pa de na bdag gi mi cha'o snyam ste/ de tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sa da la bya ba thams cad dang bralanas )
tshul bzhin du chos rnams la sems gtong zhing chos de dag la bsgom pa mang ba yin te/ daltar na byang chub sems dang 'a dgon pa rnams la dran pa shAn tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so// ji ltar na byang
chub sems dpa' grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal bo'i pho brang 'khor rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhug tsang gnas shin/ 'di la byang chub son
dba' grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dgon/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyodanaganas ba dang tshuladang 'dra zhing yongs

0 sa spang ba bya ba rab tu byung pa'i tshul dang mi mthun pa de dag yongs su sdong ngo// de dag kyang gang zhan )'di lta ste/ chung ma'i khyim mam/ smad 'tshong gi khyim mam 1 rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/rgyan

po'i gnas sam/ ra ro ba'i 'a khor gyi tshogs sanaM/ gar mkhan dang glu gar gyi gnas dang/ de ma yin pa gzhan gang rung lta/ rab tu byung ba'i tshul dang mi 'dra ba de dag longs su spong zhing de dag la dran/
pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ lul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dga' ldan pa shan tu
lta bar gzhagasung gnas so// ji ltan byang nub sa nasadapa' rnyed po dang/ bkur sti dang/ grags ba dang/ sgra dang/ tshig sa su bcad pa dag la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cange gnas she na/
'di la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ba khyad pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi dngos po nye bar gzung zhing rnyed pa dang bkur ste 'a sems gtong ste/ rtsa nas kyi zhen pa mi 'gyur/ srid pa mi skyed/ chags
pa mi skyod/ bdag gzhi mi byed/ nor du mi 'dzani/ bdag gir mi 'dzazhi pa dang/ ci nas kyang semasazhathams cad dang thun mong du byas shing/ sdug bsngal ba'i sams can rnams la ran par 'gyur
ba de ltar stong ste/ gal te yang rgyud dang/ rkyen de dang/ gzhi des grags pa dang/ sgrudang/ tshags su bcad pa zhig byung yang ) des khengs par mi 'gyur nga rgyal ma skya ) rgyags pa mi skye/ de
'di snyam du sems so// ring por mi thogs par grags pa dang/ sgra dang/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di gang las byung bu nga/ gang gis phyung ba dang/ grags pa dang/ sgra dang/
tshags su bcad pa gang yin pa de dgatsams cad du thams cad mad par 'gyuran/ de la mkhas pa'i rang btsan suzhag mi rtag cadi mganas pa'i chos ni brtan ba/ padi brtan du rung
bdag 'daga' ba'i sems spyod pa 'an/ khongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ nga rgyal dang rgyags pas dreg sa bar 'gyur snyam ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' red pa dang/ bkur sti dang/
grags ba dang/ sgadang/ tshigs su bcad pa rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhug tsang bas so// ji ltar na byang chub sems dung 'a de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa 'dus pa la
gyi dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhug cing gnas shen 1 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang 'das pa'i dbazhin gshegs pa de dus kyang bslab pa 'di nyidi la bslabs te/
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// yongs su myang n las 'dus so/ gang ma byon pa 'byung bar 'gyur pad gang/ bslab pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing mngon par rdzogs
par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// longs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// gang ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag kyang bslab pa 'di nyid la bsgrubs te mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas go
ba yongs su mya ngan las 'dab 'o zhes de de ltar yid ches bas bslab pa rnams la nan tan du byed pa 'aniti/ brtson par byed pa dang/ legs par bya ba byed pa'i shani tu rdzogs par byed pa yin te/
de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'ade bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhanatsang gnas so// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i
nyon mongs pa dang/ yongs su nyon mongs pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad la dran pa ni tu nye bar gzhagatsang gnas yin: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' cu ba'i nyin mongs pa
rnams la dran pa dang ldan pa yin/ yongs su nyon mongs pa rnams la dran pa dang ldan pa yon te/ dedag gang las byung ba dang/ rkyen gang gis byung ba'i gzhiyang ra ba du shes te/ des de ltar shes
nas byung ba de dang/ rkyen de dag yongs su spong ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa 'a de dang nyon mongs pa dang/ yongs su nyon mongs pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad
dran ban tu nye bar gzhagatsang gnas ba yanano/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan// byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnams yin no//
'phags pa dkon mchog/ she bamapo drug ba// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ljonan/ byang chub semasadang 'a phyag dar khrod pa rnams yin no//
kha cu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa rnams yin/ soms dma' ba rnams yin/rongs su mi skyo b rnams yin/ de lam zhen pa rnams lan/
nyes par lta ba dang bral ba rnams yani/ yon tan du lta ba rnamasayani/ bdag la ma stod pa rnams la'i/ gzhan la mi smod pa rnams yin tshul khrims lun sum tshogs pa rnams zhi
lha 'du ba rnanas zha'o/ rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sen sa dpa' yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa yin pazhas/ jiltaranu lha 'du ba'i b.radu yin zhe na
gas kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dad cing bsamang bun sum tshogs pa yan/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dad cing yid ches pa yin/ da srog ga dzu'i yang yang dag par
blangs pa ma 'jigatsang lang dag par blangs pa las mi 'gyur te/ de yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pas/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang/ soms dma' zhing nga rgyal mad pa yin/
dang rgyal med cing sems dma' bas phyag dar khrod pa ngan ngon yongs su bor ta/ skye bo thams cad dang ma mthun pa dag sdud do// de dag bsdus nas 'khrung ra byed/ de'akhru ba dang/
glan pa dang/ bcom pa dang/ btso bar byed pa na/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing longs su mi skyo ste/ yongs su mi skyo brkyen du byas nas// ji tsam gyis don grub par
tsa00 'gyur ba ma gtogs ru ra de la zhen par yang mi 'gyur ro// kye ma 'o phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag ni zhi gnas pa// kye ma'o phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag ni sngon pa'o// kye ma'o phyag dar khrod pa/
'di dag nishig mang ba ste/ lus la mi bde zhung rdul 'an to zhes nyes pa'i lta bas yan gyi/ phyag dar khrod pa'adi dag ni drang srong gis bgos pa'o// 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'thun
pa'o// 'phags pa'i 'gas dang 'azhu pago/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstod pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa'o zhes phyag dar khrod pa de dag la yon tan du lta ba yan to/
rgyu de dang/ skyed dang/ gzhi des bdag la mi stod/ gzhan la mi smod do// de bdag la stod tsung gzhan la smod pa dang bral bas tshul khrams phun sumatshogs pa yin te/ tshul khrims phun
sum tshogs pas lha rnams 'du ba yin ) de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yani/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su btsal pa yani/ ma dang mi ma yAn da
rnams kyis longs su bsrung yani/ bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ grong rdal gyi mi rnams dang/ yul gyi mi rnams kyis phug bya ba yani/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spud pa rnams kyis
gzengs bstod par bya ba lan taM/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas gsol
btsa gya@#// pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya chen po rnams la spyod pa dman tshogs kyis ci zhig bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten gyi yang dang sbyor pa yan te/ skyobs kyi mthu thob b rnams 'jig rtenadang 'thun par spyod kyi/ stobs kyi mthu ma thob pa rnams ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub
! sems dpa' stobs kyi mthu mthob pas ni/ nyon mongs pa ma lags pa'i gnyen po bstan par bya gzhan yang rigs kyi bu ji somadu sums/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya chen po la mos sam/
'on te man nga la mos pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de'i lan gsol du bdag gas tshegs mthun te//
ny+nyo da pa'i slad du khe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa la sa smos pa lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das ni chos gzigs nga ! bde bar gshegs pa na rjes gzigA pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas
chos gang la la mos par bgyi ba mams so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa gling bzhi'i mi rnams dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin

dang/ dri ba la mos pa dman pa gzhan dag la sbyod pa dman tshogs ston cing de dag mdun du sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod pa de ra'i phyi'i ( byang chub sems dang 'a sgrib pa thams cad
bawa rnam pa ra sa la bas gsol// bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag de lta bu 'dul ba'i slad du ste/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa rnams kyi nyon mongs ba skyes ba'i
gnyan por de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' stobs kyi mthu thob ba rnams kyang 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyi'i phyag
dar khrod par 'gyur gyi/dman pa la mos pa'i phyir ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu de'i phu byang chub sunas dpa' phyag dar khrod de rnams lanano// rigs kyi du chos bcu dang ldan na//
byang chub sems dpa' chos gos gsum pa rnams lanano// bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ chog shes ba rnams lan/ 'dod pa chung ba rnams lan)kun btsur de dang bral ba rnams yan ) sogs
padang bral ba rnams yin/ bsags pa chud zos pa dang bral ba rnams yan/ bsags pa chud zos pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral brnanas 'an/ yid mi bde ba dang bral ba rnams yan/ 'khrug
pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ len pa med pa rnams yin/ zag pa 'ad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa rnams yinatu ragasakyi bu byang chub sems dpa'achos gos ngan ngon gyis chos kes shing
'dod pa chung ba lan/ de 'dod pa chung bas na kun tu tshol ba med pa yin kun tu tshol ba med pas na/ sogs pa med de yin/ so ba/sa pa med pas na/ bsags pachud za ba nad pa yan ! bsags
ga pa chud za bamed pas na/ bsags pa chud zos pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal med pa yin/sdug bsngal bamud dusan yid mi bde ba med pa yin/ yid mi bde ba mad pas na/
'khrug bamad pa yin/ 'khrug pa med pa gzhibasan/ len pa med pa yin/ len pa med pas na/ thag pa cod par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu bo de dag dang ldan n/
byang chub sems dpa' chos gos gsum pa rnams mnano// shes kyi ba chog bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub semasadapa' lung pa can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste
'dod chags kying san pas mi 'gro ste/ de'i phyir phung pa can zhes bya'o// de bzhin du zhe sdang gi bsan pas ma 'gro/ gti mug gi bsan dag ni 'gro/ khro ba dang gnod sems kyi bsam
sgo pas ma 'gro/ phrag dog dang sar snyanabasam pas ma 'gro/ nga rgyal gyi bsam pas mi 'gro/ grags pa 'dod pa 'i bsam bsam 'gro/ shes kyi bu bdog pa'i bsam da ga na 'gro/
rud pa dang bkur ste 'dod pa'i bsamad sa mi 'grozhing bdud la mi 'dud/ dga' bar bya bas snyanas pa ma yin te/ de'i phyi'i phying ba can zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang
ldan n ]byang chub sems dpa' phung pa can rnams yazhino// 'gis kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dang 'a bkod snyoms pa rnams mnano// bcu gang zhen !
0 ]'di lta ste/ sa nas can rnams la phan par zhugs pa rnams ni/ mthar gyis pa sod snyoms len pa rnams la'i/ yongs su la chad pa med pa khrid bzhin nAn rnams yin/ chog shes pa
rnams yani/ bgo bsha' byed pa'i ngang tshul can rnams yin/ ma chags pa rnams yin/ bsod snyoms bza' b.lAtshod shes pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i phyogs la mngon du phyogs pa sa
yin/ dag pa'i rtsa ba yongs su bsdus pa rnams yin/ ral po'i 'du shes med pa rnams yano// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la phan ra la zhugs
pa yan pa nas/ ji lta na ral po'i 'du shes mang pa'i bar du yanazhin/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dung 'a sems na dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan la
sdug bsngal bo dag mthong na/ sams can de dag la phan par bya ba'i bya'i bsod snyoms pa'i 'dam 'dzo to/ de nam grong ngan/ grong khyer ram grong rdal du bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro bdo'i
tshodran pa na tu nye bar gzhug pa dang/ sngod lam mdzes pas dbang po na g.yo ba dang/ dbang bo mi rgod pa dang/ dbang po dul ba dang/ gnu'ashing gang tsam du lhab dang/ dag pa'i chos rnams
la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag nas bsod snyoms kyi phyi'i 'gro'o// de bsod snyoms kyi phyi'i 'gron/ bsod snyoms mthor gyin na da lan te/ mgo 'phang bstod cing bram ze shing sA lachen po lta
ba0 @#// bu'i gling ngam/ rgyal rags shing sA la chen po lta bu'i grong ngan/ khyan bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu'i grong 'byor pa dag tu mi 'jug gi/ mtha' gnyis nas bzung ste/
nam de'i don grub par gyur kyi bar du bsod snyoms sbyod de gzhan du gnas gang na khyi za ba'an/ badrus ma 'am/ dud 'gro'i skya gnas su gtogs pa ]rang bzhin gyis ngang tshul dran pa'i
rgyu srog chags sam ) bung mad dang ]skyes pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo kyal ka bya ba'i bsam pa can dag yod pa 'am ) smad pa'i gnas tham sa cad du thams cad yongs su song// ngamathar
gyis bsod snyon sa la 'gron/ yongs su la mi chad cing kun nas nyon mongs pa na da la/ sa mas can de dga' chags pa yang na skyid/ khrong khro ba yang mi spyong de/ yongs sa yi chad ngand
pas so so ca rigs pa'i bso da snyoms ngan ngon gyis chog shes pa yan ta des bsod snyoms de blangs nas/ bdag gi gnas su 'ongs te/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag/ rkang lag
bkrus te/ de bzhin gshags pa'i gzugs sam de bzhin gshegs pa mchod rten rnams la bkur sti dang rim gro byas te/ gnas su song nas bsod snyoms de las chagacig ni tshangs
nga mtshungs pa za spyod pa rnams kyi phyir bzhag go/ gnyis pa ni sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi phyag bzhag go/ gsum pa ni so mas can leg par lhung ba rnams kyi phyir bzhag go/ ma bzhi pa ni
[/]bdag za lta de bri ba na 'dod chags med par wa sta chags pa ra ma yin/ brkam par ma'an ) zhen par ma yan gyi/ gzhan du na ji tsam du lus gnas par 'gyur ba rung/ 'tsho
bar bya ba'i phyir zaste/ ji ltar ha cang ya nga nyam dma' ba dang/ ha cang yang lus lci bar la nga mi 'gyur ba de ltar za ste 'de 'phyir zhan/ ha cang yang nyam dmas na ni dge ba'i phyogs la
rgyab kyis lha sa par 'gyur ro// lus ha cang sbyin n gnyid kyis non par 'gyur go/ des bsod snyoms de khros nas dag nga'i phyogs la mngon du phyogs pa dang ) brtson 'grus brtsa nas nga
dang le la tshud pa dang/ soms pa med pa dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar bya'o/ de byang chub kyi chos phyogs kyi ches yongs su 'dus pas bdag tu 'ashi
pa med pa yin/ bdag tu 'dzin pa med pas ) bdag gi shas kyang sems can rnams la lan 'degs pa yan no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n) byang chub sa mas
dang 'a bsod snyoms pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu tshes bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stan gcig nga rnams yin ni// banu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// bdud/
shams cad kyis sogs kyang byang chub kyi snyang po'i stan gcig la mi g.yo ba rnams yani) 'jag rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das/
pa'i shes rab las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ stong pa nyid las mi g.yo ba rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
cad yang dag pa ji lta babazhin du rtogs pa las mi g.yo ba rnams yan/ lam las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ de bzhin nyid las mi g.yo ba rnams ni/
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyistan 'a sa mi g.yo ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu stan gcig po na 'di yan te/ de ni than sa cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stan no// rigs kyi bu stan gcig po ni 'di yin te/
de ni chos kyi snyan no// stan de las byang chub sems dang 'a de dag ma g.yo ste/ de bas na stan gcig pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi ngu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stan gcig
pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n/ byang chung se na sa dang 'bras phyis mi len pa rnams yin no// denu gang zhe na ) 'di lta ste/ mi bkan pa'i rang bzhin can
rnams yan ) mi chags pa'i rang bzhin can rnams mni 3 do dag gis nam tshod bzung bar gyur ba de'i tshe/ nye tshod yod dam med kyang rung ste/ de dag gis lus rten pa'i yo byad 'di lta ste/ mar ma/
rma'akhrumanam/ sbrang rtsi 'am/ bu ram mam/ rtsa ba'i khu ba 'am/ sdong po'i khu ba 'am/ 'bras bu'i khu ba de lta bu dag bza mi rung ngo// gzhan za ba mthong na ya nga khong khro ba'i sa mas dang//
[p/]'jungs pa'i sems kyang mi skyed do// yang gal te zas phus ma len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ji lta bu'i nad kyis srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba 'am/ dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad du 'gyur te//
nad tshabs chan/ des 'gyod pa med pa'i thetsam med par byas la/ sman yin par sems nye bar bzhag la spyod par bya// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zas phyis mi len ba yin no//
rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dang 'a bras phyis mi len pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu tshes bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa pa rnamA
yazhe no// banu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa rnams yin/ 'dul ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ dbung bo ma nyams pa rnams yani/ mang du thos pa//
rnams yin/ nus pa rnams lan) bdag tu 'dzan pa'i 'jags bu dang bral ba rnams yani/ rigs dang 'drab rnams yin/ lus kyis thag bsrings pa rnams yin/ dben pa la mngon du phyog
pa rnams yin/ ma dga' ba dang ma 'dres pa rnams la no// rigs kyi pu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' kun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa yan pa nas/ ji ltar na mi dga' ba
dang ma 'dres pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'ad la byang chub sems dpa' legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la ragazhu byung ba yin/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag nga 'i tshul khrims
ldan pa mAni/ chos nyidi 'a mkhas shing chog dang/ spyod tshul dang/ 'gro ba dang/ 'i 'ong ba la mkhas pas/ gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pas rganarangs dang/ bar ma dang/
ca8 gsar bu rnams kyi bslab pa la nubastan pa de la 'di lta sa ) don dang/ tshig dang/ 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing/ gzhan gyis ma bkri ba man/ de ltang ba
byung na lus byung bar rang du shes shing gnas de dag kyang yongs su spong ngo// gnas de dgo 'a gus par byed cing chags pa mang ba yanano// sdig pa de la skyod cing 'gyod de/ 'thol
bar byedado// gnas gang dag tu ltung bar 'gyur bde dag kyang rab tu shes ) gang dag tu mi 'gyur ba de dag kyang rab tu shes/ gang dag tu chen por 'gyur bdang/ gang dag tu 'bring dang/ gang dag
blo tu chung ngur 'gyur ba de dag kyang rab tu shos/ las gang ga rnam par smin pa'i yun ji srid pa de yang rab tu shes te ) de yang nan tan gyis sgrub bo// de mag ga debang po mnyams pa dang/
rna ba'i dbang po ma nyams shing yan lag dang nying lag thams cad ma nyams par dgon pa na gnas te/ gnas gang na ba 'tsho bamed pa'i gnas de dag tu gnas so// gnas gang dag na bsod snyoms
blang ba'i spyod yul dang ha cang mi ring ba dang/ ha cang yang mi ba dang/ gnas gang dag na chu dang zhing ga bamed pa/ gtsang zhing dri ma med pa tshegs chung ba yod pa dang/ gnas gang dag na shing
[4/ ]phun sum tshogs pa/ 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/ lam phun sum tshogs pa ! gcan gzan khrobemad ba/ phug dang ldan pa/ smon gshong dang ldan pa// thag khrug med pa// 'gron bde ba/
zhi ba/ gnyis su med ba'i gnas de 'drab dag na gnas so// de gnas de dag na gnas shing gang des sdo bklags pa dang 2 sngon thos pa de nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du slahacang yang

mi che hanang lang mi chung ba/ dbang po mi rgod tsang phyi rol tu ma song ba'i sems kyi dad pas nye bar 'tsho zhing/ tshig zhe bar bzung ste mtshan ma 'dzin cing gnyid kyis ma leg bar kha ton byed do// gal
ta dge slong dgon pa pa'i drung du rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po 'am/ de ma yin pa gzhan bram ze 'an/ rgyal rigs sam/ grong rdal gyi mi 'am/ yul gyi mi dag 'ongs na/ des de dag la gus
par legs par 'ongs so zhes brjod par bya ste/ des rgyal po chen po ji ltar gdan pa tang ba la bzhugs shig ces de skad byas nas/ gal te 'jug nan gnyis ka yang 'dug par bya'o// de ste mi 'jug
na gnyis ka yang mi 'dug par bya'o// gal te dbang po rgod par 'gyur na/ rgyal po chen po gang dag khyod kyi phyogs na/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams tshul khrims dang ldan n/ yon tan dang ldan pa/
mang du thos pa dag mi rgod dang spre'u rnams kyis ma gtses par gnas pa do ni/ rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes bstod par bya'o// de ste bstan zhing dul la dbang po rab tu zhi ba zhig yin te/ chos
[m ]/bstan pa la rung na/ de la chos sna tshogs bstan par bya'o// de ste chos sna tshogs bstan pa la mi dga' n/ de la skyo ba dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan par bya'o// de skye skyo/
dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan pa la mi dga' n/ del de bzhin la/ zhags pa'i ba dag bstan par bya'o// bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ grod pa dang yul gyi mi dag 'ongs na yang ci rigs
par bya ba dag bya'o// de de ltar mang du thos pas chos nyan pa rnams kyi sems mgu bar byed nus pa yin te/ sems can de dag kyang de la dga' bdang/ dad pa dang/ rangs ba thob par 'gyur
ro/ nyon mongs pa kun nas langs pa rnams kyi gnyen por yang nus pa yin no// mang du thos pa'i stobs bskyod pas bdag tu 'dzin pa'i 'dzugs pa dang bral ba yin no// de bdag tu
sgo/ 'dzin pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral bas dgon pa na mi 'jigs/ mi slag/ mi sdung/ bag tsha ba med cing rab dudaban ba la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur te gnas so// de dgon pa den dudren pa la
rgyu mngonang phyogs shing 'du 'dzi da par gnas pas/ ri dwags dang 'dra ba man no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa pa na ri dwags ltar rtag tu 'jigs pa ma yin te/ de la ri
dgas kyi nyes pa yang med mod kyi// ji ltar 'degs dgabadag 'di'i lan bon gyis srog ga bar chad du 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yul dang yul gyi phyogs ring po pas kyang ring por song ba de bzhin du//
byang chub sems dad na yang bdag 'di'i lan bon gyis/ yi dam gyi bar chad dam/ sems g.yeng bar 'gyuran mi rung ngo zhes bud med dang )sdus pa dang/ khyu'u dang ) bu mo rnams dang 'du
'dzin byed cing ) 'du 'dzi dag thal/ dang po bas kyang ring por yongs su srong ngo// de de ltar thag bsrings te gnas par rab tu dngan pa mngon du phyogs pa yin/ de rab tu dben pa la
mngon du phyogs pas/ dgon pa de la yon tan du ltab dang/ zhi ba'i lta ba yin/ de yon tan du lta zhing zhi bar lta bas na/ mi dga' ba dang mi 'do'o// mi dga' ba dang ma 'dres pas na/
dgon pa pa'i chos rnams yang dag par blangs nas skyod de/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu byang chub sams dpa' yun ring po nas tshangs par sprod pa la gnas pa nas/ mi dga' ba dag dang/
ma 'dres pa'i bar du lano// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan// byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa pa rnams lanano// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang
chub sems dpa' shing drung pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ grong dang gcung yang nye ba'i shing drung du mi rten/ grong dang ha cang yang 'ang ba'ishing drung du sku rten/ ldem

lcam tsher ma can gyis gang ba'i shing drung du ma rtan/ shi ba ma lu ta dang ka'i ba'i ka'itsu'i khri shing gis gang ba'i shing drung du me rten 2 shing la ma bskams pa'i shing drung du mi rten/ smra'agan
pa'i shing drung du mi rten/ bya gnas pa'i shing drung du mi rtan/ gcan gzan khro be gnas lnga'i shing drung du mi rtenA/ 'dren po gnas pa'i shing drung du mi rten/ mi
g.yon can gnas pa gang dang du mi rtan gyi/ gang na lus bag yangs shing sams dga' bar 'gyur ba'i shing drung du de lta bu r rten to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub/
sems dpa' shang drung pa rnams yin no// rags kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'abla gab med pa rnams mnano// bcu gang zhin/ 'dilta ste/ dgunanam/
dpyad ma dbyar zam/ ston kyang rung ste/ rtsage drung du mi gnas/ shang drung na ma yin ) sog ma spangs pa ma yin/ ri'i sman gshong du na lan/ chu lkog tu ma yan/ grang ba skyob par
ny+nyo yang mi byed/ rlung skyob pa ma ni/ char skyob pa yang ma yin/ ti ma skyob pa ma yin/ ba mo'i skyabs kyang mi byed kyi gzhan du na gal te byang chub sems dpa' bla gab med panam lus kyis ma
nus par gyur na/ des gtsug lag khang du gnas te/ nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcas te/ tsa nas kyang bdag gtsug lag khangan gan pa gzhan
du nyon mongs pa rnams spong bar 'bad pa de ltar sems bskyed par bya'o// gtsug lag khang de la yang chags pa mi bskyed de/ zhen pa yang ma yin no// de yang 'di ltar sems te/ sbyin pa'i
ma[/]bdag po rnams la ban gdags par bya'i/ bdag cag gis bdag 'di gso bar mi bya'osnyam ste ) de rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bla gab med pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog pa yin no// rigs kyi
bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan/ byang chub sems dpa' bla gab med pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi ba chos bzhu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dang 'a dur khrod pa rnams yan no//
bcu gang zhen/ 'dilta ste/ gnas gang na gnas kyang rung/ skyob mang po rnams yani/ de dag nga'i 'du shes rtag tu rgyun ma 'chad par lta bar gzhog nga yan/ de dag rnam par zos par 'du shes
pa dang/ rnam par dmar bar 'du shes pa dang rnam par bsngos par 'du shes pa dang/ rnam par rul bar 'du shes pa dang/ rnam par bam par 'du shes pa dang/ rnam par tshig par 'du shes
pa dang/ rnam par 'thor bar 'du shes pa dang/ keng rus su 'du shes pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par nye bar gzhog pa yazhin// gas kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod pas ni byams pa'i sems su
bya'o/ ldan pa'i soms dang/ sams can la snying brtse ba dang/ tshul khrims dang ! gtsang sbra'i chogadang ldan zhing sha dang 'bags ba med par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na ) dur khrod
kyi yo na ni/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sha za pa mthongan/ ma dad pa skyed cing gtso bar sems pa'i mi ma yin pa dag gnas pa yod do// rigs kyi ba byang chub sems dpa'i dur khrod pas gtsug lag
@#/ khang du zhugs te ) de bzhin gshegs pa'imachod rten la phyag byas/ dge slong rgan rabs rnams la phyag byas te/ gsar bu rnams kyang dga' bar byas la 'greng ste 'dug/
che8 par bya'o// dge 'dun gyi mal stan la 'dug par mi bya'o// rigs kyi bu de tsa'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi yid dang sbyar bar bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod pa/
ni'aphags pa ma yin pa'i 'jig rten dang ma mthun gyi/ 'phags ba dang ni mi mthun pa med do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod pa gang zag gi mal stan la bar na/ des ci nas kyang
de 'gyod par mi 'gyur la/ gzhanagyis kyang dpya bar mi 'gyur bar shan tu rtogs par byas la/ dge slong de'i bsam pa yang shes nas/ gdod ston de la gdol bu dang 'dra bar ngan 'a ba'i
sems kyis stan de la 'jug par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa'i dur khrod pa rnams yano// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n 3
byang chub sems dwapa'i+og pa pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus yongs su gdung bar bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa ma yin/ sams yongs su gdung bar bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa ma
yani/ gnyid kyis non te 'dug pa ma lani/ lus dub pas 'dug pam yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' cog pu pa 'dug pa ni/byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su bskang ba'i phyi'i 'dug go/
ba sems rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyi'i 'dug go/ lam mngon du bya ba'i phyir 'jug go/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i phyir 'dug go/ sems can la phan pa'icu'i 'dug go/ 'on mongasad
thams cad sbyang ba'i phyir 'jug go/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' tsog pu pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na//
byang chub sems dpa' gun ji bzhin pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste ) mal stan ma chags pa rnams yin/ bdag nyid kyang ma la stan ma 'dang/ gzhan dag kyang 'dang ngu ma 'jug/
[]gding ba'i chu'i brdami byed tsang gzhan dun lo mas gang ba 'am/ sdus gang ba'i gnas kyang rung ste/ gnas de dag tu nyal bar byed tsang/ sa gang gi phyogs na sbrul gyis gang ba 'am/ sbrang ma
dang sha sbrang gis gang ba 'am ) khung mang ba de dug 'de po bas kyang ring por yongs su spong ngo// de dag nyalaban glo g.yas pas nyal bar byed de/ rkang ba'i stang du rkang pa bzhag nas/
lus chos gos dag gis shin tu g.yogs shang dran pa dang shes bzhin du snang ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa'i 'du shes su nyal bar byed de/ gnyid kyi bde ba la chags par mi byed/ sAs
pa'i bde ba la yang ma yin te/ gzhan du na de dag ji tsam du 'byung ba chen po rnams gnas ring 'tsho ba'i phyir nyal bar byed la/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yang dge ba'i phyogs 'a mngon du phyog/
pa rnams yin no// jags kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dang nga gzhiji bzhin pa rnams ma'i no// rigs kyi bunyes bsu dang ldanu na/
chabyang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams lanano// bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ ma sdug pa bsgom pa 'ad ba rnams yin/ byams pa sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ rten cing
'brel bar 'byung ba sgom pa mang ba rnams yani/ skyon la mkhas pa rnams yin/ stong pa nyid bsgom pa mang ba rnams yani/ mtshanAs med ba sgom pa mang ba nas ni/ rnal 'byor
sgom pa mang ba nas lane/ rgyun du sgom pa mang ba rnams mne/ 'gyod pa med pa rnams yani/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de 'dra dza ltar na byang
chub sems dpa' mi sdug pa bsgom bamang ba yin zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'agacig pu lkog tu song ste/ nang du yang dag bzhag nas rab tu dben pa 'a mngon du phyogs shing/
shin tu skyo ba'i sems kyis lus drang po drang po dang lus bags kyis glod pas skyel mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du bzhag ste ) phyi rol tu ma byung ba'i sems kyis de 'di snyam du
sams so// ji snyid du ma'i nang du kha zas dang zas skom kha tsang yang rung/ bzang po yang byung/ ngan pa yang rung/ ro phun sum tshogs pa yang rung/ ro chung ba yang rung ste//
de thams cad lus kyi mas reg ba dang btsog par 'gyur te/ rul nang dri nga bu dang 'jig rten thams cad dang ma 'phrod pa yin nu/ dekha byas ru 'di dag na shin tu zhan cing rab tu chags/
bdag nugan 'phags pa'i chos 'jul ba la gnas te/ yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags te/ 'di 'dra ba'i lus la ma zhen ma chags par bya'o/ de'i phyi
skyo ba'i sams kyang mi bskyed do snyam ste/ de ltar na byang chub sams dpa' mi sdug pa bsgom ba mang ba yan no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa bsgom pa mang ba
yin zhan/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu dben par 'dug ste/ nang du yang dug par bzhag nas rab tu dben pa la mngon du phyogs shing shan tu skyo ba'i sems kyis
lus drang po drang po dang lus bags kyis glod ngas skyo la mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du bzhag ste/ phya ra' du ma byung ba'i sams kyis 'di snyam du sa mas so// sams can gang
dag khro bganod sems mang ba mi dge ba'i las byed pa rnams dang/ gang rnams bdag 'a rgol ba dang/ dogra bo gtsugs ne da par shar gnyer ba rnams byung ba'am 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang rung ste/
bdag gis de dag thams cad kyi khro ba dang gnod nas rab tu zhi bar byas te byang chub kyi sA nga ngo la dgod par bya// de yang ngagatsam gyis ma yin gyi/ bos ma do brag pa gaM sa mas te de ltar
[/]@#// na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa bsgom pa nang ba yin no/// ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bsgom pa mang ba yan zhe na/
chu'adi la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags skyes ba dang/ khro ba skyed pa dang/ gnod sems kyi sems skyed na/ 'di snyam du sems so// chos 'di sa la skyo ba de yang rten cung 'brel bar 'byung
ba'o// chos 'di gang skya ba de yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung pa'o// rkyen gang dag gis skyo ba de dag kyang na cing 'brel par 'byung pa'o// rtan cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos gsog de dag la/
mkhas ba'i rang bzhin can gu zhag bdag la ma 'byin snyam ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sgom ba mang ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'

sgyu rgyun la ma khas ba yin zhen/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang bdag gi rgyud la skyon yod pa de dag spang ba'i phyi'i nan tan du byed/ gang gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa mi nus pa'i rang bzhin de dag la yang
btang snyoms su gnas so// skyon de dag gang zhen ) 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyasal 'am gro'abyed pa dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun dang bslab pa dang/ 'phags pa nyams dang/ tshangs pa mtshungs
par sbyod pa rgan rabs dang/ bar ma dang/ gsar bu rnams la yong mi byed pa ni skyon no// bdag la ri mor byed pa dang/ gzhan la brnyas pa dang/ khul la mngon du phyogs pa dang/ myan/
04 ]las 'das pa la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang/ bdag tu lta ba dang/ sams can du lta ba dang/ srog tu lta ba dang/ gang zag tu lta ba dang/ chad par lta ba dang/ rtag par lta ba dang/ stong
pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang/ rtag par 'dzan pa dang/ ma rtag par 'dzin pa dang/ 'phags pa rnams la mnyes par ma byed pa dang/ byas pa'i skye bo dang ston pa dang/ tshul khrims dung ldan pa yod/
su slong ba dang/ sams can tshul khrims 'chal pa la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang/ sdug pa'i grogs po la snyan pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su spong ba dang/ mdo sde zab mo spong
ba dang/ mdo sde zabago la skrag pa dang/ snyom las dang/ le la dang/ bdag la brnyas pa dang gza brjid chung ba dang/ spobs pa med pa dang/ gnas ma yin pa la 'gyod pa dang/
mi 'gyod pa la 'gyod ba dang/ 'gyod pa la ma 'gyod pa dang/ sgrib pa kun nas ldang bsargyugs pa dang/ g.yo sgyus bcings pa dang/ rmugs shing gnyid kyis gnon pa dang/ rnyed pa
dang/ bkur sti 'dod pa dang/ rus la 'dod chags pa dang/ gas la 'dod chags pa dang/ lta ba la 'dod chags pa dang/ yu la 'ded chags pa dang/ 'khor la 'dod chag
pa dang/ 'jig rten rgyang 'phen gyi gsang tshig la bstan pa dang/ dam pa 'chos 'a 'khyol ba dang/ yid m 'dor ba dang/ ma dge ba dang ldan pa dag la rtsol ba dang/ dge ba dang
ldan pa dag lam rtsol ba dang/ rab tu byung ba dang sdeb pa dang/ skyes pa dang stab pa dang/ bud med dang stab pa dang/ khye'u dang sdang da dung bu mo dang sdeb pa dang/ mu
gas na dang sdeb pa dang/ dgon pa la mngon par mi dga' ba dang/ zas kyi tshod ma shes pa dang/ bla ma'i drung du mi 'gro ba dang/ khra ton gyi dus mashes pa dang/ spyod yul gyi gnas
mi shig pa dang/ bslab pa phra mo dba' lus par ma byed pa dang/ sdig pa chung ngu rnan sa 'a 'dzugs par mi lta ba dang/ dbang bo gti mug gis bsgrubs pa dang ldan pa dang/ gsang ba la
dbang po krams pa dang rgod pa'i spyod pa dang/ bcos dka' ba dang/ bka' blo mi bde ba dang/ yid du 'ong ba dngang ) yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs dag la mtshan ma dang/ mngon
zla rtags su 'dzin pa dang/ khro ba rnams la semasam byams pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba rnams la Ang mi brtsi ba dang/ no bas skyo bar mi byed pa dang/ sha bsam skrag pa dang/
kun tu 'dar ba las mi 'byung ba dang/ lus la so sor ma rtog pa dang/ tshul khrims la so sor mi rtog pa dang/ ci byas ci byed nu bya zhes so sor mi rtog pa dang/ mi bsam pa
la sems pa dang/ mi brtags pa la rtog pa dang/ mi smon pa la smon pa dang/ mi 'byung pa la 'byung bar 'du shes pa dang/ ma dga' ba la dga' ba'i 'du shes pa dang/ lam
00 ]ma lan pa la lam du 'du shes pa dang/ ma thob pa la thob par 'du shes pa dang/ 'phral gyi bya ba la chags pa dang/ byed pa ngan pas g.yengs pa dang dge ba'i phyogs rgya chen po rnam par
song ba dang/ theg bachen po la mi bsngag pa brjod pa dang/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la bsngags pa rjod pa dang/ theg pa chen po la mngon par dad pa'i gang zag rnams la mi bsngags dang rjod
pa dang/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la mngon par dad pa'i gang zag rnams la bsngags pa rjod pa dang/ rtsod pa lhur 'an pa dang/ 'brab pa'i ngang tshul can dang/ brlang ba dang/ rtsub pa dang/
go thagacan dang/ spyi brtol chen po dang/ gtun pa dang/ gdug pa dang/ gang ma snyan pa dang/ mu cor smra ba dang/ mi gtsugs par smra bas smra ba dang/ ngan du skye bas skya ba dang
brdzun zer ba dang/ spros pa la mngon par dga' bo dang/ spros pa la gzhol ba'i skyon no// de de ltar skyon la mkhas pas spros pa thams cad dang bral bar bya ba'i phyi'i ) stong pa nyid
la sgom pa la rnal 'byor du byed de/ de stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang bas/ gnas gang dang gang dag la sems 'jug cing/ sems mngon par dad pa'i gnas de dang de dag la ngo bo ni/
yongs su btsal na stong par rtogs so// sems de gang yin pa de yang yo rngas su brtagasan stong pa'o// gang gso brtags ba dan nga stong par rtogs so// ded ltar/
rtogs pas mtshan ma med pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// de la nang gi mtshanam gang dang gang snang bar 'gyur ba de dang de dag mtshanamamed par byedad 2 nas kyang lus mi
dmags bdar lus la dran pa nye bar mi 'jog pa dang/ lus la sems mi gtong ba dang/ phyi rol gyi mtshan ma rnams mi dmigs pa dang/ phyi rol gyi mtshanam rnams ladran pa nye bar
sh+tsa mi 'jogad dang/ sems ma gtong ba de ltar mtshan ma med par byed do// de phyi rol gyi mtshan ma rnams dang bral ba drang/ lus kyi mtshanam rnams dang bra' bsazhunang gi mtshan ma rnam
spang ba'i phyir zhugs te sgom pa nangon par dga' ba skyed do// de sgomad nang bsartag tu sgom pa la brtson pa yan/ rgyun mi 'chad par zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pas
gnas pa yin/ de la zhi gnas na sams rtse gcig pa'o// lhag mthong na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos la so sor rtog pa'o// de sems mnyan por bzhag pas 'gyod pa mar nang
rab tu draga' ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar tshul khrims yongs su dag nga 'i phyi 'o// tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rnal 'byor sdod pa yin te/
tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams la na/ rnal 'byor yang dag par 'grub bo// tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnam sa ni rnal 'byor la spyod de/ de bas na rnal 'byor du spyod pa
rnams zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dug dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams ni/ 'gas kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang
chub sems dpa' mdo sbra 'dzin pa rnams lanano// bcu gang zhu na/ 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos kun basrung ba'i phyi'i thos ba 'dzin gyi/ zang zung gi phyir na gzhi ni/ bstan pa kun
bsrung ba'i phyi'i thos pa 'dzan gyi/ red pa'i phyi ma yin no// dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin gyi/ bkur sti'i phyir ma yin no// theg pa chen po la
yang dag par zhugs pa'i sams can rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyi'i thos ba 'dzazhigyi/ grags pa dang/ sgra dang/ tshigs su bcad pa'i phyir ma yin no/ mgon med pa'i
sems can rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin to// sdug bsngal ba'i sams can rnams la bde bar bya ba'i phyir thos nga 'dzin to// shesarab kyi mig dang bral ba'i
sems can rnams shes rab kyi mig thob par bya ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzan te/ nyan thos kyi thig pal sa nga dag par zhugs pa'i sa mas can rnams la nyan thos kyi theg pa'i lam bstan pa'i phyir
thos pa 'dzin to// theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sams can rnams la theg pa chen po'i lam bstan pa'aphyir thos pa 'dzin to// bdag nyid kyang bla na med pa 'i ye shes
ba kya/ khong du chud par byapa'i phyir thos pa 'dzan gyi/ theg pa chung ngu lan mi smon to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' mdo snga 'dzin pa rnams
d+ha nin/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa nas yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'dul ba mdo rab tu shes/ 'dul ba'i tshul
mnga' ba tu shes/ 'dul ba zab yang 'ab tu shes// 'dul ba zhab pa yang rab tu shes/ rung ba dang mi rung ba la rnga'ab tu shes/ rang bzhin gyi bsam blo ba yang rab tu shes/ bcas pa'i kha nas
thob yang rab tu shes// so sor thar pa'i bslab pa'i gleng gzhi dang 'byung ba yang rab tu shes/ nyan thos kyi 'dul ba dang 'ab tu shes/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba yang rab tushes so//
ragis kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dang 'tshog dang/ spyod yul
dang spyod pa dang/ spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// cu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ nyanaNos kyi bslab pa dag la shin tu bslabs po rnams yani/ rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab ba dog la
shin tu bslabs pa rnams lan/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dag la shin tu bslabs pa rnams lan/ de dag ni tu pa glabs pas na/ cho ga dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa rnams yan/

tsho ga dang spyod tshul phun sum tshogs pas dge sbyong gi tshul dang bskrun pa la zhi ba'i spyod tshul rnams yongs su spong ngo// de dag de'i phyir gnas ma yin par ma spyod yul ma yin pa dang/ dus ma
lane par mi spyod/ de dag dag sbyong gi spyod yul la spyod pas/ spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams 'a ni te/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram zes 'di lta ste// don dang mi ldan pa de dang/ des mtshang 'drar mad
la ba gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid la 'jog par byed do// de dag spyod yul phun sum tshogs pas/ spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa yan/ spyod lam rab tu zhi bas spyod lam bcos pa/
med pa dang ldan pa yano/ gas kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan no/ byang chub sems dpa' chog dang/ spyod yul drang/ spyod pa dang/ spyod lam kun sum tshogs pa rnamus yin no/
rigs kyi bu chos pa su dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' ser sna dang phrag dog dang bral ba rnams yin no/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa'i bdag
po yin/ gzhan yang spyan pa la yang dag par 'dzud/ sbyin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba rnams yan/ gzhan dag gis phyin pa la rjes su yi rang bar byed/ sbyin pa 'a bdag po gzhan dag la yang
gzengs bstod cing rab tu dga' bar byed ]gzhan dag la byanen yang 'di snyam du bdag cag la byin nuge/ gzhan lan ma yin no// bdag cag gir gyur la// gzhan dag ga'i ma gyur
tsa/ ga ces sems mi skyed/ 'di snyam du 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad 'tsho ba'i yo byad de dang dedag thob par gyur cig ces 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das[E]
pa'i bde ba dang ldan te bde bar gyur cig/ bdag gis kyang de nyid kyi don du 'bad par bya'o// btsal bar bya'o/ bdag cag gis ser sna dang phrag dog gi sams bskyed par mi bya'o zhes
sems bskyod do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dug dang ldan n/ byang chub se mas dnga' sar sna dang phrag dog dang bral ba rnams yin no/ ri gas kyi bu tshos dwacu dang ldan n/
byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ sams can thams cad ' snyoms par sbyor ba rnams yin/ sams can
thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad la gnod sems chod pa rnams ni/ sems can thams cad kyi don kho nar sbyin pa dag spyani/ tshul khrims srung/
babod pa skom/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed/ shes rab sgom/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par sgrub mod kyi/ gnyis la gnas pa'i sems
kyis sgrub pa ma yan gyi/ sems can thams cad la thun mong gi sems dang/ sems can thams cad la dmigs pas sgrub ste/ canas kyang ches nyid myur du thob par 'gyur ba de ltar sgrub bo//
da dag 'khor ba rab tu 'bar ba nas/ bdag nyid byung nas gzhan dag kyang 'byon te/ de yang mnyam pa nyid kyi sems nye bar gzhag cing 'byin gyi/ sdug nga 'i sems na yani/ khong khro bas/
ma yan no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na tshong dpon nam khyim bdag la bu sdug pa ('phangs ba/ byams pa/ yid du 'ong ba drug cig yod la/ bu de dag la tshong dpon nan khyim
bdag mtshungs par byams shing mtshungs par sbyor bar gyur pa las de'i bu de dag byis pa yin te/ gog pa/ mi shes pa/ mi mkhas pa dgacig la/ de nas tshong dpon nam khyim bdag
de'i khyim ma thar te/ de'i bu dug kyang so so na 'khod par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon namakhyam bdag de 'din sngar je dbyung ngo// de nas phyis 'di dbyung ngo
snyam de ltar sems sam/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhon/ bcom ldan 'das tshong dpon nam
khyin bdag de bu rnams la sems snyoms pasu de gang dang gang dag ji ltar 'jal ba de dang de nyid de bzhin du 'byin to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byas
pa lta bu'i sems can thams cad na byang chub sems dpa'i bu dang 'dra'i/ 'phags pa rnams ni ma yin te/ byang chub sems dang 'i de byis pa/ ma gsal ba/ mi mkhas pa/ 'gro ba drug
bo so so na gnas pa de dag 'khor ba'i mame thur pa nas gang dang gang ji ltar yongs su sman par 'gyur ba de dang de 'di da ltar 'byin to// byung nas kyang mya ngan las 'das
pa'i dbyangs zhi bar rab tu gzhog go/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n ) byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa rnamasaM yanano//
rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang/ rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
chos la mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byas pa yin gyi/ zang zang ga mchod pa sa na ma yazheno// nan tan gyi mchod pa dang/ sams can rnams 'phan zhing bde
ts+tsa bar bya ba dang/ sams can rnams la phana'adogs par byed pa dang/ sems can gyi don la zhugs de dang/ yi dmu mi gtong ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am mi gtong ba dang/ ji
lhar smras pa bzhin du byed pa dang/ yud yongs su mi skyo ba dang/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong bas/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod ba dang bsnyen bkur byas pa yin
gyi/ seng thang gi mchod pa sani ma yin no// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na ) de bzhin gshegs pa rnamasazhi chos kyi sku ste/ chos la mchod na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod bar
'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nanan tan gyi yang dag par grub pa yin te )sams can thams cad la phan zhing bde ba dang ) sa mas na than sa cad la phan
'dogs pa dang/ sams can gyi don bya ba'i phyir skya'o// rags kyi bu sems can gyi don de la nga yi dam btang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang/
brdzun du smra ba dang/ smras pa las nyams ba dang/ dam bcas pa las nyams pa dang ) 'di yongs su skyo ba dang/ byang chub kyi sems dang bral bas yang dag par thob par
mi nus so// rigs kyi bu deci'i phyir zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bla na med ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub semasacan gyi don la rag las nga ste/ gal te sems na rnamA
mdan/ byang chub sems dpa' rnan sa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro// de bas na rigs kyi khu chos la mchod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cing ma
gror byas pa lan gyi/ thang thang gi ma chod pas ma yin pa de ltar blta'o// jigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang ni gro lu
bo mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal bcom pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub
sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung nas rab tu byung ste/ bdag gi grogs po dang/ blon po dang/ gnyen bshes dang ) snag gi gnyen mdangs la sha ba dang 'dra'o zhes
ngargyal bcom pa yan/ bdag gi gzugasami sdug par khas blangs shang/ bdag gis gos kha dog mi sdug pa bgos te/ tshul bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes nga rgyal btsun pa yin/ sdud pa'i rgyu sngang ba'i
wA phyi'i mgo bregs shing/ lag na lhung bzed thogos te grong nas grong du 'gro'o zhes nga rgyal bcom ba yin/gdol bu dang 'dra bar drama' ba dma' ba'i soms kyis bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro'o
zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yan/ bad na bsod snyoms pa ste/ bdag gi 'tsho ba gzhan la rag lus so zhes nga rgyal bcom pa lan/b.rAs pa'i bsod snyoms ngan ngon len te zhes nga rgyal btsum pa yin//
sma bdag gis slob dpon dang/ bla ma dang spyan pa'i gnas rnams mnyes par bya dgos so zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yan bdag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la 'di lta ste/ cho ga dang/

shu spyod yul dang/ kun spyod pa de dang des mgu bar bya'o zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma thob pa rnams thob par bya'o zhes nga rgyal bcom pa an/ sems can khros pa dang/ gnod semA
can rnams kyi nang na bzod pa mang bar bya'o zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal bcom pa rnams yin no//
rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' dad pa mang ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pa'i rgyu phun sumatshogs pas ) bsod na//
kyis bstan pa rnams mni/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog/ gzhan gyis mi dkri/ ston pa gzhan med pas yang dag par lta ba rnams yin/ g.yo dang rgyus spyod pa dang bral bas bsam pa phun sum tshog
pa rnams yin ]gyi rgyu med pa'i rang bzhinatsan pas drang ba rnams yan/ dbang po rnobs shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yini/ rgyu dang bas sgrub pa dang kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba
rnams yani/ sdig pa'i grogs po dang bral bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'di bstan pa rnams yani/ legs par bshad pa tsho'i bsamangon pa'i nga rgyal med ba rnams yani/ chos bstan pa la
ma leg par 'dzin pa rnams yani/ rgya chen bo la sa pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba rab tu shes pa yin no/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
dad pa mang ba rnams yan no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sAl bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdagazhi de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i phyogs 'ga' tsam
zhag nyan par gsol lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i phyogs 'ga' zhig ngas bstan gyis/ legs par rab tu nyon la yad la
zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'dus legs so zhes byang chub sems dba' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sal ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
rakyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bude bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la thun mong ba'i byams pa chen po dang ldan te/ das de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar sems/
can gcig la khyab pa de bzhin du semasacan gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la yang khyab ste/ sems can gyi khams thams cad la khyabanas/ nam mkha'i khams la khyab kyang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i byams pa chen po mtha' dang ma shes pa yang mdado// ra gas kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thums rung dang
zla thun mong ma yin nga 'i snyingurje chen po dang ldan te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar sanan can gcig la snying rje ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la sAng rje zhing del/
phan pa mdzadado// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pan chos ston pa ma zad pa dang ldan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa du ma nas/ bskal pa brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa du
ma'i bar du rnamagrangs gzhan dang gzhan dag dang/ tshul gzhan dang gzhanadag gas sems can thamA cad la dus gcig tu ches ston kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan
[pa]pa zad par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ dri ba la lung bstan pa shin tu ston pa tshad med pa dang ldan te/ rigs kyi bu gal te sems can ji snyad sems can gyi gra dwa
su gtogs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'a dus gcig tu tshag dang yi ge gzhan dag gas dri ba lnga dad du dus kyang de dag 'a de bzhin gshegs pas skad cig thang cig yud
tsam gcig 'dras pa lung bstan pa'i ston pa bstan kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri ba la lung bstan pa'i ston pa zad par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhi gshegs pa nichags pa med
pa'i bsam gtan gyi spyod yul ba yan te/ rigs kyi bu gal te sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la gnas par gyur la/ de dag thams cad dus gcig tu ting nge 'dzazhi brgya stong
du ma snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin du snyoms par zhugs pa nas ) bskal pa brgya stong du mar ting nge 'dzin gzhan dang gzhan dag la snyoms par zhugs kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
ting nge 'dzin tam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi mtha' 'am mu ma red do// rngags kyi bu de bzhin gshegs ba'i tshad med pa'i gzugs kyi sku mgo par grub pa dang
ldan te/ rigs kyi pa gal te sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul bar gyur na/ de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa skad cig thang cig yud tsamagatsage la/ sanas
@#/ nanar re'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs nye bar ston to// gal te gzugs gzhan dang gzhan dag la mos par gyur na/ de lu yang de bzhin gshegs pa
skad cig thang cig du datsam gtsug gsusems canar re 'a mdun du gzugs gzhan dang gzhan du nye bar ston to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i spyan gyi yul tshad med de/ rigs
kyab lha'i spyan gyis gzigs kyi/ mab mag ma yin pa'asams can yod pa/ gal te rigs kyi bu grangs ngang bsam pa las 'dus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ma lus
dra kun de 'dra bar gyur kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pas phyag gam thalan skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzigs so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i snyan
gyi lul tshad med de/ gas kyi bu gal te de lta bu nyid kyisams can gyis mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de dag thams cad kyis skad cig thang cige
ud tsam gcig la sgra dang dbyangs brjod pa'i sgra lhan cig tu byung ste/ brjod kyang de bzhin gshegs pos de dag bdag bdag gi sgra rnams kyang so sor gsan to// so sor rab tu mkhyen to//
rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes tshad med pa/ mo zad ba/ nam mkha' dang 'dra ba dang ldan te/ rigs kyi bu gal te soms can gyi khams ma lus pa so sor rnam par rtog par/
0 rjes su rnam par rtog cing bsam pa rnam pa sna tshogs rjes su sems la so son las sna tshogs byed na/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas skad cig thang gi lud tsam gcig la sems can
'dzin 'di la rnam par rtog go/ sams can 'dzin 'di la sams so// sems can 'dan las 'ad byed do// de'i 'bras bu ni 'di'i 'gyur ro zhes rab tu mkhyen te/ de 'ang de bzhin gsheg
pas dug gsum cha la yang thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis skad cig thang cig yud tsam gtsag la rab tu mkhyen to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa rgyun
mi 'chad par mnyam par bzhag pago/ drages kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bstel ngas pa med/ dbang ngo bslad ba med/ sems 'khrugs pa med do// rigs kyi
bu de ci'i phyir zhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa na nyon mongs pa'i bag chags dang bcas pa thams cad spangs pa ste/ zhib/ rab tu zhi ba/ rta bar zhi ba'o/ rigs kyi bu gang la nyon mongs pa 'od/
pa de'i sems ni bslad par 'gyur te/ sems brgyad pas mnyam par 'jog da ra mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa na nyon mongs pa med pa/ rdul med pa/ thug pa med pa/ nyon
mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad spangs pa// chos thams cad 'dabang bamanyam pa nyade thob pa teng nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i spyod lul thams cad las byung ba late/ gal te rigs kyi
bu de bzhan gshegs pa spyod lam re re la yang ting nge 'dzazhi re res spyod pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de zhin du spyod cing/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lus kyitsho'i bar du spyod na//
gang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tunyanyam par bzhag pa lta ci smos ) rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa du ma yang dag par grub pa ma yin te/ shis kyi bu de bzhinagshegs/
b.lanidapag pa dang/ bsam ba dang/ rtag par minus so// byang chub sems dang 'a sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'dus bskal ba grangs ma mchis pa/
gsum gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang dag par 'grub pa ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal te/ rigs kyi bu ma yin no// rigs kyi bu de nu'i phur zhu na/ byang
rgyu chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul bsgrub par bya ba na bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de ni bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par mi nus kyi/ nam byang chub sems
rgya dba' chos mnyam pa nyid du zhugs par gyur pa de'atshanas brtsams te bskal pa bgrang bar bya'i/ thog ma'i sems nas brtsams te ni ma yin no/u0f38/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa
@#thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sus de bzhin gshegs pa 'chi ba 'di thos nas/ dga' ba dang/ dad pa dang/ rangs pa red pa'i sems can de dag ni/
skyed bde ba la 'gas par bgyid pa la las kyi sgrib pa spangs ba/ dad pa dang mos pa mang zhing byang chub tu nye ba lags na/ su dag thos nas 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/
kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ gzhan la yang rgya cher ston pa lta ci smos te/ bcom ldan 'das sams can de dag ring po mi thogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i re ba 'di 'dra ba dag nyid kyi snod
du gyur par mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa shu rags kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu su de bzhin gshags pa'i chu bu 'di thosabar 'gyur ba'i sams/
can de dag sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba yin no// dag ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa dang/ sangs rgyus mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mod
dag gis the tsom dang/ yad gnyis dang/ nem nur mi bskyod par bya'o/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ bags kyi bu mo gang gis nub bdun du yad 'a bya ba gzhan mdazhing/ sems ma 'khrugs
par bsam pa drag po dang dad pa drag pos zhugs te/ de bzhin bshegs pa'i zhi ba 'di rjes su sems la/ zhag bdun 'das pa dang/ des mchod pa'i cho ga nye bar bzhag nas/ gtsang
ngos gos ba/ngom bgos te/ dad pa mngon du byas la 'dug par byas te/ des de'i nub mo de de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de lta mi byed dam/ chog gtsang bar byedan
desems rtse gcig par 'gyur zhing/ 'chi pa'i tshayang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mdunan zhugs par 'gyur ro/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam/
yapar sal bas gsol nga/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di bshad na/ sems can gang la la mi dad par 'gyur ba ma mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di bshad na ) sams can gang mi kharbad nga/ rtsub pa/ tsha ba'i bsam pas gnod sems kyi sems skyed par 'gyur ba dang/ chos skya ba de yang dag
'du shes par 'gyur ba dag yod de/ de dag de'i phyir lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// yang rigs kyi bu sems can gang rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i
che ba ngashad pa 'di la dad pa red par 'gyur ba dang/ chos smra ba de la yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes pa dang/ ston par 'du shes skyed pa/ ragasakyi ba sngon yang de bzhin gshegrwa/
pa 'i che ba 'di/ tshe rabs dedang de dag gzhan la yang rags kyi bu de dag gis thos par nges par rig par bya'o// de nas 'khor der 'dus pa'i sams can kha cig 'di snyam du sems
te/ kyima'o bcom ldan 'das kyisaji skad du bshad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sngon bdag cag gis kyang thos pa lha zhig snyam mo// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tsho ljags
kyi dbang po phyung ste/ ljags kyi dbang pos zhal gyi dkyil 'khor mngon par bkab po// zhal gyi dkyil 'khor mngon par btab nas/ dbu mngon par bkang bo// dbu mngon par ra
