bkab nas/ sku mngon par bkab bo// sku mngon par bkag nas ( sang ga'i khri nangon par bkub bo// sang ge'i khri mngon par bkab nas byang chubs mas dpa'i 'khor
mngon par bkab bo// denus nyan thos kyi 'khor/ du nas brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba'i 'khor/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor mngon pa/rab kab
bo/ nganas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par bkab bo// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis ljags kyi dbang po phyir bsdus te/ thams cad dang ldan
pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ gas kyi bu 'di 'dra ba'i ljags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdzun gsung bar mi 'gyur gyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod rnams dad par gyis shagi/
rigs kyi bu khyed rnams mngon par dad par gyis shig/ den khyed kyi yan ring po'i don dang/ phan pa dang/ bad bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di
bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong gis mi skya ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob pa// srog chags brgya stong du ma na chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang
ku@#// bral zhing dri ma med parnam par dag go/ sngon sems ma skyed pa'i sems can du mas na byang chub tu sems bskyed do// ga'aphags/
pa dkon mchog spran bam po bdun pa ste tha ma'o// de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyas/ yang byang chub sanas dpa' sgrib pa thamasad rnam par sel ba la bka' stsal/
rigs kyi bu tshes bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' kun rdzob lamakhas pa rnams phan no// banu gang zhon/ 'di lta ste// gzugs gu yang 'dogs la/ don dam par na gzug
su yang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yang 'dogs la/ don dam par n rnam par shes
pa' lung mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so// sa'i khams su yang 'dogs la/ don dam ba nasa'i khams su yang mi dmags shing mngon par ma chags so// de bzhin
du chu'i khams dang/ ma'i khams dung rlung gi khams drung )nam mkha'i khams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams su yang 'dogasal/ don dam par na rnam par shes pa'i kham
su yang ma dmags shing mngon par mi chags so// mig gi skyomached du yang 'dogs la/ don dam par namag gi skye mched du yang dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so// de
0bzhin du rna ba'i skye mched dang/ sna'i skye mched dang/ lce'i skye mched dang/ lus kyi skye mched dang/ yad kyi skye mched du yang 'dogs la/ don dam par n yad kyi sku mched du yang mdamags la
mngon par mi rnams so// bdag tu yang 'dogs la ) don dam par na bdag tu yang ma dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so// sems can du yang 'dogs la/ don dam par na sems
can du yang mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so// gsogadung gso ba dang/ skyes bu dang 2 gang khrag dang/ shed las skyes dang/ shed bur yang 'dogs la/ don dam par
na srog dang/ gso ba dang/ skyes bu dang/ gang brag dang/ shed las skyes dang/ shod bur yang mi dmag sa shang mngon par mi chags so// 'jig rten du yang 'dogs la/ don dam
par na 'jig rten du mi dmigs shing mngon par mi chags so// 'jig rten gyi chos rnams su yang 'dogs la/ don dam par na 'jig rten gyi chos rnams su yang ma dmigs shing mngon
par mi chags so// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams su yang 'dogs la gdon dam par na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams su yang mi dmigs shing ngon par mi chags so// byang chub
tu yang 'dogs la/ don dam pa ra na byang chub dang khyadachub byed par yang mi dmigs shing/ de la yang mngon par mi mgos shing mngon par mi chags so// rigs kyi bu do
[7 ]@#// lta bsan/ gang mang dang 'dogs pa dang tha snyad de na kun rdzo ba ces bya ste/ kun rdzob kyi chos rnams lan don dam ba med rtsod kyi kun rdzob kyi chos rnams med par
la yang don dam pa bstan par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang gnas 'di dag la kun rdzob tu mkhas shing don dam pa yang na yazhi pa de ni kun rdzob la mkhas pa zhes
bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' kun rdzob la mkhas pa rnams na no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan/ byang chub sems
dpa' don dam pa la mkhas pa rnams lanano// bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta sta/ mi skya pa'i chos nyid dad ldan pa rnams yin/ mi 'gag pa'i chos nyid dang/ mi 'jig pa'i chos nyid dang/
mi lenAm 'dor ba'i chos nyid dang/ tshig gi spyod yul las yang drag par 'das pa'i chos nyid dang/ snar med pa'i chos nyid dang/ spros pa med pa'i chos nyid dang 3 brjod du med pa'i
chos nyid dang/ zhi ba'i chos nyid dang/ 'phags pa'i chos 'di dang ldan pa rnams yin// rigs kyi bu de pa'i phyir zhe na/ domadam par ni ma skya/ ma 'gag/ mi 'jig go/
mi len to// mi 'dor ro// la gi dgagis sna bar bya ba ma yin no// yi ga rnams kyis ma brjod do// spobs pas mi rtogs so// rigs kyi bu don dam pa'i
brjod du med pa ste zhi ba'o// 'phags pa rnams kyi so so rang gis rig pa'o// rigs kyi bu don dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyes kyang rung/ ma skyes kyang rung/ mi 'jig/
bste/ rigs kyi bu de'i bya'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smig gyon la'ang dag par dad pas khyimanas khyim med par rab tu byung// rab tu byung
nas kyang/ chos 'di kho na klob pa'i bya ba'i thu'i mgo 'am gos la ma 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'gas brtsams shing gnas so// gas kyi bu gal te donan pasodadu khran/ tshan
bar spyod pa don med par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ba yang don med par 'gyur ro// gang gi phyi do dam pa yod pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams
don dam pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu bo de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' don dam pa la mkhas pa rnams yanin// rigs kyi
chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub semasadapa' rten cung 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams lan no// bcugang zhen/ 'dilta ste/ chos rnams gsog nyid du rab tu shes gsod
nyide dang/ snying po mad pa nyid dang/ mag yor lta bu nyid dang/ gzugs brnyan lta bu chud dang/ brag cha lta bu nyid dang/ sgyu ma lta bu chung dang ! ma gnas pa nyid dang/ g.yopa nyid/
dang/ rtenatsang 'brel da ra 'byung ba nyid du yang rab tu shes so// de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ chos 'di dag na 'di ltar gsog/ 'di ltar gsob/ ji lta
snying po mad ba ) 'di ltar mag yor ltabu/ 'di ltar gzugs brnyan lta bu / 'di ltar brag cha lta du/ 'di ltar sgyun lta bu ) 'di ltar mi gnas pa/ 'di ltar g.yo ba/ 'di
sh+tsa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yin yang 'di dag skya bar yang snang ngo// gnas pa dang 'jig par yang snang ngosnyam mo/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ yang chos 'dirnamasaskyaba'i
rkyen ni gang rnams yin/ chos 'di rnams 'gag pa'i rkyen nagang rnams yin snyam mo// de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ ma rag pa'i rgyan gyis chos 'di dag skye ste/ ma rag pa las byung
ba'o ma rig pa sngon du 'gro ba'i// murig pa la brten pa'o// ma rig pa la brten nas/ 'du byed rnams 'byung ba yane/ 'du byed la brtan nas rnam par shes pa snang ba
'gyurago/ rnam daragos pa yod na/ mang dang gzugs su 'dogs par 'gyur go/ ming dang gzugs su brtagasan/ sgyu mched drug rnamasasu 'dogs par 'gyur ro// skyo mched
drug rnams yodan reg par 'gyur// reg pa bodan tshorab snang bar 'gyur to 2 tshor ba'i rgyus byas pa rnams srid pas len par 'gyur ro// srid pas 'gan len pa 'dzazhi to//
tsa len pa gzung na srid pa'i mtshams sbyor bar 'gyurar// srid pa yod na skyo bar 'gyur ro// skye ba yod na rga bar 'gyur ro// skyes bu gang brag na ba chos canani 'chi bar 'gyur re//
shi ba la gnas pa'i myu ngan dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ yi mug pa dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ 'di ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyuraro//
dalta bas na mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis ma rig pa spang bar nan tan bya'o// ma rig pagazhug pa dong ma ga ngalta banas dbyung ba dang/ ma rig pa 'gag pa 'i phyir nan tan bya'o//
mgo re 'gags pas/ ma rig pa 'arkyen las skyes dang/ ma rig pa las byung ba/ ma rig pa sngon du 'gro ba/ ma ga nga 'i rten pa'i chos 'di dag 'gag par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di
lta ste/ srog gi dbang po 'gagasan ) dbang po lhag ma rnams kyang 'gag par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ma rag pa 'gagasan/ mi shes pa la brten pa'i chos 'di dag kyang 'gag par 'gyur/
mi shes paspangs pas nyon mongs pa rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo// 'gro ba rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo// 'khor ba'i rgyuna rnams kyang 'gag par 'gyur ro// mya ngan las 'dus pa dang yang nye bar
'gyurano// gas kyi bu chos bcu bo de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n ]
byang chub sems dpa' bdag shes pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar ci ba dag bram ze'i rigs sam/ 'on te
rgyal rags sam/ 'on takhyim bdag gi rigs sam/ ci mtho zhing phyug po 'am/ 'on te dma' zhing dbul ba'i rigs su skyes sam/ gang du skyas snyam yongs su rtog ste/ de gal te
rigs mtho zhing phyug par skyes na yang/ de rigs kyisadregs par ma byed do// 'on te dma' zhing dbul ba'i gas su skyes par gyur na yang/ bdag 'di lta bu'i rigs su skyes pa las/

bdag gis sngon las 'dren mang byas so zhes de snyam du sems skyod ri/ de de'i rgyus skyo ba mang ba yazhi te/ skyo ba mang bar gyur nas rab tu 'byung ngo// rab tu byung nas kyang// bdag tsa'i phyir rab

tu 'byung zhes yongs su rtog ste ) badragan rang brgal nas/ gzhan dag kyang bsgralaM bar bya/ rang grol nas gzhan dag kyang dgrol bar bya'o zhesaMrab tu byung ngo snyam nas Da de de'i phyir la 'a lami
natsong snyoms las ma byed do// de bdag rab tu byung nas ) sdig pa mi dag ba'achos gang dang gang nub tsang yongs su zad de/ kun byang bar gyur ces yongs su rtog ste/ de sdig pa mi dag
ba'i chos shig spangs par gyur na ) de la dga' ba dang/ dad ba dang/ rangs ba bskyod do// gang ma spangs pa de dag ni sdang ba'i phyi'i rtsol zhing 'badado// da bdag rab tu byung nas dge ba'i
chos gang dang gang 'phel ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ rgyu char gyur ces snyam du yongs su rtog ste/ de'i dge ba'i chos gang dag 'phel bdang/ rgyas pa dang/ rgya cher gyur pa de la dga' ba dang/
dad pa dang/ rangs ba brgyud do// gang de ltar ma gyur ces snyam pa de dag 'phel ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ rgya cher bya ba'i phyi'i rtsol zhang 'bad do// de bla ma la brtanan dag pa'i chos rnamA
'thal bar 'gyur/ sdig pa rnams ni 'grib par 'gyur ro snyam yongs su rtog ste/ de rgyu de dang/ rkyen de dang/ gzhi des mkhan po nyung du thos pa 'am/ mang du thos pa 'am/ shes
pa 'am/ mi shes pa'am/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am/ tshul khrims 'a mal pa yang rung ste/ de la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed do// de ji ltar na ston pa la dga' zhing dad nga/
rtswa bar gnas pa de bzhin du mkhan po la yang khyad do// de la slob dpon rnams la rim gro yod tsang rjes yod pa yin te/ de 'di ltar slob dpon rnams la brtenan/ bdag
gi byang nub kyi phyogs yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams ni yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs ba ma spangs pa rnams ni spang bar 'gyur ro snyam du yongs su rtog ste/ de dag la
mkhan por 'du shes bskyed cing/ dga' ba dang/ dad ba dang/ rangs pa thob pa dang/ dge ba'i chos rnams la de dag dang 'thun par spyod pa yin/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams la
01/ mi'athun par spyod pa yin te/ da de'i snyam du bdag gi ston pa gang zhes yongs su rtog cing ) de 'di snyam du sems te// bdag gi ston pa na thams cad mkhyenang
thams cad thugs su chud pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la thugs brtse ba/thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa// sbyin pa'i gnas chen po ste/ lha nga/ mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
rten gyi ston pa'o snyam ste/ de rgyud dang/ rgyun de dang/ gzhi des dga' ba dang/ dad pa dang/ dus pa bskyod do// de 'di snyamadu sems te/ bdag gi ston pa bcom ldan 'das
de yan ban bdag gis redapa legs par rnyed de/ bcom ldan 'das des bslab pa'i lan gang bcas pa de las kyang bdag gis srog gi phyir yang 'da' bar mi bya ste/ de ltar na bdag
gis bcom ldan 'das de la rim gro dang rjes su 'brang bar byas par 'gyur// de 'di snyam du bdag su'i bsod snyoms la yongs su spyod des sems shang de 'di snyam du/
zla sams te/ bdag ni bram ze dung/ rgyal rigs dang/ grong pa dang/ yul gyima rnams kyi bsod snyoms la yongs su spyod kyis/ bdag gas nas kyang de dag gi bsod snyoms
'bras bu yod pa dang/ don che ba dang// mthu che ba dang/ bdag gis kyang yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms 'bras bu yod par yongs su spyod pa de ltar bya'osnyam mo/ de 'di snyam
0 du bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ grong pa dang/ yul gyi mi 'di dag 'du shes bya dang ldan zhing bdag la bsod snyoms ster snyam zhing/ 'di ltar rjes su sems te/ bram ze dang/
rgyal drags dang ) grong rdal gyi mi dang/ yul gyi mi 'di dag ni bdag la dge sbyong gi 'du shes dang ldan/ dge slong gi 'du shes dang ldan/ sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes dang ldan zhing/
bdag la bsod snyoms sbyin par byed kyis/ canas kyang bdag gis ni dge sbyong gi yon tan yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya ba dang/ dge slong gi yon tan dang sbyin pa'i gnas kyi yon
tan rnams yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya ba de ltar spyad do snyamamo// de 'di snyamadu bdag gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i skye ba 'khor ba las brgal bar gyur tam zhes sems
shing de 'di snyam du bdag gis dag slong gis tshul thob pa 'di ni rgal ba dang po'o// bdag dge slong gi yon tan dang ldan pa 'dazhi rgol ba gnyis pa'o// bdag le lo med cing chos de/
thob pa'i phyir/ canas kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i skye ba'i 'khor ba las rgyal bar 'gyur ba de ltar brtsona'agrus brtsams te gnas pa ra bya'o snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu/
deltar longos su rtog pa'i byang chub sems dang na bdag shes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag shes pa rnams yin no/
rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten shes pa rnams yanano// banu gang zhen/ 'di lta sta) khengs pa dag la dma' ba rnams yin/
nga rgyal can dag la nga rgyal 'du ba rnams yin/ rgya gyu can rnams la drang po rnams gan/ brdzun du sku ba dag bden par smrab rnams yani/ khami mkhas pa dag la snyan par smra ba rnams gzhi/ rtsub pa
dag la 'jag pa rnams yin/ khro ba drag la bgrod pa mang ba rnams yani/ gtum pa dag la byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin/ sdug bsngal bdag la snying rje ba'i bdag nyid can rnams yin
sar sna can dag la bgo bsha' byed pa'i ngang tshul can rnams yin te/ rigs kya ba chos bcu po de dag dang ldan/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten shes pa rnams mduno//
rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag ba dag tu skye'o// banu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ skyon med pa dang/ sra sramed pa'i tshul khrims dang
rgya ldan pas tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ sams can thams cad la sbyor bamanyam pas/ sams snyoms pa rnams yano/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mi chung bas dag pa'i rtsa ba rgya chen po//
dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gos pa med pas rnyed pa dang/ bkur sti dang/ grags pa dang/ rgya dang/ tshigs su bcad pa'i sams yongs su spangs pa rnams yin/ nem nur med pa'i sems
dang ldan pas dad pa rnams yin/ sems le la mad pa dang ldan pas brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yan ) samasam g.yeng ba dang ldan pas bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa rnams na
shesa'aba'achal da'i rang bzhin can ma yan pas mang du thos pa rnams yin/ shos tu rno bas dbang po mi rtul ba rnams yin/ gnod sems dang ldan pas byams pa'i bdag nyidatsananan
yin no/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par selabs gsolapa/ bcom ldan 'dasatsa tshos de dgatshogs pas sku bar 'gyur ram/ 'on ta la la ma tshang yang skyo bar
'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos tshogs pa de dag las gang gi sa cig khal tsag skyon mad cing ma 'dres la/ sa gye med de/ yongs su dag cing yongs su byang/
yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de la/ rigs kyi buchos de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyi'i chos de dag tshogs pas skyo'im tshogs pas ni ma yin te/ rigs
gyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyus kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sams dpa' rnams
mngol gyi dri mas ma gos par skye'o// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs byed pa dang/ mchod rten zhig pa bcos pa dang ) de bzhin gshegs pa 'i mchod rten dag la//
[z/ ]hubya// spos kyi byug pa 'bul ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dag la khros kyi sos nu 'bul ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la phug bar dang skyang
cho nul bya ba 'bul pa dang pha ma dag la lus kyi rim gro byed pa dang/ mkhan po dang slob dpon dag la lus kyi rim gro byed pa dang/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la lus kyi me
gro byedatsang de yang zang thang med pa'i sems kyis te/ thang khang dang bcas pas ma yin la// dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang 'di ltar/ dag ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad mngal gyi drims/
tsha gos par skye bar gyur cig ces yongs su sngo zhing/ de yang bsam pa thag pa nas sams pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n ) byang chub sems dpa' mngal gyi dri mas ma
gos par skyo'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams la nano// banu gang zhe na ) 'di lta ste/ nye bar
len pa med pa rnams yin/ 'du 'dzi med par spyod pa rnams yin/ yul la rgyab kyis phyogs pa rnams yin/ yul la sred pa dang bral ba rnams yan/ phu lagyi nyes pas mi
tshogos ba rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshul khrims bcas pa la rim gro byed cing brtsonapa dang/ shin tu bslabs pa rnams yin/ gos dang/ bsod snyoms nga/ mal
cha ngan ngon dang ) na ba'i gsos sman dang/ yo byad ngan ngon dag gis chog shes pa rnams yan ) lhung bzed dang/ chos gos dang ) yo byad la sogs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/
rtag par 'jigs pa'i bde dang ldan zhing yul rnams las skyo ba rnams yan/ dben pa la dga' zhing rtag tu bsgom pa la brtson pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag
dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas byung ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' 'tshob yongs su
dag pa rnams yan no// bcu gang zhe na ) 'di lta ste ) tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag gi rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams lan )gzhogs slongs kyi red pa dang bral ba rnams yin//
thob kyis 'jal ba'i rud pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ mi rigs par 'tshal pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos ma mazhi pa'i redapa dang bral ba rnams yin/ yongs su
ma dag pa'i rlud pa dang bral ba rnams yani// rnyed pa la zhan pa med pa rnams yan/ red pa la chags pa med pa rnams yin/ yongs su yi rgyad pa'i rang bzhin mang po rnams yan/
chos kyi rnyed pas chog shes pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag gi red pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la
byang chub sems dpa' ded pa'i rgya rnyed pa'i phyir/ lus kyi tshul 'chos pa mi byed/ ngag gi tshul 'chos pa mi byed ) sams kyi tshul 'chos pa mi byed do//
ji ltar na lus kyi tshul 'chos ma byedapa yan zhan/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa dang/ sbyin pa'i bdag po mthongan/ spyod lam mi 'chos so// ji ltaran spyod
lam ni 'chos shan ) gnya' shing gang tsam du lta ba dang/ skyo ba lta bdang/ sgrub ba med par lta bso/ gom pa ba sa kyis 'anas 'dor zhing 'dug pa ma yin te/ rdo
ltar na lus kyi tshul 'chos par mi byed do// ji ltar na ngag gi tshul 'chos pa mi byed can/ byang chub sems dpa' named pa'i rgyu red pa'i phyir gcom bskyangs shing smra ba ma yin/
'jam por skyab yani/ dga' bar sa ba ma yani/ rjes su 'brang ba'i tshig brjod pa ma yin no// de ltaran ngag gi tshul 'chos pa mi byed do// ji ltar na sems kyi tshul 'chos pa mi
byed can/ byed chub sems dpa'an sbyin pa byed pa 'am/ sbyin pa'i bdag pos red nga sa bstabasun tshoga'adod pa chung bar ston cing sems kyi 'dod pa skyed pa ma yan no// rigs kyi
pa 'di lta ste/ tshig gis 'dod pa chung lo ) sems kyis rnyid po 'di ni nang gi gdung ba yin te/ daltaran sems kyis tshul 'chos pa mi byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag gi med pa dang bral ba mnano// ji ltar gzhogs rlongs kyi rnyed padang bral ba yin zhen/ byang chub sems dpa'an spyan pa khyedapa 'am ( spyaneb da
mthong na/bdag gos kyis 'khongs so// bdag lhung bzed kyis 'phongs// bdag naba'i gsos sman gyis 'khongs so zhes gzhogs slongasam byed cing/ sbyin pa byed pa 'amaskrun po'i
bdag bo lami spong zhing gitum rjodade/ da de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhogs slong gi red pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na thob kyis 'jal ba'i red pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/
byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa dang sbyin bdag mthong na/ bdag sbyin pa'i bdag po che ge mo zhig gis dngos bo ma ge mo zhig phyin te/ de la bdag gas kyang phan pa ma ga mo zhig byas
so nas des kyang bdag la tshul khrims dang ldan par 'gi ste/ mang du thos pa'o/ 'dod pa chung pa zhes 'di dang 'di khyen no// bdag gis kyang de la 'di stong rje ba'i sems nye bar bzhag
ste blangs so zhes de skad kyi tshig mi brjod de/ de ltar na byang chub soms dba' thob kyis 'dral ba'i rnyed pa dang ldan pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sa mas dpa' ma rigs par 'tshal ba'i
red pa dang bral ba lan zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'an lus la rma byung ba dang/ sems la rma byung bar rnyed pa tshol ba ma yin no// de la lus kyi rmani 'di lta ste/ red pa'i
rgyu red pa'i phyir rgyug pa dang kun tu rgyug ba dang ) 'chal pa'i tshul khrims la spyod pa'o// sems kyi rna ni 'di lta ste/ red pa la sman ba dang/ tshangs pa mtshungs par
spyod pa gzhan gyis red pa dag la gnod semasamang ba ste ) de ltar na byang rlub sems dpa' ma rag par 'chal ba'i rnyed pa dang khral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos ma yin pa'i/
rong ba dang bral ba la zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' srang la sgyu med pa dang/ btsal ba la skya mad pa dang/ sa da brtan pa la gnod par byed pa med pa dang/ g.yos red pa mi sgrub
pa ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' longs su ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub se/
rgyu dpa' gang mchod rten gyi dang 'dres ba 'am/ chos kyidang 'dres ba 'am/ dga' dun gyi dang 'dres ba 'am/ ma byin par ma gnang ba de dag mi 'an cang bdag gir mi byed/ chags pa'i sems mi
spyad de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yazhi no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa la zhen pa med pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub
soms dpa' ridapa redakyang/ bdag giram khyod/ nor du mi brtsi/ tshogs su mi byed pa/ dus dus su dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ pha ma dang/ mdza' bo dang/ blon po dang/ gnyen
bshes dang/ snag gi gnyen mtshams dag la gtong zhing dus dus su bdag kyang yongs su spyod la/ longs su spyod pa'i tshi chags pa med pa dang/ zhen par med par yongs su spyod do//
nad pa ma red na yang skyo bsams mi skyed cing yongs su yi mi 'chad de/ sbyin pa byed pa dang ) sbyin bdag rnams la ma dad par ma 'dzin pa lan te/ de chos dang 'thun par rnyed pa/
dga' n gyir gtogs pa// de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags ba/ byang chub sems dpa' khasmad pa/ lhas bstod pa// tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pas mi dpyabs chog shes pa
yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa rnams yan no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub
sems dpa' mad yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi rgyu semasacan gyi phyir 'khor ba na gnas pas yongs sum skyo'o// sems can gyi rgyu
sems can gyi phu'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis yongs su ma skyo'o// sems can gyi don rnams la yongs su mi skyo'o// sems can gyi dgos pa rnams la yongs su ma skyo'o// se//
na gyi bya ba rnams la yongs su mi skyogo/ gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams lam ston pas yongs su mi skyo'o// de dag la dad pa mi byed do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
yongs su bsdugs kyang yongs su mi skyo'o// byang nub kyi phyogs tshogs yongasasu rdzogs par byakhas kyang yongs su ma skyogo/ bsam pa mya ngan las 'das/
par gyur kyang/ myang n las 'dus pa la mngon du mi ston du ma lta'i/ byang chub lagazhol/ byang chub l 'bab/ byang chub la bab pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos su
wA bo de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' yid yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegasal
rnams kyi bka' bzhin du byed ba rnams mnano// cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bag med pa thams cad dang bral zhing bag yod par spyod pa rnams lan/ lus kyi shin tu bsngams
b+hU/ shang lus kyi ngan du spyad pa mi spyod pa rnams Ani ngag gshin tu bsams shing/ ngag gi ngan du spyad pa mi spyod pa rnams yin/ yid kyi shin tu bsdams shing/ yid kyi ngan du
spyad pa mi spyod pa rnams man no// 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'jige sa shing mi dge ba'i chos thams cad rnam po'i sbrangs pa rnams lan/ rigs pa'i sna zhing mi rigs pa thams cad dang bral ba
rnams yan/ chos su smra zhing chos ma yin pa la stod pa rnams ni/ smad pa'i las rnam par spangs shing dgeba' las kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
bstan pa la sunam 'phyan cange nyon mongs ba dri nga ba'i yul thams cad dang bral b rnams lan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid yongs su mi spong zhing sdig pa mi dag pa'i chos rnams la srung ba/
rnams yin// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa rnanas mnano// 'gas kyi bu
chos bcu dang ldan na ) byang chub semasadapa' bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dbang bo shin tu ngang ba rnams mnano// dbang bo longs su
dag pa rnams yin/ dbang po gsal bo rnams yani/ dbang po dri ma med pa rnams yin/ dbang po 'ongs su byang ba rnams yan/ gnod sems dang dra la b rnams lan/ bag la nyal ba dang
bral ba rnams mni/ kun nas ldang ba dang bral b rnams yan/ thu ba dang mdud par 'dzin pa dang bral ba rnams lan// khong khro ba dang bral ba rnams la no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po
de dag dang sngonan/ byang chub sems dpa' bzhin 'dzum zhing khrogater mad pa rnams yagano// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sol bsagasol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsus pa'i don ji lta bu lags ba bdag gis 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbang bo yongs su dag pas na/ bzhani'adzum pa lags/ namongs pa rnams dang bral bsan/
khroganyer mamachis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ) gis kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbang mo longs
sudag pas na/ bzhin 'dzum pa yin/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bas na/ khro gnyer med pa mno// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dang 'a
mang du thos pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltaste/ 'khor ban 'dod chags kyi las rab tu 'bar ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhan du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang gi mas rab tu
btsa 'bar ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gti mug gi mas rab tu dkrugs pa 'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dus byas ni ma rtag pa'o zhes
zhi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal kha'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tushas so// 'jig rten na stong pa'o zhes yang dag paji lta ba bzhin
du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o zhes lang dgo pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tushas so// 'jig rten ni spros pa la mngon par dga' ba'o zhes lang dag ba ji lta ba bzhin
du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad n rkyen las byung ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin durab tu shes so//
de mang thos pa dang ) bsam padang ) bsgom pas shes kyi/ sgrar brjod pa cad kyis nan yin ta/ da ltar sa nas kyang/ snying rje ba'i sems brtan pa nye bar bzhag ste// sems can rnam
kyi don du rtsol zhing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom// gigs kyi bu tshos banu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'amang du thos pa rnams yin no/ gas kyi bu chos
bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos longs su 'dzin pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe 3 lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par
'jig cing bstan pa 'khrug par gyur pa dang/ sems can rnams laman par zhugs pa dang/ ye shes kyi sgron ma mya ngan las 'das te/ ston pa med pa'i tshe/ mdo snga rgya chen po rgya chen po don

zhing mthu che ba/ dam pa'i tshesathams cad kyi ma mo dang 'dra ba dag 'dzin cing klog la/ kha ton byed cing kun chub par byed pa dang/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher brjod cing ston la yang dag par ston pa'i
gas la bar byed pa dang/ de la zhugs pa'i gang zag rnams la dga' ba dang/ dad pa dang/ rangs par byed cing/ de dag la phan 'dogs pa dang/ zang thung med pa'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos
zhan pa dang/ chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la ston par 'du shes skyed pa dang/ dam pa'i chos la bdud rtsir 'du shes skyed pa dang/ bcud kyis len du 'du shes skyed pa dang/ rtsi'i 'du
[r/ ©]/ )shes skyed pa dang/ lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba dang ) brtsal nas kyang nan tan gyis sgrub pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag
dad ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams mnano// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan no )byang chub sems dpa' ches kyi rgyal po'i
sras rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus mtshan gyi rgyun gyisabargyun pa rnams yan/ lus dpe byad bzang po'i ma tog rgyas pa rnams yin/ dbang po rnam pa thams
cad kyi mchog dang ldan zhing shan tu yongs su rdzogs pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i gnas la rjes su rten pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhud
pa'i lam rjes su thob par byed pa rnams yin ) de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pa'i chos rnams khong du chud par byed pa rnams lan/ 'jig rten sdug bsngal ba yodongs su skyo/
ba rnams yin/ 'phags pa'i tshul 'ashin tu bsrubs pa rnams lan/ tshangs pa'i gnas rnams la shin tu mthur phyin pa rnams yan ) de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i thamA
cad na khyen pa nyid kyi pho brang na gnas pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams yin no//
rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na ) byang chub gnas dpa' brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang ) 'jig rten skyong bas bsu ba rnams yanano// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
las phyir mi ldog pa rnams yan/ bdud thams cad kyis mi bskul pa rnams yan/ sangs rgyas chos thams cad las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi tshul la zhugs pa
rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi na nyam pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yani/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin/ shin tu rtog pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnam
yani/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa rnams yan/ mi skya ba'i chos kyi bzod
pa thob ba rnams yin te/ 'gis kyi bu chos bcu bo de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong bas bsu ba rnams yanano
rigs kyi bachos don dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dang la bsam pa dang bgal nyal bshes panams yin no// bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sems can 'ded
chags kyi bsam pa can yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang gi bsam pa na dang/ gti mug gi bsam pa na dang/ dam pa'i bsam pa can dang/ b.ratsha
bsam pa can dang/ zhan pa'i bsam pa can dang/ dag pa'i bsam pa can da/ brtan pa ni bsam da na dang/ yun ring po'i bsam pa can dang ) sems can
gtum pa'i bsam pa can yang da ga pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing/ de yang sa mas can gcig la ji lta shes pa bzhin du sems can gyi khams kun la yang yang drag pa ji lta ba
sh+tsa bzhin du rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' bsan pa dang bag la nyal ba shes pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos
bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can longs su smin par bya ba'i chog shes ba rnams yin no// banu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis 'dul
laba'i sems can rnams la/ sangs rgyas gzugs nye bar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa'i
rgyu gzugs ]rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ nyan thos kyi gzugs
brgya byin gyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la// brgya byin gyi gzugs/ bdud kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'asams na rnams la/ bdud kyi gzugs//
0 tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sams can rnan sA la tshangs pa'i gzugs/ dran re'i gajugs kyis 'dul ba'i sams can rnams la/ bram ze'i gzugs/ rgyal rigs
kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ rgyal rigs kyi gzugs/ khyim bdag la gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ khyim bdag gagazugs ni bar ston to//
rigs kyi bu de ltar rnam pa gang gis sams can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de dang de byang chub sems dpa' rnams )bar ston to// rigs kyi chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin bar bya ba cho ga shes pa rnams yin no// gas kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' des pa rnams yin no//
bcu gang zhen/ 'dil ste/ drang ba rnams yani/ 'jam pa rnams lan/ glakhyu med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams lan/ gnod sems med pa'i gnas dang ldan ba rnams mne/ dri/
ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ rnam par dag pa'i sams dang ldan pa rnams yan/ mi b.rung ba'i soms dang ldan pa rnams yin/ rtsub pa sbyangs pa rnams yin/ brjod
mang ba rnams yin/ des pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sa mas dpa'adzes pa rnams yin no/ rigs kyi bu chos
@# cu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba rnams 'go/ bcu ba nga zhen/ 'di lta ste/ lta ba yongs su dag nga sa lta ba phun sum tshogs pa rnan na yin/ tshul
khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ chos yongs su dag pa rnams yani/ tshul dang ma 'thun pa'i spyod yul du spyod pa rnams yano/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med par spyod pa rnanas yin//
khong yangs pa rnams lani/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la rjed pa rnams yan/ skal ba mnyam pa rnams mni/ lam gcig tu zhugs pa rnams yan ! ston pa gzhan med pa rnams lan/
'gos kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n/ byung chub sums dpa' 'grogs na bde ba rnams 5no// rab sa kyi bu tshes bcudang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' bsdupa'i dngos
tsha po la mkhas pa rnams lan no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste phan pa'i sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud do// bde ba'i sbyin pa dang Da mi zad pa'i sbyin pa dang/ na bar sna ba dang/
don du smra ba dang/ chos su smra ba dang/ rigs par sla ba dang/ don dubyu ba dang/ zang zang gsadon 'thun pa dang ) 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis don 'thun pas sams can rnams sdud do// rigs

kyi bu phan pa'i sbyin pan gang chos kyi sbyin pa'o// bde ba'i spyon ban gang zang zing gi sbyin pa'o// mi zad pa'i sbyin pa ni gang lam gyi lung sbyin pa'o// khan par smra ba ni gang dge ba'i rtsa ba bstabs pa'o/

[/]don du smra ba na se ra yang dag pa'i bstan pa'o// chos su smra pa ni gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang 'thun par bstan pa'o// rigs par smra ba ni gang don rang dag nga ra chud mi gson pa'o//
don bya ba na ming mi dge ba'i gnas nas bsrung ste/ dag ba'i gnas su 'jog pa'o// zang 'ang ga don 'khrun pa na dang bza' ba dang/ btsa' ba dang bldag pa dang/ ltung ba dang/ gzhib pa dang/
ges la gol sa pa thun mong du longs su spyod bgo/ rigs kyi bu 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyi don 'thun pa ni gang gsar dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ ba rlung dang/ dung dang/ man shel dang/ byur
dang/ sa le sbram dang/ dngul dang/ rta dang/ glang po chadang/ shing rta dang/ bzhon pa thun mong du spyod pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i
bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams lan no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul shes pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
spyod 'am rab tu zhi ba rnams yin spyod lam sgyu med pa rnams yin/ spyod lam yongs su dag pa rnams yani/ blta na dga' ba rnams yin/ blta na 'jam pa rnams yin//
blta bas chog mi shes pa rnams yin/ blta na yid du 'ong ba rnams yin ) pat+tan sams na thams cad khong khro ba med par 'gyur ba rnams yin/ bldan sems can thams
cad semasatshim par 'gyur ba rnams gzhi/ blta na sems can thams cad kyi nyams dang bar 'gyur ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n
byang chub sems dang 'a tshul shes pa rnams yanano// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dang 'a gnas btsa' ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/
'di lta sta/ sams can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa dag las yongs su srung ba yin/ 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon ba nas 'don pa rnams yon/ 'khor ba'i rgyamatsho
las sgrol ba rnams yin/ mgon med pa rnams la gtan du gyur pa rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur pa rnams la sman par gyur pa rnams yin/
waM rten med pa dag la rten rnams yin/ gnas med pa dag la gnas rnams lan ) skyabamed pa dag la skyabs rnams yan/ gling 'ad pa dag la gang rnams yin/ dpung gnyen med pa
zla nag la dpung gnyen rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas bca' ba rnams yin// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang
ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsa'i rgyal po 'a shing chen po lta bu rnams yin// bcu gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po bstan bzang zhes bya ba de
ni rtsa bas kyang sems can nad pa rnams nye bar 'tsho'i// sdong po dang/ yal ga rnams dang/ lo ma rnams dang/ ma tog rnams dang/ 'bras bu rnams dang/ mthong ba dang/ bsnams
pa dang/ reg pa sa myangs pa dang/ reg pas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ nyon mongs
pa sna tshogs kyi nad kyi nad par gyur pa'i sems can rnanas sbyin pas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/
shes rab dar/ markeng ba dang/ thos pa dang ! yon tan gyi ro myangs pa dang/ bsnyen bkur bya bas kyang nye bar 'tshob yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/
byang chub sems da pa' rtsi'i rgyal po' shing chen po lta bu rnams yanan// bags kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams bya ba
la bgo ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dkon mchog gsum la ci zhus su bya ba byed pa dang/ sems canand pa rnams la rtse sbyor ba dang/ sems can
khakres ba dang skom pas nyen ba rnams la zas dang/ skom gyi sbyin pa dang/ rlung dang/ lhags pa dang/ nA mas nyen pa'i sems can rnams la dgab pa sbyin pa dang/
mkhan po dang slob dpon rnams la gus par rim gro byed pa dang/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la gus par smra/ phyag 'tshal/ ldang/ thal mo sbyor/
zhing 'dud nga ra byed pa dang/ kun dga' ra ba dang ) gtsug lag khang dang/ skyed mos tshal bya ba dang/ dus dus su nor dang/ 'bu dang/ mdzod dang/ bang ba gtong ba
wA dang/ bran pho dar/ bran mo dang/ las mi dang/ zhashas 'tsho ba la bgo bshas yongs su skyong ba dang/ dus dus su tshul khrims M drang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze la
bsnyen bkur byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams bya ba la brtson pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu
chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sa mas dang 'o sprul ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhin ) 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la ) sangs rgyas
kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yongs su 'dri'o/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang ma g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
rmol chos nyan to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang ma g.yo la// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngu mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byed do// sangs rgyas kyi
'ang gcig nas kyang mi g.yol/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo 'a ) sangs rgyas kyi zhing
dumar yang byang chub sems dang 'amangon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bo rnams la rim gro byed/ bkur sti byed/ paste stang byed ) mchod pa byed pa yin no// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig//
nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gciganas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang bdag
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar snang ngo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gciganas kyang mi g.yo la// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du marayang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar snang ngo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la ) sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang
sa nas can 'dul ba ji sAd kyi sprul pa 'gyedakyang/ de dag sprul pa 'gyed pa'i tshe/ rtog pa med cung rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no// byang chub sems dang 'a sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
bas gsol pa ! bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang lta bu byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa 'gyed na/ ma rtog rnam bar mi rtog pa lags ]batshaldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi khu
de'i phyir dpa nyon cig/ rdzogs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nyim dang zla ba ni gling ba'i sgrung bar byed cing/ sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa yin kyang nyi ma dang zla
ba ni bdag cag gi snang bar byed do// bdag na som sa can la phan 'dogs pa'o zhes mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon gyi las rnam par smin pa'i mngon par 'du shes pas
slob dang nyi ma gnyis kyi bya ba de lta bu 'byung ngo// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sprul pa 'gyed na mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ bsgrim pa dang mngon par 'du bya
ba ma byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sngon gyilas rnam par smin pas mngon par 'du bya ba rnams mngon par 'grub ba'i phyir te/ sngon byang chub re mas dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i
@# spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ de nas kyang rnam par rtog pa med par yang sprul pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar smon ma btab/ de lta de ltar mngon par 'du byas pa'i phyir ro//
rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa la mkhas po rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan n ) byang chub sems dpa' myur
duban med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhen ! 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa shin tu grub pas sbyin pa shin tu phun sum
tshogs po rnams yan/ tshul khAnI shin tu grub cang tshul khrims kyi phung bo skyon med pa dang/ ma 'dres pa dang/ sra sro med pa dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad:
las 'dus pa dang/ yongs su dag pa ) yongs su byang ba dang ldan pas tshul khromis shan tu phun sum tshogs pa rnamasayin/ brjod pa shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang/ brtson
'grus shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan shan tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang/ shes rab shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dung blabs shan tu
phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang/ smon lam shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang stobs shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang ) ya shosAshani tu grubatsung thun mong ma
lan dra'i ye shes nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 'dus pa/ sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sa mas dang 'a yan chad/ sa dgu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub semA
dpa' bar gyi ye shes 'a sa 'das pa drang ldan pas/ ye shes shin tu rdzogs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan nA/ byang chub sems dpa' myur
du sman med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub man par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'dabashad pa'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi
stong chen po 'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu 'gul te/ rab du g.yos par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'a'ajig rten gyi khams 'di ni
du/ ri'i rgyal po chen po ri rab dag gam/ ra btang bkrung ngam/ ri btang bzung chen po dag gam khor yug gi 'am/ khor yug gi ri chen pa dag gam/ dem yan pa rin po che'i
dang 'a nag po de dag thams cad kyang/ yul g.ya ga la ba dang ) ga ya mgo'i ri ga la ba de logasas bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi ngag pa bya ba'i phyir 'dud par gyur to// gang stong
gsum gyi stong chen po 'a 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na me tog gi shing ngam/ 'bras bu'i shing ngam/ sos kyi shing su yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i phyir ga
yamago'i ri ga la de logs su 'dud par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dgab pa 'bul ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas kyang na bza' dang rgyan gyi bye brag
sna tshogs kyi phung po'i ra ba tsam byas par gyur to// brgya byin dang [“]/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba brgya stong du ma'ang mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing thal mo sbyar ba byas te/ 'dud cing
bcom ldan 'das la me tog man ra ba dang/ man+da ra ba chen po dag 'thor bar gyur to// lha'i bu brgya stong du ma'ang nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas te/ gos g.yob cing ca codang ga na brgya stong
byed bar gyur to// lha 'am tog gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thob bar gyur cing/ kye ma'o dang 'jig rtan du sangs rgyas gnyis skyes par gyur to// kye ma'o chos kyi 'khor la gnyis
pa bskor to// sems can gang dag gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grags par 'gyur ba de dag kyang bsod nams dang ldan zhing/ dge ba'i las byed pa ste/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa
rnams la dag pa'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags pa yin no// gang 'di la dad pa red pa de dag lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes de skad du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de/ lto 'phye chen po brgya stong du
ma'ang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la chos kyi dgab pa bya ba'i phyir/ 'brug ltar sgra 'ur 'ur 'byin/ klog par byed/ shin tu sgrog par byed cing/ sos kyi sprin sna tshogs mngon par sprul te
stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang/ ga ya mgo'i ri la sbos chu'i char mngon par 'bebs kyang/ sems can rnams la gnod par mi snang ngo// lha'i bu mo brgya stong du ma dang/
btsem ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar glu'i nga ro'i sgra 'byin par gyur to// dri za 'am mi 'am ci brgya stong du ma'ang snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis glu len cing/ ga ya mgo'i ri dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la skor bar byed par gyur to// gnod sbyin bye ba brgya stong du ma'ang pad+ma'i char mngon par 'bebs par gyur to// bram tho dang ) rgyal rigs dang/ !
grong rdal gyi ma dang/ yul gyi mi brgya stong du ma'ang me tog dang// bdug spos dang/ spros dang/ 'breng ba nga pa/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ na babra' dang/ gdub/sa dang
rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dran dag gas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma dganas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi dgab par
bya ba'i phyir/ so so'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dag nas 'od ther mang po bkye bar gyur to// 'od zer de dag kyang kha dog tshogs/ gzugs sna tshogs snang ba sna tshogs can sha stab/
ste/ de 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang/ sur po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ le brgan dang ) shel dang/ dngul gyi kha dog ste// de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'i 'jab
rten gyi khams 'di la skor bar byed cing/ mun pa thams cad rnam par sal bar gyur te// 'khor nas ga ya mgo'i ri la bskor ba byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'a 'ang bskor ba byas
zla nas bcom ldan 'dus kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// rlung yang bde bar langs par gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa dang/ mchod pa mngon par 'du bya ba 'byung ba'i
! tshe byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis mi skyo ba'i chos la bzod pa thob po// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'ang chos rnams la rdul tshod cing
dram dang bral ba chos kyi mig rnam par dag go/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kyang sngan chad ma skyod pa las byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// de nas yang
ga ya mgo ni'i la gnas pa'i lha momi 'chib zhes byab dpung dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas te/ 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug 'dug pa las/ de stan las langs
nAs bdag gi gnas su song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa blangs nas/ pa phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la bkur stir byas/ btsun par byas/
mor byas/ mchod par byas/ bsti stang byas/ rim gror byas so// bkur sti dang/ btsun pa dang/ ri mo drang/ mchod pa dang/ bste stang dang/ rim gror byas nas/ bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshe rabs gzhan de dang de dag la ga ya mgo'i ri 'du nyid du chos kyi rnam grangs 'disangs rgyas stong phrag bdun cu rtsaganyis kyis
don 'di nyid dag dang/ tshul 'di nyid dag dang/ tshig dang yi ge 'di nyid dag gis bstan pa bdag gis mngon par dranano// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ma 'chi
ba de ltar khyod kyis dkon mchog 'byung ba de lta bu thos par gyur pa na khyod kyis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo// de nas 'khor der tshogs pa'i nang nas lha'i bu kha chuge 'ang sum du
sems par gyur to// lha mo 'dis de srid cage nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos la/ de snyad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mang po la bsnyen bkur byas kyang 'dis bud/
med kyi lus las ma bsgyur snyam pa dang/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dba'achen po sgrib pa khrums cad rnam par sel bas/ lha'i bu de dag gi samAs kyi yongs su rtog pa
sems kyis yongs su shIs nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar lha mo ma 'chib 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba
thob la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de snyad du mang ba zhig bstan bkur bgyis na/ bud mad kyi lus ma bsgyur ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal
lcab rigs kyi bu 'di la sems can kyi don ni rgyu'o// sems can gyi don ni rkyen no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rigs kyi bu lha mo mi 'chib ni/ rnam par thar pa bsamagyis mi khyab pa la
gnag ba/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ ma thu nab ste/gas kyi bu lhago mi 'chibs gang yang dag par len du btsud pa dang/ gzengs bstod pa dang/ byang chub sems bskyed pa las
yongs sumya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bgrang ba las 'das pa zhig ngos mno par 'dushes te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na lha mo mi 'chi ba ni rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu la
ste gas kyi bu lha mo mi 'chi ba 'di'i bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyid dumangon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ mngon
ba' rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang/ mi 'jib zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan
'das sa/ lha mo ma 'chib la bka' stsal pa// ma 'chi ba khyod kyis rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ston cig/ de nas lha mo mi'achib gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa
zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs dag gyur te/ lhamo mi 'chib gzugs thams cad yosas ston pa'i teng nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thug tu de'i tshe stong
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag mthil lta bu r mnyam zhing/ be rlud+ma'i gzhir smar bar gyur te/ ri nag po med rung shing tha mal pa med la/ gnas
gnas dgazhabang dpag khasam gyi shing stag snang bar gyur to// gnas gnas dab na chumag dang/ mtsho'u dang/ lteng ka dang/ rdzong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i nus
yongs su gang ba dag snang bar gyur to// mi phal pa med par snang bar gyur to// den bud med kyi sgra yang mi grag par gyur to// gnas dang gnas dag na pad+ma shing rta'i 'khor
[2]@#// 'a tsam dag snang bar gyur to// pad+ma de dag la'ang byang chub sems dba' gzugs sku'i mo krungadu 'khod pa sha stag snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'chi ba de'ang byang nub srems dpa' de dag la chos ston par snang ste/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten
skyong ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor cing/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dums mdun du bdar te )'di ltar chos nyid 'di kho na las btsums nas chos
ston par snang bar gyur to// de nas lha mo mi 'chi pa'ang ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ de nyid du mi snang/
lta bar gyur to// denas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrub ba thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang/
rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par bgyid dam/ kha ton bgyid dam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag
par ston par bgyidan/ de bsod nams ji tsam zhig skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis stong
[ar ]/gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems ldan rnams la sbyin pa lhug par phyin te/ de ltar spyani bas bska la dra brgya stong mang bo'i bya ba bas/ rigs kyi bu
'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bris/ legs par zhug te/ soms dad pas sems dad pa la byin/ de bas kyang 'di bsod nams mang du skyod/
do rigs kyi bu de ba'i phyir zhe na/ zang zang ga sbyan pan phran tshegs te/ chos kyi sbyin panardzu 'phrul cheba'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i sems can
rnams kyis khrang bang na rnam pa du mas myong gi/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi ro ni nam yang ma myong// 'jig rten pa ni ma yin no// rigs kyi bu gang la las stong gsum gyi
stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa 'a sams can rnams dag pa bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'du bkod pa bas/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/ 'dzani tum/
'chang ma/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan la'ang rgyu cher ston na/ de bas 'di bsod nams chesamang du skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dge ba bcu'i las
kyi lama rnams 'di las byung/ rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams rgyan du zhugs pa dang//
xxx
klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston na/ debs kyang 'di bsod nams mang du skyod go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos nyid 'di la yun/ nyan thos
dang rang sangs rgyas rnams snang bar 'gyur ro/ 1chos nyid 'di la rten na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snang bar 'gyur ro// chos nyid 'di la rten na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ba dang/ bgrags pa dang/ sprul ba dang/ kha ton byas pas// mdo sde thams cad bzung ba dang/
rmasngol ba dang/ kha ton myos par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phya'i zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'di na chos thams cad kyi ma mo ste/ rigs kyi bu chos nyid 'di la thob bar chos nyid rgya chen po thob par mi
'gyur te/ rigs kyi ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dul ba'o// denas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad stan las langs te/
bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de 'tshogs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang chos nyid 'di shes pa skye ba'i 'khor ba chen po bas ngan bgyis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dag
slong dag de de bzhan go/ de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhinano// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor mang po de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag sa phyogs
gong du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa dang ston pa'i sa phyogs de byang chub kyi snying por gzung bar bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gzung bar bya'o// mchod rtenachen
por gzung bar bya'o// bdag cag gi ston pa gnas 'di na bzhugs so gzung bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu dag de ba'i phyir zhen/ chos nyidi na byang chub bo/ chos nyid 'di ni chos kyi 'khor la
rab tu bskor ba// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pan chos kyi sku ste/ rigs kyi bu dag chos mchod pas de bzhin gshegs ba rnams mchod par 'gyur ro// sa phyogs gang nachos
lcab de gnas pa de la'ang mchod rten du 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ chos smra ba de la'ang bla ma'i 'dushes bskyed par bya'o/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes bskyod par bya'o//
'am ston par 'du shes bskyed par khyago/ chos smra ba de mthong dga' bdang/ dad pa dang/ rangs pa bskyod par bya'o/ rim gro byas te stan la bdar bar bya'o// chos smra ba/
de'i bsngags pa bskyed par bya'o// legs so zhes brjod pa mang bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu dag ngas bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par chos ba de'i bsngas
ba brjod kyang/ chos smra ba de la cung zad kyang phan par byas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/ bkur stir bya ba dang/ btsun par bya ba dang bsngags pa
brjodapa na gyin cung zad zad do// gas kyi bu dag gal te chos 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis chos smra ba de 'ong ba lam rang gi khrag gas chag chag byas
'a kyang chos smra ba de la ban bcung zad kyang byas pa med do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul bzung 'di ni dka' 'o//
rags kyi bdagachos skya ba des kyang/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa dang/ bstan pa dang/ yang dag par ston pa 'i tshe/ 'jigs pa med par bya'o// ma zhum pa dang/ snga ma gong ba
dang/ zhe ma 'gras pasanas dang/ gos gtsang ma bgos te dad pa bskyed par bya'o// bdag gis bsngags pa brjod kyang mi snyams pa dang/ nga rgyal du mi gzung bar bya ste/ bdag mi
stod/ gzhan mi snod cing/ des rang bde med pa'i sems kyisar mor byas te chos ston par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol te/
bcom ldan 'das dog sa'i phyogs gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa 'am/ bstan par 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs der chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad mnyan pa dang/ chos smra ba de la sman par bgyi ba'i
slad du/ bdag cag dpung dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas te mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka legs so legs so// khyod kyis de ltar gyis shig/ ke'u shika
khyod kyis de bzhi gshegs pa'i chos nyid yongs bsrung bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam nga na sel bag gsol ba/ bcom ldan
'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming 'dus 'gyi/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dkon mchog/
sprin ces bya bar zung zhig/ yon tan 'an po che'i 'byung gnas kyi le'u zhes bya bar yang zung zhag/ yi shes sgron ma zhes bya bar yang thung zhig/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas
zhus ba zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang/ byang
chub sems dpa' de dab/dang/ nyan thos chen po de dag dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang ) gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu la sogs
ba lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dag dang/ de ma yin pa gzhan lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri zu dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/
lta'aphye chen po brgyad stong dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon bar bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog sprinaces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba bar bar tsa na ra kri tadang/ d+harma tAsha las zhus te gtan la phab pa/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang b.rus 'gas so//
rgya gar skad du Ar+yadzAn ka sku dra bud+d+haa ba dAn/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyirtogs pa brjod pa shes ldan gyi mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag ga'i pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'dus yum gyi don du lha rnams kyi gnas sum cu rtsa gsum na/ shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi drung na la bdakar
po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs so// de'i lha bu zhig la snga ltas ngan pa lnga byung ste/ 'phreng rgyan brnyings pa dang/ gos banges pa dang/ lus drang bar gyur pa dang/ mchan khung nas rngul
tsho'adzag pa dang/ rang gi stan la dga' ba med par gyur to// skye ba'ang mthong ste/ yangs ba'i phag gi mngal du skye ba mthong ngo// des de mthong nas mya ngan gyis thebs/ smra sngags
'don/ brang rdung zhing du la ) na tu mog mog por gyur to// de nas lha'i bu gzhan zhig lha'i bu de ga la ba der song song ste 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu khyod 'chi bas 'jigs
sam snus pa ) lha'i bu bdag 'chibs 'jigs so// lha'i bu de ci'i phyir zhen/ bdag lha rnams kyi nang du sum cu rtsa gsum 'dar lha'i bza' pan zas/ lha'i btung bani 'thungs/
lha'i bgo ban bags na/ drenas phyir yangs pa'i phag gi mal du skye ba mthong ste/ der bdag bshang ba za zhing mche bar gyur te/ lha'i bu de lta bas na bdag 'chi bas 'jigs so//
snyas pa lha'i bu khyod 'chi bas ma 'jigs shig/ de ci'i phyir zhin/ lha'i bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsem pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
do yul gyi don du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas 'di na/ shing yongs 'du sa brdol gyi drung na/ la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs te/ tsa sa lha'i bu khyed kyis
bcom ldan 'das de la phyag tshol dang/ bcom ldan 'das de 'dir gshegs te/ des khyod ngan song rnams las grol bar mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das ni thugs rje chen pos sems can yongs su ma btang ba yin no// de nas lha'i bu de stan la lang te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas ) pus mo g.yas pa [u0f7a]lha nga sa la/
@#// ]btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legasasu thalamo sbyar ba btud nas ched du brjod pa 'di lan gsum brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de 'dir bshegs su gsol/ bdagangan song
wA du skye ba rnams las grol bar mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ lha'i bu de dag ga la ba der gshegs te/ gdan
bshams pa de la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu khyod 'tshibs 'jigs sam ) gsol pa/ bcom ldan
ts+tshA 'dus bdag 'gum ra sa 'jigs lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ yangs pa'i phag gamangal ma sdug par skye ba mthong lags ti/ der bdag skyes nas bshang pa 'tshal zhing mngon gyis
'gum par 'gyur lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag 'gumang sa 'jigs lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
lha'i bu khyod 'chi bas ma 'jigs shig ) de ci'i phyir zhen/ lha'i bu sa'i khams dang/ chu'i khams mi 'grom 'ong gi ) bdag nyid kyi las kyis 'ong zhing 'gro ste/ lha'i bu khyod tshur shog/
sangs rgyas la skyabs su song zhig/ chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song zhig/ de nas lha'i bu destan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo// bdag sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o// chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i bu de la rtogs/
bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig sangs rgyas lan skyabs song ba// de ni ngan 'gror 'di na mi 'gro ste// lha yi bdag 'di dngos po sbyangs nas su/ mi yi bdag nyid dngos po len pa'i
'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu
dga' ba'i bdu mdzad nas/ gdan las bzhengs te bzhud do// bcom ldan 'das bzhud nas ring po ma len par lha'i bude 'chi ba'i dus byas so// dus byas nas de ma thag tu
yangs pa der tshong dpon zhig gi chung ma dam da'i mngal du skyes so// de zla ba dgu 'dus nas/ khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po/
rgyas pa mchog dang ldan ba zhig btsas par gyur to// de btsas ma thag tu tshig 'di skad ces sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal 'go/ chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag
'tshal lo zhes brjod do// de nas de'i pha dang ma 'di snyamadu sems te/ khye'u 'di ni sangs rgyasashes/ chos shes ) dge 'dun shes te/ 'ang ni shes
ba dang ldan no snyam du 'du shes skyes so// de nas khye'ushes ldan gang gi tshe/ lo brgyad 'don pa lta bu r gyur pa de'i tshe/ 'a tsa byi gzhon nurab tu mang po rnams kyis lhan cig tumadun
pash+tsa du bdar nas/ skyed mos tshal gyi bzhi mdonas byung ngo// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das yangs pa'i tshal chen po na khang pa brtsigs pa'i khang bzangs na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan
'das snga dro'i dus kyi/ sad g.yogs dang chos gos gsol// lhung bzed bsnams te/ yangs par bsod snyoms la phyir gshegs so// bcom ldan 'das de mdzes pa nas
'od dang ldan pa'i bar du gyur pa khye'u shes ldan gyis mthongang// mthong nas de bcom ldan 'das la sems rab tu dga' bar gyur to// sems dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga lab
der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ rdzogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khye'u
shes ldan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/ ) bdag gis sngon gyi tshe dran te// sdug bsngal rnams las rab bkrol zhing// ngan song ltung ba 'a san bdag/ 'jig/
namagon gyis grol bar mdzad// mi mchog thugs na brtser dgongs te// bsod snyoms 'di ni bzhes par mdzadu// bdag gi gdugs tshod 'di dag ni// grol bar mdzad nas deng/
bzhengs ga/ sazhi bdag gi ba ma yi// snum bar 'dren bas brtser dgongs te/ dge slong kun dang thabs cig tu// gdugs tshod dgan gsol bar mdzad// bcom ldan 'das
cang mi gsung bar gyur pas/ khye'u shes ldan gyis ga la ba gnang ngo// de nas khye'u shes ldan bcom ldan 'das cang ma gsung bar gnang bar rig nas/ pha ma ga la ba der song ste/
ma la 'di skad ces smras so// yab yum bdag gis ni bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyon sa phul lags te/ sang yang gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so// de nas khye'u shes ldan gyi pham
mgu zhing dga' la/ ya rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ de'i mtshan mo bza' ba dang bca' ba ro dang ldan pa zhim pa mang po mngon par bshams nas/ yangs
ba'i grong khyer chen po than sa cad phyag bdar byas te/ dar gyi lda lnga btags pog phor nas smos kyis bdugs/ spos chus chag chag btab/ me tog gis mdzes par bkram ste/ de'i
mtshanamo 'das nas dus la bab pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod la bab ste/ gdugs tshod sbyar lags so zhes gsol to/ de nas
[7 ]bya/ 1/bcom ldan 'das de'i snga dro dgayogs dang chos gas gsol/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis mdun du bdar cing/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis mes
su bskor te/ shes ldan gyi pha ma'i byam ga la ba der gshegs nas gdan bshams pa de la bzhugs so// de nas khye'u shes ldan bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcasapagacan
labazhugs par rag nas rang gi lag gis bza' ba dang bca' ba ro dang ldag ba zhim zhing mang bdag legs par brims/ legs par gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol bar rig
nas so so so so la ras bcos bu zung dang/ sa so la lham zung dag phul lo// bdun ldan 'das la chos gos gsar pa gas marang/ chags gsar pa zung dag gsol to// gsar
gyi me tog dang dngul gyi me tog rnams kyis gtor to// gang mngon par gtor ba de dag tu sangs rgyas kyi ma sdus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug gi thad kar lang ba brtsegs pa bkra ba//
blta na sdug pa/ gru bzhi pa/ gnas bzhi dang ldan pa zhig 'dug ra ra gyur to// 'ad pa brtsegs pa der de bzhin gshags pa'i sku skyal mo krung bcas tachos 'chad cing bzhugs
pa des mthong ngo// de nas khye'u shes ldan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang/ cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab po de 'dra ba na grong nas/mgu zhing dag 'a banas
0/yid bde ba skyes pa'i bar du gyur nas/ bam ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dag pa'i rtsa ba 'di blun ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu bsngo sta/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des na/ bdag da ltar gyi bcom ldan 'das bzhin du sangs rgyas su gyur cig/ chos ston par yang gyur cig/ dge 'dun yongs su skyong bar yang gyur cig/
denas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye 'u shes ldan gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa shugs su chud de/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa nas/ spyi gtsug gi nang du nub pa'i bar du mdzad pa tshedang ldan pa kun dga' bas/
mthong ste/ don med par 'dzum pa mamadzad do snyam pa'i bar du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshadang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'a tshigs su bcad ngeslar bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' ngo
'di ltar shesaldan gyisan di bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa nas/ bsal pa bye ba dgu bcu dag tu log par ltung bar ma 'gyur la// de nas de ma thag tu rnam par 'dren par nye bar skye 'gyur te//
mtshan ni mkhyen gtso rgyal po zhes bya sangs rgyas 'jig rtan 'byung bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyan rtogs pa brjod pas ma gos rnams yang dag dga' byed cing// ma yi mkhas pa gang
gis thos nas dge ba mang po byed 'gyur te// rgya mtsho mthasagatugs dpog med lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas la// rab tu dang bas yon rnams phul ba'i 'bras bu chung bar
mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ khye'u shes ldan dang/ dag slong de dag dang/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi'adA
te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa shes ldan gyi mdo rdzogs so// rgyu gar gyi na khan po ba
ka ra sang ha dang/ sarba dzA de wa dang/ zhu chen gyi 'atsa ba ba dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ (a/ rgya gar skad du//
pa 'i san a ba danaM/ bod skad du/ dpal gyi sde'i rtogs pa brjod nga/ dkon mchog gisum la phyag 'tshal lago/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pan ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong
rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag gal te ji ltar na ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang shes 'a/ spyan pa'i bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin nga 'ang shes bzhin du san sa can rnams kyis
zakyang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang shes la/ sbyin nga ldi bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang shes su ban na ni/ de lta na kham gyi pha ma dang/ kham gyi mjug lus pa gang yan pa de las kyang/
gal te yon gnas len pa po red na ) de 'a ma byin nam ) bge bsha' ma byas kyi bar du tre bar mi byed la/ de dag gi sems kyang ser sna skyes pas kun nas dkris shing 'dug par ma gyur
ba zhig na/ ji ltar ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang shes la ) spyan pa'i bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang shes bzhin du sems can rnams kyi sbyin ba'i 'bras bu'ang mishes la/ spyan
ba bgo bsha'i 'bras bu rnam pa ra snyan pa'ang mi shes nga sa ni/ de'i phyir de dag ni kun tu 'dzazhi pa'i sams kyis ma byin pa'am bgo bshar ma byas pa ra za bar byed la/ de dag gi sam
kyang ser sna skyes pas kun tu dkris shing 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad dugasungasanas/ gzhan yang ston pas 'di
skad ces bka' stsal to// bgo bsha' dag gi rnam par smano// ji ltar don chen gyur pa de// drang srong cha rnams gsungs pa bzhin// sems can rnams kyisashis na ni/
ma byin bar du ma za zhung// ser sna can du ma 'gyur la// de dag kun tu 'dzad pa'i soms// naman kyang skye bar mi 'gyur na// gang phyir byas pa gti mug gsi/ 3bsgribs pa rnamA
kyi mi shes pas// de phyir kun tu 'dzin samasakyis// rtag tu ma byin za bar byed/ de dag ser sna skyes nas kyang// sems ni kun nas dkris shang 'dug/ gang gi tshe bcom
ldan 'das kyis mdo 'di bshad pa de'i tshe/ sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur cang/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku las 'od zer rnams byung bar gyur to// de nas dge slong rnams kyis
sa (@#// bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab cing rmad du byung pa 'di lta bu mthong na ngo mtshar skyes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rgya
mamachis rkyen ma mchis par zhi/ dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'di lta bu'i rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul ston par mi mdzadan/ btsun pa 'ad/
lta bu 'a cho 'phrul gyi rgyu gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag cho 'phrul 'di 'byung ba'i rgyu mnyan par 'dod dmaM/ btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo/ )dge slong dag
de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la lad la zung zhig dang ngas bshad par bya'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ rgyal po'i pho brang a ri b+hA zhes bya ba 'byor pa/
rgyas pa/ bde ba/ lo 'gas nga/ skye bo mang bo dang mis gang ba/ chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zhing du dbag tshod bdun pa/ gru bzhi ba rnam par 'byes pa/ gdugs dang/ rgyal
mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ rta babs bsgrung ba byung bar gyur ta/ rgyal bo'i lo brang der rgyal po dpal gyi sde zhes bya ba stobs kyi 'khor lo sbyar ba/ gzugs bzung ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na
rgyusdug pa/ kha dog bzang bo rgyas ba/ mchog dang ldan nga/ rang bzhin gyi skye ba dran pa/ chos dang ldan pa// chos kyi rgyal po/ ngos kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbang thug gi bdag po byang nga
zhig byung bar gyur to// rgyal po dbal gyi snga'i mthus shing rnams rtag tu me tog dang 'bras bur ldan zhing/ lha rnams dus dus su char yang dag pa ra 'babs la/ la dog shin tu
phun sum tshogs par gyur to// sems can rnams kyang nd med par gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyang phan pa dang byams pa'i sems kyas ba nas so// rgya' po de'i btsun mo
dam pa rgyal ba 'i 'od ces bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes ba/ bltan sdug ba/ yan lag dang nying lag thanas cad tshang ba/ yul gyi bzang mo// rgyal po dpal gyi sna'i shin tu
yid du 'ong ba dang/ sdug pa dang/ 'phangs ba zhig byung bar gyur to// dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi snga'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad la dpya dang/ shogam dang/ gru btsas
med de/ zhing gi 'byor ba dang ldan pa/ skye bo rnamasaM na ba/ khyim bya rnams dang ldan pa 'i yu la dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ yul 'khor rang/ rgyal po'i pho brang
byung bar gyur to// dge slong dag rgyal bo dang la gyi snga byang chub sems dpar gyur te/ thams cad ster ba/ thams cad yongs su gtong ba/ chags pa med par yongs su gtong ba
dang/ gtong ba chen po la zhugs nas tha na rang gi sha'ang gtong ste/ des ma byin pa dang ) yongs su ma btang ba ci'ang mang ngo// dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i rgyal po'i
pho brang a riba'i shar phyogs gyi grong khyer gyi mthar sbyin gtong gi gnas byas te/ spyan pa ni gtong/ bsod nams ni byed do//lho dang/ nub dang/ byang gi grong khyer gyi skor sbyin pa ni/
gtong/ bsod nams ni byed de// sum mdo'i dbus na 'ang sbyin pa ni gtong/ bsod nams ni byad do// 'di ltar zas 'dod pa rnam sa lan zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la na snyom/
bza' ba dang/ bca' ba dang/ mar ma dang ) 'phreng ba dang/ dri dang/ byug pa dang/ gos dang/ mal cha dang/ stan dang/ rgyab rten dang/ gnas dang/ gzugs rnams
dag shing rta dang/ glang po dang/ rta dang/ rgyan rnams dang/ gsar gyi snod dngul gyi bya mas yongs su gang ba rnams dang/ dngul gyi stong gsar gyi phye mas yongs su gang ba rnams dang
pa 'ang gsar gyi rwa dang/ dngul gyi rmig pa btags pa/ 'khar ba'i dazho snodadang/ ras zung gis bkab ba rnams dang/ gzhon nu ma rnams dang/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas/
sbyin pa ni gdong/ bsod nams ni byed de/ dge slong dag ji tsam du rgyal po dang la gyi sngas ji tsam gyis 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi thams cad phyug pa dang/ nor mang bang/ longs spyod che bar

'gyur ba de tsam du sbyin pa rnams sbyin no// yang de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang a riny+tsa'i grong khyer ka bya ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gi mi rnams gnas te/ rgyal po dpal gyi sda de ngag thams cad kyi
sngag pa dang/ yid du 'ong bar gyur to// gzhan yang 'di skyes pa dang bud med rnams kyis ma klong ban/ doms ngag 'gyur ba'i dga' ba thob po// dge slong dag rgyal po dang lagyi snga'i
bo stong phrag bcu gnyis ka da da/ blon po de rnams kyi na rog bgros chen po zhes bya ba mkhas pa/ gsal ba/ blo dang rjen nga/ thams cad la dbang byed pa/ rgyal ngo yongs su skya ba
par byed pa/ ) rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i sdug pa dang/ yad du 'ong ba dang/ 'phangs par gyur pa zhig byung bar gyur to// dus 'di'i gzugs dang/ kha dag dang/ rtags dang/ dbyi=
mang ban ngoms pa mad de/ skad cig kyang 'di dang mi 'a bra' la// dag slong dag rgyal po dang kha gyi sngas 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad dag ba bzhu 'i las kyi 'a ma la yang dag nga ra sbyar
te shes ldan dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi 'a ma rnams la rten nas// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di rnams yang dag par srung zhagi rjes dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
la yang dag par sbyor te/ dge slong dag rgyal po dpal gyi sdes de lta bu'i gdams ngag rjes su ston par gyur to// 'di lta ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i dus su gang 'dzam bu'i gling
pa 'i mi gong 'a la dus byas te/ lus zhig nas de lha'i ris drug tu skyes par gyur to// gang phal cher na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris su skyes so// yang de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum
gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i grong khyer pa lta na sdug ces bya ba lha'i tshogs kyis kun tu gang ngo// de nas der go skabs mang par gyur pa rang/ blta na sdug gi phyi ral
yangs 'du dang/ shing rta sna tshogs can dang ) dga' ba'i tshal la sogs pa'i skyed mos tshal rnams su gnas par gyur to// de nas sngon skyas pa'i sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i
tshogs kyis yang dag pa'i 'byor pa de mthong sta/ rab tu dga' nas lha'i ngabang po brgya byin lo 'di skad ces smas so// ko'u shi ka gang du ri'i rgyal po ri rab de nyid lha'i bu de dag gis gang sdu/
lha'i tshogs ni 'phal bar gyur/ lha ma yin gyi tshogs ni 'grib pa ra 'gyur ba'i ngomatshar 'di dag gzigs so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu rnams las thos nas/ ci'i
rgyal po ri rab thams cad la blta bar bsams pa dang/ ji tsaman ri'i rgyal po'i rab lha'i tshogs rnams kyis kun nas gang po mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sams te
rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis sems can 'di snyad cig 'dir skyes par gyur snyam na/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la blta bar brtsams pa dang/ ji tsam na rgyal po dpal gyi sda'i ma yin
gat+taM par mthong ngo/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sems rab tu dga' bas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la snus nga/ grogs po dag khyed rnams nyon cig/ 'dzam gling dbang phyug rgyal
po yi dpal gyi snga zhes rnam grags pa// rtag tu chos la gzhol ba dang// rgyal po chen po chos la gnas// thog ma bar dang mthar dag zhing// sams can kun la phan par dga'/
gtso bo ma rnams dge ba la// rtag tu yang dag sbyor bar byed// rtag tu snying rje'i bdag nyid can// phyi rol dngos po rab gtong zhing// de yi shayang slong ba la// rjes su brtse ba nyid kyis
stag// nang ngam yang na phyi rol la// de ni yongs su 'dzin madra par// rjes brtse 'ad kyis gtong byed cing// byang chub mgur dbyung ba la brtson// des ni rnam dag gsar bzhin du
'gro ba thams cad rab bsgrubs pas// rgyal po de yi mthu yis ni// thums cad mtho ris la gzhola'agyur// rgyal po blo gros che de yi// mthu yis su yang dmyal ba dang// yi
dgas dang na dud 'gro yi// skye gnas rnams su skye mi 'gyur// de yagabri brjed mthu yis// thams cad snang bar 'gro ba dang// sbyin dang tshul khrims dga' 'gyur bar// dga'
ba'i tshalan dga' bas rtso// dpal gyi sdo la rjes bstan par/ (gus dang bcas par gyur pa 'di// lha yi 'jig rten nyams dga' bar// de yang dga' b rnam par snang// denas
sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha de rnams kyis tshig thos pa dang/ yid dga' ba dang/ sams rangs par gyur te/ dga' ba'i sems su gyur cing ) 'di skad ces kyang sAs so// gang rgyal/
po 'di yan lag dang nyid lag kyang sbyin par gtong 'dod par rtsol ba ni ngo mtshar che'o// 'on kyang 'di ltar yan lag dang nying lag skyer ba 'di ni dka' ba ste/ bdag dang
mnyam par 'phangs pa gzhan med bas/ de ji ltar zhi bdag nyid chen po 'di rang gi lus kyi sdug bsngal ba la mi sems par yan lagadang nying lag sbyin pa gtong bar gyur te/ 'di ni rdzas
su dpag pa'i nus pa ma yin no// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po dag khyed rnams de skad ma smra zhig/ rgyal po 'di ni mthun ste/ rdzu 'phrul mo ba/ snying rje che bas tha na rang gi sha'ab
gtong sa/ 'di la yongs su ma gtang ba ci 'ang med do// ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig gi tshe/ btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od stan chen po la nyal banaM/ tho rangs kyi dus su rmi lam bzhi rmas te/
dpal gyi stan las bdag nying ba banas slar yang bteg par mthong ba dang/ rang gi mig phyung ste/ slar yang skyes par mthong ba dang/ bdag nyid kyi dpung pa g.yas pa 'di bcad de sa la/
lhung ba yang skyes par mthong ba dang/ mi ma yin pa dngul gyi rdo bcug pa'i mdog 'dra ba zhig gis rgyal po dpal gyi snga'i dpung pa g.yon pa mod la phyung// grogs nas slar yang skye
klu/ khar rmis so// gnyid sad pa dang/ 'jigs par gyur/ spu zing zhes byed de/ nga 'am lha la sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig 'byung bar mi 'gyur grang zhes bsams nas/ des rgyal po
dbal gyi snga la sbas so// de rmi ltas la byang ba yin pas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dis rmi lam ji lta bu mthong ba las na/ ring po ma thogs par chung ma 'de nyid slong ba 'byung bar 'gyur
ro snyam nas/ smras pa/ ma 'jigs shig/ sgyu ma lta bu'i mi 'an sogs nga sa ci zhag bya ) dang 'a gyi stan pa bdag nyid gnas da ra khyod kyis mthong ngam/ mig mi nyams par
dbazhin du 'dug pa dang/ bdag nyid kyi dpung pa g.yas pa de bzhin du yod pa dang/ nga'i yang dpung pa g.yon paganas bzhin pa nyid chos des dbugs phyung ba dang )cang mi sla bar
'dug go/ ji tsam na mtshan mo gnyisapal blon po 'i mchog blo gros chen po zhes bya ba'i rmi lam du rgyal po dpal gyi snga'i ban po che thams cad las byas pa'i khang bzungs no dal zhig po
dang/ na po che de rnams sha za mthong na 'jigs su rung ba rnams kyis phan tshun khyer ba dang/ slar yang khung bsrangs so sor sbyar bar rmis so// sad pa dang/ 'jigs shing skyag pa
dang/ yi mug ste/ snga zang zhes byed pa dang/ bsams nga/ sems can thams cad la mnyes ga ban pa dang/ lha dpal gyi sda'i sku lus slong bar mi 'gyur grang/ lha'ang thanas
cad sol ba/ thams cad yo gAsu gtong ba/ chags pa med par gteng ste/ 'di lta ste/ dman pa dang/ 'angab dang ) bkres pa dang/ sdug 'phongs pa rnams la 'di yongs su
ga/ mi gtong ba su'ang med do// rgyal po dbal gyi sde lan zhu bar mi bya sta )shin tu spro ba skye bar mi 'gyur grang/ de nas des gsang ste mtshan mkhan bos nas/ dam
bsgo ste zhes snyas pa/ shes ldan rjes 'di lta bu'i rmi lam rmis pa'i 'bras bu ji lta bu r gyur pa khyed kyis lung ston cig ! mtshan mkhan gyis smras pa/ rmi lam ci 'dra ba 'di las
ny+tsa'ang bo ma thogs par lha sku lus slong ba 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rmi lam bstan pa 'di lta bu de thos pa dang 2 blon po chen poblogros chen po sdug bsnga' drag pos gdungs shing/ mig
mchi mas gang ba dang lag nga 'gram pa la brtad de ) sems khongs su chud pa sa gnas nas/ dpal gyi sde byams pa dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can sems can thams cad la mnyes
tshugashin pa/ yon tan du ma dang ldan pa la/ mi rtag pa'i stobs nye bar gnas pa ni ha cang gyur chos so// de nas nub gsum pa 'ablon bo stong phrag bcu gnyis la rmi lam rmus te
khri yis rgyal po dpal gyi sde'i gdugs dang rtsod ban phrogs te slar yang byon pa dang/ skya bo thamasacad kyi mgo bcad nas slar yang byung ba dang/ rgyal bo dang 'bagyi 'dzam bu'i gling ga
